grave tool after he had made it a molten calf: and they said these
be thi god o israel which brought thee up out of the land of egypt

32:5 and when aaron saw it he built an altar befor it; and aaron
made proclam and said to morrow is a feast to the lord

32:6 and they rose up earli on the morrow and offer burnt
offer and brought peac offerings; and the peopl sat down to eat
and to drink and rose up to play

32:7 and the lord said unto mose go get thee down; for thi peopl
which thou broughtest out of the land of egypt have corrupt
themselves: 32:8 they have turn asid quickli out of the way which i
command them: they have made them a molten calf and have worship
it and have sacrif thereunto and said these be thi god o
israel which have brought thee up out of the land of egypt

32:9 and the lord said unto mose i have seen thi peopl and
behold it is a stiffneck people: 32:10 now therefor let me alon
that my wrath may wax hot against them and that i may consum them:
and i will make of thee a great nation

32:11 and mose besought the lord hi god and said lord whi doth
thi wrath wax hot against thi peopl which thou hast brought forth
out of the land of egypt with great power and with a mighti hand?
32:12 wherefor should the egyptian speak and say for mischief did
he bring them out to slay them in the mountain and to consum them
from the face of the earth? turn from thi fierc wrath and repent of
thi evil against thi peopl

32:13 rememb abraham isaac and israel thi servant to whom thou
swarest by thine own self and saidst unto them i will multipli your
seed as the star of heaven and all thi land that i have spoken of
will i give unto your seed and they shall inherit it for ever

32:14 and the lord repent of the evil which he thought to do unto
hi peopl

32:15 and mose turn and went down from the mount and the two
tabl of the testimoni were in hi hand: the tabl were written on
both their sides; on the one side and on the other were they written

32:16 and the tabl were the work of god and the write wa the
write of god graven upon the tabl

32:17 and when joshua heard the nois of the peopl as they shout
he said unto mose there is a nois of war in the camp

32:18 and he said it is not the voic of them that shout for masteri
neither is it the voic of them that cri for be overcome: but the
nois of them that sing do i hear

32:19 and it came to pass as soon as he came nigh unto the camp that
he saw the calf and the dancing: and mose anger wax hot and he
cast the tabl out of hi hand and brake them beneath the mount

32:20 and he took the calf which they had made and burnt it in the
fire and ground it to powder and straw it upon the water and made
the children of israel drink of it

32:21 and mose said unto aaron what did thi peopl unto thee that
thou hast brought so great a sin upon them? 32:22 and aaron said let
not the anger of my lord wax hot: thou knowest the peopl that they
are set on mischief

32:23 for they said unto me make us god which shall go befor us:
for as for thi mose the man that brought us up out of the land of
egypt we wot not what is becom of him

32:24 and i said unto them whosoev hath ani gold let them break it
off so they gave it me: then i cast it into the fire and there came
out thi calf

32:25 and when mose saw that the peopl were naked; (for aaron had
made them nake unto their shame among their enemies:) 32:26 then
mose stood in the gate of the camp and said who is on the lord
side? let him come unto me and all the son of levi gather
themselv togeth unto him

32:27 and he said unto them thu saith the lord god of israel put
everi man hi sword by hi side and go in and out from gate to gate
throughout the camp and slay everi man hi brother and everi man hi
companion and everi man hi neighbour

32:28 and the children of levi did accord to the word of moses: and
there fell of the peopl that day about three thousand men

32:29 for mose had said consecr yourselv today to the lord
even everi man upon hi son and upon hi brother; that he may bestow
upon you a bless thi day

32:30 and it came to pass on the morrow that mose said unto the
peopl ye have sin a great sin: and now i will go up unto the
lord; peradventur i shall make an aton for your sin

32:31 and mose return unto the lord and said oh thi peopl have
sin a great sin and have made them god of gold

32:32 yet now if thou wilt forgiv their sin--; and if not blot me
i pray thee out of thi book which thou hast written

32:33 and the lord said unto mose whosoev hath sin against me
him will i blot out of my book

32:34 therefor now go lead the peopl unto the place of which i have
spoken unto thee: behold mine angel shall go befor thee:
nevertheless in the day when i visit i will visit their sin upon them

32:35 and the lord plagu the peopl becaus they made the calf
which aaron made

33:1 and the lord said unto mose depart and go up henc thou and
the peopl which thou hast brought up out of the land of egypt unto
the land which i sware unto abraham to isaac and to jacob say
unto thi seed will i give it: 33:2 and i will send an angel befor
thee; and i will drive out the canaanit the amorit and the
hittit and the perizzit the hivit and the jebusite: 33:3 unto a
land flow with milk and honey: for i will not go up in the midst of
thee; for thou art a stiffneck people: lest i consum thee in the
way

33:4 and when the peopl heard these evil tide they mourned: and
no man did put on him hi ornament

33:5 for the lord had said unto mose say unto the children of
israel ye are a stiffneck people: i will come up into the midst of
thee in a moment and consum thee: therefor now put off thi
ornament from thee that i may know what to do unto thee

33:6 and the children of israel strip themselv of their ornament
by the mount horeb

33:7 and mose took the tabernacl and pitch it without the camp
afar off from the camp and call it the tabernacl of the
congreg and it came to pass that everi one which sought the
lord went out unto the tabernacl of the congreg which wa
without the camp

33:8 and it came to pass when mose went out unto the tabernacl
that all the peopl rose up and stood everi man at hi tent door and
look after mose until he wa gone into the tabernacl

33:9 and it came to pass as mose enter into the tabernacl the
cloudi pillar descend and stood at the door of the tabernacl and
the lord talk with mose

33:10 and all the peopl saw the cloudi pillar stand at the tabernacl
door: and all the peopl rose up and worship everi man in hi tent
door

33:11 and the lord spake unto mose face to face as a man speaketh
unto hi friend and he turn again into the camp: but hi servant
joshua the son of nun a young man depart not out of the
tabernacl

33:12 and mose said unto the lord see thou sayest unto me bring up
thi people: and thou hast not let me know whom thou wilt send with
me yet thou hast said i know thee by name and thou hast also found
grace in my sight

33:13 now therefor i pray thee if i have found grace in thi sight
shew me now thi way that i may know thee that i may find grace in
thi sight: and consid that thi nation is thi peopl

33:14 and he said my presenc shall go with thee and i will give
thee rest

33:15 and he said unto him if thi presenc go not with me carri us
not up henc

33:16 for wherein shall it be known here that i and thi peopl have
found grace in thi sight? is it not in that thou goest with us? so
shall we be separ i and thi peopl from all the peopl that are
upon the face of the earth

33:17 and the lord said unto mose i will do thi thing also that
thou hast spoken: for thou hast found grace in my sight and i know
thee by name

33:18 and he said i beseech thee shew me thi glori

33:19 and he said i will make all my good pass befor thee and i
will proclaim the name of the lord befor thee; and will be graciou
to whom i will be graciou and will shew merci on whom i will shew
merci

33:20 and he said thou canst not see my face: for there shall no man
see me and live

33:21 and the lord said behold there is a place by me and thou
shalt stand upon a rock: 33:22 and it shall come to pass while my
glori passeth by that i will put thee in a clift of the rock and
will cover thee with my hand while i pass by: 33:23 and i will take
away mine hand and thou shalt see my back parts: but my face shall
not be seen

34:1 and the lord said unto mose hew thee two tabl of stone like
unto the first: and i will write upon these tabl the word that were
in the first tabl which thou brakest

34:2 and be readi in the morn and come up in the morn unto
mount sinai and present thyself there to me in the top of the mount

34:3 and no man shall come up with thee neither let ani man be seen
throughout all the mount; neither let the flock nor herd feed befor
that mount

34:4 and he hew two tabl of stone like unto the first; and mose
rose up earli in the morn and went up unto mount sinai as the
lord had command him and took in hi hand the two tabl of stone

34:5 and the lord descend in the cloud and stood with him there
and proclaim the name of the lord

34:6 and the lord pass by befor him and proclaim the lord the
lord god merci and graciou longsuff and abund in
good and truth 34:7 keep merci for thousand forgiv
iniqu and transgress and sin and that will by no mean clear
the guilty; visit the iniqu of the father upon the children
and upon the children children unto the third and to the fourth
gener

34:8 and mose made hast and bow hi head toward the earth and
worship

34:9 and he said if now i have found grace in thi sight o lord let
my lord i pray thee go among us; for it is a stiffneck people; and
pardon our iniqu and our sin and take us for thine inherit

34:10 and he said behold i make a covenant: befor all thi peopl i
will do marvel such as have not been done in all the earth nor in
ani nation: and all the peopl among which thou art shall see the work
of the lord: for it is a terribl thing that i will do with thee

34:11 observ thou that which i command thee thi day: behold i drive
out befor thee the amorit and the canaanit and the hittit and
the perizzit and the hivit and the jebusit

34:12 take heed to thyself lest thou make a coven with the
inhabit of the land whither thou goest lest it be for a snare in
the midst of thee: 34:13 but ye shall destroy their altar break
their imag and cut down their groves: 34:14 for thou shalt worship
no other god: for the lord whose name is jealou is a jealou god:
34:15 lest thou make a coven with the inhabit of the land and
they go a whore after their god and do sacrific unto their god
and one call thee and thou eat of hi sacrifice; 34:16 and thou take
of their daughter unto thi son and their daughter go a whore
after their god and make thi son go a whore after their god

34:17 thou shalt make thee no molten god

34:18 the feast of unleaven bread shalt thou keep seven day thou
shalt eat unleaven bread as i command thee in the time of the
month abib: for in the month abib thou camest out from egypt

34:19 all that openeth the matrix is mine; and everi firstl among
thi cattl whether ox or sheep that is male

34:20 but the firstl of an ass thou shalt redeem with a lamb: and
if thou redeem him not then shalt thou break hi neck all the
firstborn of thi son thou shalt redeem and none shall appear befor
me empti

34:21 six day thou shalt work but on the seventh day thou shalt
rest: in ear time and in harvest thou shalt rest

34:22 and thou shalt observ the feast of week of the firstfruit of
wheat harvest and the feast of ingath at the year end

34:23 thrice in the year shall all your menchildren appear befor the
lord god the god of israel

34:24 for i will cast out the nation befor thee and enlarg thi
borders: neither shall ani man desir thi land when thou shalt go up
to appear befor the lord thi god thrice in the year

34:25 thou shalt not offer the blood of my sacrific with leaven;
neither shall the sacrific of the feast of the passov be left unto
the morn

34:26 the first of the firstfruit of thi land thou shalt bring unto
the hous of the lord thi god thou shalt not seeth a kid in hi
mother milk

34:27 and the lord said unto mose write thou these words: for after
the tenor of these word i have made a coven with thee and with
israel

34:28 and he wa there with the lord forti day and forti nights; he
did neither eat bread nor drink water and he wrote upon the tabl
the word of the coven the ten command

34:29 and it came to pass when mose came down from mount sinai with
the two tabl of testimoni in mose hand when he came down from the
mount that mose wist not that the skin of hi face shone while he
talk with him

34:30 and when aaron and all the children of israel saw mose behold
the skin of hi face shone; and they were afraid to come nigh him

34:31 and mose call unto them; and aaron and all the ruler of the
congreg return unto him: and mose talk with them

34:32 and afterward all the children of israel came nigh: and he gave
them in command all that the lord had spoken with him in mount
sinai

34:33 and till mose had done speak with them he put a vail on hi
face

34:34 but when mose went in befor the lord to speak with him he
took the vail off until he came out and he came out and spake unto
the children of israel that which he wa command

34:35 and the children of israel saw the face of mose that the skin
of mose face shone: and mose put the vail upon hi face again
until he went in to speak with him

35:1 and mose gather all the congreg of the children of israel
togeth and said unto them these are the word which the lord hath
command that ye should do them

35:2 six day shall work be done but on the seventh day there shall
be to you an holi day a sabbath of rest to the lord: whosoev doeth
work therein shall be put to death

35:3 ye shall kindl no fire throughout your habit upon the
sabbath day

35:4 and mose spake unto all the congreg of the children of
israel say thi is the thing which the lord command say
35:5 take ye from among you an offer unto the lord: whosoev is of
a will heart let him bring it an offer of the lord; gold and
silver and brass 35:6 and blue and purpl and scarlet and fine
linen and goat hair 35:7 and ram skin dy red and badger
skin and shittim wood 35:8 and oil for the light and spice for
anoint oil and for the sweet incens 35:9 and onyx stone and
stone to be set for the ephod and for the breastplat

35:10 and everi wise heart among you shall come and make all that
the lord hath commanded; 35:11 the tabernacl hi tent and hi
cover hi tach and hi board hi bar hi pillar and hi
socket 35:12 the ark and the stave thereof with the merci seat
and the vail of the cover 35:13 the tabl and hi stave and all
hi vessel and the shewbread 35:14 the candlestick also for the
light and hi furnitur and hi lamp with the oil for the light
35:15 and the incens altar and hi stave and the anoint oil
and the sweet incens and the hang for the door at the enter in
of the tabernacl 35:16 the altar of burnt offer with hi brasen
grate hi stave and all hi vessel the laver and hi foot 35:17
the hang of the court hi pillar and their socket and the
hang for the door of the court 35:18 the pin of the tabernacl
and the pin of the court and their cord 35:19 the cloth of
servic to do servic in the holi place the holi garment for aaron
the priest and the garment of hi son to minist in the priest
offic

35:20 and all the congreg of the children of israel depart from
the presenc of mose

35:21 and they came everi one whose heart stir him up and everi
one whom hi spirit made will and they brought the lord offer
to the work of the tabernacl of the congreg and for all hi
servic and for the holi garment

35:22 and they came both men and women as mani as were will
heart and brought bracelet and ear and ring and tablet
all jewel of gold: and everi man that offer offer an offer of
gold unto the lord

35:23 and everi man with whom wa found blue and purpl and
scarlet and fine linen and goat hair and red skin of ram and
badger skin brought them

35:24 everi one that did offer an offer of silver and brass brought
the lord offering: and everi man with whom wa found shittim wood
for ani work of the servic brought it

35:25 and all the women that were wise heart did spin with their
hand and brought that which they had spun both of blue and of
purpl and of scarlet and of fine linen

35:26 and all the women whose heart stir them up in wisdom spun
goat hair

35:27 and the ruler brought onyx stone and stone to be set for
the ephod and for the breastplate; 35:28 and spice and oil for the
light and for the anoint oil and for the sweet incens

35:29 the children of israel brought a will offer unto the lord
everi man and woman whose heart made them will to bring for all
manner of work which the lord had command to be made by the hand of
mose

35:30 and mose said unto the children of israel see the lord hath
call by name bezaleel the son of uri the son of hur of the tribe
of judah; 35:31 and he hath fill him with the spirit of god in
wisdom in understand and in knowledg and in all manner of
workmanship; 35:32 and to devis curiou work to work in gold and
in silver and in brass 35:33 and in the cut of stone to set
them and in carv of wood to make ani manner of cun work

35:34 and he hath put in hi heart that he may teach both he and
aholiab the son of ahisamach of the tribe of dan

35:35 them hath he fill with wisdom of heart to work all manner of
work of the engrav and of the cun workman and of the
embroider in blue and in purpl in scarlet and in fine linen
and of the weaver even of them that do ani work and of those that
devis cun work

36:1 then wrought bezaleel and aholiab and everi wise heart man in
whom the lord put wisdom and understand to know how to work all
manner of work for the servic of the sanctuari accord to all that
the lord had command

36:2 and mose call bezaleel and aholiab and everi wise heart
man in whose heart the lord had put wisdom even everi one whose
heart stir him up to come unto the work to do it: 36:3 and they
receiv of mose all the offer which the children of israel had
brought for the work of the servic of the sanctuari to make it
withal and they brought yet unto him free offer everi morn

36:4 and all the wise men that wrought all the work of the sanctuari
came everi man from hi work which they made; 36:5 and they spake unto
mose say the peopl bring much more than enough for the servic
of the work which the lord command to make

36:6 and mose gave command and they caus it to be proclaim
throughout the camp say let neither man nor woman make ani more
work for the offer of the sanctuari so the peopl were restrain
from bring

36:7 for the stuff they had wa suffici for all the work to make
it and too much

36:8 and everi wise heart man among them that wrought the work of
the tabernacl made ten curtain of fine twine linen and blue and
purpl and scarlet: with cherubim of cun work made he them

36:9 the length of one curtain wa twenti and eight cubit and the
breadth of one curtain four cubits: the curtain were all of one size

36:10 and he coupl the five curtain one unto another: and the other
five curtain he coupl one unto anoth

36:11 and he made loop of blue on the edg of one curtain from the
selvedg in the coupling: likewis he made in the uttermost side of
anoth curtain in the coupl of the second

36:12 fifti loop made he in one curtain and fifti loop made he in
the edg of the curtain which wa in the coupl of the second: the
loop held one curtain to anoth

36:13 and he made fifti tach of gold and coupl the curtain one
unto anoth with the taches: so it becam one tabernacl

36:14 and he made curtain of goat hair for the tent over the
tabernacle: eleven curtain he made them

36:15 the length of one curtain wa thirti cubit and four cubit wa
the breadth of one curtain: the eleven curtain were of one size

36:16 and he coupl five curtain by themselv and six curtain by
themselv

36:17 and he made fifti loop upon the uttermost edg of the curtain
in the coupl and fifti loop made he upon the edg of the curtain
which coupleth the second

36:18 and he made fifti tach of brass to coupl the tent togeth
that it might be one

36:19 and he made a cover for the tent of ram skin dy red and
a cover of badger skin abov that

36:20 and he made board for the tabernacl of shittim wood stand
up

36:21 the length of a board wa ten cubit and the breadth of a board
one cubit and a half

36:22 one board had two tenon equal distant one from another: thu
did he make for all the board of the tabernacl

36:23 and he made board for the tabernacle; twenti board for the
south side southward: 36:24 and forti socket of silver he made under
the twenti boards; two socket under one board for hi two tenon and
two socket under anoth board for hi two tenon

36:25 and for the other side of the tabernacl which is toward the
north corner he made twenti board 36:26 and their forti socket of
silver; two socket under one board and two socket under anoth
board

36:27 and for the side of the tabernacl westward he made six board

36:28 and two board made he for the corner of the tabernacl in the
two side

36:29 and they were coupl beneath and coupl togeth at the head
thereof to one ring: thu he did to both of them in both the corner

36:30 and there were eight boards; and their socket were sixteen
socket of silver under everi board two socket

36:31 and he made bar of shittim wood; five for the board of the one
side of the tabernacl 36:32 and five bar for the board of the
other side of the tabernacl and five bar for the board of the
tabernacl for the side westward

36:33 and he made the middl bar to shoot through the board from the
one end to the other

36:34 and he overlaid the board with gold and made their ring of
gold to be place for the bar and overlaid the bar with gold

36:35 and he made a vail of blue and purpl and scarlet and fine
twine linen: with cherubim made he it of cun work

36:36 and he made thereunto four pillar of shittim wood and overlaid
them with gold: their hook were of gold; and he cast for them four
socket of silver

36:37 and he made an hang for the tabernacl door of blue and
purpl and scarlet and fine twine linen of needlework; 36:38 and
the five pillar of it with their hooks: and he overlaid their
chapit and their fillet with gold: but their five socket were of
brass

37:1 and bezaleel made the ark of shittim wood: two cubit and a half
wa the length of it and a cubit and a half the breadth of it and a
cubit and a half the height of it: 37:2 and he overlaid it with pure
gold within and without and made a crown of gold to it round about

37:3 and he cast for it four ring of gold to be set by the four
corner of it; even two ring upon the one side of it and two ring
upon the other side of it

37:4 and he made stave of shittim wood and overlaid them with gold

37:5 and he put the stave into the ring by the side of the ark to
bear the ark

37:6 and he made the merci seat of pure gold: two cubit and a half
wa the length thereof and one cubit and a half the breadth thereof

37:7 and he made two cherubim of gold beaten out of one piec made
he them on the two end of the merci seat; 37:8 one cherub on the end
on thi side and anoth cherub on the other end on that side: out of
the merci seat made he the cherubim on the two end thereof

37:9 and the cherubim spread out their wing on high and cover
with their wing over the merci seat with their face one to another;
even to the merci seatward were the face of the cherubim

37:10 and he made the tabl of shittim wood: two cubit wa the length
thereof and a cubit the breadth thereof and a cubit and a half the
height thereof: 37:11 and he overlaid it with pure gold and made
thereunto a crown of gold round about

37:12 also he made thereunto a border of an handbreadth round about;
and made a crown of gold for the border thereof round about

37:13 and he cast for it four ring of gold and put the ring upon
the four corner that were in the four feet thereof

37:14 over against the border were the ring the place for the
stave to bear the tabl

37:15 and he made the stave of shittim wood and overlaid them with
gold to bear the tabl

37:16 and he made the vessel which were upon the tabl hi dish
and hi spoon and hi bowl and hi cover to cover withal of pure
gold

37:17 and he made the candlestick of pure gold: of beaten work made he
the candlestick; hi shaft and hi branch hi bowl hi knop and
hi flower were of the same: 37:18 and six branch go out of the
side thereof; three branch of the candlestick out of the one side
thereof and three branch of the candlestick out of the other side
thereof: 37:19 three bowl made after the fashion of almond in one
branch a knop and a flower; and three bowl made like almond in
anoth branch a knop and a flower: so throughout the six branch
go out of the candlestick

37:20 and in the candlestick were four bowl made like almond hi
knop and hi flowers: 37:21 and a knop under two branch of the
same and a knop under two branch of the same and a knop under two
branch of the same accord to the six branch go out of it

37:22 their knop and their branch were of the same: all of it wa
one beaten work of pure gold

37:23 and he made hi seven lamp and hi snuffer and hi
snuffdish of pure gold

37:24 of a talent of pure gold made he it and all the vessel
thereof

37:25 and he made the incens altar of shittim wood: the length of it
wa a cubit and the breadth of it a cubit; it wa foursquare; and two
cubit wa the height of it; the horn thereof were of the same

37:26 and he overlaid it with pure gold both the top of it and the
side thereof round about and the horn of it: also he made unto it a
crown of gold round about

37:27 and he made two ring of gold for it under the crown thereof by
the two corner of it upon the two side thereof to be place for
the stave to bear it withal

37:28 and he made the stave of shittim wood and overlaid them with
gold

37:29 and he made the holi anoint oil and the pure incens of
sweet spice accord to the work of the apothecari

38:1 and he made the altar of burnt offer of shittim wood: five
cubit wa the length thereof and five cubit the breadth thereof; it
wa foursquare; and three cubit the height thereof

38:2 and he made the horn thereof on the four corner of it; the
horn thereof were of the same: and he overlaid it with brass

38:3 and he made all the vessel of the altar the pot and the
shovel and the bason and the fleshhook and the firepans: all the
vessel thereof made he of brass

38:4 and he made for the altar a brasen grate of network under the
compass thereof beneath unto the midst of it

38:5 and he cast four ring for the four end of the grate of brass
to be place for the stave

38:6 and he made the stave of shittim wood and overlaid them with
brass

38:7 and he put the stave into the ring on the side of the altar
to bear it withal; he made the altar hollow with board

38:8 and he made the laver of brass and the foot of it of brass of
the lookingglass of the women assembl which assembl at the
door of the tabernacl of the congreg

38:9 and he made the court: on the south side southward the hang
of the court were of fine twine linen an hundr cubits: 38:10 their
pillar were twenti and their brasen socket twenty; the hook of the
pillar and their fillet were of silver

38:11 and for the north side the hang were an hundr cubit
their pillar were twenti and their socket of brass twenty; the
hook of the pillar and their fillet of silver

38:12 and for the west side were hang of fifti cubit their
pillar ten and their socket ten; the hook of the pillar and their
fillet of silver

38:13 and for the east side eastward fifti cubit

38:14 the hang of the one side of the gate were fifteen cubits;
their pillar three and their socket three

38:15 and for the other side of the court gate on thi hand and that
hand were hang of fifteen cubits; their pillar three and their
socket three

38:16 all the hang of the court round about were of fine twine
linen

38:17 and the socket for the pillar were of brass; the hook of the
pillar and their fillet of silver; and the overlay of their
chapit of silver; and all the pillar of the court were fillet
with silver

38:18 and the hang for the gate of the court wa needlework of
blue and purpl and scarlet and fine twine linen: and twenti
cubit wa the length and the height in the breadth wa five cubit
answer to the hang of the court

38:19 and their pillar were four and their socket of brass four;
their hook of silver and the overlay of their chapit and their
fillet of silver

38:20 and all the pin of the tabernacl and of the court round
about were of brass

38:21 thi is the sum of the tabernacl even of the tabernacl of
testimoni as it wa count accord to the command of mose
for the servic of the levit by the hand of ithamar son to aaron
the priest

38:22 and bezaleel the son uri the son of hur of the tribe of judah
made all that the lord command mose

38:23 and with him wa aholiab son of ahisamach of the tribe of dan
an engrav and a cun workman and an embroider in blue and in
purpl and in scarlet and fine linen

38:24 all the gold that wa occupi for the work in all the work of
the holi place even the gold of the offer wa twenti and nine
talent and seven hundr and thirti shekel after the shekel of the
sanctuari

38:25 and the silver of them that were number of the congreg
wa an hundr talent and a thousand seven hundr and threescor
and fifteen shekel after the shekel of the sanctuary: 38:26 a bekah
for everi man that is half a shekel after the shekel of the
sanctuari for everi one that went to be number from twenti year
old and upward for six hundr thousand and three thousand and five
hundr and fifti men

38:27 and of the hundr talent of silver were cast the socket of
the sanctuari and the socket of the vail; an hundr socket of the
hundr talent a talent for a socket

38:28 and of the thousand seven hundr seventi and five shekel he
made hook for the pillar and overlaid their chapit and fillet
them

38:29 and the brass of the offer wa seventi talent and two
thousand and four hundr shekel

38:30 and therewith he made the socket to the door of the tabernacl
of the congreg and the brasen altar and the brasen grate for
it and all the vessel of the altar 38:31 and the socket of the
court round about and the socket of the court gate and all the pin
of the tabernacl and all the pin of the court round about

39:1 and of the blue and purpl and scarlet they made cloth of
servic to do servic in the holi place and made the holi garment
for aaron; as the lord command mose

39:2 and he made the ephod of gold blue and purpl and scarlet and
fine twine linen

39:3 and they did beat the gold into thin plate and cut it into
wire to work it in the blue and in the purpl and in the scarlet
and in the fine linen with cun work

39:4 they made shoulderpiec for it to coupl it together: by the
two edg wa it coupl togeth

39:5 and the curiou girdl of hi ephod that wa upon it wa of the
same accord to the work thereof; of gold blue and purpl and
scarlet and fine twine linen; as the lord command mose

39:6 and they wrought onyx stone inclos in ouch of gold graven
as signet are graven with the name of the children of israel

39:7 and he put them on the shoulder of the ephod that they should
be stone for a memori to the children of israel; as the lord
command mose

39:8 and he made the breastplat of cun work like the work of the
ephod; of gold blue and purpl and scarlet and fine twine linen

39:9 it wa foursquare; they made the breastplat double: a span wa
the length thereof and a span the breadth thereof be doubl

39:10 and they set in it four row of stones: the first row wa a
sardiu a topaz and a carbuncle: thi wa the first row

39:11 and the second row an emerald a sapphir and a diamond

39:12 and the third row a ligur an agat and an amethyst

39:13 and the fourth row a beryl an onyx and a jasper: they were
inclos in ouch of gold in their inclos

39:14 and the stone were accord to the name of the children of
israel twelv accord to their name like the engrav of a
signet everi one with hi name accord to the twelv tribe

39:15 and they made upon the breastplat chain at the end of
wreathen work of pure gold

39:16 and they made two ouch of gold and two gold rings; and put
the two ring in the two end of the breastplat

39:17 and they put the two wreathen chain of gold in the two ring on
the end of the breastplat

39:18 and the two end of the two wreathen chain they fasten in the
two ouch and put them on the shoulderpiec of the ephod befor
it

39:19 and they made two ring of gold and put them on the two end of
the breastplat upon the border of it which wa on the side of the
ephod inward

39:20 and they made two other golden ring and put them on the two
side of the ephod underneath toward the forepart of it over against
the other coupl thereof abov the curiou girdl of the ephod

39:21 and they did bind the breastplat by hi ring unto the ring of
the ephod with a lace of blue that it might be abov the curiou
girdl of the ephod and that the breastplat might not be loos from
the ephod; as the lord command mose

39:22 and he made the robe of the ephod of woven work all of blue

39:23 and there wa an hole in the midst of the robe as the hole of
an habergeon with a band round about the hole that it should not
rend

39:24 and they made upon the hem of the robe pomegran of blue
and purpl and scarlet and twine linen

39:25 and they made bell of pure gold and put the bell between the
pomegran upon the hem of the robe round about between the
pomegranates; 39:26 a bell and a pomegran a bell and a
pomegran round about the hem of the robe to minist in; as the
lord command mose

39:27 and they made coat of fine linen of woven work for aaron and
for hi son 39:28 and a mitr of fine linen and goodli bonnet of
fine linen and linen breech of fine twine linen 39:29 and a
girdl of fine twine linen and blue and purpl and scarlet of
needlework; as the lord command mose

39:30 and they made the plate of the holi crown of pure gold and
wrote upon it a write like to the engrav of a signet holi
to the lord

39:31 and they tie unto it a lace of blue to fasten it on high upon
the mitre; as the lord command mose

39:32 thu wa all the work of the tabernacl of the tent of the
congreg finished: and the children of israel did accord to all
that the lord command mose so did they

39:33 and they brought the tabernacl unto mose the tent and all
hi furnitur hi tach hi board hi bar and hi pillar and
hi socket 39:34 and the cover of ram skin dy red and the
cover of badger skin and the vail of the cover 39:35 the
ark of the testimoni and the stave thereof and the merci seat
39:36 the tabl and all the vessel thereof and the shewbread 39:37
the pure candlestick with the lamp thereof even with the lamp to
be set in order and all the vessel thereof and the oil for light
39:38 and the golden altar and the anoint oil and the sweet
incens and the hang for the tabernacl door 39:39 the brasen
altar and hi grate of brass hi stave and all hi vessel the
laver and hi foot 39:40 the hang of the court hi pillar and
hi socket and the hang for the court gate hi cord and hi
pin and all the vessel of the servic of the tabernacl for the
tent of the congreg 39:41 the cloth of servic to do servic in
the holi place and the holi garment for aaron the priest and hi
son garment to minist in the priest offic

39:42 accord to all that the lord command mose so the children
of israel made all the work

39:43 and mose did look upon all the work and behold they had done
it as the lord had command even so had they done it: and mose
bless them

40:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 40:2 on the first day of
the first month shalt thou set up the tabernacl of the tent of the
congreg

40:3 and thou shalt put therein the ark of the testimoni and cover
the ark with the vail

40:4 and thou shalt bring in the tabl and set in order the thing
that are to be set in order upon it; and thou shalt bring in the
candlestick and light the lamp thereof

40:5 and thou shalt set the altar of gold for the incens befor the
ark of the testimoni and put the hang of the door to the
tabernacl

40:6 and thou shalt set the altar of the burnt offer befor the
door of the tabernacl of the tent of the congreg

40:7 and thou shalt set the laver between the tent of the congreg
and the altar and shalt put water therein

40:8 and thou shalt set up the court round about and hang up the
hang at the court gate

40:9 and thou shalt take the anoint oil and anoint the tabernacl
and all that is therein and shalt hallow it and all the vessel
thereof: and it shall be holi

40:10 and thou shalt anoint the altar of the burnt offer and all
hi vessel and sanctifi the altar: and it shall be an altar most
holi

40:11 and thou shalt anoint the laver and hi foot and sanctifi it

40:12 and thou shalt bring aaron and hi son unto the door of the
tabernacl of the congreg and wash them with water

40:13 and thou shalt put upon aaron the holi garment and anoint him
and sanctifi him; that he may minist unto me in the priest offic

40:14 and thou shalt bring hi son and cloth them with coats: 40:15
and thou shalt anoint them as thou didst anoint their father that
they may minist unto me in the priest office: for their anoint
shall sure be an everlast priesthood throughout their
gener

40:16 thu did moses: accord to all that the lord command him so
did he

40:17 and it came to pass in the first month in the second year on
the first day of the month that the tabernacl wa rear up

40:18 and mose rear up the tabernacl and fasten hi socket
and set up the board thereof and put in the bar thereof and rear
up hi pillar

40:19 and he spread abroad the tent over the tabernacl and put the
cover of the tent abov upon it; as the lord command mose

40:20 and he took and put the testimoni into the ark and set the
stave on the ark and put the merci seat abov upon the ark: 40:21
and he brought the ark into the tabernacl and set up the vail of the
cover and cover the ark of the testimony; as the lord command
mose

40:22 and he put the tabl in the tent of the congreg upon the
side of the tabernacl northward without the vail

40:23 and he set the bread in order upon it befor the lord; as the
lord had command mose

40:24 and he put the candlestick in the tent of the congreg over
against the tabl on the side of the tabernacl southward

40:25 and he light the lamp befor the lord; as the lord command
mose

40:26 and he put the golden altar in the tent of the congreg
befor the vail: 40:27 and he burnt sweet incens thereon; as the lord
command mose

40:28 and he set up the hang at the door of the tabernacl

40:29 and he put the altar of burnt offer by the door of the
tabernacl of the tent of the congreg and offer upon it the
burnt offer and the meat offering; as the lord command mose

40:30 and he set the laver between the tent of the congreg and
the altar and put water there to wash withal

40:31 and mose and aaron and hi son wash their hand and their
feet thereat: 40:32 when they went into the tent of the congreg
and when they came near unto the altar they washed; as the lord
command mose

40:33 and he rear up the court round about the tabernacl and the
altar and set up the hang of the court gate so mose finish the
work

40:34 then a cloud cover the tent of the congreg and the glori
of the lord fill the tabernacl

40:35 and mose wa not abl to enter into the tent of the
congreg becaus the cloud abod thereon and the glori of the
lord fill the tabernacl

40:36 and when the cloud wa taken up from over the tabernacl the
children of israel went onward in all their journeys: 40:37 but if the
cloud were not taken up then they journey not till the day that it
wa taken up

40:38 for the cloud of the lord wa upon the tabernacl by day and
fire wa on it by night in the sight of all the hous of israel
throughout all their journey




the third book of moses: call leviticu


1:1 and the lord call unto mose and spake unto him out of the
tabernacl of the congreg say 1:2 speak unto the children of
israel and say unto them if ani man of you bring an offer unto
the lord ye shall bring your offer of the cattl even of the
herd and of the flock

1:3 if hi offer be a burnt sacrific of the herd let him offer a
male without blemish: he shall offer it of hi own voluntari will at
the door of the tabernacl of the congreg befor the lord

1:4 and he shall put hi hand upon the head of the burnt offering; and
it shall be accept for him to make aton for him

1:5 and he shall kill the bullock befor the lord: and the priest
aaron son shall bring the blood and sprinkl the blood round
about upon the altar that is by the door of the tabernacl of the
congreg

1:6 and he shall flay the burnt offer and cut it into hi piec

1:7 and the son of aaron the priest shall put fire upon the altar
and lay the wood in order upon the fire: 1:8 and the priest aaron
son shall lay the part the head and the fat in order upon the
wood that is on the fire which is upon the altar: 1:9 but hi inward
and hi leg shall he wash in water: and the priest shall burn all on
the altar to be a burnt sacrific an offer made by fire of a
sweet savour unto the lord

1:10 and if hi offer be of the flock name of the sheep or of
the goat for a burnt sacrifice; he shall bring it a male without
blemish

1:11 and he shall kill it on the side of the altar northward befor
the lord: and the priest aaron son shall sprinkl hi blood
round about upon the altar

1:12 and he shall cut it into hi piec with hi head and hi fat:
and the priest shall lay them in order on the wood that is on the fire
which is upon the altar: 1:13 but he shall wash the inward and the
leg with water: and the priest shall bring it all and burn it upon
the altar: it is a burnt sacrific an offer made by fire of a
sweet savour unto the lord

1:14 and if the burnt sacrific for hi offer to the lord be of
fowl then he shall bring hi offer of turtledov or of young
pigeon

1:15 and the priest shall bring it unto the altar and wring off hi
head and burn it on the altar; and the blood thereof shall be wrung
out at the side of the altar: 1:16 and he shall pluck away hi crop
with hi feather and cast it besid the altar on the east part by
the place of the ashes: 1:17 and he shall cleav it with the wing
thereof but shall not divid it asunder: and the priest shall burn it
upon the altar upon the wood that is upon the fire: it is a burnt
sacrific an offer made by fire of a sweet savour unto the lord

2:1 and when ani will offer a meat offer unto the lord hi
offer shall be of fine flour; and he shall pour oil upon it and
put frankincens thereon: 2:2 and he shall bring it to aaron son
the priests: and he shall take thereout hi hand of the flour
thereof and of the oil thereof with all the frankincens thereof;
and the priest shall burn the memori of it upon the altar to be an
offer made by fire of a sweet savour unto the lord: 2:3 and the
remnant of the meat offer shall be aaron and hi sons: it is a
thing most holi of the offer of the lord made by fire

2:4 and if thou bring an oblat of a meat offer baken in the
oven it shall be unleaven cake of fine flour mingl with oil or
unleaven wafer anoint with oil

2:5 and if thi oblat be a meat offer baken in a pan it shall be
of fine flour unleaven mingl with oil

2:6 thou shalt part it in piec and pour oil thereon: it is a meat
offer

2:7 and if thi oblat be a meat offer baken in the fryingpan it
shall be made of fine flour with oil

2:8 and thou shalt bring the meat offer that is made of these
thing unto the lord: and when it is present unto the priest he
shall bring it unto the altar

2:9 and the priest shall take from the meat offer a memori
thereof and shall burn it upon the altar: it is an offer made by
fire of a sweet savour unto the lord

2:10 and that which is left of the meat offer shall be aaron and
hi sons: it is a thing most holi of the offer of the lord made
by fire

2:11 no meat offer which ye shall bring unto the lord shall be
made with leaven: for ye shall burn no leaven nor ani honey in ani
offer of the lord made by fire

2:12 as for the oblat of the firstfruit ye shall offer them unto
the lord: but they shall not be burnt on the altar for a sweet savour

2:13 and everi oblat of thi meat offer shalt thou season with
salt; neither shalt thou suffer the salt of the coven of thi god to
be lack from thi meat offering: with all thine offer thou shalt
offer salt

2:14 and if thou offer a meat offer of thi firstfruit unto the
lord thou shalt offer for the meat offer of thi firstfruit green
ear of corn dri by the fire even corn beaten out of full ear

2:15 and thou shalt put oil upon it and lay frankincens thereon: it
is a meat offer

2:16 and the priest shall burn the memori of it part of the beaten
corn thereof and part of the oil thereof with all the frankincens
thereof: it is an offer made by fire unto the lord

3:1 and if hi oblat be a sacrific of peac offer if he offer
it of the herd; whether it be a male or femal he shall offer it
without blemish befor the lord

3:2 and he shall lay hi hand upon the head of hi offer and kill
it at the door of the tabernacl of the congregation: and aaron son
the priest shall sprinkl the blood upon the altar round about

3:3 and he shall offer of the sacrific of the peac offer an
offer made by fire unto the lord; the fat that covereth the
inward and all the fat that is upon the inward 3:4 and the two
kidney and the fat that is on them which is by the flank and the
caul abov the liver with the kidney it shall he take away

3:5 and aaron son shall burn it on the altar upon the burnt
sacrific which is upon the wood that is on the fire: it is an
offer made by fire of a sweet savour unto the lord

3:6 and if hi offer for a sacrific of peac offer unto the
lord be of the flock; male or femal he shall offer it without
blemish

3:7 if he offer a lamb for hi offer then shall he offer it befor
the lord

3:8 and he shall lay hi hand upon the head of hi offer and kill
it befor the tabernacl of the congregation: and aaron son shall
sprinkl the blood thereof round about upon the altar

3:9 and he shall offer of the sacrific of the peac offer an
offer made by fire unto the lord; the fat thereof and the whole
rump it shall he take off hard by the backbone; and the fat that
covereth the inward and all the fat that is upon the inward 3:10
and the two kidney and the fat that is upon them which is by the
flank and the caul abov the liver with the kidney it shall he
take away

3:11 and the priest shall burn it upon the altar: it is the food of
the offer made by fire unto the lord

3:12 and if hi offer be a goat then he shall offer it befor the
lord

3:13 and he shall lay hi hand upon the head of it and kill it befor
the tabernacl of the congregation: and the son of aaron shall
sprinkl the blood thereof upon the altar round about

3:14 and he shall offer thereof hi offer even an offer made by
fire unto the lord; the fat that covereth the inward and all the fat
that is upon the inward 3:15 and the two kidney and the fat that
is upon them which is by the flank and the caul abov the liver
with the kidney it shall he take away

3:16 and the priest shall burn them upon the altar: it is the food of
the offer made by fire for a sweet savour: all the fat is the
lord

3:17 it shall be a perpetu statut for your gener throughout
all your dwell that ye eat neither fat nor blood

4:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 4:2 speak unto the children
of israel say if a soul shall sin through ignor against ani
of the command of the lord concern thing which ought not to
be done and shall do against ani of them: 4:3 if the priest that is
anoint do sin accord to the sin of the people; then let him bring
for hi sin which he hath sin a young bullock without blemish
unto the lord for a sin offer

4:4 and he shall bring the bullock unto the door of the tabernacl of
the congreg befor the lord; and shall lay hi hand upon the
bullock head and kill the bullock befor the lord

4:5 and the priest that is anoint shall take of the bullock blood
and bring it to the tabernacl of the congregation: 4:6 and the priest
shall dip hi finger in the blood and sprinkl of the blood seven
time befor the lord befor the vail of the sanctuari

4:7 and the priest shall put some of the blood upon the horn of the
altar of sweet incens befor the lord which is in the tabernacl of
the congregation; and shall pour all the blood of the bullock at the
bottom of the altar of the burnt offer which is at the door of the
tabernacl of the congreg

4:8 and he shall take off from it all the fat of the bullock for the
sin offering; the fat that covereth the inward and all the fat that
is upon the inward 4:9 and the two kidney and the fat that is upon
them which is by the flank and the caul abov the liver with the
kidney it shall he take away 4:10 as it wa taken off from the
bullock of the sacrific of peac offerings: and the priest shall burn
them upon the altar of the burnt offer

4:11 and the skin of the bullock and all hi flesh with hi head
and with hi leg and hi inward and hi dung 4:12 even the whole
bullock shall he carri forth without the camp unto a clean place
where the ash are pour out and burn him on the wood with fire:
where the ash are pour out shall he be burnt

4:13 and if the whole congreg of israel sin through ignor
and the thing be hid from the eye of the assembl and they have done
somewhat against ani of the command of the lord concern thing
which should not be done and are guilty; 4:14 when the sin which
they have sin against it is known then the congreg shall
offer a young bullock for the sin and bring him befor the tabernacl
of the congreg

4:15 and the elder of the congreg shall lay their hand upon the
head of the bullock befor the lord: and the bullock shall be kill
befor the lord

4:16 and the priest that is anoint shall bring of the bullock
blood to the tabernacl of the congregation: 4:17 and the priest shall
dip hi finger in some of the blood and sprinkl it seven time
befor the lord even befor the vail

4:18 and he shall put some of the blood upon the horn of the altar
which is befor the lord that is in the tabernacl of the
congreg and shall pour out all the blood at the bottom of the
altar of the burnt offer which is at the door of the tabernacl of
the congreg

4:19 and he shall take all hi fat from him and burn it upon the
altar

4:20 and he shall do with the bullock as he did with the bullock for a
sin offer so shall he do with this: and the priest shall make an
aton for them and it shall be forgiven them

4:21 and he shall carri forth the bullock without the camp and burn
him as he burn the first bullock: it is a sin offer for the
congreg

4:22 when a ruler hath sin and done somewhat through ignor
against ani of the command of the lord hi god concern thing
which should not be done and is guilty; 4:23 or if hi sin wherein
he hath sin come to hi knowledge; he shall bring hi offer a
kid of the goat a male without blemish: 4:24 and he shall lay hi
hand upon the head of the goat and kill it in the place where they
kill the burnt offer befor the lord: it is a sin offer

4:25 and the priest shall take of the blood of the sin offer with
hi finger and put it upon the horn of the altar of burnt offer
and shall pour out hi blood at the bottom of the altar of burnt
offer

4:26 and he shall burn all hi fat upon the altar as the fat of the
sacrific of peac offerings: and the priest shall make an aton
for him as concern hi sin and it shall be forgiven him

4:27 and if ani one of the common peopl sin through ignor while
he doeth somewhat against ani of the command of the lord
concern thing which ought not to be done and be guilty; 4:28 or
if hi sin which he hath sin come to hi knowledge: then he shall
bring hi offer a kid of the goat a femal without blemish for
hi sin which he hath sin

4:29 and he shall lay hi hand upon the head of the sin offer and
slay the sin offer in the place of the burnt offer

4:30 and the priest shall take of the blood thereof with hi finger
and put it upon the horn of the altar of burnt offer and shall
pour out all the blood thereof at the bottom of the altar

4:31 and he shall take away all the fat thereof as the fat is taken
away from off the sacrific of peac offerings; and the priest shall
burn it upon the altar for a sweet savour unto the lord; and the
priest shall make an aton for him and it shall be forgiven him

4:32 and if he bring a lamb for a sin offer he shall bring it a
femal without blemish

4:33 and he shall lay hi hand upon the head of the sin offer and
slay it for a sin offer in the place where they kill the burnt
offer

4:34 and the priest shall take of the blood of the sin offer with
hi finger and put it upon the horn of the altar of burnt offer
and shall pour out all the blood thereof at the bottom of the altar:
4:35 and he shall take away all the fat thereof as the fat of the
lamb is taken away from the sacrific of the peac offerings; and the
priest shall burn them upon the altar accord to the offer made
by fire unto the lord: and the priest shall make an aton for hi
sin that he hath commit and it shall be forgiven him

5:1 and if a soul sin and hear the voic of swear and is a
wit whether he hath seen or known of it; if he do not utter it
then he shall bear hi iniqu

5:2 or if a soul touch ani unclean thing whether it be a carcas of
an unclean beast or a carcas of unclean cattl or the carcas of
unclean creep thing and if it be hidden from him; he also shall
be unclean and guilti

5:3 or if he touch the unclean of man whatsoev unclean it
be that a man shall be defil withal and it be hid from him; when he
knoweth of it then he shall be guilti

5:4 or if a soul swear pronounc with hi lip to do evil or to do
good whatsoev it be that a man shall pronounc with an oath and it
be hid from him; when he knoweth of it then he shall be guilti in one
of these

5:5 and it shall be when he shall be guilti in one of these thing
that he shall confess that he hath sin in that thing: 5:6 and he
shall bring hi trespass offer unto the lord for hi sin which he
hath sin a femal from the flock a lamb or a kid of the goat
for a sin offering; and the priest shall make an aton for him
concern hi sin

5:7 and if he be not abl to bring a lamb then he shall bring for hi
trespass which he hath commit two turtledov or two young
pigeon unto the lord; one for a sin offer and the other for a
burnt offer

5:8 and he shall bring them unto the priest who shall offer that
which is for the sin offer first and wring off hi head from hi
neck but shall not divid it asunder: 5:9 and he shall sprinkl of
the blood of the sin offer upon the side of the altar; and the rest
of the blood shall be wrung out at the bottom of the altar: it is a
sin offer

5:10 and he shall offer the second for a burnt offer accord to
the manner: and the priest shall make an aton for him for hi sin
which he hath sin and it shall be forgiven him

5:11 but if he be not abl to bring two turtledov or two young
pigeon then he that sin shall bring for hi offer the tenth
part of an ephah of fine flour for a sin offering; he shall put no oil
upon it neither shall he put ani frankincens thereon: for it is a
sin offer

5:12 then shall he bring it to the priest and the priest shall take
hi hand of it even a memori thereof and burn it on the altar
accord to the offer made by fire unto the lord: it is a sin
offer

5:13 and the priest shall make an aton for him as touch hi
sin that he hath sin in one of these and it shall be forgiven him:
and the remnant shall be the priest as a meat offer

5:14 and the lord spake unto mose say 5:15 if a soul commit a
trespass and sin through ignor in the holi thing of the lord;
then he shall bring for hi trespass unto the lord a ram without
blemish out of the flock with thi estim by shekel of silver
after the shekel of the sanctuari for a trespass offer

5:16 and he shall make amend for the harm that he hath done in the
holi thing and shall add the fifth part thereto and give it unto the
priest: and the priest shall make an aton for him with the ram of
the trespass offer and it shall be forgiven him

5:17 and if a soul sin and commit ani of these thing which are
forbidden to be done by the command of the lord; though he wist
it not yet is he guilti and shall bear hi iniqu

5:18 and he shall bring a ram without blemish out of the flock with
thi estim for a trespass offer unto the priest: and the
priest shall make an aton for him concern hi ignor
wherein he er and wist it not and it shall be forgiven him

5:19 it is a trespass offering: he hath certainli trespass against
the lord

6:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 6:2 if a soul sin and
commit a trespass against the lord and lie unto hi neighbour in that
which wa deliv him to keep or in fellowship or in a thing taken
away by violenc or hath deceiv hi neighbour; 6:3 or have found
that which wa lost and lieth concern it and sweareth falsely; in
ani of all these that a man doeth sin therein: 6:4 then it shall
be becaus he hath sin and is guilti that he shall restor that
which he took violent away or the thing which he hath deceit
gotten or that which wa deliv him to keep or the lost thing
which he found 6:5 or all that about which he hath sworn falsely; he
shall even restor it in the princip and shall add the fifth part
more thereto and give it unto him to whom it appertaineth in the day
of hi trespass offer

6:6 and he shall bring hi trespass offer unto the lord a ram
without blemish out of the flock with thi estim for a trespass
offer unto the priest: 6:7 and the priest shall make an aton
for him befor the lord: and it shall be forgiven him for ani thing of
all that he hath done in trespass therein

6:8 and the lord spake unto mose say 6:9 command aaron and hi
son say thi is the law of the burnt offering: it is the burnt
offer becaus of the burn upon the altar all night unto the
morn and the fire of the altar shall be burn in it

6:10 and the priest shall put on hi linen garment and hi linen
breech shall he put upon hi flesh and take up the ash which the
fire hath consum with the burnt offer on the altar and he shall
put them besid the altar

6:11 and he shall put off hi garment and put on other garment and
carri forth the ash without the camp unto a clean place

6:12 and the fire upon the altar shall be burn in it; it shall not
be put out: and the priest shall burn wood on it everi morn and
lay the burnt offer in order upon it; and he shall burn thereon the
fat of the peac offer

6:13 the fire shall ever be burn upon the altar; it shall never go
out

6:14 and thi is the law of the meat offering: the son of aaron shall
offer it befor the lord befor the altar

6:15 and he shall take of it hi hand of the flour of the meat
offer and of the oil thereof and all the frankincens which is
upon the meat offer and shall burn it upon the altar for a sweet
savour even the memori of it unto the lord

6:16 and the remaind thereof shall aaron and hi son eat: with
unleaven bread shall it be eaten in the holi place; in the court of
the tabernacl of the congreg they shall eat it

6:17 it shall not be baken with leaven i have given it unto them for
their portion of my offer made by fire; it is most holi as is the
sin offer and as the trespass offer

6:18 all the male among the children of aaron shall eat of it it
shall be a statut for ever in your gener concern the
offer of the lord made by fire: everi one that toucheth them shall
be holi

6:19 and the lord spake unto mose say 6:20 thi is the offer
of aaron and of hi son which they shall offer unto the lord in the
day when he is anointed; the tenth part of an ephah of fine flour for
a meat offer perpetu half of it in the morn and half thereof
at night

6:21 in a pan it shall be made with oil; and when it is baken thou
shalt bring it in: and the baken piec of the meat offer shalt
thou offer for a sweet savour unto the lord

6:22 and the priest of hi son that is anoint in hi stead shall
offer it: it is a statut for ever unto the lord; it shall be wholli
burnt

6:23 for everi meat offer for the priest shall be wholli burnt: it
shall not be eaten

6:24 and the lord spake unto mose say 6:25 speak unto aaron and
to hi son say thi is the law of the sin offering: in the place
where the burnt offer is kill shall the sin offer be kill
befor the lord: it is most holi

6:26 the priest that offereth it for sin shall eat it: in the holi
place shall it be eaten in the court of the tabernacl of the
congreg

6:27 whatsoev shall touch the flesh thereof shall be holy: and when
there is sprinkl of the blood thereof upon ani garment thou shalt
wash that whereon it wa sprinkl in the holi place

6:28 but the earthen vessel wherein it is sodden shall be broken: and
if it be sodden in a brasen pot it shall be both scour and rins
in water

6:29 all the male among the priest shall eat thereof: it is most
holi

6:30 and no sin offer whereof ani of the blood is brought into the
tabernacl of the congreg to reconcil withal in the holi place
shall be eaten: it shall be burnt in the fire

7:1 likewis thi is the law of the trespass offering: it is most
holi

7:2 in the place where they kill the burnt offer shall they kill
the trespass offering: and the blood thereof shall he sprinkl round
about upon the altar

7:3 and he shall offer of it all the fat thereof; the rump and the
fat that covereth the inward 7:4 and the two kidney and the fat
that is on them which is by the flank and the caul that is abov
the liver with the kidney it shall he take away: 7:5 and the priest
shall burn them upon the altar for an offer made by fire unto the
lord: it is a trespass offer

7:6 everi male among the priest shall eat thereof: it shall be eaten
in the holi place: it is most holi

7:7 as the sin offer is so is the trespass offering: there is one
law for them: the priest that maketh aton therewith shall have
it

7:8 and the priest that offereth ani man burnt offer even the
priest shall have to himself the skin of the burnt offer which he
hath offer

7:9 and all the meat offer that is baken in the oven and all that
is dress in the fryingpan and in the pan shall be the priest
that offereth it

7:10 and everi meat offer mingl with oil and dri shall all the
son of aaron have one as much as anoth

7:11 and thi is the law of the sacrific of peac offer which he
shall offer unto the lord

7:12 if he offer it for a thanksgiv then he shall offer with the
sacrific of thanksgiv unleaven cake mingl with oil and
unleaven wafer anoint with oil and cake mingl with oil of
fine flour fri

7:13 besid the cake he shall offer for hi offer leaven bread
with the sacrific of thanksgiv of hi peac offer

7:14 and of it he shall offer one out of the whole oblat for an
heav offer unto the lord and it shall be the priest that
sprinkleth the blood of the peac offer

7:15 and the flesh of the sacrific of hi peac offer for
thanksgiv shall be eaten the same day that it is offered; he shall
not leav ani of it until the morn

7:16 but if the sacrific of hi offer be a vow or a voluntari
offer it shall be eaten the same day that he offereth hi
sacrifice: and on the morrow also the remaind of it shall be eaten:
7:17 but the remaind of the flesh of the sacrific on the third day
shall be burnt with fire

7:18 and if ani of the flesh of the sacrific of hi peac offer
be eaten at all on the third day it shall not be accept neither
shall it be imput unto him that offereth it: it shall be an
abomin and the soul that eateth of it shall bear hi iniqu

7:19 and the flesh that toucheth ani unclean thing shall not be eaten;
it shall be burnt with fire: and as for the flesh all that be clean
shall eat thereof

7:20 but the soul that eateth of the flesh of the sacrific of peac
offer that pertain unto the lord have hi unclean upon
him even that soul shall be cut off from hi peopl

7:21 moreov the soul that shall touch ani unclean thing as the
unclean of man or ani unclean beast or ani abomin unclean
thing and eat of the flesh of the sacrific of peac offer which
pertain unto the lord even that soul shall be cut off from hi
peopl

7:22 and the lord spake unto mose say 7:23 speak unto the
children of israel say ye shall eat no manner of fat of ox or
of sheep or of goat

7:24 and the fat of the beast that dieth of itself and the fat of
that which is torn with beast may be use in ani other use: but ye
shall in no wise eat of it

7:25 for whosoev eateth the fat of the beast of which men offer an
offer made by fire unto the lord even the soul that eateth it
shall be cut off from hi peopl

7:26 moreov ye shall eat no manner of blood whether it be of fowl
or of beast in ani of your dwell

7:27 whatsoev soul it be that eateth ani manner of blood even that
soul shall be cut off from hi peopl

7:28 and the lord spake unto mose say 7:29 speak unto the
children of israel say he that offereth the sacrific of hi
peac offer unto the lord shall bring hi oblat unto the lord
of the sacrific of hi peac offer

7:30 hi own hand shall bring the offer of the lord made by fire
the fat with the breast it shall he bring that the breast may be
wave for a wave offer befor the lord

7:31 and the priest shall burn the fat upon the altar: but the breast
shall be aaron and hi son

7:32 and the right shoulder shall ye give unto the priest for an heav
offer of the sacrific of your peac offer

7:33 he among the son of aaron that offereth the blood of the peac
offer and the fat shall have the right shoulder for hi part

7:34 for the wave breast and the heav shoulder have i taken of the
children of israel from off the sacrific of their peac offer
and have given them unto aaron the priest and unto hi son by a
statut for ever from among the children of israel

7:35 thi is the portion of the anoint of aaron and of the
anoint of hi son out of the offer of the lord made by fire
in the day when he present them to minist unto the lord in the
priest office; 7:36 which the lord command to be given them of the
children of israel in the day that he anoint them by a statut for
ever throughout their gener

7:37 thi is the law of the burnt offer of the meat offer and
of the sin offer and of the trespass offer and of the
consecr and of the sacrific of the peac offerings; 7:38 which
the lord command mose in mount sinai in the day that he command
the children of israel to offer their oblat unto the lord in the
wilder of sinai

8:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 8:2 take aaron and hi son
with him and the garment and the anoint oil and a bullock for
the sin offer and two ram and a basket of unleaven bread; 8:3
and gather thou all the congreg togeth unto the door of the
tabernacl of the congreg

8:4 and mose did as the lord command him; and the assembl wa
gather togeth unto the door of the tabernacl of the congreg

8:5 and mose said unto the congreg thi is the thing which the
lord command to be done

8:6 and mose brought aaron and hi son and wash them with water

8:7 and he put upon him the coat and gird him with the girdl and
cloth him with the robe and put the ephod upon him and he gird
him with the curiou girdl of the ephod and bound it unto him
therewith

8:8 and he put the breastplat upon him: also he put in the
breastplat the urim and the thummim

8:9 and he put the mitr upon hi head; also upon the mitr even upon
hi forefront did he put the golden plate the holi crown; as the
lord command mose

8:10 and mose took the anoint oil and anoint the tabernacl and
all that wa therein and sanctifi them

8:11 and he sprinkl thereof upon the altar seven time and anoint
the altar and all hi vessel both the laver and hi foot to
sanctifi them

8:12 and he pour of the anoint oil upon aaron head and
anoint him to sanctifi him

8:13 and mose brought aaron son and put coat upon them and
gird them with girdl and put bonnet upon them; as the lord
command mose

8:14 and he brought the bullock for the sin offering: and aaron and
hi son laid their hand upon the head of the bullock for the sin
offer

8:15 and he slew it; and mose took the blood and put it upon the
horn of the altar round about with hi finger and purifi the
altar and pour the blood at the bottom of the altar and sanctifi
it to make reconcili upon it

8:16 and he took all the fat that wa upon the inward and the caul
abov the liver and the two kidney and their fat and mose burn
it upon the altar

8:17 but the bullock and hi hide hi flesh and hi dung he burnt
with fire without the camp; as the lord command mose

8:18 and he brought the ram for the burnt offering: and aaron and hi
son laid their hand upon the head of the ram

8:19 and he kill it; and mose sprinkl the blood upon the altar
round about

8:20 and he cut the ram into pieces; and mose burnt the head and the
piec and the fat

8:21 and he wash the inward and the leg in water; and mose burnt
the whole ram upon the altar: it wa a burnt sacrific for a sweet
savour and an offer made by fire unto the lord; as the lord
command mose

8:22 and he brought the other ram the ram of consecration: and aaron
and hi son laid their hand upon the head of the ram

8:23 and he slew it; and mose took of the blood of it and put it
upon the tip of aaron right ear and upon the thumb of hi right
hand and upon the great toe of hi right foot

8:24 and he brought aaron son and mose put of the blood upon the
tip of their right ear and upon the thumb of their right hand and
upon the great toe of their right feet: and mose sprinkl the blood
upon the altar round about

8:25 and he took the fat and the rump and all the fat that wa upon
the inward and the caul abov the liver and the two kidney and
their fat and the right shoulder: 8:26 and out of the basket of
unleaven bread that wa befor the lord he took one unleaven
cake and a cake of oil bread and one wafer and put them on the
fat and upon the right shoulder: 8:27 and he put all upon aaron
hand and upon hi son hand and wave them for a wave offer
befor the lord

8:28 and mose took them from off their hand and burnt them on the
altar upon the burnt offering: they were consecr for a sweet
savour: it is an offer made by fire unto the lord

8:29 and mose took the breast and wave it for a wave offer
befor the lord: for of the ram of consecr it wa mose part; as
the lord command mose

8:30 and mose took of the anoint oil and of the blood which wa
upon the altar and sprinkl it upon aaron and upon hi garment
and upon hi son and upon hi son garment with him; and
sanctifi aaron and hi garment and hi son and hi son
garment with him

8:31 and mose said unto aaron and to hi son boil the flesh at the
door of the tabernacl of the congregation: and there eat it with the
bread that is in the basket of consecr as i command say
aaron and hi son shall eat it

8:32 and that which remaineth of the flesh and of the bread shall ye
burn with fire

8:33 and ye shall not go out of the door of the tabernacl of the
congreg in seven day until the day of your consecr be at
an end: for seven day shall he consecr you

8:34 as he hath done thi day so the lord hath command to do to
make an aton for you

8:35 therefor shall ye abid at the door of the tabernacl of the
congreg day and night seven day and keep the charg of the
lord that ye die not: for so i am command

8:36 so aaron and hi son did all thing which the lord command by
the hand of mose

9:1 and it came to pass on the eighth day that mose call aaron and
hi son and the elder of israel; 9:2 and he said unto aaron take
thee a young calf for a sin offer and a ram for a burnt offer
without blemish and offer them befor the lord

9:3 and unto the children of israel thou shalt speak say take ye
a kid of the goat for a sin offering; and a calf and a lamb both of
the first year without blemish for a burnt offering; 9:4 also a
bullock and a ram for peac offer to sacrific befor the lord;
and a meat offer mingl with oil: for to day the lord will appear
unto you

9:5 and they brought that which mose command befor the tabernacl
of the congregation: and all the congreg drew near and stood
befor the lord

9:6 and mose said thi is the thing which the lord command that ye
should do: and the glori of the lord shall appear unto you

9:7 and mose said unto aaron go unto the altar and offer thi sin
offer and thi burnt offer and make an aton for thyself
and for the people: and offer the offer of the peopl and make an
aton for them; as the lord command

9:8 aaron therefor went unto the altar and slew the calf of the sin
offer which wa for himself

9:9 and the son of aaron brought the blood unto him: and he dip
hi finger in the blood and put it upon the horn of the altar and
pour out the blood at the bottom of the altar: 9:10 but the fat and
the kidney and the caul abov the liver of the sin offer he
burnt upon the altar; as the lord command mose

9:11 and the flesh and the hide he burnt with fire without the camp

9:12 and he slew the burnt offering; and aaron son present unto
him the blood which he sprinkl round about upon the altar

9:13 and they present the burnt offer unto him with the piec
thereof and the head: and he burnt them upon the altar

9:14 and he did wash the inward and the leg and burnt them upon the
burnt offer on the altar

9:15 and he brought the peopl offer and took the goat which
wa the sin offer for the peopl and slew it and offer it for
sin as the first

9:16 and he brought the burnt offer and offer it accord to
the manner

9:17 and he brought the meat offer and took an hand thereof
and burnt it upon the altar besid the burnt sacrific of the
morn

9:18 he slew also the bullock and the ram for a sacrific of peac
offer which wa for the people: and aaron son present unto
him the blood which he sprinkl upon the altar round about 9:19 and
the fat of the bullock and of the ram the rump and that which
covereth the inward and the kidney and the caul abov the liver:
9:20 and they put the fat upon the breast and he burnt the fat upon
the altar: 9:21 and the breast and the right shoulder aaron wave for
a wave offer befor the lord; as mose command

9:22 and aaron lift up hi hand toward the peopl and bless them
and came down from offer of the sin offer and the burnt
offer and peac offer

9:23 and mose and aaron went into the tabernacl of the congreg
and came out and bless the people: and the glori of the lord
appear unto all the peopl

9:24 and there came a fire out from befor the lord and consum upon
the altar the burnt offer and the fat: which when all the peopl
saw they shout and fell on their face

10:1 and nadab and abihu the son of aaron took either of them hi
censer and put fire therein and put incens thereon and offer
strang fire befor the lord which he command them not

10:2 and there went out fire from the lord and devour them and
they die befor the lord

10:3 then mose said unto aaron thi is it that the lord spake
say i will be sanctifi in them that come nigh me and befor all
the peopl i will be glorifi and aaron held hi peac

10:4 and mose call mishael and elzaphan the son of uzziel the
uncl of aaron and said unto them come near carri your brethren
from befor the sanctuari out of the camp

10:5 so they went near and carri them in their coat out of the
camp; as mose had said

10:6 and mose said unto aaron and unto eleazar and unto ithamar hi
son uncov not your head neither rend your clothes; lest ye die
and lest wrath come upon all the people: but let your brethren the
whole hous of israel bewail the burn which the lord hath kindl

10:7 and ye shall not go out from the door of the tabernacl of the
congreg lest ye die: for the anoint oil of the lord is upon
you and they did accord to the word of mose

10:8 and the lord spake unto aaron say 10:9 do not drink wine nor
strong drink thou nor thi son with thee when ye go into the
tabernacl of the congreg lest ye die: it shall be a statut for
ever throughout your generations: 10:10 and that ye may put differ
between holi and unholi and between unclean and clean; 10:11 and that
ye may teach the children of israel all the statut which the lord
hath spoken unto them by the hand of mose

10:12 and mose spake unto aaron and unto eleazar and unto ithamar
hi son that were left take the meat offer that remaineth of the
offer of the lord made by fire and eat it without leaven besid
the altar: for it is most holy: 10:13 and ye shall eat it in the holi
place becaus it is thi due and thi son due of the sacrific of
the lord made by fire: for so i am command

10:14 and the wave breast and heav shoulder shall ye eat in a clean
place; thou and thi son and thi daughter with thee: for they be
thi due and thi son due which are given out of the sacrific of
peac offer of the children of israel

10:15 the heav shoulder and the wave breast shall they bring with the
offer made by fire of the fat to wave it for a wave offer
befor the lord; and it shall be thine and thi son with thee by a
statut for ever; as the lord hath command

10:16 and mose dilig sought the goat of the sin offer and
behold it wa burnt: and he wa angri with eleazar and ithamar the
son of aaron which were left aliv say 10:17 wherefor have ye
not eaten the sin offer in the holi place see it is most holi
and god hath given it you to bear the iniqu of the congreg to
make aton for them befor the lord? 10:18 behold the blood of
it wa not brought in within the holi place: ye should inde have
eaten it in the holi place as i command

10:19 and aaron said unto mose behold thi day have they offer
their sin offer and their burnt offer befor the lord; and such
thing have befallen me: and if i had eaten the sin offer to day
should it have been accept in the sight of the lord? 10:20 and when
mose heard that he wa content

11:1 and the lord spake unto mose and to aaron say unto them
11:2 speak unto the children of israel say these are the beast
which ye shall eat among all the beast that are on the earth

11:3 whatsoev parteth the hoof and is clovenfoot and cheweth the
cud among the beast that shall ye eat

11:4 nevertheless these shall ye not eat of them that chew the cud or
of them that divid the hoof: as the camel becaus he cheweth the
cud but divideth not the hoof; he is unclean unto you

11:5 and the coney becaus he cheweth the cud but divideth not the
hoof; he is unclean unto you

11:6 and the hare becaus he cheweth the cud but divideth not the
hoof; he is unclean unto you

11:7 and the swine though he divid the hoof and be clovenfoot
yet he cheweth not the cud; he is unclean to you

11:8 of their flesh shall ye not eat and their carcas shall ye not
touch; they are unclean to you

11:9 these shall ye eat of all that are in the waters: whatsoev hath
fin and scale in the water in the sea and in the river them
shall ye eat

11:10 and all that have not fin and scale in the sea and in the
river of all that move in the water and of ani live thing which
is in the water they shall be an abomin unto you: 11:11 they
shall be even an abomin unto you; ye shall not eat of their
flesh but ye shall have their carcas in abomin

11:12 whatsoev hath no fin nor scale in the water that shall be
an abomin unto you

11:13 and these are they which ye shall have in abomin among the
fowls; they shall not be eaten they are an abomination: the eagl
and the ossifrag and the ospray 11:14 and the vultur and the kite
after hi kind; 11:15 everi raven after hi kind; 11:16 and the owl
and the night hawk and the cuckow and the hawk after hi kind 11:17
and the littl owl and the cormor and the great owl 11:18 and
the swan and the pelican and the gier eagl 11:19 and the stork
the heron after her kind and the lapw and the bat

11:20 all fowl that creep go upon all four shall be an
abomin unto you

11:21 yet these may ye eat of everi fli creep thing that goeth
upon all four which have leg abov their feet to leap withal upon
the earth; 11:22 even these of them ye may eat; the locust after hi
kind and the bald locust after hi kind and the beetl after hi
kind and the grasshopp after hi kind

11:23 but all other fli creep thing which have four feet
