shall be an abomin unto you

11:24 and for these ye shall be unclean: whosoev toucheth the
carcas of them shall be unclean until the even

11:25 and whosoev beareth ought of the carcas of them shall wash
hi cloth and be unclean until the even

11:26 the carcas of everi beast which divideth the hoof and is not
clovenfoot nor cheweth the cud are unclean unto you: everi one
that toucheth them shall be unclean

11:27 and whatsoev goeth upon hi paw among all manner of beast
that go on all four those are unclean unto you: whoso toucheth their
carcas shall be unclean until the even

11:28 and he that beareth the carcas of them shall wash hi cloth
and be unclean until the even: they are unclean unto you

11:29 these also shall be unclean unto you among the creep thing
that creep upon the earth; the weasel and the mous and the tortois
after hi kind 11:30 and the ferret and the chameleon and the
lizard and the snail and the mole

11:31 these are unclean to you among all that creep: whosoev doth
touch them when they be dead shall be unclean until the even

11:32 and upon whatsoev ani of them when they are dead doth fall
it shall be unclean; whether it be ani vessel of wood or raiment or
skin or sack whatsoev vessel it be wherein ani work is done it
must be put into water and it shall be unclean until the even; so it
shall be cleans

11:33 and everi earthen vessel whereinto ani of them falleth
whatsoev is in it shall be unclean; and ye shall break it

11:34 of all meat which may be eaten that on which such water cometh
shall be unclean: and all drink that may be drunk in everi such vessel
shall be unclean

11:35 and everi thing whereupon ani part of their carcas falleth
shall be unclean; whether it be oven or rang for pot they shall
be broken down: for they are unclean and shall be unclean unto you

11:36 nevertheless a fountain or pit wherein there is plenti of
water shall be clean: but that which toucheth their carcas shall be
unclean

11:37 and if ani part of their carcas fall upon ani sow seed which
is to be sown it shall be clean

11:38 but if ani water be put upon the seed and ani part of their
carcas fall thereon it shall be unclean unto you

11:39 and if ani beast of which ye may eat die; he that toucheth the
carcas thereof shall be unclean until the even

11:40 and he that eateth of the carcas of it shall wash hi cloth
and be unclean until the even: he also that beareth the carcas of it
shall wash hi cloth and be unclean until the even

11:41 and everi creep thing that creepeth upon the earth shall be
an abomination; it shall not be eaten

11:42 whatsoev goeth upon the belli and whatsoev goeth upon all
four or whatsoev hath more feet among all creep thing that
creep upon the earth them ye shall not eat; for they are an
abomin

11:43 ye shall not make yourselv abomin with ani creep thing
that creepeth neither shall ye make yourselv unclean with them
that ye should be defil therebi

11:44 for i am the lord your god: ye shall therefor sanctifi
yourselv and ye shall be holy; for i am holy: neither shall ye
defil yourselv with ani manner of creep thing that creepeth upon
the earth

11:45 for i am the lord that bringeth you up out of the land of egypt
to be your god: ye shall therefor be holi for i am holi

11:46 thi is the law of the beast and of the fowl and of everi
live creatur that moveth in the water and of everi creatur that
creepeth upon the earth: 11:47 to make a differ between the
unclean and the clean and between the beast that may be eaten and the
beast that may not be eaten

12:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 12:2 speak unto the
children of israel say if a woman have conceiv seed and born a
man child: then she shall be unclean seven days; accord to the day
of the separ for her infirm shall she be unclean

12:3 and in the eighth day the flesh of hi foreskin shall be
circumcis

12:4 and she shall then continu in the blood of her purifi three
and thirti days; she shall touch no hallow thing nor come into the
sanctuari until the day of her purifi be fulfil

12:5 but if she bear a maid child then she shall be unclean two
week as in her separation: and she shall continu in the blood of
her purifi threescor and six day

12:6 and when the day of her purifi are fulfil for a son or
for a daughter she shall bring a lamb of the first year for a burnt
offer and a young pigeon or a turtledov for a sin offer
unto the door of the tabernacl of the congreg unto the priest:
12:7 who shall offer it befor the lord and make an aton for
her; and she shall be cleans from the issu of her blood thi is
the law for her that hath born a male or a femal

12:8 and if she be not abl to bring a lamb then she shall bring two
turtl or two young pigeons; the one for the burnt offer and the
other for a sin offering: and the priest shall make an aton for
her and she shall be clean

13:1 and the lord spake unto mose and aaron say 13:2 when a man
shall have in the skin of hi flesh a rise a scab or bright spot
and it be in the skin of hi flesh like the plagu of leprosy; then he
shall be brought unto aaron the priest or unto one of hi son the
priests: 13:3 and the priest shall look on the plagu in the skin of
the flesh: and when the hair in the plagu is turn white and the
plagu in sight be deeper than the skin of hi flesh it is a plagu
of leprosy: and the priest shall look on him and pronounc him
unclean

13:4 if the bright spot be white in the skin of hi flesh and in
sight be not deeper than the skin and the hair thereof be not turn
white; then the priest shall shut up him that hath the plagu seven
days: 13:5 and the priest shall look on him the seventh day: and
behold if the plagu in hi sight be at a stay and the plagu spread
not in the skin; then the priest shall shut him up seven day more:
13:6 and the priest shall look on him again the seventh day: and
behold if the plagu be somewhat dark and the plagu spread not in
the skin the priest shall pronounc him clean: it is but a scab: and
he shall wash hi cloth and be clean

13:7 but if the scab spread much abroad in the skin after that he
hath been seen of the priest for hi cleans he shall be seen of
the priest again

13:8 and if the priest see that behold the scab spreadeth in the
skin then the priest shall pronounc him unclean: it is a leprosi

13:9 when the plagu of leprosi is in a man then he shall be brought
unto the priest; 13:10 and the priest shall see him: and behold if
the rise be white in the skin and it have turn the hair white
and there be quick raw flesh in the rising; 13:11 it is an old leprosi
in the skin of hi flesh and the priest shall pronounc him unclean
and shall not shut him up: for he is unclean

13:12 and if a leprosi break out abroad in the skin and the leprosi
cover all the skin of him that hath the plagu from hi head even to
hi foot wheresoev the priest looketh; 13:13 then the priest shall
consider: and behold if the leprosi have cover all hi flesh he
shall pronounc him clean that hath the plague: it is all turn
white: he is clean

13:14 but when raw flesh appeareth in him he shall be unclean

13:15 and the priest shall see the raw flesh and pronounc him to be
unclean: for the raw flesh is unclean: it is a leprosi

13:16 or if the raw flesh turn again and be chang unto white he
shall come unto the priest; 13:17 and the priest shall see him: and
behold if the plagu be turn into white; then the priest shall
pronounc him clean that hath the plague: he is clean

13:18 the flesh also in which even in the skin thereof wa a boil
and is heal 13:19 and in the place of the boil there be a white
rise or a bright spot white and somewhat reddish and it be
shew to the priest; 13:20 and if when the priest seeth it behold
it be in sight lower than the skin and the hair thereof be turn
white; the priest shall pronounc him unclean: it is a plagu of
leprosi broken out of the boil

13:21 but if the priest look on it and behold there be no white
hair therein and if it be not lower than the skin but be somewhat
dark; then the priest shall shut him up seven days: 13:22 and if it
spread much abroad in the skin then the priest shall pronounc him
unclean: it is a plagu

13:23 but if the bright spot stay in hi place and spread not it is
a burn boil; and the priest shall pronounc him clean

13:24 or if there be ani flesh in the skin whereof there is a hot
burn and the quick flesh that burneth have a white bright spot
somewhat reddish or white; 13:25 then the priest shall look upon it:
and behold if the hair in the bright spot be turn white and it be
in sight deeper than the skin; it is a leprosi broken out of the
burning: wherefor the priest shall pronounc him unclean: it is the
plagu of leprosi

13:26 but if the priest look on it and behold there be no white
hair in the bright spot and it be no lower than the other skin but
be somewhat dark; then the priest shall shut him up seven days: 13:27
and the priest shall look upon him the seventh day: and if it be
spread much abroad in the skin then the priest shall pronounc him
unclean: it is the plagu of leprosi

13:28 and if the bright spot stay in hi place and spread not in the
skin but it be somewhat dark; it is a rise of the burn and the
priest shall pronounc him clean: for it is an inflamm of the
burn

13:29 if a man or woman have a plagu upon the head or the beard;
13:30 then the priest shall see the plague: and behold if it be in
sight deeper than the skin; and there be in it a yellow thin hair;
then the priest shall pronounc him unclean: it is a dri scall even a
leprosi upon the head or beard

13:31 and if the priest look on the plagu of the scall and behold
it be not in sight deeper than the skin and that there is no black
hair in it; then the priest shall shut up him that hath the plagu of
the scall seven days: 13:32 and in the seventh day the priest shall
look on the plague: and behold if the scall spread not and there be
in it no yellow hair and the scall be not in sight deeper than the
skin; 13:33 he shall be shaven but the scall shall he not shave; and
the priest shall shut up him that hath the scall seven day more:
13:34 and in the seventh day the priest shall look on the scall: and
behold if the scall be not spread in the skin nor be in sight deeper
than the skin; then the priest shall pronounc him clean: and he shall
wash hi cloth and be clean

13:35 but if the scall spread much in the skin after hi cleansing;
13:36 then the priest shall look on him: and behold if the scall be
spread in the skin the priest shall not seek for yellow hair; he is
unclean

13:37 but if the scall be in hi sight at a stay and that there is
black hair grown up therein; the scall is heal he is clean: and the
priest shall pronounc him clean

13:38 if a man also or a woman have in the skin of their flesh bright
spot even white bright spots; 13:39 then the priest shall look: and
behold if the bright spot in the skin of their flesh be darkish
white; it is a freckl spot that groweth in the skin; he is clean

13:40 and the man whose hair is fallen off hi head he is bald; yet
is he clean

13:41 and he that hath hi hair fallen off from the part of hi head
toward hi face he is forehead bald: yet is he clean

13:42 and if there be in the bald head or bald forehead a white
reddish sore; it is a leprosi sprung up in hi bald head or hi bald
forehead

13:43 then the priest shall look upon it: and behold if the rise
of the sore be white reddish in hi bald head or in hi bald
forehead as the leprosi appeareth in the skin of the flesh; 13:44 he
is a leprou man he is unclean: the priest shall pronounc him
utterli unclean; hi plagu is in hi head

13:45 and the leper in whom the plagu is hi cloth shall be rent
and hi head bare and he shall put a cover upon hi upper lip and
shall cri unclean unclean

13:46 all the day wherein the plagu shall be in him he shall be
defiled; he is unclean: he shall dwell alone; without the camp shall
hi habit be

13:47 the garment also that the plagu of leprosi is in whether it be
a woollen garment or a linen garment; 13:48 whether it be in the
warp or woof; of linen or of woollen; whether in a skin or in ani
thing made of skin; 13:49 and if the plagu be greenish or reddish in
the garment or in the skin either in the warp or in the woof or in
ani thing of skin; it is a plagu of leprosi and shall be shew unto
the priest: 13:50 and the priest shall look upon the plagu and shut
up it that hath the plagu seven days: 13:51 and he shall look on the
plagu on the seventh day: if the plagu be spread in the garment
either in the warp or in the woof or in a skin or in ani work that
is made of skin; the plagu is a fret leprosy; it is unclean

13:52 he shall therefor burn that garment whether warp or woof in
woollen or in linen or ani thing of skin wherein the plagu is: for
it is a fret leprosy; it shall be burnt in the fire

13:53 and if the priest shall look and behold the plagu be not
spread in the garment either in the warp or in the woof or in ani
thing of skin; 13:54 then the priest shall command that they wash the
thing wherein the plagu is and he shall shut it up seven day more:
13:55 and the priest shall look on the plagu after that it is
washed: and behold if the plagu have not chang hi colour and
the plagu be not spread; it is unclean; thou shalt burn it in the
fire; it is fret inward whether it be bare within or without

13:56 and if the priest look and behold the plagu be somewhat dark
after the wash of it; then he shall rend it out of the garment or
out of the skin or out of the warp or out of the woof: 13:57 and if
it appear still in the garment either in the warp or in the woof or
in ani thing of skin; it is a spread plague: thou shalt burn that
wherein the plagu is with fire

13:58 and the garment either warp or woof or whatsoev thing of
skin it be which thou shalt wash if the plagu be depart from
them then it shall be wash the second time and shall be clean

13:59 thi is the law of the plagu of leprosi in a garment of woollen
or linen either in the warp or woof or ani thing of skin to
pronounc it clean or to pronounc it unclean

14:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 14:2 thi shall be the law
of the leper in the day of hi cleansing: he shall be brought unto the
priest: 14:3 and the priest shall go forth out of the camp; and the
priest shall look and behold if the plagu of leprosi be heal in
the leper; 14:4 then shall the priest command to take for him that is
to be cleans two bird aliv and clean and cedar wood and scarlet
and hyssop: 14:5 and the priest shall command that one of the bird be
kill in an earthen vessel over run water: 14:6 as for the live
bird he shall take it and the cedar wood and the scarlet and the
hyssop and shall dip them and the live bird in the blood of the
bird that wa kill over the run water: 14:7 and he shall
sprinkl upon him that is to be cleans from the leprosi seven time
and shall pronounc him clean and shall let the live bird loos
into the open field

14:8 and he that is to be cleans shall wash hi cloth and shave
off all hi hair and wash himself in water that he may be clean: and
after that he shall come into the camp and shall tarri abroad out of
hi tent seven day

14:9 but it shall be on the seventh day that he shall shave all hi
hair off hi head and hi beard and hi eyebrow even all hi hair he
shall shave off: and he shall wash hi cloth also he shall wash hi
flesh in water and he shall be clean

14:10 and on the eighth day he shall take two he lamb without
blemish and one ewe lamb of the first year without blemish and three
tenth deal of fine flour for a meat offer mingl with oil and
one log of oil

14:11 and the priest that maketh him clean shall present the man that
is to be made clean and those thing befor the lord at the door of
the tabernacl of the congregation: 14:12 and the priest shall take
one he lamb and offer him for a trespass offer and the log of
oil and wave them for a wave offer befor the lord: 14:13 and he
shall slay the lamb in the place where he shall kill the sin offer
and the burnt offer in the holi place: for as the sin offer is
the priest so is the trespass offering: it is most holy: 14:14 and
the priest shall take some of the blood of the trespass offer and
the priest shall put it upon the tip of the right ear of him that is
to be cleans and upon the thumb of hi right hand and upon the
great toe of hi right foot: 14:15 and the priest shall take some of
the log of oil and pour it into the palm of hi own left hand: 14:16
and the priest shall dip hi right finger in the oil that is in hi
left hand and shall sprinkl of the oil with hi finger seven time
befor the lord: 14:17 and of the rest of the oil that is in hi hand
shall the priest put upon the tip of the right ear of him that is to
be cleans and upon the thumb of hi right hand and upon the great
toe of hi right foot upon the blood of the trespass offering: 14:18
and the remnant of the oil that is in the priest hand he shall pour
upon the head of him that is to be cleansed: and the priest shall make
an aton for him befor the lord

14:19 and the priest shall offer the sin offer and make an
aton for him that is to be cleans from hi uncleanness; and
afterward he shall kill the burnt offering: 14:20 and the priest shall
offer the burnt offer and the meat offer upon the altar: and the
priest shall make an aton for him and he shall be clean

14:21 and if he be poor and cannot get so much; then he shall take
one lamb for a trespass offer to be wave to make an aton for
him and one tenth deal of fine flour mingl with oil for a meat
offer and a log of oil; 14:22 and two turtledov or two young
pigeon such as he is abl to get; and the one shall be a sin
offer and the other a burnt offer

14:23 and he shall bring them on the eighth day for hi cleans unto
the priest unto the door of the tabernacl of the congreg
befor the lord

14:24 and the priest shall take the lamb of the trespass offer and
the log of oil and the priest shall wave them for a wave offer
befor the lord: 14:25 and he shall kill the lamb of the trespass
offer and the priest shall take some of the blood of the trespass
offer and put it upon the tip of the right ear of him that is to
be cleans and upon the thumb of hi right hand and upon the great
toe of hi right foot: 14:26 and the priest shall pour of the oil into
the palm of hi own left hand: 14:27 and the priest shall sprinkl
with hi right finger some of the oil that is in hi left hand seven
time befor the lord: 14:28 and the priest shall put of the oil that
is in hi hand upon the tip of the right ear of him that is to be
cleans and upon the thumb of hi right hand and upon the great toe
of hi right foot upon the place of the blood of the trespass
offering: 14:29 and the rest of the oil that is in the priest hand
he shall put upon the head of him that is to be cleans to make an
aton for him befor the lord

14:30 and he shall offer the one of the turtledov or of the young
pigeon such as he can get; 14:31 even such as he is abl to get the
one for a sin offer and the other for a burnt offer with the
meat offering: and the priest shall make an aton for him that is
to be cleans befor the lord

14:32 thi is the law of him in whom is the plagu of leprosi whose
hand is not abl to get that which pertaineth to hi cleans

14:33 and the lord spake unto mose and unto aaron say 14:34 when
ye be come into the land of canaan which i give to you for a
possess and i put the plagu of leprosi in a hous of the land of
your possession; 14:35 and he that owneth the hous shall come and
tell the priest say it seemeth to me there is as it were a plagu
in the house: 14:36 then the priest shall command that they empti the
hous befor the priest go into it to see the plagu that all that
is in the hous be not made unclean: and afterward the priest shall go
in to see the house: 14:37 and he shall look on the plagu and
behold if the plagu be in the wall of the hous with hollow
strake greenish or reddish which in sight are lower than the wall;
14:38 then the priest shall go out of the hous to the door of the
hous and shut up the hous seven days: 14:39 and the priest shall
come again the seventh day and shall look: and behold if the plagu
be spread in the wall of the house; 14:40 then the priest shall
command that they take away the stone in which the plagu is and
they shall cast them into an unclean place without the city: 14:41 and
he shall caus the hous to be scrape within round about and they
shall pour out the dust that they scrape off without the citi into an
unclean place: 14:42 and they shall take other stone and put them in
the place of those stones; and he shall take other morter and shall
plaister the hous

14:43 and if the plagu come again and break out in the hous after
that he hath taken away the stone and after he hath scrape the
hous and after it is plaistered; 14:44 then the priest shall come
and look and behold if the plagu be spread in the hous it is a
fret leprosi in the house; it is unclean

14:45 and he shall break down the hous the stone of it and the
timber thereof and all the morter of the house; and he shall carri
them forth out of the citi into an unclean place

14:46 moreov he that goeth into the hous all the while that it is
shut up shall be unclean until the even

14:47 and he that lieth in the hous shall wash hi clothes; and he
that eateth in the hous shall wash hi cloth

14:48 and if the priest shall come in and look upon it and behold
the plagu hath not spread in the hous after the hous wa
plaistered: then the priest shall pronounc the hous clean becaus
the plagu is heal

14:49 and he shall take to cleans the hous two bird and cedar
wood and scarlet and hyssop: 14:50 and he shall kill the one of the
bird in an earthen vessel over run water: 14:51 and he shall take
the cedar wood and the hyssop and the scarlet and the live bird
and dip them in the blood of the slain bird and in the run water
and sprinkl the hous seven times: 14:52 and he shall cleans the
hous with the blood of the bird and with the run water and with
the live bird and with the cedar wood and with the hyssop and
with the scarlet: 14:53 but he shall let go the live bird out of the
citi into the open field and make an aton for the house: and it
shall be clean

14:54 thi is the law for all manner of plagu of leprosi and scall
14:55 and for the leprosi of a garment and of a hous 14:56 and for
a rise and for a scab and for a bright spot: 14:57 to teach when
it is unclean and when it is clean: thi is the law of leprosi

15:1 and the lord spake unto mose and to aaron say 15:2 speak
unto the children of israel and say unto them when ani man hath a
run issu out of hi flesh becaus of hi issu he is unclean

15:3 and thi shall be hi unclean in hi issue: whether hi flesh
run with hi issu or hi flesh be stop from hi issu it is hi
unclean

15:4 everi bed whereon he lieth that hath the issu is unclean: and
everi thing whereon he sitteth shall be unclean

15:5 and whosoev toucheth hi bed shall wash hi cloth and bath
himself in water and be unclean until the even

15:6 and he that sitteth on ani thing whereon he sat that hath the
issu shall wash hi cloth and bath himself in water and be
unclean until the even

15:7 and he that toucheth the flesh of him that hath the issu shall
wash hi cloth and bath himself in water and be unclean until the
even

15:8 and if he that hath the issu spit upon him that is clean; then
he shall wash hi cloth and bath himself in water and be unclean
until the even

15:9 and what saddl soever he rideth upon that hath the issu shall
be unclean

15:10 and whosoev toucheth ani thing that wa under him shall be
unclean until the even: and he that beareth ani of those thing shall
wash hi cloth and bath himself in water and be unclean until the
even

15:11 and whomsoev he toucheth that hath the issu and hath not
rins hi hand in water he shall wash hi cloth and bath
himself in water and be unclean until the even

15:12 and the vessel of earth that he toucheth which hath the issu
shall be broken: and everi vessel of wood shall be rins in water

15:13 and when he that hath an issu is cleans of hi issue; then he
shall number to himself seven day for hi cleans and wash hi
cloth and bath hi flesh in run water and shall be clean

15:14 and on the eighth day he shall take to him two turtledov or
two young pigeon and come befor the lord unto the door of the
tabernacl of the congreg and give them unto the priest: 15:15
and the priest shall offer them the one for a sin offer and the
other for a burnt offering; and the priest shall make an aton for
him befor the lord for hi issu

15:16 and if ani man seed of copul go out from him then he
shall wash all hi flesh in water and be unclean until the even

15:17 and everi garment and everi skin whereon is the seed of
copul shall be wash with water and be unclean until the even

15:18 the woman also with whom man shall lie with seed of copul
they shall both bath themselv in water and be unclean until the
even

15:19 and if a woman have an issu and her issu in her flesh be
blood she shall be put apart seven days: and whosoev toucheth her
shall be unclean until the even

15:20 and everi thing that she lieth upon in her separ shall be
unclean: everi thing also that she sitteth upon shall be unclean

15:21 and whosoev toucheth her bed shall wash hi cloth and bath
himself in water and be unclean until the even

15:22 and whosoev toucheth ani thing that she sat upon shall wash
hi cloth and bath himself in water and be unclean until the
even

15:23 and if it be on her bed or on ani thing whereon she sitteth
when he toucheth it he shall be unclean until the even

15:24 and if ani man lie with her at all and her flower be upon him
he shall be unclean seven days; and all the bed whereon he lieth shall
be unclean

15:25 and if a woman have an issu of her blood mani day out of the
time of her separ or if it run beyond the time of her
separation; all the day of the issu of her unclean shall be as
the day of her separation: she shall be unclean

15:26 everi bed whereon she lieth all the day of her issu shall be
unto her as the bed of her separation: and whatsoev she sitteth upon
shall be unclean as the unclean of her separ

15:27 and whosoev toucheth those thing shall be unclean and shall
wash hi cloth and bath himself in water and be unclean until the
even

15:28 but if she be cleans of her issu then she shall number to
herself seven day and after that she shall be clean

15:29 and on the eighth day she shall take unto her two turtl or
two young pigeon and bring them unto the priest to the door of the
tabernacl of the congreg

15:30 and the priest shall offer the one for a sin offer and the
other for a burnt offering; and the priest shall make an aton for
her befor the lord for the issu of her unclean

15:31 thu shall ye separ the children of israel from their
uncleanness; that they die not in their unclean when they defil
my tabernacl that is among them

15:32 thi is the law of him that hath an issu and of him whose seed
goeth from him and is defil therewith; 15:33 and of her that is
sick of her flower and of him that hath an issu of the man and of
the woman and of him that lieth with her that is unclean

16:1 and the lord spake unto mose after the death of the two son of
aaron when they offer befor the lord and died; 16:2 and the lord
said unto mose speak unto aaron thi brother that he come not at all
time into the holi place within the vail befor the merci seat which
is upon the ark; that he die not: for i will appear in the cloud upon
the merci seat

16:3 thu shall aaron come into the holi place: with a young bullock
for a sin offer and a ram for a burnt offer

16:4 he shall put on the holi linen coat and he shall have the linen
breech upon hi flesh and shall be gird with a linen girdl and
with the linen mitr shall he be attired: these are holi garments;
therefor shall he wash hi flesh in water and so put them on

16:5 and he shall take of the congreg of the children of israel
two kid of the goat for a sin offer and one ram for a burnt
offer

16:6 and aaron shall offer hi bullock of the sin offer which is
for himself and make an aton for himself and for hi hous

16:7 and he shall take the two goat and present them befor the lord
at the door of the tabernacl of the congreg

16:8 and aaron shall cast lot upon the two goats; one lot for the
lord and the other lot for the scapegoat

16:9 and aaron shall bring the goat upon which the lord lot fell
and offer him for a sin offer

16:10 but the goat on which the lot fell to be the scapegoat shall
be present aliv befor the lord to make an aton with him and
to let him go for a scapegoat into the wilder

16:11 and aaron shall bring the bullock of the sin offer which is
for himself and shall make an aton for himself and for hi
hous and shall kill the bullock of the sin offer which is for
himself: 16:12 and he shall take a censer full of burn coal of
fire from off the altar befor the lord and hi hand full of sweet
incens beaten small and bring it within the vail: 16:13 and he shall
put the incens upon the fire befor the lord that the cloud of the
incens may cover the merci seat that is upon the testimoni that he
die not: 16:14 and he shall take of the blood of the bullock and
sprinkl it with hi finger upon the merci seat eastward; and befor
the merci seat shall he sprinkl of the blood with hi finger seven
time

16:15 then shall he kill the goat of the sin offer that is for the
peopl and bring hi blood within the vail and do with that blood as
he did with the blood of the bullock and sprinkl it upon the merci
seat and befor the merci seat: 16:16 and he shall make an aton
for the holi place becaus of the unclean of the children of
israel and becaus of their transgress in all their sins: and so
shall he do for the tabernacl of the congreg that remaineth
among them in the midst of their unclean

16:17 and there shall be no man in the tabernacl of the congreg
when he goeth in to make an aton in the holi place until he come
out and have made an aton for himself and for hi household
and for all the congreg of israel

16:18 and he shall go out unto the altar that is befor the lord and
make an aton for it; and shall take of the blood of the bullock
and of the blood of the goat and put it upon the horn of the altar
round about

16:19 and he shall sprinkl of the blood upon it with hi finger seven
time and cleans it and hallow it from the unclean of the
children of israel

16:20 and when he hath made an end of reconcil the holi place and
the tabernacl of the congreg and the altar he shall bring the
live goat: 16:21 and aaron shall lay both hi hand upon the head of
the live goat and confess over him all the iniqu of the children
of israel and all their transgress in all their sin put
them upon the head of the goat and shall send him away by the hand of
a fit man into the wilderness: 16:22 and the goat shall bear upon him
all their iniqu unto a land not inhabited: and he shall let go
the goat in the wilder

16:23 and aaron shall come into the tabernacl of the congreg
and shall put off the linen garment which he put on when he went
into the holi place and shall leav them there: 16:24 and he shall
wash hi flesh with water in the holi place and put on hi garment
and come forth and offer hi burnt offer and the burnt offer
of the peopl and make an aton for himself and for the peopl

16:25 and the fat of the sin offer shall he burn upon the altar

16:26 and he that let go the goat for the scapegoat shall wash hi
cloth and bath hi flesh in water and afterward come into the
camp

16:27 and the bullock for the sin offer and the goat for the sin
offer whose blood wa brought in to make aton in the holi
place shall one carri forth without the camp; and they shall burn in
the fire their skin and their flesh and their dung

16:28 and he that burneth them shall wash hi cloth and bath hi
flesh in water and afterward he shall come into the camp

16:29 and thi shall be a statut for ever unto you: that in the
seventh month on the tenth day of the month ye shall afflict your
soul and do no work at all whether it be one of your own countri
or a stranger that sojourneth among you: 16:30 for on that day shall
the priest make an aton for you to cleans you that ye may be
clean from all your sin befor the lord

16:31 it shall be a sabbath of rest unto you and ye shall afflict
your soul by a statut for ever

16:32 and the priest whom he shall anoint and whom he shall
consecr to minist in the priest offic in hi father stead
shall make the aton and shall put on the linen cloth even the
holi garments: 16:33 and he shall make an aton for the holi
sanctuari and he shall make an aton for the tabernacl of the
congreg and for the altar and he shall make an aton for
the priest and for all the peopl of the congreg

16:34 and thi shall be an everlast statut unto you to make an
aton for the children of israel for all their sin onc a year
and he did as the lord command mose

17:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 17:2 speak unto aaron and
unto hi son and unto all the children of israel and say unto them;
thi is the thing which the lord hath command say 17:3 what man
soever there be of the hous of israel that killeth an ox or lamb
or goat in the camp or that killeth it out of the camp 17:4 and
bringeth it not unto the door of the tabernacl of the congreg
to offer an offer unto the lord befor the tabernacl of the lord;
blood shall be imput unto that man; he hath shed blood; and that man
shall be cut off from among hi people: 17:5 to the end that the
children of israel may bring their sacrific which they offer in the
open field even that they may bring them unto the lord unto the door
of the tabernacl of the congreg unto the priest and offer them
for peac offer unto the lord

17:6 and the priest shall sprinkl the blood upon the altar of the
lord at the door of the tabernacl of the congreg and burn the
fat for a sweet savour unto the lord

17:7 and they shall no more offer their sacrific unto devil after
whom they have gone a whore thi shall be a statut for ever unto
them throughout their gener

17:8 and thou shalt say unto them whatsoev man there be of the
hous of israel or of the stranger which sojourn among you that
offereth a burnt offer or sacrific 17:9 and bringeth it not unto
the door of the tabernacl of the congreg to offer it unto the
lord; even that man shall be cut off from among hi peopl

17:10 and whatsoev man there be of the hous of israel or of the
stranger that sojourn among you that eateth ani manner of blood; i
will even set my face against that soul that eateth blood and will
cut him off from among hi peopl

17:11 for the life of the flesh is in the blood: and i have given it
to you upon the altar to make an aton for your souls: for it is
the blood that maketh an aton for the soul

17:12 therefor i said unto the children of israel no soul of you
shall eat blood neither shall ani stranger that sojourneth among you
eat blood

17:13 and whatsoev man there be of the children of israel or of the
stranger that sojourn among you which hunteth and catcheth ani beast
or fowl that may be eaten; he shall even pour out the blood thereof
and cover it with dust

17:14 for it is the life of all flesh; the blood of it is for the life
thereof: therefor i said unto the children of israel ye shall eat
the blood of no manner of flesh: for the life of all flesh is the
blood thereof: whosoev eateth it shall be cut off

17:15 and everi soul that eateth that which die of itself or that
which wa torn with beast whether it be one of your own countri or
a stranger he shall both wash hi cloth and bath himself in
water and be unclean until the even: then shall he be clean

17:16 but if he wash them not nor bath hi flesh; then he shall bear
hi iniqu

18:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 18:2 speak unto the
children of israel and say unto them i am the lord your god

18:3 after the do of the land of egypt wherein ye dwelt shall ye
not do: and after the do of the land of canaan whither i bring
you shall ye not do: neither shall ye walk in their ordin

18:4 ye shall do my judgment and keep mine ordin to walk
therein: i am the lord your god

18:5 ye shall therefor keep my statut and my judgments: which if a
man do he shall live in them: i am the lord

18:6 none of you shall approach to ani that is near of kin to him to
uncov their nakedness: i am the lord

18:7 the naked of thi father or the naked of thi mother
shalt thou not uncover: she is thi mother; thou shalt not uncov her
naked

18:8 the naked of thi father wife shalt thou not uncover: it is
thi father naked

18:9 the naked of thi sister the daughter of thi father or
daughter of thi mother whether she be born at home or born abroad
even their naked thou shalt not uncov

18:10 the naked of thi son daughter or of thi daughter
daughter even their naked thou shalt not uncover: for their is
thine own naked

18:11 the naked of thi father wife daughter begotten of thi
father she is thi sister thou shalt not uncov her naked

18:12 thou shalt not uncov the naked of thi father sister: she
is thi father near kinswoman

18:13 thou shalt not uncov the naked of thi mother sister: for
she is thi mother near kinswoman

18:14 thou shalt not uncov the naked of thi father brother
thou shalt not approach to hi wife: she is thine aunt

18:15 thou shalt not uncov the naked of thi daughter in law: she
is thi son wife; thou shalt not uncov her naked

18:16 thou shalt not uncov the naked of thi brother wife: it
is thi brother naked

18:17 thou shalt not uncov the naked of a woman and her
daughter neither shalt thou take her son daughter or her
daughter daughter to uncov her nakedness; for they are her near
kinswomen: it is wicked

18:18 neither shalt thou take a wife to her sister to vex her to
uncov her naked besid the other in her life time

18:19 also thou shalt not approach unto a woman to uncov her
naked as long as she is put apart for her unclean

18:20 moreov thou shalt not lie carnal with thi neighbour wife
to defil thyself with her

18:21 and thou shalt not let ani of thi seed pass through the fire to
molech neither shalt thou profan the name of thi god: i am the lord

18:22 thou shalt not lie with mankind as with womankind: it is
abomin

18:23 neither shalt thou lie with ani beast to defil thyself
therewith: neither shall ani woman stand befor a beast to lie down
thereto: it is confus

18:24 defil not ye yourselv in ani of these things: for in all
these the nation are defil which i cast out befor you: 18:25 and
the land is defiled: therefor i do visit the iniqu thereof upon
it and the land itself vomiteth out her inhabit

18:26 ye shall therefor keep my statut and my judgment and shall
not commit ani of these abominations; neither ani of your own nation
nor ani stranger that sojourneth among you: 18:27 (for all these
abomin have the men of the land done which were befor you and
the land is defiled;) 18:28 that the land spue not you out also when
ye defil it as it spu out the nation that were befor you

18:29 for whosoev shall commit ani of these abomin even the
soul that commit them shall be cut off from among their peopl

18:30 therefor shall ye keep mine ordin that ye commit not ani
one of these abomin custom which were commit befor you and
that ye defil not yourselv therein: i am the lord your god

19:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 19:2 speak unto all the
congreg of the children of israel and say unto them ye shall be
holy: for i the lord your god am holi

19:3 ye shall fear everi man hi mother and hi father and keep my
sabbaths: i am the lord your god

19:4 turn ye not unto idol nor make to yourselv molten gods: i am
the lord your god

19:5 and if ye offer a sacrific of peac offer unto the lord ye
shall offer it at your own will

19:6 it shall be eaten the same day ye offer it and on the morrow:
and if ought remain until the third day it shall be burnt in the
fire

19:7 and if it be eaten at all on the third day it is abominable; it
shall not be accept

19:8 therefor everi one that eateth it shall bear hi iniqu
becaus he hath profan the hallow thing of the lord: and that soul
shall be cut off from among hi peopl

19:9 and when ye reap the harvest of your land thou shalt not wholli
reap the corner of thi field neither shalt thou gather the glean
of thi harvest

19:10 and thou shalt not glean thi vineyard neither shalt thou gather
everi grape of thi vineyard; thou shalt leav them for the poor and
stranger: i am the lord your god

19:11 ye shall not steal neither deal fals neither lie one to
anoth

19:12 and ye shall not swear by my name fals neither shalt thou
profan the name of thi god: i am the lord

19:13 thou shalt not defraud thi neighbour neither rob him: the wage
of him that is hire shall not abid with thee all night until the
morn

19:14 thou shalt not curs the deaf nor put a stumblingblock befor
the blind but shalt fear thi god: i am the lord

19:15 ye shall do no unright in judgment: thou shalt not
respect the person of the poor nor honor the person of the mighty:
but in righteous shalt thou judg thi neighbour

19:16 thou shalt not go up and down as a talebear among thi people:
neither shalt thou stand against the blood of thi neighbour; i am the
lord

19:17 thou shalt not hate thi brother in thine heart: thou shalt in
ani wise rebuk thi neighbour and not suffer sin upon him

19:18 thou shalt not aveng nor bear ani grudg against the children
of thi peopl but thou shalt love thi neighbour as thyself: i am the
lord

19:19 ye shall keep my statut thou shalt not let thi cattl gender
with a divers kind: thou shalt not sow thi field with mingl seed:
neither shall a garment mingl of linen and woollen come upon thee

19:20 and whosoev lieth carnal with a woman that is a bondmaid
betroth to an husband and not at all redeem nor freedom given
her; she shall be scourged; they shall not be put to death becaus
she wa not free

19:21 and he shall bring hi trespass offer unto the lord unto the
door of the tabernacl of the congreg even a ram for a trespass
offer

19:22 and the priest shall make an aton for him with the ram of
the trespass offer befor the lord for hi sin which he hath done:
and the sin which he hath done shall be forgiven him

19:23 and when ye shall come into the land and shall have plant all
manner of tree for food then ye shall count the fruit thereof as
uncircumcised: three year shall it be as uncircumcis unto you: it
shall not be eaten of

19:24 but in the fourth year all the fruit thereof shall be holi to
prais the lord withal

19:25 and in the fifth year shall ye eat of the fruit thereof that it
may yield unto you the increas thereof: i am the lord your god

19:26 ye shall not eat ani thing with the blood: neither shall ye use
enchant nor observ time

19:27 ye shall not round the corner of your head neither shalt thou
mar the corner of thi beard

19:28 ye shall not make ani cut in your flesh for the dead nor
print ani mark upon you: i am the lord

19:29 do not prostitut thi daughter to caus her to be a whore; lest
the land fall to whoredom and the land becom full of wicked

19:30 ye shall keep my sabbath and rever my sanctuary: i am the
lord

19:31 regard not them that have familiar spirit neither seek after
wizard to be defil by them: i am the lord your god

19:32 thou shalt rise up befor the hoari head and honour the face of
the old man and fear thi god: i am the lord

19:33 and if a stranger sojourn with thee in your land ye shall not
vex him

19:34 but the stranger that dwelleth with you shall be unto you as one
born among you and thou shalt love him as thyself; for ye were
stranger in the land of egypt: i am the lord your god

19:35 ye shall do no unright in judgment in meteyard in
weight or in measur

19:36 just balanc just weight a just ephah and a just hin shall
ye have: i am the lord your god which brought you out of the land of
egypt

19:37 therefor shall ye observ all my statut and all my
judgment and do them: i am the lord

20:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 20:2 again thou shalt say
to the children of israel whosoev he be of the children of israel
or of the stranger that sojourn in israel that giveth ani of hi
seed unto molech; he shall sure be put to death: the peopl of the
land shall stone him with stone

20:3 and i will set my face against that man and will cut him off
from among hi people; becaus he hath given of hi seed unto molech
to defil my sanctuari and to profan my holi name

20:4 and if the peopl of the land do ani way hide their eye from
the man when he giveth of hi seed unto molech and kill him not:
20:5 then i will set my face against that man and against hi famili
and will cut him off and all that go a whore after him to commit
whoredom with molech from among their peopl

20:6 and the soul that turneth after such as have familiar spirit
and after wizard to go a whore after them i will even set my face
against that soul and will cut him off from among hi peopl

20:7 sanctifi yourselv therefor and be ye holy: for i am the lord
your god

20:8 and ye shall keep my statut and do them: i am the lord which
sanctifi you

20:9 for everi one that curseth hi father or hi mother shall be
sure put to death: he hath curs hi father or hi mother; hi
blood shall be upon him

20:10 and the man that committeth adulteri with anoth man wife
even he that committeth adulteri with hi neighbour wife the
adulter and the adulteress shall sure be put to death

20:11 and the man that lieth with hi father wife hath uncov hi
father nakedness: both of them shall sure be put to death; their
blood shall be upon them

20:12 and if a man lie with hi daughter in law both of them shall
sure be put to death: they have wrought confusion; their blood shall
be upon them

20:13 if a man also lie with mankind as he lieth with a woman both
of them have commit an abomination: they shall sure be put to
death; their blood shall be upon them

20:14 and if a man take a wife and her mother it is wickedness: they
shall be burnt with fire both he and they; that there be no
wicked among you

20:15 and if a man lie with a beast he shall sure be put to death:
and ye shall slay the beast

20:16 and if a woman approach unto ani beast and lie down thereto
thou shalt kill the woman and the beast: they shall sure be put to
death; their blood shall be upon them

20:17 and if a man shall take hi sister hi father daughter or
hi mother daughter and see her naked and she see hi
nakedness; it is a wick thing; and they shall be cut off in the
sight of their people: he hath uncov hi sister nakedness; he
shall bear hi iniqu

20:18 and if a man shall lie with a woman have her sick and
shall uncov her nakedness; he hath discov her fountain and she
hath uncov the fountain of her blood: and both of them shall be
cut off from among their peopl

20:19 and thou shalt not uncov the naked of thi mother sister
nor of thi father sister: for he uncovereth hi near kin: they shall
bear their iniqu

20:20 and if a man shall lie with hi uncl wife he hath uncov
hi uncl nakedness: they shall bear their sin; they shall die
childless

20:21 and if a man shall take hi brother wife it is an unclean
thing: he hath uncov hi brother nakedness; they shall be
childless

20:22 ye shall therefor keep all my statut and all my judgment
and do them: that the land whither i bring you to dwell therein spue
you not out

20:23 and ye shall not walk in the manner of the nation which i cast
out befor you: for they commit all these thing and therefor i
abhor them

20:24 but i have said unto you ye shall inherit their land and i
will give it unto you to possess it a land that floweth with milk and
honey: i am the lord your god which have separ you from other
peopl

20:25 ye shall therefor put differ between clean beast and
unclean and between unclean fowl and clean: and ye shall not make
your soul abomin by beast or by fowl or by ani manner of live
thing that creepeth on the ground which i have separ from you as
unclean

20:26 and ye shall be holi unto me: for i the lord am holi and have
sever you from other peopl that ye should be mine

20:27 a man also or woman that hath a familiar spirit or that is a
wizard shall sure be put to death: they shall stone them with
stones: their blood shall be upon them

21:1 and the lord said unto mose speak unto the priest the son of
aaron and say unto them there shall none be defil for the dead
among hi people: 21:2 but for hi kin that is near unto him that
is for hi mother and for hi father and for hi son and for hi
daughter and for hi brother

21:3 and for hi sister a virgin that is nigh unto him which hath
had no husband; for her may he be defil

21:4 but he shall not defil himself be a chief man among hi
peopl to profan himself

21:5 they shall not make bald upon their head neither shall they
shave off the corner of their beard nor make ani cut in their
flesh

21:6 they shall be holi unto their god and not profan the name of
their god: for the offer of the lord made by fire and the bread
of their god they do offer: therefor they shall be holi

21:7 they shall not take a wife that is a whore or profane; neither
shall they take a woman put away from her husband: for he is holi unto
hi god

21:8 thou shalt sanctifi him therefore; for he offereth the bread of
thi god: he shall be holi unto thee: for i the lord which sanctifi
you am holi

21:9 and the daughter of ani priest if she profan herself by play
the whore she profaneth her father: she shall be burnt with fire

21:10 and he that is the high priest among hi brethren upon whose
head the anoint oil wa pour and that is consecr to put on
the garment shall not uncov hi head nor rend hi clothes; 21:11
neither shall he go in to ani dead bodi nor defil himself for hi
father or for hi mother; 21:12 neither shall he go out of the
sanctuari nor profan the sanctuari of hi god; for the crown of the
anoint oil of hi god is upon him: i am the lord

21:13 and he shall take a wife in her virgin

21:14 a widow or a divorc woman or profan or an harlot these
shall he not take: but he shall take a virgin of hi own peopl to
wife

21:15 neither shall he profan hi seed among hi people: for i the
lord do sanctifi him

21:16 and the lord spake unto mose say 21:17 speak unto aaron
say whosoev he be of thi seed in their gener that hath ani
blemish let him not approach to offer the bread of hi god

21:18 for whatsoev man he be that hath a blemish he shall not
approach: a blind man or a lame or he that hath a flat nose or ani
thing superflu 21:19 or a man that is brokenfoot or
brokenhand 21:20 or crookbackt or a dwarf or that hath a blemish
in hi eye or be scurvi or scab or hath hi stone broken; 21:21
no man that hath a blemish of the seed of aaron the priest shall come
nigh to offer the offer of the lord made by fire: he hath a
blemish; he shall not come nigh to offer the bread of hi god

21:22 he shall eat the bread of hi god both of the most holi and of
the holi

21:23 onli he shall not go in unto the vail nor come nigh unto the
altar becaus he hath a blemish; that he profan not my sanctuaries:
for i the lord do sanctifi them

21:24 and mose told it unto aaron and to hi son and unto all the
children of israel

22:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 22:2 speak unto aaron and
to hi son that they separ themselv from the holi thing of the
children of israel and that they profan not my holi name in those
thing which they hallow unto me: i am the lord

22:3 say unto them whosoev he be of all your seed among your
gener that goeth unto the holi thing which the children of
israel hallow unto the lord have hi unclean upon him that
soul shall be cut off from my presence: i am the lord

22:4 what man soever of the seed of aaron is a leper or hath a
run issue; he shall not eat of the holi thing until he be clean
and whoso toucheth ani thing that is unclean by the dead or a man
whose seed goeth from him; 22:5 or whosoev toucheth ani creep
thing wherebi he may be made unclean or a man of whom he may take
unclean whatsoev unclean he hath; 22:6 the soul which hath
touch ani such shall be unclean until even and shall not eat of the
holi thing unless he wash hi flesh with water

22:7 and when the sun is down he shall be clean and shall afterward
eat of the holi things; becaus it is hi food

22:8 that which dieth of itself or is torn with beast he shall not
eat to defil himself therewith; i am the lord

22:9 they shall therefor keep mine ordin lest they bear sin for
it and die therefor if they profan it: i the lord do sanctifi
them

22:10 there shall no stranger eat of the holi thing: a sojourn of
the priest or an hire servant shall not eat of the holi thing

22:11 but if the priest buy ani soul with hi money he shall eat of
it and he that is born in hi house: they shall eat of hi meat

22:12 if the priest daughter also be marri unto a stranger she
may not eat of an offer of the holi thing

22:13 but if the priest daughter be a widow or divorc and have
no child and is return unto her father hous as in her youth
she shall eat of her father meat: but there shall be no stranger eat
thereof

22:14 and if a man eat of the holi thing unwittingli then he shall
put the fifth part thereof unto it and shall give it unto the priest
with the holi thing

22:15 and they shall not profan the holi thing of the children of
israel which they offer unto the lord; 22:16 or suffer them to bear
the iniqu of trespass when they eat their holi things: for i the
lord do sanctifi them

22:17 and the lord spake unto mose say 22:18 speak unto aaron
and to hi son and unto all the children of israel and say unto
them whatsoev he be of the hous of israel or of the stranger in
israel that will offer hi oblat for all hi vow and for all hi
freewil offer which they will offer unto the lord for a burnt
offering; 22:19 ye shall offer at your own will a male without
blemish of the beev of the sheep or of the goat

22:20 but whatsoev hath a blemish that shall ye not offer: for it
shall not be accept for you

22:21 and whosoev offereth a sacrific of peac offer unto the
lord to accomplish hi vow or a freewil offer in beev or sheep
it shall be perfect to be accepted; there shall be no blemish therein

22:22 blind or broken or maim or have a wen or scurvi or
scab ye shall not offer these unto the lord nor make an offer
by fire of them upon the altar unto the lord

22:23 either a bullock or a lamb that hath ani thing superflu or
lack in hi part that mayest thou offer for a freewil offering;
but for a vow it shall not be accept

22:24 ye shall not offer unto the lord that which is bruis or
crush or broken or cut; neither shall ye make ani offer thereof
in your land

22:25 neither from a stranger hand shall ye offer the bread of your
god of ani of these; becaus their corrupt is in them and
blemish be in them: they shall not be accept for you

22:26 and the lord spake unto mose say 22:27 when a bullock or
a sheep or a goat is brought forth then it shall be seven day
under the dam; and from the eighth day and thenceforth it shall be
accept for an offer made by fire unto the lord

22:28 and whether it be cow or ewe ye shall not kill it and her
young both in one day

22:29 and when ye will offer a sacrific of thanksgiv unto the
lord offer it at your own will

22:30 on the same day it shall be eaten up; ye shall leav none of it
until the morrow: i am the lord

22:31 therefor shall ye keep my command and do them: i am the
lord

22:32 neither shall ye profan my holi name; but i will be hallow
among the children of israel: i am the lord which hallow you 22:33
that brought you out of the land of egypt to be your god: i am the
lord

23:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 23:2 speak unto the
children of israel and say unto them concern the feast of the
lord which ye shall proclaim to be holi convoc even these are
my feast

23:3 six day shall work be done: but the seventh day is the sabbath
of rest an holi convocation; ye shall do no work therein: it is the
sabbath of the lord in all your dwell

23:4 these are the feast of the lord even holi convoc which
ye shall proclaim in their season

23:5 in the fourteenth day of the first month at even is the lord
passov

23:6 and on the fifteenth day of the same month is the feast of
unleaven bread unto the lord: seven day ye must eat unleaven
bread

23:7 in the first day ye shall have an holi convocation: ye shall do
no servil work therein

23:8 but ye shall offer an offer made by fire unto the lord seven
days: in the seventh day is an holi convocation: ye shall do no
servil work therein

23:9 and the lord spake unto mose say 23:10 speak unto the
children of israel and say unto them when ye be come into the land
which i give unto you and shall reap the harvest thereof then ye
shall bring a sheaf of the firstfruit of your harvest unto the
priest: 23:11 and he shall wave the sheaf befor the lord to be
accept for you: on the morrow after the sabbath the priest shall
wave it

23:12 and ye shall offer that day when ye wave the sheaf an he lamb
without blemish of the first year for a burnt offer unto the lord

23:13 and the meat offer thereof shall be two tenth deal of fine
flour mingl with oil an offer made by fire unto the lord for a
sweet savour: and the drink offer thereof shall be of wine the
fourth part of an hin

23:14 and ye shall eat neither bread nor parch corn nor green
ear until the selfsam day that ye have brought an offer unto
your god: it shall be a statut for ever throughout your gener
in all your dwell

23:15 and ye shall count unto you from the morrow after the sabbath
from the day that ye brought the sheaf of the wave offering; seven
sabbath shall be complete: 23:16 even unto the morrow after the
seventh sabbath shall ye number fifti days; and ye shall offer a new
meat offer unto the lord

23:17 ye shall bring out of your habit two wave loav of two
tenth deals; they shall be of fine flour; they shall be baken with
leaven; they are the firstfruit unto the lord

23:18 and ye shall offer with the bread seven lamb without blemish of
the first year and one young bullock and two rams: they shall be for
a burnt offer unto the lord with their meat offer and their
drink offer even an offer made by fire of sweet savour unto
the lord

23:19 then ye shall sacrific one kid of the goat for a sin offer
and two lamb of the first year for a sacrific of peac offer

23:20 and the priest shall wave them with the bread of the firstfruit
for a wave offer befor the lord with the two lambs: they shall be
holi to the lord for the priest

23:21 and ye shall proclaim on the selfsam day that it may be an
holi convoc unto you: ye shall do no servil work therein: it
shall be a statut for ever in all your dwell throughout your
gener

23:22 and when ye reap the harvest of your land thou shalt not make
clean riddanc of the corner of thi field when thou reapest neither
shalt thou gather ani glean of thi harvest: thou shalt leav them
unto the poor and to the stranger: i am the lord your god

23:23 and the lord spake unto mose say 23:24 speak unto the
children of israel say in the seventh month in the first day of
the month shall ye have a sabbath a memori of blow of trumpet
an holi convoc

23:25 ye shall do no servil work therein: but ye shall offer an
offer made by fire unto the lord

23:26 and the lord spake unto mose say 23:27 also on the tenth
day of thi seventh month there shall be a day of atonement: it shall
be an holi convoc unto you; and ye shall afflict your soul and
offer an offer made by fire unto the lord

23:28 and ye shall do no work in that same day: for it is a day of
aton to make an aton for you befor the lord your god

23:29 for whatsoev soul it be that shall not be afflict in that
same day he shall be cut off from among hi peopl

23:30 and whatsoev soul it be that doeth ani work in that same day
the same soul will i destroy from among hi peopl

23:31 ye shall do no manner of work: it shall be a statut for ever
throughout your gener in all your dwell

23:32 it shall be unto you a sabbath of rest and ye shall afflict
your souls: in the ninth day of the month at even from even unto
even shall ye celebr your sabbath

23:33 and the lord spake unto mose say 23:34 speak unto the
children of israel say the fifteenth day of thi seventh month
shall be the feast of tabernacl for seven day unto the lord

23:35 on the first day shall be an holi convocation: ye shall do no
servil work therein

23:36 seven day ye shall offer an offer made by fire unto the
lord: on the eighth day shall be an holi convoc unto you; and ye
shall offer an offer made by fire unto the lord: it is a solemn
assembly; and ye shall do no servil work therein

23:37 these are the feast of the lord which ye shall proclaim to be
holi convoc to offer an offer made by fire unto the lord a
burnt offer and a meat offer a sacrific and drink offer
everi thing upon hi day: 23:38 besid the sabbath of the lord and
besid your gift and besid all your vow and besid all your
freewil offer which ye give unto the lord

23:39 also in the fifteenth day of the seventh month when ye have
gather in the fruit of the land ye shall keep a feast unto the lord
seven days: on the first day shall be a sabbath and on the eighth day
shall be a sabbath

23:40 and ye shall take you on the first day the bough of goodli
tree branch of palm tree and the bough of thick tree and
willow of the brook; and ye shall rejoic befor the lord your god
seven day

23:41 and ye shall keep it a feast unto the lord seven day in the
year

it shall be a statut for ever in your generations: ye shall celebr
it in the seventh month

23:42 ye shall dwell in booth seven days; all that are israelit
born shall dwell in booths: 23:43 that your gener may know that
i made the children of israel to dwell in booth when i brought them
out of the land of egypt: i am the lord your god

23:44 and mose declar unto the children of israel the feast of the
lord

24:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 24:2 command the children
of israel that they bring unto thee pure oil oliv beaten for the
light to caus the lamp to burn continu

24:3 without the vail of the testimoni in the tabernacl of the
congreg shall aaron order it from the even unto the morn
befor the lord continually: it shall be a statut for ever in your
gener

24:4 he shall order the lamp upon the pure candlestick befor the
lord continu

24:5 and thou shalt take fine flour and bake twelv cake thereof:
two tenth deal shall be in one cake

24:6 and thou shalt set them in two row six on a row upon the pure
tabl befor the lord

24:7 and thou shalt put pure frankincens upon each row that it may
be on the bread for a memori even an offer made by fire unto the
lord

24:8 everi sabbath he shall set it in order befor the lord
continu be taken from the children of israel by an everlast
coven

24:9 and it shall be aaron and hi sons; and they shall eat it in
the holi place: for it is most holi unto him of the offer of the
lord made by fire by a perpetu statut

24:10 and the son of an israelitish woman whose father wa an
egyptian went out among the children of israel: and thi son of the
israelitish woman and a man of israel strove togeth in the camp;
24:11 and the israelitish woman son blasphem the name of the lord
and curs and they brought him unto moses: (and hi mother name
wa shelomith the daughter of dibri of the tribe of dan:) 24:12 and
they put him in ward that the mind of the lord might be shew them

24:13 and the lord spake unto mose say 24:14 bring forth him
that hath curs without the camp; and let all that heard him lay
their hand upon hi head and let all the congreg stone him

24:15 and thou shalt speak unto the children of israel say
whosoev curseth hi god shall bear hi sin

24:16 and he that blasphemeth the name of the lord he shall sure be
put to death and all the congreg shall certainli stone him: as
well the stranger as he that is born in the land when he blasphemeth
the name of the lord shall be put to death

24:17 and he that killeth ani man shall sure be put to death

24:18 and he that killeth a beast shall make it good; beast for beast

24:19 and if a man caus a blemish in hi neighbour; as he hath done
so shall it be done to him; 24:20 breach for breach eye for eye
tooth for tooth: as he hath caus a blemish in a man so shall it be
done to him again

24:21 and he that killeth a beast he shall restor it: and he that
killeth a man he shall be put to death

24:22 ye shall have one manner of law as well for the stranger as
for one of your own country: for i am the lord your god

24:23 and mose spake to the children of israel that they should
bring forth him that had curs out of the camp and stone him with
stone and the children of israel did as the lord command mose

25:1 and the lord spake unto mose in mount sinai say 25:2 speak
unto the children of israel and say unto them when ye come into the
land which i give you then shall the land keep a sabbath unto the
lord

25:3 six year thou shalt sow thi field and six year thou shalt
prune thi vineyard and gather in the fruit thereof; 25:4 but in the
seventh year shall be a sabbath of rest unto the land a sabbath for
the lord: thou shalt neither sow thi field nor prune thi vineyard

25:5 that which groweth of it own accord of thi harvest thou shalt
not reap neither gather the grape of thi vine undressed: for it is a
year of rest unto the land

25:6 and the sabbath of the land shall be meat for you; for thee and
for thi servant and for thi maid and for thi hire servant and for
thi stranger that sojourneth with thee

25:7 and for thi cattl and for the beast that are in thi land shall
all the increas thereof be meat

25:8 and thou shalt number seven sabbath of year unto thee seven
time seven years; and the space of the seven sabbath of year shall
be unto thee forti and nine year

25:9 then shalt thou caus the trumpet of the jubil to sound on the
tenth day of the seventh month in the day of aton shall ye make
the trumpet sound throughout all your land

25:10 and ye shall hallow the fiftieth year and proclaim liberti
throughout all the land unto all the inhabit thereof: it shall be
a jubil unto you; and ye shall return everi man unto hi possess
and ye shall return everi man unto hi famili

25:11 a jubil shall that fiftieth year be unto you: ye shall not sow
neither reap that which groweth of itself in it nor gather the grape
in it of thi vine undress

25:12 for it is the jubile; it shall be holi unto you: ye shall eat
the increas thereof out of the field

25:13 in the year of thi jubil ye shall return everi man unto hi
possess

25:14 and if thou sell ought unto thi neighbour or buyest ought of
thi neighbour hand ye shall not oppress one another: 25:15
accord to the number of year after the jubil thou shalt buy of
thi neighbour and accord unto the number of year of the fruit he
shall sell unto thee: 25:16 accord to the multitud of year thou
shalt increas the price thereof and accord to the few of
year thou shalt diminish the price of it: for accord to the number
of the year of the fruit doth he sell unto thee

25:17 ye shall not therefor oppress one another; but thou shalt fear
thi god:for i am the lord your god

25:18 wherefor ye shall do my statut and keep my judgment and do
them; and ye shall dwell in the land in safeti

25:19 and the land shall yield her fruit and ye shall eat your fill
and dwell therein in safeti

25:20 and if ye shall say what shall we eat the seventh year? behold
we shall not sow nor gather in our increase: 25:21 then i will
command my bless upon you in the sixth year and it shall bring
forth fruit for three year

25:22 and ye shall sow the eighth year and eat yet of old fruit until
the ninth year; until her fruit come in ye shall eat of the old
store

25:23 the land shall not be sold for ever: for the land is mine for
ye are stranger and sojourn with me

25:24 and in all the land of your possess ye shall grant a
redempt for the land

25:25 if thi brother be waxen poor and hath sold away some of hi
possess and if ani of hi kin come to redeem it then shall he
redeem that which hi brother sold

25:26 and if the man have none to redeem it and himself be abl to
redeem it; 25:27 then let him count the year of the sale thereof and
restor the overplu unto the man to whom he sold it; that he may
return unto hi possess

25:28 but if he be not abl to restor it to him then that which is
sold shall remain in the hand of him that hath bought it until the
year of jubile: and in the jubil it shall go out and he shall return
unto hi possess

25:29 and if a man sell a dwell hous in a wall citi then he may
redeem it within a whole year after it is sold; within a full year may
he redeem it

25:30 and if it be not redeem within the space of a full year then
the hous that is in the wall citi shall be establish for ever to
him that bought it throughout hi generations: it shall not go out in
the jubil

25:31 but the hous of the villag which have no wall round about
them shall be count as the field of the country: they may be
redeem and they shall go out in the jubil

25:32 notwithstand the citi of the levit and the hous of the
citi of their possess may the levit redeem at ani time

25:33 and if a man purchas of the levit then the hous that wa
sold and the citi of hi possess shall go out in the year of
jubile: for the hous of the citi of the levit are their
possess among the children of israel

25:34 but the field of the suburb of their citi may not be sold;
for it is their perpetu possess

25:35 and if thi brother be waxen poor and fallen in decay with thee;
then thou shalt reliev him: yea though he be a stranger or a
sojourner; that he may live with thee

25:36 take thou no usuri of him or increase: but fear thi god; that
thi brother may live with thee

25:37 thou shalt not give him thi money upon usuri nor lend him thi
victual for increas

25:38 i am the lord your god which brought you forth out of the land
of egypt to give you the land of canaan and to be your god

25:39 and if thi brother that dwelleth by thee be waxen poor and be
sold unto thee; thou shalt not compel him to serv as a bondservant:
25:40 but as an hire servant and as a sojourn he shall be with
thee and shall serv thee unto the year of jubil

25:41 and then shall he depart from thee both he and hi children
with him and shall return unto hi own famili and unto the
possess of hi father shall he return

25:42 for they are my servant which i brought forth out of the land
of egypt: they shall not be sold as bondmen

25:43 thou shalt not rule over him with rigour; but shalt fear thi
god

25:44 both thi bondmen and thi bondmaid which thou shalt have
shall be of the heathen that are round about you; of them shall ye buy
bondmen and bondmaid

25:45 moreov of the children of the stranger that do sojourn among
you of them shall ye buy and of their famili that are with you
which they begat in your land: and they shall be your possess

25:46 and ye shall take them as an inherit for your children after
you to inherit them for a possession; they shall be your bondmen for
ever: but over your brethren the children of israel ye shall not rule
one over anoth with rigour

25:47 and if a sojourn or stranger wax rich by thee and thi brother
that dwelleth by him wax poor and sell himself unto the stranger or
sojourn by thee or to the stock of the stranger family: 25:48
after that he is sold he may be redeem again; one of hi brethren
may redeem him: 25:49 either hi uncl or hi uncl son may redeem
him or ani that is nigh of kin unto him of hi famili may redeem him;
or if he be abl he may redeem himself

25:50 and he shall reckon with him that bought him from the year that
he wa sold to him unto the year of jubile: and the price of hi sale
shall be accord unto the number of year accord to the time of
an hire servant shall it be with him

25:51 if there be yet mani year behind accord unto them he shall
give again the price of hi redempt out of the money that he wa
bought for

25:52 and if there remain but few year unto the year of jubil then
he shall count with him and accord unto hi year shall he give
him again the price of hi redempt

25:53 and as a yearli hire servant shall he be with him: and the
other shall not rule with rigour over him in thi sight

25:54 and if he be not redeem in these year then he shall go out
in the year of jubil both he and hi children with him

25:55 for unto me the children of israel are servants; they are my
servant whom i brought forth out of the land of egypt: i am the lord
your god

26:1 ye shall make you no idol nor graven imag neither rear you up
a stand imag neither shall ye set up ani imag of stone in your
land to bow down unto it: for i am the lord your god

26:2 ye shall keep my sabbath and rever my sanctuary: i am the
lord

26:3 if ye walk in my statut and keep my command and do them;
26:4 then i will give you rain in due season and the land shall yield
her increas and the tree of the field shall yield their fruit

26:5 and your thresh shall reach unto the vintag and the vintag
shall reach unto the sow time: and ye shall eat your bread to the
full and dwell in your land safe

26:6 and i will give peac in the land and ye shall lie down and
none shall make you afraid: and i will rid evil beast out of the
land neither shall the sword go through your land

26:7 and ye shall chase your enemi and they shall fall befor you
by the sword

26:8 and five of you shall chase an hundr and an hundr of you
shall put ten thousand to flight: and your enemi shall fall befor
you by the sword

26:9 for i will have respect unto you and make you fruit and
multipli you and establish my coven with you

26:10 and ye shall eat old store and bring forth the old becaus of
the new

26:11 and i set my tabernacl among you: and my soul shall not abhor
you

26:12 and i will walk among you and will be your god and ye shall be
my peopl

26:13 i am the lord your god which brought you forth out of the land
of egypt that ye should not be their bondmen; and i have broken the
band of your yoke and made you go upright

26:14 but if ye will not hearken unto me and will not do all these
commandments; 26:15 and if ye shall despis my statut or if your
soul abhor my judgment so that ye will not do all my command
but that ye break my covenant: 26:16 i also will do thi unto you; i
will even appoint over you terror consumpt and the burn agu
that shall consum the eye and caus sorrow of heart: and ye shall
sow your seed in vain for your enemi shall eat it

26:17 and i will set my face against you and ye shall be slain befor
your enemies: they that hate you shall reign over you; and ye shall
flee when none pursueth you

26:18 and if ye will not yet for all thi hearken unto me then i will
punish you seven time more for your sin

26:19 and i will break the pride of your power; and i will make your
heaven as iron and your earth as brass: 26:20 and your strength shall
be spent in vain: for your land shall not yield her increas neither
shall the tree of the land yield their fruit

26:21 and if ye walk contrari unto me and will not hearken unto me; i
will bring seven time more plagu upon you accord to your sin

26:22 i will also send wild beast among you which shall rob you of
your children and destroy your cattl and make you few in number;
and your high way shall be desol

26:23 and if ye will not be reform by me by these thing but will
walk contrari unto me; 26:24 then will i also walk contrari unto you
and will punish you yet seven time for your sin

26:25 and i will bring a sword upon you that shall aveng the quarrel
of my covenant: and when ye are gather togeth within your citi
i will send the pestil among you; and ye shall be deliv into
the hand of the enemi

26:26 and when i have broken the staff of your bread ten women shall
bake your bread in one oven and they shall deliv you your bread
again by weight: and ye shall eat and not be satisfi

26:27 and if ye will not for all thi hearken unto me but walk
contrari unto me; 26:28 then i will walk contrari unto you also in
fury; and i even i will chastis you seven time for your sin

26:29 and ye shall eat the flesh of your son and the flesh of your
daughter shall ye eat

26:30 and i will destroy your high place and cut down your imag
and cast your carcas upon the carcas of your idol and my soul
shall abhor you

26:31 and i will make your citi wast and bring your sanctuari
unto desol and i will not smell the savour of your sweet odour

26:32 and i will bring the land into desolation: and your enemi
which dwell therein shall be astonish at it

26:33 and i will scatter you among the heathen and will draw out a
sword after you: and your land shall be desol and your citi
wast

26:34 then shall the land enjoy her sabbath as long as it lieth
desol and ye be in your enemi land; even then shall the land
rest and enjoy her sabbath

26:35 as long as it lieth desol it shall rest; becaus it did not
rest in your sabbath when ye dwelt upon it

26:36 and upon them that are left aliv of you i will send a faint
into their heart in the land of their enemies; and the sound of a
shaken leaf shall chase them; and they shall flee as flee from a
sword; and they shall fall when none pursueth

26:37 and they shall fall one upon anoth as it were befor a sword
when none pursueth: and ye shall have no power to stand befor your
enemi

26:38 and ye shall perish among the heathen and the land of your
enemi shall eat you up

26:39 and they that are left of you shall pine away in their iniqu
in your enemi lands; and also in the iniqu of their father
shall they pine away with them

26:40 if they shall confess their iniqu and the iniqu of their
father with their trespass which they trespass against me and
that also they have walk contrari unto me; 26:41 and that i also
have walk contrari unto them and have brought them into the land of
their enemies; if then their uncircumcis heart be humbl and they
then accept of the punish of their iniquity: 26:42 then will i
rememb my coven with jacob and also my coven with isaac and
also my coven with abraham will i remember; and i will rememb the
land

26:43 the land also shall be left of them and shall enjoy her
sabbath while she lieth desol without them: and they shall accept
of the punish of their iniquity: becaus even becaus they
despis my judgment and becaus their soul abhor my statut

26:44 and yet for all that when they be in the land of their enemi
i will not cast them away neither will i abhor them to destroy them
utterli and to break my coven with them: for i am the lord their
god

26:45 but i will for their sake rememb the coven of their
ancestor whom i brought forth out of the land of egypt in the sight
of the heathen that i might be their god: i am the lord

26:46 these are the statut and judgment and law which the lord
made between him and the children of israel in mount sinai by the hand
of mose

27:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 27:2 speak unto the
children of israel and say unto them when a man shall make a
singular vow the person shall be for the lord by thi estim

27:3 and thi estim shall be of the male from twenti year old
even unto sixti year old even thi estim shall be fifti shekel
of silver after the shekel of the sanctuari

27:4 and if it be a femal then thi estim shall be thirti
shekel

27:5 and if it be from five year old even unto twenti year old then
thi estim shall be of the male twenti shekel and for the femal
ten shekel

27:6 and if it be from a month old even unto five year old then thi
estim shall be of the male five shekel of silver and for the
femal thi estim shall be three shekel of silver

27:7 and if it be from sixti year old and above; if it be a male
then thi estim shall be fifteen shekel and for the femal ten
shekel

27:8 but if he be poorer than thi estim then he shall present
himself befor the priest and the priest shall valu him; accord
to hi abil that vow shall the priest valu him

27:9 and if it be a beast whereof men bring an offer unto the
