15:25 and the priest shall make an aton for all the congreg
of the children of israel and it shall be forgiven them; for it is
ignorance: and they shall bring their offer a sacrific made by
fire unto the lord and their sin offer befor the lord for their
ignorance: 15:26 and it shall be forgiven all the congreg of the
children of israel and the stranger that sojourneth among them;
see all the peopl were in ignor

15:27 and if ani soul sin through ignor then he shall bring a she
goat of the first year for a sin offer

15:28 and the priest shall make an aton for the soul that sinneth
ignorantli when he sinneth by ignor befor the lord to make an
aton for him; and it shall be forgiven him

15:29 ye shall have one law for him that sinneth through ignor
both for him that is born among the children of israel and for the
stranger that sojourneth among them

15:30 but the soul that doeth ought presumptu whether he be born
in the land or a stranger the same reproacheth the lord; and that
soul shall be cut off from among hi peopl

15:31 becaus he hath despis the word of the lord and hath broken
hi command that soul shall utterli be cut off; hi iniqu
shall be upon him

15:32 and while the children of israel were in the wilder they
found a man that gather stick upon the sabbath day

15:33 and they that found him gather stick brought him unto mose
and aaron and unto all the congreg

15:34 and they put him in ward becaus it wa not declar what
should be done to him

15:35 and the lord said unto mose the man shall be sure put to
death: all the congreg shall stone him with stone without the
camp

15:36 and all the congreg brought him without the camp and
stone him with stone and he died; as the lord command mose

15:37 and the lord spake unto mose say 15:38 speak unto the
children of israel and bid them that they make them fring in the
border of their garment throughout their gener and that they
put upon the fring of the border a ribband of blue: 15:39 and it
shall be unto you for a fring that ye may look upon it and rememb
all the command of the lord and do them; and that ye seek not
after your own heart and your own eye after which ye use to go a
whoring: 15:40 that ye may rememb and do all my command and
be holi unto your god

15:41 i am the lord your god which brought you out of the land of
egypt to be your god: i am the lord your god

16:1 now korah the son of izhar the son of kohath the son of levi
and dathan and abiram the son of eliab and on the son of peleth
son of reuben took men: 16:2 and they rose up befor mose with
certain of the children of israel two hundr and fifti princ of
the assembl famou in the congreg men of renown: 16:3 and they
gather themselv togeth against mose and against aaron and said
unto them ye take too much upon you see all the congreg are
holi everi one of them and the lord is among them: wherefor then
lift ye up yourselv abov the congreg of the lord? 16:4 and
when mose heard it he fell upon hi face: 16:5 and he spake unto
korah and unto all hi compani say even to morrow the lord will
shew who are hi and who is holy; and will caus him to come near
unto him: even him whom he hath chosen will he caus to come near unto
him

16:6 thi do; take you censer korah and all hi company; 16:7 and
put fire therein and put incens in them befor the lord to morrow:
and it shall be that the man whom the lord doth choos he shall be
holy: ye take too much upon you ye son of levi

16:8 and mose said unto korah hear i pray you ye son of levi:
16:9 seemeth it but a small thing unto you that the god of israel
hath separ you from the congreg of israel to bring you near
to himself to do the servic of the tabernacl of the lord and to
stand befor the congreg to minist unto them? 16:10 and he
hath brought thee near to him and all thi brethren the son of levi
with thee: and seek ye the priesthood also? 16:11 for which caus
both thou and all thi compani are gather togeth against the lord:
and what is aaron that ye murmur against him? 16:12 and mose sent
to call dathan and abiram the son of eliab: which said we will not
come up: 16:13 is it a small thing that thou hast brought us up out of
a land that floweth with milk and honey to kill us in the wilder
except thou make thyself altogeth a princ over us? 16:14 moreov
thou hast not brought us into a land that floweth with milk and honey
or given us inherit of field and vineyards: wilt thou put out the
eye of these men? we will not come up

16:15 and mose wa veri wroth and said unto the lord respect not
thou their offering: i have not taken one ass from them neither have
i hurt one of them

16:16 and mose said unto korah be thou and all thi compani befor
the lord thou and they and aaron to morrow: 16:17 and take everi
man hi censer and put incens in them and bring ye befor the lord
everi man hi censer two hundr and fifti censers; thou also and
aaron each of you hi censer

16:18 and they took everi man hi censer and put fire in them and
laid incens thereon and stood in the door of the tabernacl of the
congreg with mose and aaron

16:19 and korah gather all the congreg against them unto the
door of the tabernacl of the congregation: and the glori of the lord
appear unto all the congreg

16:20 and the lord spake unto mose and unto aaron say 16:21
separ yourselv from among thi congreg that i may consum
them in a moment

16:22 and they fell upon their face and said o god the god of the
spirit of all flesh shall one man sin and wilt thou be wroth with
all the congregation? 16:23 and the lord spake unto mose say
16:24 speak unto the congreg say get you up from about the
tabernacl of korah dathan and abiram

16:25 and mose rose up and went unto dathan and abiram; and the
elder of israel follow him

16:26 and he spake unto the congreg say depart i pray you
from the tent of these wick men and touch noth of their lest
ye be consum in all their sin

16:27 so they gat up from the tabernacl of korah dathan and abiram
on everi side: and dathan and abiram came out and stood in the door
of their tent and their wive and their son and their littl
children

16:28 and mose said herebi ye shall know that the lord hath sent me
to do all these works; for i have not done them of mine own mind

16:29 if these men die the common death of all men or if they be
visit after the visit of all men; then the lord hath not sent
me

16:30 but if the lord make a new thing and the earth open her mouth
and swallow them up with all that appertain unto them and they go
down quick into the pit; then ye shall understand that these men have
provok the lord

16:31 and it came to pass as he had made an end of speak all these
word that the ground clave asund that wa under them: 16:32 and
the earth open her mouth and swallow them up and their hous
and all the men that appertain unto korah and all their good

16:33 they and all that appertain to them went down aliv into the
pit and the earth close upon them: and they perish from among the
congreg

16:34 and all israel that were round about them fled at the cri of
them: for they said lest the earth swallow us up also

16:35 and there came out a fire from the lord and consum the two
hundr and fifti men that offer incens

16:36 and the lord spake unto mose say 16:37 speak unto eleazar
the son of aaron the priest that he take up the censer out of the
burn and scatter thou the fire yonder; for they are hallow

16:38 the censer of these sinner against their own soul let them
make them broad plate for a cover of the altar: for they offer
them befor the lord therefor they are hallowed: and they shall be a
sign unto the children of israel

16:39 and eleazar the priest took the brasen censer wherewith they
that were burnt had offered; and they were made broad plate for a
cover of the altar: 16:40 to be a memori unto the children of
israel that no stranger which is not of the seed of aaron come near
to offer incens befor the lord; that he be not as korah and as hi
company: as the lord said to him by the hand of mose

16:41 but on the morrow all the congreg of the children of israel
murmur against mose and against aaron say ye have kill the
peopl of the lord

16:42 and it came to pass when the congreg wa gather against
mose and against aaron that they look toward the tabernacl of the
congregation: and behold the cloud cover it and the glori of the
lord appear

16:43 and mose and aaron came befor the tabernacl of the
congreg

16:44 and the lord spake unto mose say 16:45 get you up from
among thi congreg that i may consum them as in a moment and
they fell upon their face

16:46 and mose said unto aaron take a censer and put fire therein
from off the altar and put on incens and go quickli unto the
congreg and make an aton for them: for there is wrath gone
out from the lord; the plagu is begun

16:47 and aaron took as mose command and ran into the midst of the
congregation; and behold the plagu wa begun among the people: and
he put on incens and made an aton for the peopl

16:48 and he stood between the dead and the living; and the plagu wa
stay

16:49 now they that die in the plagu were fourteen thousand and
seven hundr besid them that die about the matter of korah

16:50 and aaron return unto mose unto the door of the tabernacl of
the congregation: and the plagu wa stay

17:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 17:2 speak unto the
children of israel and take of everi one of them a rod accord to
the hous of their father of all their princ accord to the
hous of their father twelv rods: write thou everi man name upon
hi rod

17:3 and thou shalt write aaron name upon the rod of levi: for one
rod shall be for the head of the hous of their father

17:4 and thou shalt lay them up in the tabernacl of the congreg
befor the testimoni where i will meet with you

17:5 and it shall come to pass that the man rod whom i shall
choos shall blossom: and i will make to ceas from me the murmur
of the children of israel wherebi they murmur against you

17:6 and mose spake unto the children of israel and everi one of
their princ gave him a rod apiec for each princ one accord to
their father hous even twelv rods: and the rod of aaron wa
among their rod

17:7 and mose laid up the rod befor the lord in the tabernacl of
wit

17:8 and it came to pass that on the morrow mose went into the
tabernacl of witness; and behold the rod of aaron for the hous of
levi wa bud and brought forth bud and bloom blossom and
yield almond

17:9 and mose brought out all the rod from befor the lord unto all
the children of israel: and they look and took everi man hi rod

17:10 and the lord said unto mose bring aaron rod again befor the
testimoni to be kept for a token against the rebels; and thou shalt
quit take away their murmur from me that they die not

17:11 and mose did so: as the lord command him so did he

17:12 and the children of israel spake unto mose say behold we
die we perish we all perish

17:13 whosoev cometh ani thing near unto the tabernacl of the lord
shall die: shall we be consum with dying? 18:1 and the lord said
unto aaron thou and thi son and thi father hous with thee shall
bear the iniqu of the sanctuary: and thou and thi son with thee
shall bear the iniqu of your priesthood

18:2 and thi brethren also of the tribe of levi the tribe of thi
father bring thou with thee that they may be join unto thee and
minist unto thee: but thou and thi son with thee shall minist
befor the tabernacl of wit

18:3 and they shall keep thi charg and the charg of all the
tabernacle: onli they shall not come nigh the vessel of the sanctuari
and the altar that neither they nor ye also die

18:4 and they shall be join unto thee and keep the charg of the
tabernacl of the congreg for all the servic of the tabernacle:
and a stranger shall not come nigh unto you

18:5 and ye shall keep the charg of the sanctuari and the charg of
the altar: that there be no wrath ani more upon the children of
israel

18:6 and i behold i have taken your brethren the levit from among
the children of israel: to you they are given as a gift for the lord
to do the servic of the tabernacl of the congreg

18:7 therefor thou and thi son with thee shall keep your priest
offic for everyth of the altar and within the vail; and ye shall
serve: i have given your priest offic unto you as a servic of
gift: and the stranger that cometh nigh shall be put to death

18:8 and the lord spake unto aaron behold i also have given thee the
charg of mine heav offer of all the hallow thing of the
children of israel; unto thee have i given them by reason of the
anoint and to thi son by an ordin for ever

18:9 thi shall be thine of the most holi thing reserv from the
fire: everi oblat of their everi meat offer of their and
everi sin offer of their and everi trespass offer of their
which they shall render unto me shall be most holi for thee and for
thi son

18:10 in the most holi place shalt thou eat it; everi male shall eat
it: it shall be holi unto thee

18:11 and thi is thine; the heav offer of their gift with all
the wave offer of the children of israel: i have given them unto
thee and to thi son and to thi daughter with thee by a statut for
ever: everi one that is clean in thi hous shall eat of it

18:12 all the best of the oil and all the best of the wine and of
the wheat the firstfruit of them which they shall offer unto the
lord them have i given thee

18:13 and whatsoev is first ripe in the land which they shall bring
unto the lord shall be thine; everi one that is clean in thine hous
shall eat of it

18:14 everi thing devot in israel shall be thine

18:15 everi thing that openeth the matrix in all flesh which they
bring unto the lord whether it be of men or beast shall be thine:
nevertheless the firstborn of man shalt thou sure redeem and the
firstl of unclean beast shalt thou redeem

18:16 and those that are to be redeem from a month old shalt thou
redeem accord to thine estim for the money of five shekel
after the shekel of the sanctuari which is twenti gerah

18:17 but the firstl of a cow or the firstl of a sheep or the
firstl of a goat thou shalt not redeem; they are holy: thou shalt
sprinkl their blood upon the altar and shalt burn their fat for an
offer made by fire for a sweet savour unto the lord

18:18 and the flesh of them shall be thine as the wave breast and as
the right shoulder are thine

18:19 all the heav offer of the holi thing which the children
of israel offer unto the lord have i given thee and thi son and thi
daughter with thee by a statut for ever: it is a coven of salt
for ever befor the lord unto thee and to thi seed with thee

18:20 and the lord spake unto aaron thou shalt have no inherit in
their land neither shalt thou have ani part among them: i am thi part
and thine inherit among the children of israel

18:21 and behold i have given the children of levi all the tenth in
israel for an inherit for their servic which they serv even
the servic of the tabernacl of the congreg

18:22 neither must the children of israel henceforth come nigh the
tabernacl of the congreg lest they bear sin and die

18:23 but the levit shall do the servic of the tabernacl of the
congreg and they shall bear their iniquity: it shall be a
statut for ever throughout your gener that among the children
of israel they have no inherit

18:24 but the tith of the children of israel which they offer as an
heav offer unto the lord i have given to the levit to inherit:
therefor i have said unto them among the children of israel they
shall have no inherit

18:25 and the lord spake unto mose say 18:26 thu speak unto the
levit and say unto them when ye take of the children of israel the
tith which i have given you from them for your inherit then ye
shall offer up an heav offer of it for the lord even a tenth part
of the tith

18:27 and thi your heav offer shall be reckon unto you as
though it were the corn of the threshingfloor and as the ful of
the winepress

18:28 thu ye also shall offer an heav offer unto the lord of all
your tith which ye receiv of the children of israel; and ye shall
give thereof the lord heav offer to aaron the priest

18:29 out of all your gift ye shall offer everi heav offer of the
lord of all the best thereof even the hallow part thereof out of
it

18:30 therefor thou shalt say unto them when ye have heav the best
thereof from it then it shall be count unto the levit as the
increas of the threshingfloor and as the increas of the winepress

18:31 and ye shall eat it in everi place ye and your households: for
it is your reward for your servic in the tabernacl of the
congreg

18:32 and ye shall bear no sin by reason of it when ye have heav
from it the best of it: neither shall ye pollut the holi thing of
the children of israel lest ye die

19:1 and the lord spake unto mose and unto aaron say 19:2 thi
is the ordin of the law which the lord hath command say
speak unto the children of israel that they bring thee a red heifer
without spot wherein is no blemish and upon which never came yoke:
19:3 and ye shall give her unto eleazar the priest that he may bring
her forth without the camp and one shall slay her befor hi face:
19:4 and eleazar the priest shall take of her blood with hi finger
and sprinkl of her blood directli befor the tabernacl of the
congreg seven times: 19:5 and one shall burn the heifer in hi
sight; her skin and her flesh and her blood with her dung shall he
burn: 19:6 and the priest shall take cedar wood and hyssop and
scarlet and cast it into the midst of the burn of the heifer

19:7 then the priest shall wash hi cloth and he shall bath hi
flesh in water and afterward he shall come into the camp and the
priest shall be unclean until the even

19:8 and he that burneth her shall wash hi cloth in water and
bath hi flesh in water and shall be unclean until the even

19:9 and a man that is clean shall gather up the ash of the heifer
and lay them up without the camp in a clean place and it shall be
kept for the congreg of the children of israel for a water of
separation: it is a purif for sin

19:10 and he that gathereth the ash of the heifer shall wash hi
cloth and be unclean until the even: and it shall be unto the
children of israel and unto the stranger that sojourneth among them
for a statut for ever

19:11 he that toucheth the dead bodi of ani man shall be unclean seven
day

19:12 he shall purifi himself with it on the third day and on the
seventh day he shall be clean: but if he purifi not himself the third
day then the seventh day he shall not be clean

19:13 whosoev toucheth the dead bodi of ani man that is dead and
purifieth not himself defileth the tabernacl of the lord; and that
soul shall be cut off from israel: becaus the water of separ wa
not sprinkl upon him he shall be unclean; hi unclean is yet
upon him

19:14 thi is the law when a man dieth in a tent: all that come into
the tent and all that is in the tent shall be unclean seven day

19:15 and everi open vessel which hath no cover bound upon it is
unclean

19:16 and whosoev toucheth one that is slain with a sword in the
open field or a dead bodi or a bone of a man or a grave shall be
unclean seven day

19:17 and for an unclean person they shall take of the ash of the
burnt heifer of purif for sin and run water shall be put
thereto in a vessel: 19:18 and a clean person shall take hyssop and
dip it in the water and sprinkl it upon the tent and upon all the
vessel and upon the person that were there and upon him that
touch a bone or one slain or one dead or a grave: 19:19 and the
clean person shall sprinkl upon the unclean on the third day and on
the seventh day: and on the seventh day he shall purifi himself and
wash hi cloth and bath himself in water and shall be clean at
even

19:20 but the man that shall be unclean and shall not purifi himself
that soul shall be cut off from among the congreg becaus he
hath defil the sanctuari of the lord: the water of separ hath
not been sprinkl upon him; he is unclean

19:21 and it shall be a perpetu statut unto them that he that
sprinkleth the water of separ shall wash hi clothes; and he that
toucheth the water of separ shall be unclean until even

19:22 and whatsoev the unclean person toucheth shall be unclean; and
the soul that toucheth it shall be unclean until even

20:1 then came the children of israel even the whole congreg
into the desert of zin in the first month: and the peopl abod in
kadesh; and miriam die there and wa buri there

20:2 and there wa no water for the congregation: and they gather
themselv togeth against mose and against aaron

20:3 and the peopl chode with mose and spake say would god
that we had die when our brethren die befor the lord! 20:4 and whi
have ye brought up the congreg of the lord into thi wilder
that we and our cattl should die there? 20:5 and wherefor have ye
made us to come up out of egypt to bring us in unto thi evil place?
it is no place of seed or of fig or of vine or of pomegranates;
neither is there ani water to drink

20:6 and mose and aaron went from the presenc of the assembl unto
the door of the tabernacl of the congreg and they fell upon
their faces: and the glori of the lord appear unto them

20:7 and the lord spake unto mose say 20:8 take the rod and
gather thou the assembl togeth thou and aaron thi brother and
speak ye unto the rock befor their eyes; and it shall give forth hi
water and thou shalt bring forth to them water out of the rock: so
thou shalt give the congreg and their beast drink

20:9 and mose took the rod from befor the lord as he command him

20:10 and mose and aaron gather the congreg togeth befor
the rock and he said unto them hear now ye rebels; must we fetch
you water out of thi rock? 20:11 and mose lift up hi hand and
with hi rod he smote the rock twice: and the water came out
abundantli and the congreg drank and their beast also

20:12 and the lord spake unto mose and aaron becaus ye believ me
not to sanctifi me in the eye of the children of israel therefor
ye shall not bring thi congreg into the land which i have given
them

20:13 thi is the water of meribah; becaus the children of israel
strove with the lord and he wa sanctifi in them

20:14 and mose sent messeng from kadesh unto the king of edom
thu saith thi brother israel thou knowest all the travail that hath
befallen us: 20:15 how our father went down into egypt and we have
dwelt in egypt a long time; and the egyptian vex us and our
fathers: 20:16 and when we cri unto the lord he heard our voic
and sent an angel and hath brought us forth out of egypt: and
behold we are in kadesh a citi in the uttermost of thi border: 20:17
let us pass i pray thee through thi country: we will not pass
through the field or through the vineyard neither will we drink of
the water of the wells: we will go by the king high way we will not
turn to the right hand nor to the left until we have pass thi
border

20:18 and edom said unto him thou shalt not pass by me lest i come
out against thee with the sword

20:19 and the children of israel said unto him we will go by the high
way: and if i and my cattl drink of thi water then i will pay for
it: i will onli without do anyth els go through on my feet

20:20 and he said thou shalt not go through and edom came out
against him with much peopl and with a strong hand

20:21 thu edom refus to give israel passag through hi border:
wherefor israel turn away from him

20:22 and the children of israel even the whole congreg
journey from kadesh and came unto mount hor

20:23 and the lord spake unto mose and aaron in mount hor by the
coast of the land of edom say 20:24 aaron shall be gather unto
hi people: for he shall not enter into the land which i have given
unto the children of israel becaus ye rebel against my word at
the water of meribah

20:25 take aaron and eleazar hi son and bring them up unto mount
hor: 20:26 and strip aaron of hi garment and put them upon eleazar
hi son: and aaron shall be gather unto hi peopl and shall die
there

20:27 and mose did as the lord commanded: and they went up into mount
hor in the sight of all the congreg

20:28 and mose strip aaron of hi garment and put them upon
eleazar hi son; and aaron die there in the top of the mount: and
mose and eleazar came down from the mount

20:29 and when all the congreg saw that aaron wa dead they
mourn for aaron thirti day even all the hous of israel

21:1 and when king arad the canaanit which dwelt in the south heard
tell that israel came by the way of the spies; then he fought against
israel and took some of them prison

21:2 and israel vow a vow unto the lord and said if thou wilt
inde deliv thi peopl into my hand then i will utterli destroy
their citi

21:3 and the lord hearken to the voic of israel and deliv up
the canaanites; and they utterli destroy them and their cities: and
he call the name of the place hormah

21:4 and they journey from mount hor by the way of the red sea to
compass the land of edom: and the soul of the peopl wa much
discourag becaus of the way

21:5 and the peopl spake against god and against mose wherefor
have ye brought us up out of egypt to die in the wilderness? for there
is no bread neither is there ani water; and our soul loatheth thi
light bread

21:6 and the lord sent fieri serpent among the peopl and they bit
the people; and much peopl of israel die

21:7 therefor the peopl came to mose and said we have sin for
we have spoken against the lord and against thee; pray unto the lord
that he take away the serpent from us and mose pray for the
peopl

21:8 and the lord said unto mose make thee a fieri serpent and set
it upon a pole: and it shall come to pass that everi one that is
bitten when he looketh upon it shall live

21:9 and mose made a serpent of brass and put it upon a pole and it
came to pass that if a serpent had bitten ani man when he beheld the
serpent of brass he live

21:10 and the children of israel set forward and pitch in oboth

21:11 and they journey from oboth and pitch at ijeabarim in the
wilder which is befor moab toward the sunris

21:12 from thenc they remov and pitch in the valley of zare

21:13 from thenc they remov and pitch on the other side of
arnon which is in the wilder that cometh out of the coast of the
amorites: for arnon is the border of moab between moab and the
amorit

21:14 wherefor it is said in the book of the war of the lord what
he did in the red sea and in the brook of arnon 21:15 and at the
stream of the brook that goeth down to the dwell of ar and lieth
upon the border of moab

21:16 and from thenc they went to beer: that is the well whereof the
lord spake unto mose gather the peopl togeth and i will give
them water

21:17 then israel sang thi song spring up o well; sing ye unto it:
21:18 the princ dig the well the nobl of the peopl dig it
by the direct of the lawgiv with their stave and from the
wilder they went to mattanah: 21:19 and from mattanah to nahaliel:
and from nahaliel to bamoth: 21:20 and from bamoth in the valley that
is in the countri of moab to the top of pisgah which looketh toward
jeshimon

21:21 and israel sent messeng unto sihon king of the amorit
say 21:22 let me pass through thi land: we will not turn into the
field or into the vineyards; we will not drink of the water of the
well: but we will go along by the king high way until we be past
thi border

21:23 and sihon would not suffer israel to pass through hi border:
but sihon gather all hi peopl togeth and went out against
israel into the wilderness: and he came to jahaz and fought against
israel

21:24 and israel smote him with the edg of the sword and possess
hi land from arnon unto jabbok even unto the children of ammon: for
the border of the children of ammon wa strong

21:25 and israel took all these cities: and israel dwelt in all the
citi of the amorit in heshbon and in all the villag thereof

21:26 for heshbon wa the citi of sihon the king of the amorit who
had fought against the former king of moab and taken all hi land out
of hi hand even unto arnon

21:27 wherefor they that speak in proverb say come into heshbon
let the citi of sihon be built and prepared: 21:28 for there is a fire
gone out of heshbon a flame from the citi of sihon: it hath consum
ar of moab and the lord of the high place of arnon

21:29 woe to thee moab! thou art undon o peopl of chemosh: he hath
given hi son that escap and hi daughter into captiv unto
sihon king of the amorit

21:30 we have shot at them; heshbon is perish even unto dibon and
we have laid them wast even unto nophah which reacheth unto medeba

21:31 thu israel dwelt in the land of the amorit

21:32 and mose sent to spi out jaazer and they took the villag
thereof and drove out the amorit that were there

21:33 and they turn and went up by the way of bashan: and og the
king of bashan went out against them he and all hi peopl to the
battl at edrei

21:34 and the lord said unto mose fear him not: for i have deliv
him into thi hand and all hi peopl and hi land; and thou shalt do
to him as thou didst unto sihon king of the amorit which dwelt at
heshbon

21:35 so they smote him and hi son and all hi peopl until there
wa none left him alive: and they possess hi land

22:1 and the children of israel set forward and pitch in the plain
of moab on thi side jordan by jericho

22:2 and balak the son of zippor saw all that israel had done to the
amorit

22:3 and moab wa sore afraid of the peopl becaus they were many:
and moab wa distress becaus of the children of israel

22:4 and moab said unto the elder of midian now shall thi compani
lick up all that are round about us as the ox licketh up the grass of
the field

and balak the son of zippor wa king of the moabit at that time

22:5 he sent messeng therefor unto balaam the son of beor to
pethor which is by the river of the land of the children of hi
peopl to call him say behold there is a peopl come out from
egypt: behold they cover the face of the earth and they abid over
against me: 22:6 come now therefor i pray thee curs me thi
people; for they are too mighti for me: peradventur i shall prevail
that we may smite them and that i may drive them out of the land: for
i wot that he whom thou blessest is bless and he whom thou cursest
is curs

22:7 and the elder of moab and the elder of midian depart with the
reward of divin in their hand; and they came unto balaam and
spake unto him the word of balak

22:8 and he said unto them lodg here thi night and i will bring
you word again as the lord shall speak unto me: and the princ of
moab abod with balaam

22:9 and god came unto balaam and said what men are these with thee?
22:10 and balaam said unto god balak the son of zippor king of moab
hath sent unto me say 22:11 behold there is a peopl come out of
egypt which covereth the face of the earth: come now curs me them;
peradventur i shall be abl to overcom them and drive them out

22:12 and god said unto balaam thou shalt not go with them; thou
shalt not curs the people: for they are bless

22:13 and balaam rose up in the morn and said unto the princ of
balak get you into your land: for the lord refuseth to give me leav
to go with you

22:14 and the princ of moab rose up and they went unto balak and
said balaam refuseth to come with us

22:15 and balak sent yet again princ more and more honour than
they

22:16 and they came to balaam and said to him thu saith balak the
son of zippor let noth i pray thee hinder thee from come unto
me: 22:17 for i will promot thee unto veri great honour and i will
do whatsoev thou sayest unto me: come therefor i pray thee curs
me thi peopl

22:18 and balaam answer and said unto the servant of balak if
balak would give me hi hous full of silver and gold i cannot go
beyond the word of the lord my god to do less or more

22:19 now therefor i pray you tarri ye also here thi night that i
may know what the lord will say unto me more

22:20 and god came unto balaam at night and said unto him if the men
come to call thee rise up and go with them; but yet the word which i
shall say unto thee that shalt thou do

22:21 and balaam rose up in the morn and saddl hi ass and went
with the princ of moab

22:22 and god anger wa kindl becaus he went: and the angel of
the lord stood in the way for an adversari against him now he wa
ride upon hi ass and hi two servant were with him

22:23 and the ass saw the angel of the lord stand in the way and
hi sword drawn in hi hand: and the ass turn asid out of the way
and went into the field: and balaam smote the ass to turn her into
the way

22:24 but the angel of the lord stood in a path of the vineyard a
wall be on thi side and a wall on that side

22:25 and when the ass saw the angel of the lord she thrust herself
unto the wall and crush balaam foot against the wall: and he
smote her again

22:26 and the angel of the lord went further and stood in a narrow
place where wa no way to turn either to the right hand or to the
left

22:27 and when the ass saw the angel of the lord she fell down under
balaam: and balaam anger wa kindl and he smote the ass with a
staff

22:28 and the lord open the mouth of the ass and she said unto
balaam what have i done unto thee that thou hast smitten me these
three times? 22:29 and balaam said unto the ass becaus thou hast
mock me: i would there were a sword in mine hand for now would i
kill thee

22:30 and the ass said unto balaam am not i thine ass upon which
thou hast ridden ever sinc i wa thine unto thi day? wa i ever wont
to do so unto thee? and he said nay

22:31 then the lord open the eye of balaam and he saw the angel of
the lord stand in the way and hi sword drawn in hi hand: and he
bow down hi head and fell flat on hi face

22:32 and the angel of the lord said unto him wherefor hast thou
smitten thine ass these three times? behold i went out to withstand
thee becaus thi way is pervers befor me: 22:33 and the ass saw me
and turn from me these three times: unless she had turn from me
sure now also i had slain thee and save her aliv

22:34 and balaam said unto the angel of the lord i have sinned; for i
knew not that thou stoodest in the way against me: now therefor if
it displeas thee i will get me back again

22:35 and the angel of the lord said unto balaam go with the men: but
onli the word that i shall speak unto thee that thou shalt speak so
balaam went with the princ of balak

22:36 and when balak heard that balaam wa come he went out to meet
him unto a citi of moab which is in the border of arnon which is in
the utmost coast

22:37 and balak said unto balaam did i not earnestli send unto thee
to call thee? wherefor camest thou not unto me? am i not abl inde
to promot thee to honour? 22:38 and balaam said unto balak lo i am
come unto thee: have i now ani power at all to say ani thing? the word
that god putteth in my mouth that shall i speak

22:39 and balaam went with balak and they came unto kirjathhuzoth

22:40 and balak offer oxen and sheep and sent to balaam and to the
princ that were with him

22:41 and it came to pass on the morrow that balak took balaam and
brought him up into the high place of baal that thenc he might see
the utmost part of the peopl

23:1 and balaam said unto balak build me here seven altar and
prepar me here seven oxen and seven ram

23:2 and balak did as balaam had spoken; and balak and balaam offer
on everi altar a bullock and a ram

23:3 and balaam said unto balak stand by thi burnt offer and i
will go: peradventur the lord will come to meet me: and whatsoev he
sheweth me i will tell thee and he went to an high place

23:4 and god met balaam: and he said unto him i have prepar seven
altar and i have offer upon everi altar a bullock and a ram

23:5 and the lord put a word in balaam mouth and said return unto
balak and thu thou shalt speak

23:6 and he return unto him and lo he stood by hi burnt
sacrific he and all the princ of moab

23:7 and he took up hi parabl and said balak the king of moab hath
brought me from aram out of the mountain of the east say come
curs me jacob and come defi israel

23:8 how shall i curs whom god hath not cursed? or how shall i defi
whom the lord hath not defied? 23:9 for from the top of the rock i
see him and from the hill i behold him: lo the peopl shall dwell
alon and shall not be reckon among the nation

23:10 who can count the dust of jacob and the number of the fourth
part of israel? let me die the death of the righteou and let my last
end be like his! 23:11 and balak said unto balaam what hast thou
done unto me? i took thee to curs mine enemi and behold thou
hast bless them altogeth

23:12 and he answer and said must i not take heed to speak that
which the lord hath put in my mouth? 23:13 and balak said unto him
come i pray thee with me unto anoth place from whenc thou mayest
see them: thou shalt see but the utmost part of them and shalt not
see them all: and curs me them from thenc

23:14 and he brought him into the field of zophim to the top of
pisgah and built seven altar and offer a bullock and a ram on
everi altar

23:15 and he said unto balak stand here by thi burnt offer while
i meet the lord yonder

23:16 and the lord met balaam and put a word in hi mouth and said
go again unto balak and say thu

23:17 and when he came to him behold he stood by hi burnt offer
and the princ of moab with him and balak said unto him what hath
the lord spoken? 23:18 and he took up hi parabl and said rise up
balak and hear; hearken unto me thou son of zippor: 23:19 god is not
a man that he should lie; neither the son of man that he should
repent: hath he said and shall he not do it? or hath he spoken and
shall he not make it good? 23:20 behold i have receiv command
to bless: and he hath blessed; and i cannot revers it

23:21 he hath not beheld iniqu in jacob neither hath he seen
pervers in israel: the lord hi god is with him and the shout of
a king is among them

23:22 god brought them out of egypt; he hath as it were the strength
of an unicorn

23:23 sure there is no enchant against jacob neither is there
ani divin against israel: accord to thi time it shall be said
of jacob and of israel what hath god wrought! 23:24 behold the
peopl shall rise up as a great lion and lift up himself as a young
lion: he shall not lie down until he eat of the prey and drink the
blood of the slain

23:25 and balak said unto balaam neither curs them at all nor bless
them at all

23:26 but balaam answer and said unto balak told not i thee
say all that the lord speaketh that i must do? 23:27 and balak
said unto balaam come i pray thee i will bring thee unto anoth
place; peradventur it will pleas god that thou mayest curs me them
from thenc

23:28 and balak brought balaam unto the top of peor that looketh
toward jeshimon

23:29 and balaam said unto balak build me here seven altar and
prepar me here seven bullock and seven ram

23:30 and balak did as balaam had said and offer a bullock and a
ram on everi altar

24:1 and when balaam saw that it pleas the lord to bless israel he
went not as at other time to seek for enchant but he set hi
face toward the wilder

24:2 and balaam lift up hi eye and he saw israel abid in hi
tent accord to their tribes; and the spirit of god came upon him

24:3 and he took up hi parabl and said balaam the son of beor hath
said and the man whose eye are open hath said: 24:4 he hath said
which heard the word of god which saw the vision of the almighti
fall into a tranc but have hi eye open: 24:5 how goodli are
thi tent o jacob and thi tabernacl o israel! 24:6 as the
valley are they spread forth as garden by the river side as the
tree of lign alo which the lord hath plant and as cedar tree
besid the water

24:7 he shall pour the water out of hi bucket and hi seed shall be
in mani water and hi king shall be higher than agag and hi
kingdom shall be exalt

24:8 god brought him forth out of egypt; he hath as it were the
strength of an unicorn: he shall eat up the nation hi enemi and
shall break their bone and pierc them through with hi arrow

24:9 he couch he lay down as a lion and as a great lion: who shall
stir him up? bless is he that blesseth thee and curs is he that
curseth thee

24:10 and balak anger wa kindl against balaam and he smote hi
hand together: and balak said unto balaam i call thee to curs
mine enemi and behold thou hast altogeth bless them these
three time

24:11 therefor now flee thou to thi place: i thought to promot thee
unto great honour; but lo the lord hath kept thee back from honour

24:12 and balaam said unto balak spake i not also to thi messeng
which thou sentest unto me say 24:13 if balak would give me hi
hous full of silver and gold i cannot go beyond the command of
the lord to do either good or bad of mine own mind; but what the lord
saith that will i speak? 24:14 and now behold i go unto my people:
come therefor and i will advertis thee what thi peopl shall do to
thi peopl in the latter day

24:15 and he took up hi parabl and said balaam the son of beor
hath said and the man whose eye are open hath said: 24:16 he hath
said which heard the word of god and knew the knowledg of the most
high which saw the vision of the almighti fall into a tranc but
have hi eye open: 24:17 i shall see him but not now: i shall
behold him but not nigh: there shall come a star out of jacob and a
sceptr shall rise out of israel and shall smite the corner of moab
and destroy all the children of sheth

24:18 and edom shall be a possess seir also shall be a possess
for hi enemies; and israel shall do valiantli

24:19 out of jacob shall come he that shall have dominion and shall
destroy him that remaineth of the citi

24:20 and when he look on amalek he took up hi parabl and said
amalek wa the first of the nations; but hi latter end shall be that
he perish for ever

24:21 and he look on the kenit and took up hi parabl and said
strong is thi dwellingplac and thou puttest thi nest in a rock

24:22 nevertheless the kenit shall be wast until asshur shall
carri thee away captiv

24:23 and he took up hi parabl and said ala who shall live when
god doeth this! 24:24 and ship shall come from the coast of chittim
and shall afflict asshur and shall afflict eber and he also shall
perish for ever

24:25 and balaam rose up and went and return to hi place: and
balak also went hi way

25:1 and israel abod in shittim and the peopl began to commit
whoredom with the daughter of moab

25:2 and they call the peopl unto the sacrific of their gods: and
the peopl did eat and bow down to their god

25:3 and israel join himself unto baalpeor: and the anger of the
lord wa kindl against israel

25:4 and the lord said unto mose take all the head of the peopl
and hang them up befor the lord against the sun that the fierc
anger of the lord may be turn away from israel

25:5 and mose said unto the judg of israel slay ye everi one hi
men that were join unto baalpeor

25:6 and behold one of the children of israel came and brought unto
hi brethren a midianitish woman in the sight of mose and in the
sight of all the congreg of the children of israel who were
weep befor the door of the tabernacl of the congreg

25:7 and when phineha the son of eleazar the son of aaron the
priest saw it he rose up from among the congreg and took a
javelin in hi hand; 25:8 and he went after the man of israel into the
tent and thrust both of them through the man of israel and the
woman through her belli so the plagu wa stay from the children of
israel

25:9 and those that die in the plagu were twenti and four thousand

25:10 and the lord spake unto mose say 25:11 phineha the son
of eleazar the son of aaron the priest hath turn my wrath away
from the children of israel while he wa zealou for my sake among
them that i consum not the children of israel in my jealousi

25:12 wherefor say behold i give unto him my coven of peace:
25:13 and he shall have it and hi seed after him even the coven
of an everlast priesthood; becaus he wa zealou for hi god and
made an aton for the children of israel

25:14 now the name of the israelit that wa slain even that wa
slain with the midianitish woman wa zimri the son of salu a princ
of a chief hous among the simeonit

25:15 and the name of the midianitish woman that wa slain wa cozbi
the daughter of zur; he wa head over a peopl and of a chief hous
in midian

25:16 and the lord spake unto mose say 25:17 vex the midianit
and smite them: 25:18 for they vex you with their wile wherewith
they have beguil you in the matter of peor and in the matter of
cozbi the daughter of a princ of midian their sister which wa
slain in the day of the plagu for peor sake

26:1 and it came to pass after the plagu that the lord spake unto
mose and unto eleazar the son of aaron the priest say 26:2 take
the sum of all the congreg of the children of israel from twenti
year old and upward throughout their father hous all that are
abl to go to war in israel

26:3 and mose and eleazar the priest spake with them in the plain of
moab by jordan near jericho say 26:4 take the sum of the peopl
from twenti year old and upward; as the lord command mose and the
children of israel which went forth out of the land of egypt

26:5 reuben the eldest son of israel: the children of reuben; hanoch
of whom cometh the famili of the hanochites: of pallu the famili of
the palluites: 26:6 of hezron the famili of the hezronites: of carmi
the famili of the carmit

26:7 these are the famili of the reubenites: and they that were
number of them were forti and three thousand and seven hundr and
thirti

26:8 and the son of pallu; eliab

26:9 and the son of eliab; nemuel and dathan and abiram thi is
that dathan and abiram which were famou in the congreg who
strove against mose and against aaron in the compani of korah when
they strove against the lord: 26:10 and the earth open her mouth
and swallow them up togeth with korah when that compani die
what time the fire devour two hundr and fifti men: and they becam
a sign

26:11 notwithstand the children of korah die not

26:12 the son of simeon after their families: of nemuel the famili
of the nemuelites: of jamin the famili of the jaminites: of jachin
the famili of the jachinites: 26:13 of zerah the famili of the
zarhites: of shaul the famili of the shaulit

26:14 these are the famili of the simeonit twenti and two
thousand and two hundr

26:15 the children of gad after their families: of zephon the famili
of the zephonites: of haggi the famili of the haggites: of shuni the
famili of the shunites: 26:16 of ozni the famili of the oznites: of
eri the famili of the erites: 26:17 of arod the famili of the
arodites: of are the famili of the arelit

26:18 these are the famili of the children of gad accord to those
that were number of them forti thousand and five hundr

26:19 the son of judah were er and onan: and er and onan die in the
land of canaan

26:20 and the son of judah after their famili were; of shelah the
famili of the shelanites: of pharez the famili of the pharzites: of
zerah the famili of the zarhit

26:21 and the son of pharez were; of hezron the famili of the
hezronites: of hamul the famili of the hamulit

26:22 these are the famili of judah accord to those that were
number of them threescor and sixteen thousand and five hundr

26:23 of the son of issachar after their families: of tola the
famili of the tolaites: of pua the famili of the punites: 26:24 of
jashub the famili of the jashubites: of shimron the famili of the
shimronit

26:25 these are the famili of issachar accord to those that were
number of them threescor and four thousand and three hundr

26:26 of the son of zebulun after their families: of sere the
famili of the sardites: of elon the famili of the elonites: of
jahleel the famili of the jahleelit

26:27 these are the famili of the zebulunit accord to those
that were number of them threescor thousand and five hundr

26:28 the son of joseph after their famili were manasseh and
ephraim

26:29 of the son of manasseh: of machir the famili of the
machirites: and machir begat gilead: of gilead come the famili of the
gileadit

26:30 these are the son of gilead: of jeezer the famili of the
jeezerites: of helek the famili of the helekites: 26:31 and of
asriel the famili of the asrielites: and of shechem the famili of
the shechemites: 26:32 and of shemida the famili of the shemidaites:
and of hepher the famili of the hepherit

26:33 and zelophehad the son of hepher had no son but daughters: and
the name of the daughter of zelophehad were mahlah and noah
hoglah milcah and tirzah

26:34 these are the famili of manasseh and those that were number
of them fifti and two thousand and seven hundr

26:35 these are the son of ephraim after their families: of
shuthelah the famili of the shuthalhites: of becher the famili of
the bachrites: of tahan the famili of the tahanit

26:36 and these are the son of shuthelah: of eran the famili of the
eranit

26:37 these are the famili of the son of ephraim accord to those
that were number of them thirti and two thousand and five hundr
these are the son of joseph after their famili

26:38 the son of benjamin after their families: of bela the famili
of the belaites: of ashbel the famili of the ashbelites: of ahiram
the famili of the ahiramites: 26:39 of shupham the famili of the
shuphamites: of hupham the famili of the huphamit

26:40 and the son of bela were ard and naaman: of ard the famili of
the ardites: and of naaman the famili of the naamit

26:41 these are the son of benjamin after their families: and they
that were number of them were forti and five thousand and six
hundr

26:42 these are the son of dan after their families: of shuham the
famili of the shuhamit these are the famili of dan after their
famili

26:43 all the famili of the shuhamit accord to those that were
number of them were threescor and four thousand and four hundr

26:44 of the children of asher after their families: of jimna the
famili of the jimnites: of jesui the famili of the jesuites: of
beriah the famili of the beriit

26:45 of the son of beriah: of heber the famili of the heberites: of
malchiel the famili of the malchielit

26:46 and the name of the daughter of asher wa sarah

26:47 these are the famili of the son of asher accord to those
that were number of them; who were fifti and three thousand and four
hundr

26:48 of the son of naphtali after their families: of jahzeel the
famili of the jahzeelites: of guni the famili of the gunites: 26:49
of jezer the famili of the jezerites: of shillem the famili of the
shillemit

26:50 these are the famili of naphtali accord to their families:
and they that were number of them were forti and five thousand and
four hundr

26:51 these were the number of the children of israel six hundr
thousand and a thousand seven hundr and thirti

26:52 and the lord spake unto mose say 26:53 unto these the land
shall be divid for an inherit accord to the number of name

26:54 to mani thou shalt give the more inherit and to few thou
shalt give the less inheritance: to everi one shall hi inherit be
given accord to those that were number of him

26:55 notwithstand the land shall be divid by lot: accord to
the name of the tribe of their father they shall inherit

26:56 accord to the lot shall the possess thereof be divid
between mani and few

26:57 and these are they that were number of the levit after their
families: of gershon the famili of the gershonites: of kohath the
famili of the kohathites: of merari the famili of the merarit

26:58 these are the famili of the levites: the famili of the
libnit the famili of the hebronit the famili of the mahlit
the famili of the mushit the famili of the korathit and kohath
begat amram

26:59 and the name of amram wife wa jocheb the daughter of levi
whom her mother bare to levi in egypt: and she bare unto amram aaron
and mose and miriam their sister

26:60 and unto aaron wa born nadab and abihu eleazar and ithamar

26:61 and nadab and abihu die when they offer strang fire befor
the lord

26:62 and those that were number of them were twenti and three
thousand all male from a month old and upward: for they were not
number among the children of israel becaus there wa no
inherit given them among the children of israel

26:63 these are they that were number by mose and eleazar the
priest who number the children of israel in the plain of moab by
jordan near jericho

26:64 but among these there wa not a man of them whom mose and aaron
the priest number when they number the children of israel in the
wilder of sinai

26:65 for the lord had said of them they shall sure die in the
wilder and there wa not left a man of them save caleb the son
of jephunneh and joshua the son of nun

27:1 then came the daughter of zelophehad the son of hepher the son
of gilead the son of machir the son of manasseh of the famili of
manasseh the son of joseph: and these are the name of hi daughters;
mahlah noah and hoglah and milcah and tirzah

27:2 and they stood befor mose and befor eleazar the priest and
befor the princ and all the congreg by the door of the
tabernacl of the congreg say 27:3 our father die in the
wilder and he wa not in the compani of them that gather
themselv togeth against the lord in the compani of korah; but die
in hi own sin and had no son

27:4 whi should the name of our father be done away from among hi
famili becaus he hath no son? give unto us therefor a possess
among the brethren of our father

27:5 and mose brought their caus befor the lord

27:6 and the lord spake unto mose say 27:7 the daughter of
zelophehad speak right: thou shalt sure give them a possess of an
inherit among their father brethren; and thou shalt caus the
inherit of their father to pass unto them

27:8 and thou shalt speak unto the children of israel say if a
man die and have no son then ye shall caus hi inherit to pass
unto hi daughter

27:9 and if he have no daughter then ye shall give hi inherit
unto hi brethren

27:10 and if he have no brethren then ye shall give hi inherit
unto hi father brethren

27:11 and if hi father have no brethren then ye shall give hi
inherit unto hi kinsman that is next to him of hi famili and he
shall possess it: and it shall be unto the children of israel a
statut of judgment as the lord command mose

27:12 and the lord said unto mose get thee up into thi mount
abarim and see the land which i have given unto the children of
israel

27:13 and when thou hast seen it thou also shalt be gather unto thi
peopl as aaron thi brother wa gather

27:14 for ye rebel against my command in the desert of zin in
the strife of the congreg to sanctifi me at the water befor
their eyes: that is the water of meribah in kadesh in the wilder
of zin

27:15 and mose spake unto the lord say 27:16 let the lord the
god of the spirit of all flesh set a man over the congreg
27:17 which may go out befor them and which may go in befor them
and which may lead them out and which may bring them in; that the
congreg of the lord be not as sheep which have no shepherd

27:18 and the lord said unto mose take thee joshua the son of nun a
man in whom is the spirit and lay thine hand upon him; 27:19 and set
him befor eleazar the priest and befor all the congregation; and
give him a charg in their sight

27:20 and thou shalt put some of thine honour upon him that all the
congreg of the children of israel may be obedi

27:21 and he shall stand befor eleazar the priest who shall ask
counsel for him after the judgment of urim befor the lord: at hi
word shall they go out and at hi word they shall come in both he
and all the children of israel with him even all the congreg

27:22 and mose did as the lord command him: and he took joshua and
set him befor eleazar the priest and befor all the congregation:
27:23 and he laid hi hand upon him and gave him a charg as the
lord command by the hand of mose

28:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 28:2 command the children
of israel and say unto them my offer and my bread for my
sacrific made by fire for a sweet savour unto me shall ye observ
to offer unto me in their due season

28:3 and thou shalt say unto them thi is the offer made by fire
which ye shall offer unto the lord; two lamb of the first year
without spot day by day for a continu burnt offer

28:4 the one lamb shalt thou offer in the morn and the other lamb
shalt thou offer at even; 28:5 and a tenth part of an ephah of flour
for a meat offer mingl with the fourth part of an hin of beaten
oil

28:6 it is a continu burnt offer which wa ordain in mount
sinai for a sweet savour a sacrific made by fire unto the lord

28:7 and the drink offer thereof shall be the fourth part of an hin
for the one lamb: in the holi place shalt thou caus the strong wine
to be pour unto the lord for a drink offer

28:8 and the other lamb shalt thou offer at even: as the meat offer
of the morn and as the drink offer thereof thou shalt offer
it a sacrific made by fire of a sweet savour unto the lord

28:9 and on the sabbath day two lamb of the first year without spot
and two tenth deal of flour for a meat offer mingl with oil
and the drink offer thereof: 28:10 thi is the burnt offer of
everi sabbath besid the continu burnt offer and hi drink
offer

28:11 and in the begin of your month ye shall offer a burnt
offer unto the lord; two young bullock and one ram seven lamb
of the first year without spot; 28:12 and three tenth deal of flour
for a meat offer mingl with oil for one bullock; and two tenth
deal of flour for a meat offer mingl with oil for one ram;
28:13 and a sever tenth deal of flour mingl with oil for a meat
offer unto one lamb; for a burnt offer of a sweet savour a
sacrific made by fire unto the lord

28:14 and their drink offer shall be half an hin of wine unto a
bullock and the third part of an hin unto a ram and a fourth part of
an hin unto a lamb: thi is the burnt offer of everi month
throughout the month of the year

28:15 and one kid of the goat for a sin offer unto the lord shall
be offer besid the continu burnt offer and hi drink
offer

28:16 and in the fourteenth day of the first month is the passov of
the lord

28:17 and in the fifteenth day of thi month is the feast: seven day
shall unleaven bread be eaten

28:18 in the first day shall be an holi convocation; ye shall do no
manner of servil work therein: 28:19 but ye shall offer a sacrific
made by fire for a burnt offer unto the lord; two young bullock
and one ram and seven lamb of the first year: they shall be unto you
without blemish: 28:20 and their meat offer shall be of flour
mingl with oil: three tenth deal shall ye offer for a bullock and
two tenth deal for a ram; 28:21 a sever tenth deal shalt thou offer
for everi lamb throughout the seven lambs: 28:22 and one goat for a
sin offer to make an aton for you

28:23 ye shall offer these besid the burnt offer in the morn
which is for a continu burnt offer

28:24 after thi manner ye shall offer daili throughout the seven
day the meat of the sacrific made by fire of a sweet savour unto
the lord: it shall be offer besid the continu burnt offer and
hi drink offer

28:25 and on the seventh day ye shall have an holi convocation; ye
shall do no servil work

28:26 also in the day of the firstfruit when ye bring a new meat
offer unto the lord after your week be out ye shall have an holi
convocation; ye shall do no servil work: 28:27 but ye shall offer the
burnt offer for a sweet savour unto the lord; two young bullock
one ram seven lamb of the first year; 28:28 and their meat offer
of flour mingl with oil three tenth deal unto one bullock two
tenth deal unto one ram 28:29 a sever tenth deal unto one lamb
throughout the seven lambs; 28:30 and one kid of the goat to make an
aton for you

28:31 ye shall offer them besid the continu burnt offer and hi
meat offer (they shall be unto you without blemish) and their
drink offer

29:1 and in the seventh month on the first day of the month ye shall
have an holi convocation; ye shall do no servil work: it is a day of
blow the trumpet unto you

29:2 and ye shall offer a burnt offer for a sweet savour unto the
lord; one young bullock one ram and seven lamb of the first year
without blemish: 29:3 and their meat offer shall be of flour
mingl with oil three tenth deal for a bullock and two tenth deal
for a ram 29:4 and one tenth deal for one lamb throughout the seven
lambs: 29:5 and one kid of the goat for a sin offer to make an
aton for you: 29:6 besid the burnt offer of the month and
hi meat offer and the daili burnt offer and hi meat
offer and their drink offer accord unto their manner for
a sweet savour a sacrific made by fire unto the lord

29:7 and ye shall have on the tenth day of thi seventh month an holi
convocation; and ye shall afflict your souls: ye shall not do ani work
therein: 29:8 but ye shall offer a burnt offer unto the lord for a
sweet savour; one young bullock one ram and seven lamb of the first
year; they shall be unto you without blemish: 29:9 and their meat
offer shall be of flour mingl with oil three tenth deal to a
bullock and two tenth deal to one ram 29:10 a sever tenth deal
for one lamb throughout the seven lambs: 29:11 one kid of the goat
for a sin offering; besid the sin offer of aton and the
continu burnt offer and the meat offer of it and their drink
offer

29:12 and on the fifteenth day of the seventh month ye shall have an
holi convocation; ye shall do no servil work and ye shall keep a
feast unto the lord seven days: 29:13 and ye shall offer a burnt
offer a sacrific made by fire of a sweet savour unto the lord;
thirteen young bullock two ram and fourteen lamb of the first
year; they shall be without blemish: 29:14 and their meat offer
shall be of flour mingl with oil three tenth deal unto everi
bullock of the thirteen bullock two tenth deal to each ram of the
two ram 29:15 and a sever tenth deal to each lamb of the fourteen
lambs: 29:16 and one kid of the goat for a sin offering; besid the
continu burnt offer hi meat offer and hi drink offer

29:17 and on the second day ye shall offer twelv young bullock two
ram fourteen lamb of the first year without spot: 29:18 and their
meat offer and their drink offer for the bullock for the
ram and for the lamb shall be accord to their number after the
manner: 29:19 and one kid of the goat for a sin offering; besid the
continu burnt offer and the meat offer thereof and their
drink offer

29:20 and on the third day eleven bullock two ram fourteen lamb
of the first year without blemish; 29:21 and their meat offer and
their drink offer for the bullock for the ram and for the
lamb shall be accord to their number after the manner: 29:22 and
one goat for a sin offering; besid the continu burnt offer and
hi meat offer and hi drink offer

29:23 and on the fourth day ten bullock two ram and fourteen lamb
of the first year without blemish: 29:24 their meat offer and their
drink offer for the bullock for the ram and for the lamb
shall be accord to their number after the manner: 29:25 and one
kid of the goat for a sin offering; besid the continu burnt
offer hi meat offer and hi drink offer

29:26 and on the fifth day nine bullock two ram and fourteen lamb
of the first year without spot: 29:27 and their meat offer and
their drink offer for the bullock for the ram and for the
lamb shall be accord to their number after the manner: 29:28 and
one goat for a sin offering; besid the continu burnt offer and
hi meat offer and hi drink offer

29:29 and on the sixth day eight bullock two ram and fourteen
lamb of the first year without blemish: 29:30 and their meat offer
and their drink offer for the bullock for the ram and for the
lamb shall be accord to their number after the manner: 29:31 and
one goat for a sin offering; besid the continu burnt offer hi
meat offer and hi drink offer

29:32 and on the seventh day seven bullock two ram and fourteen
lamb of the first year without blemish: 29:33 and their meat offer
and their drink offer for the bullock for the ram and for the
lamb shall be accord to their number after the manner: 29:34 and
one goat for a sin offering; besid the continu burnt offer hi
meat offer and hi drink offer

29:35 on the eighth day ye shall have a solemn assembly: ye shall do
no servil work therein: 29:36 but ye shall offer a burnt offer a
sacrific made by fire of a sweet savour unto the lord: one bullock
one ram seven lamb of the first year without blemish: 29:37 their
meat offer and their drink offer for the bullock for the ram
and for the lamb shall be accord to their number after the
manner: 29:38 and one goat for a sin offering; besid the continu
burnt offer and hi meat offer and hi drink offer

29:39 these thing ye shall do unto the lord in your set feast
besid your vow and your freewil offer for your burnt
offer and for your meat offer and for your drink offer
and for your peac offer

29:40 and mose told the children of israel accord to all that the
lord command mose

30:1 and mose spake unto the head of the tribe concern the
children of israel say thi is the thing which the lord hath
command

30:2 if a man vow a vow unto the lord or swear an oath to bind hi
soul with a bond; he shall not break hi word he shall do accord
to all that proceedeth out of hi mouth

30:3 if a woman also vow a vow unto the lord and bind herself by a
bond be in her father hous in her youth; 30:4 and her father
hear her vow and her bond wherewith she hath bound her soul and her
father shall hold hi peac at her; then all her vow shall stand and
everi bond wherewith she hath bound her soul shall stand

30:5 but if her father disallow her in the day that he heareth; not
ani of her vow or of her bond wherewith she hath bound her soul
shall stand: and the lord shall forgiv her becaus her father
disallow her

30:6 and if she had at all an husband when she vow or utter
ought out of her lip wherewith she bound her soul; 30:7 and her
husband heard it and held hi peac at her in the day that he heard
it: then her vow shall stand and her bond wherewith she bound her
soul shall stand

30:8 but if her husband disallow her on the day that he heard it;
then he shall make her vow which she vow and that which she utter
with her lip wherewith she bound her soul of none effect: and the
lord shall forgiv her

30:9 but everi vow of a widow and of her that is divorc wherewith
they have bound their soul shall stand against her

30:10 and if she vow in her husband hous or bound her soul by a
bond with an oath; 30:11 and her husband heard it and held hi peac
at her and disallow her not: then all her vow shall stand and
everi bond wherewith she bound her soul shall stand

30:12 but if her husband hath utterli made them void on the day he
heard them; then whatsoev proceed out of her lip concern her
vow or concern the bond of her soul shall not stand: her husband
hath made them void; and the lord shall forgiv her

30:13 everi vow and everi bind oath to afflict the soul her
husband may establish it or her husband may make it void

30:14 but if her husband altogeth hold hi peac at her from day to
day; then he establisheth all her vow or all her bond which are
upon her: he confirmeth them becaus he held hi peac at her in the
day that he heard them

30:15 but if he shall ani way make them void after that he hath heard
them; then he shall bear her iniqu

30:16 these are the statut which the lord command mose between
a man and hi wife between the father and hi daughter be yet in
her youth in her father hous

31:1 and the lord spake unto mose say 31:2 aveng the children
of israel of the midianites: afterward shalt thou be gather unto thi
peopl

31:3 and mose spake unto the peopl say arm some of yourselv
unto the war and let them go against the midianit and aveng the
lord of midian

31:4 of everi tribe a thousand throughout all the tribe of israel
shall ye send to the war

31:5 so there were deliv out of the thousand of israel a
thousand of everi tribe twelv thousand arm for war

31:6 and mose sent them to the war a thousand of everi tribe them
and phineha the son of eleazar the priest to the war with the holi
instrument and the trumpet to blow in hi hand

31:7 and they war against the midianit as the lord command
moses; and they slew all the male

31:8 and they slew the king of midian besid the rest of them that
were slain; name evi and rekem and zur and hur and reba five
king of midian: balaam also the son of beor they slew with the sword

31:9 and the children of israel took all the women of midian captiv
and their littl one and took the spoil of all their cattl and all
their flock and all their good

31:10 and they burnt all their citi wherein they dwelt and all
their goodli castl with fire

31:11 and they took all the spoil and all the prey both of men and
of beast

31:12 and they brought the captiv and the prey and the spoil unto
mose and eleazar the priest and unto the congreg of the
children of israel unto the camp at the plain of moab which are by
jordan near jericho

31:13 and mose and eleazar the priest and all the princ of the
congreg went forth to meet them without the camp

31:14 and mose wa wroth with the offic of the host with the
captain over thousand and captain over hundr which came from
the battl

31:15 and mose said unto them have ye save all the women alive?
31:16 behold these caus the children of israel through the counsel
of balaam to commit trespass against the lord in the matter of peor
and there wa a plagu among the congreg of the lord

31:17 now therefor kill everi male among the littl one and kill
everi woman that hath known man by lie with him

31:18 but all the women children that have not known a man by lie
with him keep aliv for yourselv

31:19 and do ye abid without the camp seven days: whosoev hath
kill ani person and whosoev hath touch ani slain purifi both
yourselv and your captiv on the third day and on the seventh day

31:20 and purifi all your raiment and all that is made of skin and
all work of goat hair and all thing made of wood

31:21 and eleazar the priest said unto the men of war which went to
the battl thi is the ordin of the law which the lord command
moses; 31:22 onli the gold and the silver the brass the iron the
tin and the lead 31:23 everi thing that may abid the fire ye shall
make it go through the fire and it shall be clean: nevertheless it
shall be purifi with the water of separation: and all that abideth
not the fire ye shall make go through the water

31:24 and ye shall wash your cloth on the seventh day and ye shall
be clean and afterward ye shall come into the camp

31:25 and the lord spake unto mose say 31:26 take the sum of the
prey that wa taken both of man and of beast thou and eleazar the
priest and the chief father of the congregation: 31:27 and divid
the prey into two parts; between them that took the war upon them who
went out to battl and between all the congregation: 31:28 and levi a
tribut unto the lord of the men of war which went out to battle: one
soul of five hundr both of the person and of the beev and of
the ass and of the sheep: 31:29 take it of their half and give it
unto eleazar the priest for an heav offer of the lord

31:30 and of the children of israel half thou shalt take one
portion of fifti of the person of the beev of the ass and of
the flock of all manner of beast and give them unto the levit
which keep the charg of the tabernacl of the lord

31:31 and mose and eleazar the priest did as the lord command
mose

31:32 and the booti be the rest of the prey which the men of war
had caught wa six hundr thousand and seventi thousand and five
thousand sheep 31:33 and threescor and twelv thousand beev 31:34
and threescor and one thousand ass 31:35 and thirti and two
thousand person in all of women that had not known man by lie with
him

31:36 and the half which wa the portion of them that went out to
war wa in number three hundr thousand and seven and thirti
thousand and five hundr sheep: 31:37 and the lord tribut of the
sheep wa six hundr and threescor and fifteen

31:38 and the beev were thirti and six thousand; of which the lord
tribut wa threescor and twelv

31:39 and the ass were thirti thousand and five hundred; of which
the lord tribut wa threescor and one

31:40 and the person were sixteen thousand; of which the lord
tribut wa thirti and two person

31:41 and mose gave the tribut which wa the lord heav offer
unto eleazar the priest as the lord command mose

31:42 and of the children of israel half which mose divid from
the men that war 31:43 (now the half that pertain unto the
congreg wa three hundr thousand and thirti thousand and seven
thousand and five hundr sheep 31:44 and thirti and six thousand
beev 31:45 and thirti thousand ass and five hundr 31:46 and
sixteen thousand persons;) 31:47 even of the children of israel
half mose took one portion of fifti both of man and of beast and
gave them unto the levit which kept the charg of the tabernacl of
the lord; as the lord command mose

31:48 and the offic which were over thousand of the host the
captain of thousand and captain of hundr came near unto moses:
31:49 and they said unto mose thi servant have taken the sum of the
men of war which are under our charg and there lacketh not one man
of us

31:50 we have therefor brought an oblat for the lord what everi
man hath gotten of jewel of gold chain and bracelet ring
ear and tablet to make an aton for our soul befor the
lord

31:51 and mose and eleazar the priest took the gold of them even all
wrought jewel

31:52 and all the gold of the offer that they offer up to the
lord of the captain of thousand and of the captain of hundr
wa sixteen thousand seven hundr and fifti shekel

31:53 (for the men of war had taken spoil everi man for himself)
31:54 and mose and eleazar the priest took the gold of the captain
of thousand and of hundr and brought it into the tabernacl of
the congreg for a memori for the children of israel befor the
lord

32:1 now the children of reuben and the children of gad had a veri
great multitud of cattle: and when they saw the land of jazer and
the land of gilead that behold the place wa a place for cattle;
32:2 the children of gad and the children of reuben came and spake
unto mose and to eleazar the priest and unto the princ of the
congreg say 32:3 ataroth and dibon and jazer and nimrah
and heshbon and elealeh and shebam and nebo and beon 32:4 even
the countri which the lord smote befor the congreg of israel is
a land for cattl and thi servant have cattle: 32:5 wherefor said
they if we have found grace in thi sight let thi land be given unto
thi servant for a possess and bring us not over jordan

32:6 and mose said unto the children of gad and to the children of
reuben shall your brethren go to war and shall ye sit here? 32:7
and wherefor discourag ye the heart of the children of israel from
go over into the land which the lord hath given them? 32:8 thu
did your father when i sent them from kadeshbarnea to see the land

32:9 for when they went up unto the valley of eshcol and saw the
land they discourag the heart of the children of israel that they
should not go into the land which the lord had given them

32:10 and the lord anger wa kindl the same time and he sware
say 32:11 sure none of the men that came up out of egypt from
twenti year old and upward shall see the land which i sware unto
abraham unto isaac and unto jacob; becaus they have not wholli
follow me: 32:12 save caleb the son of jephunneh the kenezit and
joshua the son of nun: for they have wholli follow the lord

32:13 and the lord anger wa kindl against israel and he made
them wander in the wilder forti year until all the gener
that had done evil in the sight of the lord wa consum

32:14 and behold ye are risen up in your father stead an increas
of sin men to augment yet the fierc anger of the lord toward
israel

32:15 for if ye turn away from after him he will yet again leav them
in the wilderness; and ye shall destroy all thi peopl

32:16 and they came near unto him and said we will build sheepfold
here for our cattl and citi for our littl ones: 32:17 but we
ourselv will go readi arm befor the children of israel until we
have brought them unto their place: and our littl one shall dwell in
the fenc citi becaus of the inhabit of the land

32:18 we will not return unto our hous until the children of israel
have inherit everi man hi inherit

32:19 for we will not inherit with them on yonder side jordan or
forward; becaus our inherit is fallen to us on thi side jordan
eastward

32:20 and mose said unto them if ye will do thi thing if ye will
go arm befor the lord to war 32:21 and will go all of you arm
over jordan befor the lord until he hath driven out hi enemi from
befor him 32:22 and the land be subdu befor the lord: then
afterward ye shall return and be guiltless befor the lord and
befor israel; and thi land shall be your possess befor the lord

32:23 but if ye will not do so behold ye have sin against the
lord: and be sure your sin will find you out

32:24 build you citi for your littl one and fold for your sheep;
and do that which hath proceed out of your mouth

32:25 and the children of gad and the children of reuben spake unto
mose say thi servant will do as my lord commandeth

32:26 our littl one our wive our flock and all our cattl
shall be there in the citi of gilead: 32:27 but thi servant will
pass over everi man arm for war befor the lord to battl as my
lord saith

32:28 so concern them mose command eleazar the priest and
joshua the son of nun and the chief father of the tribe of the
children of israel: 32:29 and mose said unto them if the children of
gad and the children of reuben will pass with you over jordan everi
man arm to battl befor the lord and the land shall be subdu
befor you; then ye shall give them the land of gilead for a
possession: 32:30 but if they will not pass over with you arm they
shall have possess among you in the land of canaan

32:31 and the children of gad and the children of reuben answer
say as the lord hath said unto thi servant so will we do

32:32 we will pass over arm befor the lord into the land of canaan
that the possess of our inherit on thi side jordan may be
our

32:33 and mose gave unto them even to the children of gad and to
the children of reuben and unto half the tribe of manasseh the son of
joseph the kingdom of sihon king of the amorit and the kingdom of
og king of bashan the land with the citi thereof in the coast
even the citi of the countri round about

32:34 and the children of gad built dibon and ataroth and aroer
32:35 and atroth shophan and jaazer and jogbehah 32:36 and
bethnimrah and bethharan fenc cities: and fold for sheep

32:37 and the children of reuben built heshbon and elealeh and
kirjathaim 32:38 and nebo and baalmeon (their name be changed)
and shibmah: and gave other name unto the citi which they build

32:39 and the children of machir the son of manasseh went to gilead
and took it and dispossess the amorit which wa in it

32:40 and mose gave gilead unto machir the son of manasseh; and he
dwelt therein

32:41 and jair the son of manasseh went and took the small town
thereof and call them havothjair

32:42 and nobah went and took kenath and the villag thereof and
call it nobah after hi own name

33:1 these are the journey of the children of israel which went
forth out of the land of egypt with their armi under the hand of
mose and aaron

33:2 and mose wrote their go out accord to their journey by
the command of the lord: and these are their journey accord to
their go out

33:3 and they depart from rames in the first month on the
fifteenth day of the first month; on the morrow after the passov the
children of israel went out with an high hand in the sight of all the
egyptian

33:4 for the egyptian buri all their firstborn which the lord had
smitten among them: upon their god also the lord execut judgment

33:5 and the children of israel remov from rames and pitch in
succoth

33:6 and they depart from succoth and pitch in etham which is in
the edg of the wilder

33:7 and they remov from etham and turn again unto pihahiroth
which is befor baalzephon: and they pitch befor migdol

33:8 and they depart from befor pihahiroth and pass through the
midst of the sea into the wilder and went three day journey in
