victuals; for within three day ye shall pass over thi jordan to go
in to possess the land which the lord your god giveth you to possess
it

1:12 and to the reubenit and to the gadit and to half the tribe
of manasseh spake joshua say 1:13 rememb the word which mose
the servant of the lord command you say the lord your god hath
given you rest and hath given you thi land

1:14 your wive your littl one and your cattl shall remain in
the land which mose gave you on thi side jordan; but ye shall pass
befor your brethren arm all the mighti men of valour and help
them; 1:15 until the lord have given your brethren rest as he hath
given you and they also have possess the land which the lord your
god giveth them: then ye shall return unto the land of your
possess and enjoy it which mose the lord servant gave you on
thi side jordan toward the sunris

1:16 and they answer joshua say all that thou commandest us we
will do and whithersoev thou sendest us we will go

1:17 accord as we hearken unto mose in all thing so will we
hearken unto thee: onli the lord thi god be with thee as he wa with
mose

1:18 whosoev he be that doth rebel against thi command and will
not hearken unto thi word in all that thou commandest him he shall
be put to death: onli be strong and of a good courag

2:1 and joshua the son of nun sent out of shittim two men to spi
secretli say go view the land even jericho and they went and
came into an harlot hous name rahab and lodg there

2:2 and it wa told the king of jericho say behold there came
men in hither to night of the children of israel to search out the
countri

2:3 and the king of jericho sent unto rahab say bring forth the
men that are come to thee which are enter into thine house: for
they be come to search out all the countri

2:4 and the woman took the two men and hid them and said thu there
came men unto me but i wist not whenc they were: 2:5 and it came to
pass about the time of shut of the gate when it wa dark that
the men went out: whither the men went i wot not: pursu after them
quickly; for ye shall overtak them

2:6 but she had brought them up to the roof of the hous and hid them
with the stalk of flax which she had laid in order upon the roof

2:7 and the men pursu after them the way to jordan unto the fords:
and as soon as they which pursu after them were gone out they shut
the gate

2:8 and befor they were laid down she came up unto them upon the
roof; 2:9 and she said unto the men i know that the lord hath given
you the land and that your terror is fallen upon us and that all the
inhabit of the land faint becaus of you

2:10 for we have heard how the lord dri up the water of the red sea
for you when ye came out of egypt; and what ye did unto the two king
of the amorit that were on the other side jordan sihon and og
whom ye utterli destroy

2:11 and as soon as we had heard these thing our heart did melt
neither did there remain ani more courag in ani man becaus of you:
for the lord your god he is god in heaven abov and in earth
beneath

2:12 now therefor i pray you swear unto me by the lord sinc i
have shew you kind that ye will also shew kind unto my
father hous and give me a true token: 2:13 and that ye will save
aliv my father and my mother and my brethren and my sister and
all that they have and deliv our live from death

2:14 and the men answer her our life for your if ye utter not
thi our busi and it shall be when the lord hath given us the
land that we will deal kindli and truli with thee

2:15 then she let them down by a cord through the window: for her
hous wa upon the town wall and she dwelt upon the wall

2:16 and she said unto them get you to the mountain lest the
pursuer meet you; and hide yourselv there three day until the
pursuer be returned: and afterward may ye go your way

2:17 and the men said unto her we will be blameless of thi thine
oath which thou hast made us swear

2:18 behold when we come into the land thou shalt bind thi line of
scarlet thread in the window which thou didst let us down by: and thou
shalt bring thi father and thi mother and thi brethren and all thi
father household home unto thee

2:19 and it shall be that whosoev shall go out of the door of thi
hous into the street hi blood shall be upon hi head and we will
be guiltless: and whosoev shall be with thee in the hous hi blood
shall be on our head if ani hand be upon him

2:20 and if thou utter thi our busi then we will be quit of
thine oath which thou hast made us to swear

2:21 and she said accord unto your word so be it and she sent
them away and they departed: and she bound the scarlet line in the
window

2:22 and they went and came unto the mountain and abod there three
day until the pursuer were returned: and the pursuer sought them
throughout all the way but found them not

2:23 so the two men return and descend from the mountain and
pass over and came to joshua the son of nun and told him all
thing that befel them: 2:24 and they said unto joshua truli the
lord hath deliv into our hand all the land; for even all the
inhabit of the countri do faint becaus of us

3:1 and joshua rose earli in the morning; and they remov from
shittim and came to jordan he and all the children of israel and
lodg there befor they pass over

3:2 and it came to pass after three day that the offic went
through the host; 3:3 and they command the peopl say when ye
see the ark of the coven of the lord your god and the priest the
levit bear it then ye shall remov from your place and go after
it

3:4 yet there shall be a space between you and it about two thousand
cubit by measure: come not near unto it that ye may know the way by
which ye must go: for ye have not pass thi way heretofor

3:5 and joshua said unto the peopl sanctifi yourselves: for to
morrow the lord will do wonder among you

3:6 and joshua spake unto the priest say take up the ark of the
coven and pass over befor the peopl and they took up the ark of
the coven and went befor the peopl

3:7 and the lord said unto joshua thi day will i begin to magnifi
thee in the sight of all israel that they may know that as i wa
with mose so i will be with thee

3:8 and thou shalt command the priest that bear the ark of the
coven say when ye are come to the brink of the water of
jordan ye shall stand still in jordan

3:9 and joshua said unto the children of israel come hither and hear
the word of the lord your god

3:10 and joshua said herebi ye shall know that the live god is
among you and that he will without fail drive out from befor you the
canaanit and the hittit and the hivit and the perizzit and
the girgashit and the amorit and the jebusit

3:11 behold the ark of the coven of the lord of all the earth
passeth over befor you into jordan

3:12 now therefor take you twelv men out of the tribe of israel
out of everi tribe a man

3:13 and it shall come to pass as soon as the sole of the feet of
the priest that bear the ark of the lord the lord of all the earth
shall rest in the water of jordan that the water of jordan shall be
cut off from the water that come down from above; and they shall
stand upon an heap

3:14 and it came to pass when the peopl remov from their tent to
pass over jordan and the priest bear the ark of the coven
befor the people; 3:15 and as they that bare the ark were come unto
jordan and the feet of the priest that bare the ark were dip in
the brim of the water (for jordan overfloweth all hi bank all the
time of harvest) 3:16 that the water which came down from abov
stood and rose up upon an heap veri far from the citi adam that is
besid zaretan: and those that came down toward the sea of the plain
even the salt sea fail and were cut off: and the peopl pass
over right against jericho

3:17 and the priest that bare the ark of the coven of the lord
stood firm on dri ground in the midst of jordan and all the
israelit pass over on dri ground until all the peopl were pass
clean over jordan

4:1 and it came to pass when all the peopl were clean pass over
jordan that the lord spake unto joshua say 4:2 take you twelv
men out of the peopl out of everi tribe a man 4:3 and command ye
them say take you henc out of the midst of jordan out of the
place where the priest feet stood firm twelv stone and ye shall
carri them over with you and leav them in the lodg place where
ye shall lodg thi night

4:4 then joshua call the twelv men whom he had prepar of the
children of israel out of everi tribe a man: 4:5 and joshua said unto
them pass over befor the ark of the lord your god into the midst of
jordan and take you up everi man of you a stone upon hi shoulder
accord unto the number of the tribe of the children of israel: 4:6
that thi may be a sign among you that when your children ask their
father in time to come say what mean ye by these stones? 4:7
then ye shall answer them that the water of jordan were cut off
befor the ark of the coven of the lord; when it pass over
jordan the water of jordan were cut off: and these stone shall be
for a memori unto the children of israel for ever

4:8 and the children of israel did so as joshua command and took up
twelv stone out of the midst of jordan as the lord spake unto
joshua accord to the number of the tribe of the children of
israel and carri them over with them unto the place where they
lodg and laid them down there

4:9 and joshua set up twelv stone in the midst of jordan in the
place where the feet of the priest which bare the ark of the coven
stood: and they are there unto thi day

4:10 for the priest which bare the ark stood in the midst of jordan
until everyth wa finish that the lord command joshua to speak
unto the peopl accord to all that mose command joshua: and the
peopl hast and pass over

4:11 and it came to pass when all the peopl were clean pass over
that the ark of the lord pass over and the priest in the presenc
of the peopl

4:12 and the children of reuben and the children of gad and half the
tribe of manasseh pass over arm befor the children of israel as
mose spake unto them: 4:13 about forti thousand prepar for war
pass over befor the lord unto battl to the plain of jericho

4:14 on that day the lord magnifi joshua in the sight of all israel;
and they fear him as they fear mose all the day of hi life

4:15 and the lord spake unto joshua say 4:16 command the priest
that bear the ark of the testimoni that they come up out of jordan

4:17 joshua therefor command the priest say come ye up out of
jordan

4:18 and it came to pass when the priest that bare the ark of the
coven of the lord were come up out of the midst of jordan and the
sole of the priest feet were lift up unto the dri land that the
water of jordan return unto their place and flow over all hi
bank as they did befor

4:19 and the peopl came up out of jordan on the tenth day of the
first month and encamp in gilgal in the east border of jericho

4:20 and those twelv stone which they took out of jordan did
joshua pitch in gilgal

4:21 and he spake unto the children of israel say when your
children shall ask their father in time to come say what mean
these stones? 4:22 then ye shall let your children know say
israel came over thi jordan on dri land

4:23 for the lord your god dri up the water of jordan from befor
you until ye were pass over as the lord your god did to the red
sea which he dri up from befor us until we were gone over: 4:24
that all the peopl of the earth might know the hand of the lord that
it is mighty: that ye might fear the lord your god for ever

5:1 and it came to pass when all the king of the amorit which
were on the side of jordan westward and all the king of the
canaanit which were by the sea heard that the lord had dri up
the water of jordan from befor the children of israel until we were
pass over that their heart melt neither wa there spirit in them
ani more becaus of the children of israel

5:2 at that time the lord said unto joshua make thee sharp knive
and circumcis again the children of israel the second time

5:3 and joshua made him sharp knive and circumcis the children of
israel at the hill of the foreskin

5:4 and thi is the caus whi joshua did circumcise: all the peopl
that came out of egypt that were male even all the men of war die
in the wilder by the way after they came out of egypt

5:5 now all the peopl that came out were circumcised: but all the
peopl that were born in the wilder by the way as they came forth
out of egypt them they had not circumcis

5:6 for the children of israel walk forti year in the wilder
till all the peopl that were men of war which came out of egypt
were consum becaus they obey not the voic of the lord: unto
whom the lord sware that he would not shew them the land which the
lord sware unto their father that he would give us a land that
floweth with milk and honey

5:7 and their children whom he rais up in their stead them joshua
circumcised: for they were uncircumcis becaus they had not
circumcis them by the way

5:8 and it came to pass when they had done circumcis all the
peopl that they abod in their place in the camp till they were
whole

5:9 and the lord said unto joshua thi day have i roll away the
reproach of egypt from off you wherefor the name of the place is
call gilgal unto thi day

5:10 and the children of israel encamp in gilgal and kept the
passov on the fourteenth day of the month at even in the plain of
jericho

5:11 and they did eat of the old corn of the land on the morrow after
the passov unleaven cake and parch corn in the selfsam day

5:12 and the manna ceas on the morrow after they had eaten of the
old corn of the land; neither had the children of israel manna ani
more; but they did eat of the fruit of the land of canaan that year

5:13 and it came to pass when joshua wa by jericho that he lift
up hi eye and look and behold there stood a man over against
him with hi sword drawn in hi hand: and joshua went unto him and
said unto him art thou for us or for our adversaries? 5:14 and he
said nay; but as captain of the host of the lord am i now come and
joshua fell on hi face to the earth and did worship and said unto
him what saith my lord unto hi servant? 5:15 and the captain of the
lord host said unto joshua loos thi shoe from off thi foot; for
the place whereon thou standest is holi and joshua did so

6:1 now jericho wa straitli shut up becaus of the children of
israel: none went out and none came in

6:2 and the lord said unto joshua see i have given into thine hand
jericho and the king thereof and the mighti men of valour

6:3 and ye shall compass the citi all ye men of war and go round
about the citi onc thu shalt thou do six day

6:4 and seven priest shall bear befor the ark seven trumpet of
ram horns: and the seventh day ye shall compass the citi seven
time and the priest shall blow with the trumpet

6:5 and it shall come to pass that when they make a long blast with
the ram horn and when ye hear the sound of the trumpet all the
peopl shall shout with a great shout; and the wall of the citi shall
fall down flat and the peopl shall ascend up everi man straight
befor him

6:6 and joshua the son of nun call the priest and said unto them
take up the ark of the coven and let seven priest bear seven
trumpet of ram horn befor the ark of the lord

6:7 and he said unto the peopl pass on and compass the citi and
let him that is arm pass on befor the ark of the lord

6:8 and it came to pass when joshua had spoken unto the peopl that
the seven priest bear the seven trumpet of ram horn pass on
befor the lord and blew with the trumpets: and the ark of the
coven of the lord follow them

6:9 and the arm men went befor the priest that blew with the
trumpet and the rereward came after the ark the priest go on
and blow with the trumpet

6:10 and joshua had command the peopl say ye shall not shout
nor make ani nois with your voic neither shall ani word proceed out
of your mouth until the day i bid you shout; then shall ye shout

6:11 so the ark of the lord compass the citi go about it once:
and they came into the camp and lodg in the camp

6:12 and joshua rose earli in the morn and the priest took up the
ark of the lord

6:13 and seven priest bear seven trumpet of ram horn befor
the ark of the lord went on continu and blew with the trumpets:
and the arm men went befor them; but the rereward came after the
ark of the lord the priest go on and blow with the trumpet

6:14 and the second day they compass the citi onc and return
into the camp: so they did six day

6:15 and it came to pass on the seventh day that they rose earli
about the dawn of the day and compass the citi after the same
manner seven times: onli on that day they compass the citi seven
time

6:16 and it came to pass at the seventh time when the priest blew
with the trumpet joshua said unto the peopl shout; for the lord
hath given you the citi

6:17 and the citi shall be accurs even it and all that are
therein to the lord: onli rahab the harlot shall live she and all
that are with her in the hous becaus she hid the messeng that we
sent

6:18 and ye in ani wise keep yourselv from the accurs thing lest
ye make yourselv accurs when ye take of the accurs thing and
make the camp of israel a curs and troubl it

6:19 but all the silver and gold and vessel of brass and iron are
consecr unto the lord: they shall come into the treasuri of the
lord

6:20 so the peopl shout when the priest blew with the trumpets:
and it came to pass when the peopl heard the sound of the trumpet
and the peopl shout with a great shout that the wall fell down
flat so that the peopl went up into the citi everi man straight
befor him and they took the citi

6:21 and they utterli destroy all that wa in the citi both man and
woman young and old and ox and sheep and ass with the edg of the
sword

6:22 but joshua had said unto the two men that had spi out the
countri go into the harlot hous and bring out thenc the woman
and all that she hath as ye sware unto her

6:23 and the young men that were spi went in and brought out rahab
and her father and her mother and her brethren and all that she
had; and they brought out all her kindr and left them without the
camp of israel

6:24 and they burnt the citi with fire and all that wa therein: onli
the silver and the gold and the vessel of brass and of iron they
put into the treasuri of the hous of the lord

6:25 and joshua save rahab the harlot aliv and her father
household and all that she had; and she dwelleth in israel even unto
thi day; becaus she hid the messeng which joshua sent to spi out
jericho

6:26 and joshua adjur them at that time say curs be the man
befor the lord that riseth up and buildeth thi citi jericho: he
shall lay the foundat thereof in hi firstborn and in hi youngest
son shall he set up the gate of it

6:27 so the lord wa with joshua; and hi fame wa nois throughout
all the countri

7:1 but the children of israel commit a trespass in the accurs
thing: for achan the son of carmi the son of zabdi the son of
zerah of the tribe of judah took of the accurs thing: and the
anger of the lord wa kindl against the children of israel

7:2 and joshua sent men from jericho to ai which is besid bethaven
on the east of bethel and spake unto them say go up and view the
countri

and the men went up and view ai

7:3 and they return to joshua and said unto him let not all the
peopl go up; but let about two or three thousand men go up and smite
ai; and make not all the peopl to labour thither; for they are but
few

7:4 so there went up thither of the peopl about three thousand men:
and they fled befor the men of ai

7:5 and the men of ai smote of them about thirti and six men: for they
chase them from befor the gate even unto shebarim and smote them in
the go down: wherefor the heart of the peopl melt and becam
as water

7:6 and joshua rent hi cloth and fell to the earth upon hi face
befor the ark of the lord until the eventid he and the elder of
israel and put dust upon their head

7:7 and joshua said ala o lord god wherefor hast thou at all
brought thi peopl over jordan to deliv us into the hand of the
amorit to destroy us? would to god we had been content and dwelt
on the other side jordan! 7:8 o lord what shall i say when israel
turneth their back befor their enemies! 7:9 for the canaanit and
all the inhabit of the land shall hear of it and shall environ us
round and cut off our name from the earth: and what wilt thou do unto
thi great name? 7:10 and the lord said unto joshua get thee up;
wherefor liest thou thu upon thi face? 7:11 israel hath sin and
they have also transgress my coven which i command them: for
they have even taken of the accurs thing and have also stolen and
dissembl also and they have put it even among their own stuff

7:12 therefor the children of israel could not stand befor their
enemi but turn their back befor their enemi becaus they
were accursed: neither will i be with you ani more except ye destroy
the accurs from among you

7:13 up sanctifi the peopl and say sanctifi yourselv against to
morrow: for thu saith the lord god of israel there is an accurs
thing in the midst of thee o israel: thou canst not stand befor
thine enemi until ye take away the accurs thing from among you

7:14 in the morn therefor ye shall be brought accord to your
tribes: and it shall be that the tribe which the lord taketh shall
come accord to the famili thereof; and the famili which the lord
shall take shall come by households; and the household which the lord
shall take shall come man by man

7:15 and it shall be that he that is taken with the accurs thing
shall be burnt with fire he and all that he hath: becaus he hath
transgress the coven of the lord and becaus he hath wrought
folli in israel

7:16 so joshua rose up earli in the morn and brought israel by
their tribes; and the tribe of judah wa taken: 7:17 and he brought
the famili of judah; and he took the famili of the zarhites: and he
brought the famili of the zarhit man by man; and zabdi wa taken:
7:18 and he brought hi household man by man; and achan the son of
carmi the son of zabdi the son of zerah of the tribe of judah wa
taken

7:19 and joshua said unto achan my son give i pray thee glori to
the lord god of israel and make confess unto him; and tell me now
what thou hast done; hide it not from me

7:20 and achan answer joshua and said inde i have sin against
the lord god of israel and thu and thu have i done: 7:21 when i saw
among the spoil a goodli babylonish garment and two hundr shekel
of silver and a wedg of gold of fifti shekel weight then i covet
them and took them; and behold they are hid in the earth in the
midst of my tent and the silver under it

7:22 so joshua sent messeng and they ran unto the tent; and
behold it wa hid in hi tent and the silver under it

7:23 and they took them out of the midst of the tent and brought them
unto joshua and unto all the children of israel and laid them out
befor the lord

7:24 and joshua and all israel with him took achan the son of zerah
and the silver and the garment and the wedg of gold and hi son
and hi daughter and hi oxen and hi ass and hi sheep and hi
tent and all that he had: and they brought them unto the valley of
achor

7:25 and joshua said whi hast thou troubl us? the lord shall
troubl thee thi day and all israel stone him with stone and
burn them with fire after they had stone them with stone

7:26 and they rais over him a great heap of stone unto thi day so
the lord turn from the fierc of hi anger wherefor the name
of that place wa call the valley of achor unto thi day

8:1 and the lord said unto joshua fear not neither be thou dismayed:
take all the peopl of war with thee and aris go up to ai: see i
have given into thi hand the king of ai and hi peopl and hi citi
and hi land: 8:2 and thou shalt do to ai and her king as thou didst
unto jericho and her king: onli the spoil thereof and the cattl
thereof shall ye take for a prey unto yourselves: lay thee an ambush
for the citi behind it

8:3 so joshua aros and all the peopl of war to go up against ai:
and joshua chose out thirti thousand mighti men of valour and sent
them away by night

8:4 and he command them say behold ye shall lie in wait
against the citi even behind the city: go not veri far from the citi
but be ye all ready: 8:5 and i and all the peopl that are with me
will approach unto the city: and it shall come to pass when they come
out against us as at the first that we will flee befor them 8:6
(for they will come out after us) till we have drawn them from the
city; for they will say they flee befor us as at the first:
therefor we will flee befor them

8:7 then ye shall rise up from the ambush and seiz upon the city:
for the lord your god will deliv it into your hand

8:8 and it shall be when ye have taken the citi that ye shall set
the citi on fire: accord to the command of the lord shall ye
do see i have command you

8:9 joshua therefor sent them forth: and they went to lie in ambush
and abod between bethel and ai on the west side of ai: but joshua
lodg that night among the peopl

8:10 and joshua rose up earli in the morn and number the peopl
and went up he and the elder of israel befor the peopl to ai

8:11 and all the peopl even the peopl of war that were with him
went up and drew nigh and came befor the citi and pitch on the
north side of ai: now there wa a valley between them and ai

8:12 and he took about five thousand men and set them to lie in
ambush between bethel and ai on the west side of the citi

8:13 and when they had set the peopl even all the host that wa on
the north of the citi and their lier in wait on the west of the
citi joshua went that night into the midst of the valley

8:14 and it came to pass when the king of ai saw it that they hast
and rose up earli and the men of the citi went out against israel to
battl he and all hi peopl at a time appoint befor the plain;
but he wist not that there were lier in ambush against him behind the
citi

8:15 and joshua and all israel made as if they were beaten befor
them and fled by the way of the wilder

8:16 and all the peopl that were in ai were call togeth to pursu
after them: and they pursu after joshua and were drawn away from
the citi

8:17 and there wa not a man left in ai or bethel that went not out
after israel: and they left the citi open and pursu after israel

8:18 and the lord said unto joshua stretch out the spear that is in
thi hand toward ai; for i will give it into thine hand and joshua
stretch out the spear that he had in hi hand toward the citi

8:19 and the ambush aros quickli out of their place and they ran as
soon as he had stretch out hi hand: and they enter into the citi
and took it and hast and set the citi on fire

8:20 and when the men of ai look behind them they saw and behold
the smoke of the citi ascend up to heaven and they had no power to
flee thi way or that way: and the peopl that fled to the wilder
turn back upon the pursuer

8:21 and when joshua and all israel saw that the ambush had taken the
citi and that the smoke of the citi ascend then they turn again
and slew the men of ai

8:22 and the other issu out of the citi against them; so they were
in the midst of israel some on thi side and some on that side: and
they smote them so that they let none of them remain or escap

8:23 and the king of ai they took aliv and brought him to joshua

8:24 and it came to pass when israel had made an end of slay all
the inhabit of ai in the field in the wilder wherein they
chase them and when they were all fallen on the edg of the sword
until they were consum that all the israelit return unto ai
and smote it with the edg of the sword

8:25 and so it wa that all that fell that day both of men and
women were twelv thousand even all the men of ai

8:26 for joshua drew not hi hand back wherewith he stretch out the
spear until he had utterli destroy all the inhabit of ai

8:27 onli the cattl and the spoil of that citi israel took for a prey
unto themselv accord unto the word of the lord which he
command joshua

8:28 and joshua burnt ai and made it an heap for ever even a
desol unto thi day

8:29 and the king of ai he hang on a tree until eventide: and as
soon as the sun wa down joshua command that they should take hi
carcas down from the tree and cast it at the enter of the gate of
the citi and rais thereon a great heap of stone that remaineth
unto thi day

8:30 then joshua built an altar unto the lord god of israel in mount
ebal 8:31 as mose the servant of the lord command the children of
israel as it is written in the book of the law of mose an altar of
whole stone over which no man hath lift up ani iron: and they
offer thereon burnt offer unto the lord and sacrif peac
offer

8:32 and he wrote there upon the stone a copi of the law of mose
which he wrote in the presenc of the children of israel

8:33 and all israel and their elder and offic and their judg
stood on thi side the ark and on that side befor the priest the
levit which bare the ark of the coven of the lord as well the
stranger as he that wa born among them; half of them over against
mount gerizim and half of them over against mount ebal; as mose the
servant of the lord had command befor that they should bless the
peopl of israel

8:34 and afterward he read all the word of the law the bless and
curs accord to all that is written in the book of the law

8:35 there wa not a word of all that mose command which joshua
read not befor all the congreg of israel with the women and
the littl one and the stranger that were convers among them

9:1 and it came to pass when all the king which were on thi side
jordan in the hill and in the valley and in all the coast of the
great sea over against lebanon the hittit and the amorit the
canaanit the perizzit the hivit and the jebusit heard thereof;
9:2 that they gather themselv togeth to fight with joshua and
with israel with one accord

9:3 and when the inhabit of gibeon heard what joshua had done unto
jericho and to ai 9:4 they did work wilili and went and made as if
they had been ambassador and took old sack upon their ass and
wine bottl old and rent and bound up; 9:5 and old shoe and
clout upon their feet and old garment upon them; and all the bread
of their provis wa dri and mouldi

9:6 and they went to joshua unto the camp at gilgal and said unto
him and to the men of israel we be come from a far country: now
therefor make ye a leagu with us

9:7 and the men of israel said unto the hivit peradventur ye dwell
among us; and how shall we make a leagu with you? 9:8 and they said
unto joshua we are thi servant and joshua said unto them who are
ye? and from whenc come ye? 9:9 and they said unto him from a veri
far countri thi servant are come becaus of the name of the lord thi
god: for we have heard the fame of him and all that he did in egypt
9:10 and all that he did to the two king of the amorit that were
beyond jordan to sihon king of heshbon and to og king of bashan
which wa at ashtaroth

9:11 wherefor our elder and all the inhabit of our countri spake
to us say take victual with you for the journey and go to meet
them and say unto them we are your servants: therefor now make ye a
leagu with us

9:12 thi our bread we took hot for our provis out of our hous on
the day we came forth to go unto you; but now behold it is dri and
it is mouldy: 9:13 and these bottl of wine which we fill were
new; and behold they be rent: and these our garment and our shoe
are becom old by reason of the veri long journey

9:14 and the men took of their victual and ask not counsel at the
mouth of the lord

9:15 and joshua made peac with them and made a leagu with them to
let them live: and the princ of the congreg sware unto them

9:16 and it came to pass at the end of three day after they had made
a leagu with them that they heard that they were their neighbour
and that they dwelt among them

9:17 and the children of israel journey and came unto their citi
on the third day now their citi were gibeon and chephirah and
beeroth and kirjathjearim

9:18 and the children of israel smote them not becaus the princ of
the congreg had sworn unto them by the lord god of israel and
all the congreg murmur against the princ

9:19 but all the princ said unto all the congreg we have sworn
unto them by the lord god of israel: now therefor we may not touch
them

9:20 thi we will do to them; we will even let them live lest wrath
be upon us becaus of the oath which we sware unto them

9:21 and the princ said unto them let them live; but let them be
hewer of wood and drawer of water unto all the congregation; as the
princ had promis them

9:22 and joshua call for them and he spake unto them say
wherefor have ye beguil us say we are veri far from you; when
ye dwell among us? 9:23 now therefor ye are curs and there shall
none of you be freed from be bondmen and hewer of wood and
drawer of water for the hous of my god

9:24 and they answer joshua and said becaus it wa certainli told
thi servant how that the lord thi god command hi servant mose to
give you all the land and to destroy all the inhabit of the land
from befor you therefor we were sore afraid of our live becaus of
you and have done thi thing

9:25 and now behold we are in thine hand: as it seemeth good and
right unto thee to do unto us do

9:26 and so did he unto them and deliv them out of the hand of
the children of israel that they slew them not

9:27 and joshua made them that day hewer of wood and drawer of water
for the congreg and for the altar of the lord even unto thi
day in the place which he should choos

10:1 now it came to pass when adonizedec king of jerusalem had heard
how joshua had taken ai and had utterli destroy it; as he had done
to jericho and her king so he had done to ai and her king; and how
the inhabit of gibeon had made peac with israel and were among
them; 10:2 that they fear greatli becaus gibeon wa a great citi
as one of the royal citi and becaus it wa greater than ai and
all the men thereof were mighti

10:3 wherefor adonizedec king of jerusalem sent unto hoham king of
hebron and unto piram king of jarmuth and unto japhia king of
lachish and unto debir king of eglon say 10:4 come up unto me
and help me that we may smite gibeon: for it hath made peac with
joshua and with the children of israel

10:5 therefor the five king of the amorit the king of jerusalem
the king of hebron the king of jarmuth the king of lachish the king
of eglon gather themselv togeth and went up they and all
their host and encamp befor gibeon and made war against it

10:6 and the men of gibeon sent unto joshua to the camp to gilgal
say slack not thi hand from thi servants; come up to us quickli
and save us and help us: for all the king of the amorit that dwell
in the mountain are gather togeth against us

10:7 so joshua ascend from gilgal he and all the peopl of war
with him and all the mighti men of valour

10:8 and the lord said unto joshua fear them not: for i have
deliv them into thine hand; there shall not a man of them stand
befor thee

10:9 joshua therefor came unto them suddenli and went up from gilgal
all night

10:10 and the lord discomfit them befor israel and slew them with
a great slaughter at gibeon and chase them along the way that goeth
up to bethhoron and smote them to azekah and unto makkedah

10:11 and it came to pass as they fled from befor israel and were
in the go down to bethhoron that the lord cast down great stone
from heaven upon them unto azekah and they died: they were more which
die with hailston than they whom the children of israel slew with
the sword

10:12 then spake joshua to the lord in the day when the lord deliv
up the amorit befor the children of israel and he said in the
sight of israel sun stand thou still upon gibeon; and thou moon in
the valley of ajalon

10:13 and the sun stood still and the moon stay until the peopl
had aveng themselv upon their enemi is not thi written in the
book of jasher? so the sun stood still in the midst of heaven and
hast not to go down about a whole day

10:14 and there wa no day like that befor it or after it that the
lord hearken unto the voic of a man: for the lord fought for
israel

10:15 and joshua return and all israel with him unto the camp to
gilgal

10:16 but these five king fled and hid themselv in a cave at
makkedah

10:17 and it wa told joshua say the five king are found hid in
a cave at makkedah

10:18 and joshua said roll great stone upon the mouth of the cave
and set men by it for to keep them: 10:19 and stay ye not but pursu
after your enemi and smite the hindmost of them; suffer them not to
enter into their cities: for the lord your god hath deliv them
into your hand

10:20 and it came to pass when joshua and the children of israel had
made an end of slay them with a veri great slaughter till they
were consum that the rest which remain of them enter into
fenc citi

10:21 and all the peopl return to the camp to joshua at makkedah in
peace: none move hi tongu against ani of the children of israel

10:22 then said joshua open the mouth of the cave and bring out
those five king unto me out of the cave

10:23 and they did so and brought forth those five king unto him out
of the cave the king of jerusalem the king of hebron the king of
jarmuth the king of lachish and the king of eglon

10:24 and it came to pass when they brought out those king unto
joshua that joshua call for all the men of israel and said unto
the captain of the men of war which went with him come near put
your feet upon the neck of these king and they came near and put
their feet upon the neck of them

10:25 and joshua said unto them fear not nor be dismay be strong
and of good courage: for thu shall the lord do to all your enemi
against whom ye fight

10:26 and afterward joshua smote them and slew them and hang them
on five trees: and they were hang upon the tree until the even

10:27 and it came to pass at the time of the go down of the sun
that joshua command and they took them down off the tree and cast
them into the cave wherein they had been hid and laid great stone in
the cave mouth which remain until thi veri day

10:28 and that day joshua took makkedah and smote it with the edg of
the sword and the king thereof he utterli destroy them and all
the soul that were therein; he let none remain: and he did to the
king of makkedah as he did unto the king of jericho

10:29 then joshua pass from makkedah and all israel with him unto
libnah and fought against libnah: 10:30 and the lord deliv it
also and the king thereof into the hand of israel; and he smote it
with the edg of the sword and all the soul that were therein; he
let none remain in it; but did unto the king thereof as he did unto
the king of jericho

10:31 and joshua pass from libnah and all israel with him unto
lachish and encamp against it and fought against it: 10:32 and the
lord deliv lachish into the hand of israel which took it on the
second day and smote it with the edg of the sword and all the soul
that were therein accord to all that he had done to libnah

10:33 then horam king of gezer came up to help lachish; and joshua
smote him and hi peopl until he had left him none remain

10:34 and from lachish joshua pass unto eglon and all israel with
him; and they encamp against it and fought against it: 10:35 and
they took it on that day and smote it with the edg of the sword and
all the soul that were therein he utterli destroy that day
accord to all that he had done to lachish

10:36 and joshua went up from eglon and all israel with him unto
hebron; and they fought against it: 10:37 and they took it and smote
it with the edg of the sword and the king thereof and all the
citi thereof and all the soul that were therein; he left none
remain accord to all that he had done to eglon; but destroy
it utterli and all the soul that were therein

10:38 and joshua return and all israel with him to debir; and
fought against it: 10:39 and he took it and the king thereof and all
the citi thereof; and they smote them with the edg of the sword
and utterli destroy all the soul that were therein; he left none
remaining: as he had done to hebron so he did to debir and to the
king thereof; as he had done also to libnah and to her king

10:40 so joshua smote all the countri of the hill and of the south
and of the vale and of the spring and all their kings: he left none
remain but utterli destroy all that breath as the lord god of
israel command

10:41 and joshua smote them from kadeshbarnea even unto gaza and all
the countri of goshen even unto gibeon

10:42 and all these king and their land did joshua take at one time
becaus the lord god of israel fought for israel

10:43 and joshua return and all israel with him unto the camp to
gilgal

11:1 and it came to pass when jabin king of hazor had heard those
thing that he sent to jobab king of madon and to the king of
shimron and to the king of achshaph 11:2 and to the king that were
on the north of the mountain and of the plain south of chinneroth
and in the valley and in the border of dor on the west 11:3 and to
the canaanit on the east and on the west and to the amorit and the
hittit and the perizzit and the jebusit in the mountain and to
the hivit under hermon in the land of mizpeh

11:4 and they went out they and all their host with them much
peopl even as the sand that is upon the sea shore in multitud with
hors and chariot veri mani

11:5 and when all these king were met togeth they came and pitch
togeth at the water of merom to fight against israel

11:6 and the lord said unto joshua be not afraid becaus of them: for
to morrow about thi time will i deliv them up all slain befor
israel: thou shalt hough their hors and burn their chariot with
fire

11:7 so joshua came and all the peopl of war with him against them
by the water of merom suddenly; and they fell upon them

11:8 and the lord deliv them into the hand of israel who smote
them and chase them unto great zidon and unto misrephothmaim and
unto the valley of mizpeh eastward; and they smote them until they
left them none remain

11:9 and joshua did unto them as the lord bade him: he hough their
hors and burnt their chariot with fire

11:10 and joshua at that time turn back and took hazor and smote
the king thereof with the sword: for hazor beforetim wa the head of
all those kingdom

11:11 and they smote all the soul that were therein with the edg of
the sword utterli destroy them: there wa not ani left to breathe:
and he burnt hazor with fire

11:12 and all the citi of those king and all the king of them
did joshua take and smote them with the edg of the sword and he
utterli destroy them as mose the servant of the lord command

11:13 but as for the citi that stood still in their strength israel
burn none of them save hazor only; that did joshua burn

11:14 and all the spoil of these citi and the cattl the children
of israel took for a prey unto themselves; but everi man they smote
with the edg of the sword until they had destroy them neither
left they ani to breath

11:15 as the lord command mose hi servant so did mose command
joshua and so did joshua; he left noth undon of all that the lord
command mose

11:16 so joshua took all that land the hill and all the south
countri and all the land of goshen and the valley and the plain
and the mountain of israel and the valley of the same; 11:17 even
from the mount halak that goeth up to seir even unto baalgad in the
valley of lebanon under mount hermon: and all their king he took and
smote them and slew them

11:18 joshua made war a long time with all those king

11:19 there wa not a citi that made peac with the children of
israel save the hivit the inhabit of gibeon: all other they
took in battl

11:20 for it wa of the lord to harden their heart that they should
come against israel in battl that he might destroy them utterli and
that they might have no favour but that he might destroy them as the
lord command mose

11:21 and at that time came joshua and cut off the anakim from the
mountain from hebron from debir from anab and from all the
mountain of judah and from all the mountain of israel: joshua
destroy them utterli with their citi

11:22 there wa none of the anakim left in the land of the children
of israel: onli in gaza in gath and in ashdod there remain

11:23 so joshua took the whole land accord to all that the lord
said unto moses; and joshua gave it for an inherit unto israel
accord to their divis by their tribe and the land rest from
war

12:1 now these are the king of the land which the children of israel
smote and possess their land on the other side jordan toward the
rise of the sun from the river arnon unto mount hermon and all the
plain on the east: 12:2 sihon king of the amorit who dwelt in
heshbon and rule from aroer which is upon the bank of the river
arnon and from the middl of the river and from half gilead even
unto the river jabbok which is the border of the children of ammon;
12:3 and from the plain to the sea of chinneroth on the east and unto
the sea of the plain even the salt sea on the east the way to
bethjeshimoth; and from the south under ashdothpisgah: 12:4 and the
coast of og king of bashan which wa of the remnant of the giant
that dwelt at ashtaroth and at edrei 12:5 and reign in mount
hermon and in salcah and in all bashan unto the border of the
geshurit and the maachathit and half gilead the border of sihon
king of heshbon

12:6 them did mose the servant of the lord and the children of israel
smite: and mose the servant of the lord gave it for a possess unto
the reubenit and the gadit and the half tribe of manasseh

12:7 and these are the king of the countri which joshua and the
children of israel smote on thi side jordan on the west from baalgad
in the valley of lebanon even unto the mount halak that goeth up to
seir; which joshua gave unto the tribe of israel for a possess
accord to their divisions; 12:8 in the mountain and in the
valley and in the plain and in the spring and in the wilder
and in the south country; the hittit the amorit and the
canaanit the perizzit the hivit and the jebusites: 12:9 the
king of jericho one; the king of ai which is besid bethel one;
12:10 the king of jerusalem one; the king of hebron one; 12:11 the
king of jarmuth one; the king of lachish one; 12:12 the king of
eglon one; the king of gezer one; 12:13 the king of debir one; the
king of geder one; 12:14 the king of hormah one; the king of arad
one; 12:15 the king of libnah one; the king of adullam one; 12:16
the king of makkedah one; the king of bethel one; 12:17 the king of
tappuah one; the king of hepher one; 12:18 the king of aphek one;
the king of lasharon one; 12:19 the king of madon one; the king of
hazor one; 12:20 the king of shimronmeron one; the king of achshaph
one; 12:21 the king of taanach one; the king of megiddo one; 12:22
the king of kedesh one; the king of jokneam of carmel one; 12:23 the
king of dor in the coast of dor one; the king of the nation of
gilgal one; 12:24 the king of tirzah one: all the king thirti and
one

13:1 now joshua wa old and stricken in years; and the lord said unto
him thou art old and stricken in year and there remaineth yet veri
much land to be possess

13:2 thi is the land that yet remaineth: all the border of the
philistin and all geshuri 13:3 from sihor which is befor egypt
even unto the border of ekron northward which is count to the
canaanite: five lord of the philistines; the gazathit and the
ashdothit the eshkalonit the gittit and the ekronites; also
the avites: 13:4 from the south all the land of the canaanit and
mearah that is besid the sidonian unto aphek to the border of the
amorites: 13:5 and the land of the giblit and all lebanon toward
the sunris from baalgad under mount hermon unto the enter into
hamath

13:6 all the inhabit of the hill countri from lebanon unto
misrephothmaim and all the sidonian them will i drive out from
befor the children of israel: onli divid thou it by lot unto the
israelit for an inherit as i have command thee

13:7 now therefor divid thi land for an inherit unto the nine
tribe and the half tribe of manasseh 13:8 with whom the reubenit
and the gadit have receiv their inherit which mose gave
them beyond jordan eastward even as mose the servant of the lord
gave them; 13:9 from aroer that is upon the bank of the river arnon
and the citi that is in the midst of the river and all the plain of
medeba unto dibon; 13:10 and all the citi of sihon king of the
amorit which reign in heshbon unto the border of the children of
ammon; 13:11 and gilead and the border of the geshurit and
maachathit and all mount hermon and all bashan unto salcah; 13:12
all the kingdom of og in bashan which reign in ashtaroth and in
edrei who remain of the remnant of the giants: for these did mose
smite and cast them out

13:13 nevertheless the children of israel expel not the geshurit
nor the maachathites: but the geshurit and the maachathit dwell
among the israelit until thi day

13:14 onli unto the tribe of levi he gave none inheritance; the
sacrific of the lord god of israel made by fire are their
inherit as he said unto them

13:15 and mose gave unto the tribe of the children of reuben
inherit accord to their famili

13:16 and their coast wa from aroer that is on the bank of the river
arnon and the citi that is in the midst of the river and all the
plain by medeba; 13:17 heshbon and all her citi that are in the
plain; dibon and bamothba and bethbaalmeon 13:18 and jahaza and
kedemoth and mephaath 13:19 and kirjathaim and sibmah and
zarethshahar in the mount of the valley 13:20 and bethpeor and
ashdothpisgah and bethjeshimoth 13:21 and all the citi of the
plain and all the kingdom of sihon king of the amorit which
reign in heshbon whom mose smote with the princ of midian evi
and rekem and zur and hur and reba which were duke of sihon
dwell in the countri

13:22 balaam also the son of beor the soothsay did the children of
israel slay with the sword among them that were slain by them

13:23 and the border of the children of reuben wa jordan and the
border thereof thi wa the inherit of the children of reuben
after their famili the citi and the villag thereof

13:24 and mose gave inherit unto the tribe of gad even unto the
children of gad accord to their famili

13:25 and their coast wa jazer and all the citi of gilead and
half the land of the children of ammon unto aroer that is befor
rabbah; 13:26 and from heshbon unto ramathmizpeh and betonim; and
from mahanaim unto the border of debir; 13:27 and in the valley
betharam and bethnimrah and succoth and zaphon the rest of the
kingdom of sihon king of heshbon jordan and hi border even unto the
edg of the sea of chinnereth on the other side jordan eastward

13:28 thi is the inherit of the children of gad after their
famili the citi and their villag

13:29 and mose gave inherit unto the half tribe of manasseh: and
thi wa the possess of the half tribe of the children of manasseh
by their famili

13:30 and their coast wa from mahanaim all bashan all the kingdom
of og king of bashan and all the town of jair which are in bashan
threescor cities: 13:31 and half gilead and ashtaroth and edrei
citi of the kingdom of og in bashan were pertain unto the
children of machir the son of manasseh even to the one half of the
children of machir by their famili

13:32 these are the countri which mose did distribut for
inherit in the plain of moab on the other side jordan by
jericho eastward

13:33 but unto the tribe of levi mose gave not ani inheritance: the
lord god of israel wa their inherit as he said unto them

14:1 and these are the countri which the children of israel
inherit in the land of canaan which eleazar the priest and joshua
the son of nun and the head of the father of the tribe of the
children of israel distribut for inherit to them

14:2 by lot wa their inherit as the lord command by the hand
of mose for the nine tribe and for the half tribe

14:3 for mose had given the inherit of two tribe and an half
tribe on the other side jordan: but unto the levit he gave none
inherit among them

14:4 for the children of joseph were two tribe manasseh and ephraim:
therefor they gave no part unto the levit in the land save citi
to dwell in with their suburb for their cattl and for their
substanc

14:5 as the lord command mose so the children of israel did and
they divid the land

14:6 then the children of judah came unto joshua in gilgal: and caleb
the son of jephunneh the kenezit said unto him thou knowest the
thing that the lord said unto mose the man of god concern me and
thee in kadeshbarnea

14:7 forti year old wa i when mose the servant of the lord sent me
from kadeshbarnea to espi out the land; and i brought him word again
as it wa in mine heart

14:8 nevertheless my brethren that went up with me made the heart of
the peopl melt: but i wholli follow the lord my god

14:9 and mose sware on that day say sure the land whereon thi
feet have trodden shall be thine inherit and thi children for
ever becaus thou hast wholli follow the lord my god

14:10 and now behold the lord hath kept me aliv as he said these
forti and five year even sinc the lord spake thi word unto mose
while the children of israel wander in the wilderness: and now lo
i am thi day fourscor and five year old

14:11 as yet i am as strong thi day as i wa in the day that mose
sent me: as my strength wa then even so is my strength now for war
both to go out and to come in

14:12 now therefor give me thi mountain whereof the lord spake in
that day; for thou heardest in that day how the anakim were there
and that the citi were great and fenced: if so be the lord will be
with me then i shall be abl to drive them out as the lord said

14:13 and joshua bless him and gave unto caleb the son of jephunneh
hebron for an inherit

14:14 hebron therefor becam the inherit of caleb the son of
jephunneh the kenezit unto thi day becaus that he wholli follow
the lord god of israel

14:15 and the name of hebron befor wa kirjatharba; which arba wa a
great man among the anakim and the land had rest from war

15:1 thi then wa the lot of the tribe of the children of judah by
their families; even to the border of edom the wilder of zin
southward wa the uttermost part of the south coast

15:2 and their south border wa from the shore of the salt sea from
the bay that looketh southward: 15:3 and it went out to the south side
to maalehacrabbim and pass along to zin and ascend up on the
south side unto kadeshbarnea and pass along to hezron and went up
to adar and fetch a compass to karkaa: 15:4 from thenc it pass
toward azmon and went out unto the river of egypt; and the go out
of that coast were at the sea: thi shall be your south coast

15:5 and the east border wa the salt sea even unto the end of
jordan

and their border in the north quarter wa from the bay of the sea at
the uttermost part of jordan: 15:6 and the border went up to
bethhogla and pass along by the north of betharabah; and the border
went up to the stone of bohan the son of reuben: 15:7 and the border
went up toward debir from the valley of achor and so northward
look toward gilgal that is befor the go up to adummim which
is on the south side of the river: and the border pass toward the
water of enshemesh and the go out thereof were at enrogel: 15:8
and the border went up by the valley of the son of hinnom unto the
south side of the jebusite; the same is jerusalem: and the border went
up to the top of the mountain that lieth befor the valley of hinnom
westward which is at the end of the valley of the giant northward:
15:9 and the border wa drawn from the top of the hill unto the
fountain of the water of nephtoah and went out to the citi of mount
ephron; and the border wa drawn to baalah which is kirjathjearim:
15:10 and the border compass from baalah westward unto mount seir
and pass along unto the side of mount jearim which is chesalon on
the north side and went down to bethshemesh and pass on to timnah:
15:11 and the border went out unto the side of ekron northward: and
the border wa drawn to shicron and pass along to mount baalah and
went out unto jabneel; and the go out of the border were at the
sea

15:12 and the west border wa to the great sea and the coast thereof

thi is the coast of the children of judah round about accord to
their famili

15:13 and unto caleb the son of jephunneh he gave a part among the
children of judah accord to the command of the lord to joshua
even the citi of arba the father of anak which citi is hebron

15:14 and caleb drove thenc the three son of anak sheshai and
ahiman and talmai the children of anak

15:15 and he went up thenc to the inhabit of debir: and the name
of debir befor wa kirjathseph

15:16 and caleb said he that smiteth kirjathseph and taketh it to
him will i give achsah my daughter to wife

15:17 and othniel the son of kenaz the brother of caleb took it: and
he gave him achsah hi daughter to wife

15:18 and it came to pass as she came unto him that she move him to
ask of her father a field: and she light off her ass; and caleb said
unto her what wouldest thou? 15:19 who answer give me a blessing;
for thou hast given me a south land; give me also spring of water
and he gave her the upper spring and the nether spring

15:20 thi is the inherit of the tribe of the children of judah
accord to their famili

15:21 and the uttermost citi of the tribe of the children of judah
toward the coast of edom southward were kabzeel and eder and jagur
15:22 and kinah and dimonah and adadah 15:23 and kedesh and hazor
and ithnan 15:24 ziph and telem and bealoth 15:25 and hazor
hadattah and kerioth and hezron which is hazor 15:26 amam and
shema and moladah 15:27 and hazargaddah and heshmon and bethpalet
15:28 and hazarshu and beersheba and bizjothjah 15:29 baalah and
iim and azem 15:30 and eltolad and chesil and hormah 15:31 and
ziklag and madmannah and sansannah 15:32 and lebaoth and shilhim
and ain and rimmon: all the citi are twenti and nine with their
villages: 15:33 and in the valley eshtaol and zoreah and ashnah
15:34 and zanoah and engannim tappuah and enam 15:35 jarmuth and
adullam socoh and azekah 15:36 and sharaim and adithaim and
gederah and gederothaim; fourteen citi with their villages: 15:37
zenan and hadashah and migdalgad 15:38 and dilean and mizpeh and
joktheel 15:39 lachish and bozkath and eglon 15:40 and cabbon and
lahmam and kithlish 15:41 and gederoth bethdagon and naamah and
makkedah; sixteen citi with their villages: 15:42 libnah and ether
and ashan 15:43 and jiphtah and ashnah and nezib 15:44 and keilah
and achzib and mareshah; nine citi with their villages: 15:45
ekron with her town and her villages: 15:46 from ekron even unto the
sea all that lay near ashdod with their villages: 15:47 ashdod with
her town and her villag gaza with her town and her villag unto
the river of egypt and the great sea and the border thereof: 15:48
and in the mountain shamir and jattir and socoh 15:49 and dannah
and kirjathsannah which is debir 15:50 and anab and eshtemoh and
anim 15:51 and goshen and holon and giloh; eleven citi with their
villages: 15:52 arab and dumah and eshean 15:53 and janum and
bethtappuah and aphekah 15:54 and humtah and kirjatharba which is
hebron and zior; nine citi with their villages: 15:55 maon carmel
and ziph and juttah 15:56 and jezreel and jokdeam and zanoah
15:57 cain gibeah and timnah; ten citi with their villages: 15:58
halhul bethzur and gedor 15:59 and maarath and bethanoth and
eltekon; six citi with their villages: 15:60 kirjathba which is
kirjathjearim and rabbah; two citi with their villages: 15:61 in
the wilder betharabah middin and secacah 15:62 and nibshan
and the citi of salt and engedi; six citi with their villag

15:63 as for the jebusit the inhabit of jerusalem the children
of judah could not drive them out; but the jebusit dwell with the
children of judah at jerusalem unto thi day

16:1 and the lot of the children of joseph fell from jordan by
jericho unto the water of jericho on the east to the wilder that
goeth up from jericho throughout mount bethel 16:2 and goeth out from
bethel to luz and passeth along unto the border of archi to ataroth
16:3 and goeth down westward to the coast of japhleti unto the coast
of bethhoron the nether and to gezer; and the go out thereof are
at the sea

16:4 so the children of joseph manasseh and ephraim took their
inherit

16:5 and the border of the children of ephraim accord to their
famili wa thus: even the border of their inherit on the east
side wa atarothaddar unto bethhoron the upper; 16:6 and the border
went out toward the sea to michmethah on the north side; and the
border went about eastward unto taanathshiloh and pass by it on the
east to janohah; 16:7 and it went down from janohah to ataroth and to
naarath and came to jericho and went out at jordan

16:8 the border went out from tappuah westward unto the river kanah;
and the go out thereof were at the sea thi is the inherit of
the tribe of the children of ephraim by their famili

16:9 and the separ citi for the children of ephraim were among
the inherit of the children of manasseh all the citi with their
villag

16:10 and they drave not out the canaanit that dwelt in gezer: but
the canaanit dwell among the ephraimit unto thi day and serv
under tribut

17:1 there wa also a lot for the tribe of manasseh; for he wa the
firstborn of joseph; to wit for machir the firstborn of manasseh the
father of gilead: becaus he wa a man of war therefor he had gilead
and bashan

17:2 there wa also a lot for the rest of the children of manasseh by
their families; for the children of abiez and for the children of
helek and for the children of asriel and for the children of
shechem and for the children of hepher and for the children of
shemida: these were the male children of manasseh the son of joseph by
their famili

17:3 but zelophehad the son of hepher the son of gilead the son of
machir the son of manasseh had no son but daughters: and these are
the name of hi daughter mahlah and noah hoglah milcah and
tirzah

17:4 and they came near befor eleazar the priest and befor joshua
the son of nun and befor the princ say the lord command
mose to give us an inherit among our brethren therefor
accord to the command of the lord he gave them an inherit
among the brethren of their father

17:5 and there fell ten portion to manasseh besid the land of
gilead and bashan which were on the other side jordan; 17:6 becaus
the daughter of manasseh had an inherit among hi sons: and the
rest of manasseh son had the land of gilead

17:7 and the coast of manasseh wa from asher to michmethah that
lieth befor shechem; and the border went along on the right hand unto
the inhabit of entappuah

17:8 now manasseh had the land of tappuah: but tappuah on the border
of manasseh belong to the children of ephraim; 17:9 and the coast
descend unto the river kanah southward of the river: these citi
of ephraim are among the citi of manasseh: the coast of manasseh
also wa on the north side of the river and the outgo of it were
at the sea: 17:10 southward it wa ephraim and northward it wa
manasseh and the sea is hi border; and they met togeth in asher
on the north and in issachar on the east

17:11 and manasseh had in issachar and in asher bethshean and her
town and ibleam and her town and the inhabit of dor and her
town and the inhabit of endor and her town and the inhabit
of taanach and her town and the inhabit of megiddo and her
town even three countri

17:12 yet the children of manasseh could not drive out the inhabit
of those cities; but the canaanit would dwell in that land

17:13 yet it came to pass when the children of israel were waxen
strong that they put the canaanit to tribut but did not utterli
drive them out

17:14 and the children of joseph spake unto joshua say whi hast
thou given me but one lot and one portion to inherit see i am a
great peopl forasmuch as the lord hath bless me hitherto? 17:15
and joshua answer them if thou be a great peopl then get thee up
to the wood countri and cut down for thyself there in the land of the
perizzit and of the giant if mount ephraim be too narrow for thee

17:16 and the children of joseph said the hill is not enough for us:
and all the canaanit that dwell in the land of the valley have
chariot of iron both they who are of bethshean and her town and
they who are of the valley of jezreel

17:17 and joshua spake unto the hous of joseph even to ephraim and
to manasseh say thou art a great peopl and hast great power:
thou shalt not have one lot only: 17:18 but the mountain shall be
thine; for it is a wood and thou shalt cut it down: and the outgo
of it shall be thine: for thou shalt drive out the canaanit though
they have iron chariot and though they be strong

18:1 and the whole congreg of the children of israel assembl
togeth at shiloh and set up the tabernacl of the congreg
there and the land wa subdu befor them

18:2 and there remain among the children of israel seven tribe
which had not yet receiv their inherit

18:3 and joshua said unto the children of israel how long are ye
slack to go to possess the land which the lord god of your father
hath given you? 18:4 give out from among you three men for each
tribe: and i will send them and they shall rise and go through the
land and describ it accord to the inherit of them; and they
shall come again to me

18:5 and they shall divid it into seven parts: judah shall abid in
their coast on the south and the hous of joseph shall abid in their
coast on the north

18:6 ye shall therefor describ the land into seven part and bring
the descript hither to me that i may cast lot for you here befor
the lord our god

18:7 but the levit have no part among you; for the priesthood of the
lord is their inheritance: and gad and reuben and half the tribe of
manasseh have receiv their inherit beyond jordan on the east
which mose the servant of the lord gave them

18:8 and the men aros and went away: and joshua charg them that
went to describ the land say go and walk through the land and
describ it and come again to me that i may here cast lot for you
befor the lord in shiloh

18:9 and the men went and pass through the land and describ it by
citi into seven part in a book and came again to joshua to the
host at shiloh

18:10 and joshua cast lot for them in shiloh befor the lord: and
there joshua divid the land unto the children of israel accord to
their divis

18:11 and the lot of the tribe of the children of benjamin came up
accord to their families: and the coast of their lot came forth
between the children of judah and the children of joseph

18:12 and their border on the north side wa from jordan; and the
border went up to the side of jericho on the north side and went up
through the mountain westward; and the go out thereof were at the
wilder of bethaven

18:13 and the border went over from thenc toward luz to the side of
luz which is bethel southward; and the border descend to
atarothadar near the hill that lieth on the south side of the nether
bethhoron

18:14 and the border wa drawn thenc and compass the corner of the
sea southward from the hill that lieth befor bethhoron southward;
and the go out thereof were at kirjathba which is
kirjathjearim a citi of the children of judah: thi wa the west
quarter

18:15 and the south quarter wa from the end of kirjathjearim and the
border went out on the west and went out to the well of water of
nephtoah: 18:16 and the border came down to the end of the mountain
that lieth befor the valley of the son of hinnom and which is in the
valley of the giant on the north and descend to the valley of
hinnom to the side of jebusi on the south and descend to enrogel
18:17 and wa drawn from the north and went forth to enshemesh and
went forth toward geliloth which is over against the go up of
adummim and descend to the stone of bohan the son of reuben 18:18
and pass along toward the side over against arabah northward and
went down unto arabah: 18:19 and the border pass along to the side
of bethhoglah northward: and the outgo of the border were at the
north bay of the salt sea at the south end of jordan: thi wa the
south coast

18:20 and jordan wa the border of it on the east side thi wa the
inherit of the children of benjamin by the coast thereof round
about accord to their famili

18:21 now the citi of the tribe of the children of benjamin
accord to their famili were jericho and bethhoglah and the
valley of keziz 18:22 and betharabah and zemaraim and bethel 18:23
and avim and pharah and ophrah 18:24 and chepharhaammonai and
ophni and gaba; twelv citi with their villages: 18:25 gibeon and
ramah and beeroth 18:26 and mizpeh and chephirah and mozah 18:27
and rekem and irpeel and taralah 18:28 and zelah eleph and
jebusi which is jerusalem gibeath and kirjath; fourteen citi with
their villag thi is the inherit of the children of benjamin
accord to their famili

19:1 and the second lot came forth to simeon even for the tribe of
the children of simeon accord to their families: and their
inherit wa within the inherit of the children of judah

19:2 and they had in their inherit beersheba and sheba and
moladah 19:3 and hazarshu and balah and azem 19:4 and eltolad
and bethul and hormah 19:5 and ziklag and bethmarcaboth and
hazarsusah 19:6 and bethlebaoth and sharuhen; thirteen citi and
their villages: 19:7 ain remmon and ether and ashan; four citi
and their villages: 19:8 and all the villag that were round about
these citi to baalathb ramath of the south thi is the
inherit of the tribe of the children of simeon accord to their
famili

19:9 out of the portion of the children of judah wa the inherit
of the children of simeon: for the part of the children of judah wa
too much for them: therefor the children of simeon had their
inherit within the inherit of them

19:10 and the third lot came up for the children of zebulun accord
to their families: and the border of their inherit wa unto sarid:
19:11 and their border went up toward the sea and maralah and
reach to dabbasheth and reach to the river that is befor
jokneam; 19:12 and turn from sarid eastward toward the sunris
unto the border of chislothtabor and then goeth out to daberath and
goeth up to japhia 19:13 and from thenc passeth on along on the east
to gittahheph to ittahkazin and goeth out to remmonmethoar to
neah; 19:14 and the border compasseth it on the north side to
hannathon: and the outgo thereof are in the valley of jiphthahel:
19:15 and kattath and nahal and shimron and idalah and
bethlehem: twelv citi with their villag

19:16 thi is the inherit of the children of zebulun accord to
their famili these citi with their villag

19:17 and the fourth lot came out to issachar for the children of
issachar accord to their famili

19:18 and their border wa toward jezreel and chesulloth and shunem
19:19 and haphraim and shihon and anaharath 19:20 and rabbith and
kishion and abez 19:21 and remeth and engannim and enhaddah and
bethpazzez; 19:22 and the coast reacheth to tabor and shahazimah and
bethshemesh; and the outgo of their border were at jordan: sixteen
citi with their villag

19:23 thi is the inherit of the tribe of the children of issachar
accord to their famili the citi and their villag

19:24 and the fifth lot came out for the tribe of the children of
asher accord to their famili

19:25 and their border wa helkath and hali and beten and achshaph
19:26 and alammelech and amad and misheal; and reacheth to carmel
westward and to shihorlibnath; 19:27 and turneth toward the sunris
to bethdagon and reacheth to zebulun and to the valley of jiphthahel
toward the north side of bethemek and neiel and goeth out to cabul
on the left hand 19:28 and hebron and rehob and hammon and kanah
even unto great zidon; 19:29 and then the coast turneth to ramah and
to the strong citi tyre; and the coast turneth to hosah; and the
outgo thereof are at the sea from the coast to achzib: 19:30 ummah
also and aphek and rehob: twenti and two citi with their villag

19:31 thi is the inherit of the tribe of the children of asher
accord to their famili these citi with their villag

19:32 the sixth lot came out to the children of naphtali even for the
children of naphtali accord to their famili

19:33 and their coast wa from heleph from allon to zaanannim and
adami nekeb and jabneel unto lakum; and the outgo thereof were
at jordan: 19:34 and then the coast turneth westward to aznothtabor
and goeth out from thenc to hukkok and reacheth to zebulun on the
south side and reacheth to asher on the west side and to judah upon
jordan toward the sunris

19:35 and the fenc citi are ziddim zer and hammath rakkath and
chinnereth 19:36 and adamah and ramah and hazor 19:37 and kedesh
and edrei and enhazor 19:38 and iron and migdalel horem and
bethanath and bethshemesh; nineteen citi with their villag

19:39 thi is the inherit of the tribe of the children of naphtali
accord to their famili the citi and their villag

19:40 and the seventh lot came out for the tribe of the children of
dan accord to their famili

19:41 and the coast of their inherit wa zorah and eshtaol and
irshemesh 19:42 and shaalabbin and ajalon and jethlah 19:43 and
elon and thimnathah and ekron 19:44 and eltekeh and gibbethon and
baalath 19:45 and jehud and beneberak and gathrimmon 19:46 and
mejarkon and rakkon with the border befor japho

19:47 and the coast of the children of dan went out too littl for
them: therefor the children of dan went up to fight against leshem
and took it and smote it with the edg of the sword and possess
it and dwelt therein and call leshem dan after the name of dan
their father

19:48 thi is the inherit of the tribe of the children of dan
accord to their famili these citi with their villag

19:49 when they had made an end of divid the land for inherit
by their coast the children of israel gave an inherit to joshua
the son of nun among them: 19:50 accord to the word of the lord
they gave him the citi which he ask even timnathserah in mount
ephraim: and he built the citi and dwelt therein

19:51 these are the inherit which eleazar the priest and joshua
the son of nun and the head of the father of the tribe of the
children of israel divid for an inherit by lot in shiloh befor
the lord at the door of the tabernacl of the congreg so they
made an end of divid the countri

20:1 the lord also spake unto joshua say 20:2 speak to the
children of israel say appoint out for you citi of refug
whereof i spake unto you by the hand of moses: 20:3 that the slayer
that killeth ani person unawar and unwittingli may flee thither: and
they shall be your refug from the aveng of blood

20:4 and when he that doth flee unto one of those citi shall stand
at the enter of the gate of the citi and shall declar hi caus
in the ear of the elder of that citi they shall take him into the
citi unto them and give him a place that he may dwell among them

20:5 and if the aveng of blood pursu after him then they shall not
deliv the slayer up into hi hand; becaus he smote hi neighbour
unwittingli and hate him not beforetim

20:6 and he shall dwell in that citi until he stand befor the
congreg for judgment and until the death of the high priest that
shall be in those days: then shall the slayer return and come unto
hi own citi and unto hi own hous unto the citi from whenc he
fled

20:7 and they appoint kedesh in galile in mount naphtali and
shechem in mount ephraim and kirjatharba which is hebron in the
mountain of judah

20:8 and on the other side jordan by jericho eastward they assign
bezer in the wilder upon the plain out of the tribe of reuben and
ramoth in gilead out of the tribe of gad and golan in bashan out of
the tribe of manasseh

20:9 these were the citi appoint for all the children of israel
and for the stranger that sojourneth among them that whosoev
killeth ani person at unawar might flee thither and not die by the
hand of the aveng of blood until he stood befor the congreg

21:1 then came near the head of the father of the levit unto
eleazar the priest and unto joshua the son of nun and unto the head
of the father of the tribe of the children of israel; 21:2 and they
spake unto them at shiloh in the land of canaan say the lord
command by the hand of mose to give us citi to dwell in with the
suburb thereof for our cattl

21:3 and the children of israel gave unto the levit out of their
inherit at the command of the lord these citi and their
suburb

21:4 and the lot came out for the famili of the kohathites: and the
children of aaron the priest which were of the levit had by lot
out of the tribe of judah and out of the tribe of simeon and out of
the tribe of benjamin thirteen citi

21:5 and the rest of the children of kohath had by lot out of the
famili of the tribe of ephraim and out of the tribe of dan and out
of the half tribe of manasseh ten citi

21:6 and the children of gershon had by lot out of the famili of the
tribe of issachar and out of the tribe of asher and out of the tribe
of naphtali and out of the half tribe of manasseh in bashan thirteen
citi

21:7 the children of merari by their famili had out of the tribe of
reuben and out of the tribe of gad and out of the tribe of zebulun
twelv citi

21:8 and the children of israel gave by lot unto the levit these
citi with their suburb as the lord command by the hand of mose

21:9 and they gave out of the tribe of the children of judah and out
of the tribe of the children of simeon these citi which are here
mention by name

21:10 which the children of aaron be of the famili of the
kohathit who were of the children of levi had: for their wa the
first lot

21:11 and they gave them the citi of arba the father of anak which
citi is hebron in the hill countri of judah with the suburb thereof
round about it

21:12 but the field of the citi and the villag thereof gave they
to caleb the son of jephunneh for hi possess

21:13 thu they gave to the children of aaron the priest hebron with
her suburb to be a citi of refug for the slayer; and libnah with
her suburb 21:14 and jattir with her suburb and eshtemoa with her
suburb 21:15 and holon with her suburb and debir with her suburb
21:16 and ain with her suburb and juttah with her suburb and
bethshemesh with her suburbs; nine citi out of those two tribe

21:17 and out of the tribe of benjamin gibeon with her suburb geba
with her suburb 21:18 anathoth with her suburb and almon with her
suburbs; four citi

21:19 all the citi of the children of aaron the priest were
thirteen citi with their suburb

21:20 and the famili of the children of kohath the levit which
remain of the children of kohath even they had the citi of their
lot out of the tribe of ephraim

21:21 for they gave them shechem with her suburb in mount ephraim to
be a citi of refug for the slayer; and gezer with her suburb 21:22
and kibzaim with her suburb and bethhoron with her suburbs; four
citi

21:23 and out of the tribe of dan eltekeh with her suburb gibbethon
with her suburb 21:24 aijalon with her suburb gathrimmon with her
suburbs; four citi

21:25 and out of the half tribe of manasseh tanach with her suburb
and gathrimmon with her suburbs; two citi

21:26 all the citi were ten with their suburb for the famili of
the children of kohath that remain

21:27 and unto the children of gershon of the famili of the
levit out of the other half tribe of manasseh they gave golan in
bashan with her suburb to be a citi of refug for the slayer; and
beeshterah with her suburbs; two citi

21:28 and out of the tribe of issachar kishon with her suburb
dabareh with her suburb 21:29 jarmuth with her suburb engannim
with her suburbs; four citi

21:30 and out of the tribe of asher mishal with her suburb abdon
with her suburb 21:31 helkath with her suburb and rehob with her
suburbs; four citi

21:32 and out of the tribe of naphtali kedesh in galile with her
suburb to be a citi of refug for the slayer; and hammothdor with
her suburb and kartan with her suburbs; three citi

21:33 all the citi of the gershonit accord to their famili
were thirteen citi with their suburb

21:34 and unto the famili of the children of merari the rest of the
levit out of the tribe of zebulun jokneam with her suburb and
