18:13 now in the fourteenth year of king hezekiah did sennacherib king
of assyria come up against all the fenc citi of judah and took
them

18:14 and hezekiah king of judah sent to the king of assyria to
lachish say i have offended; return from me: that which thou
puttest on me will i bear and the king of assyria appoint unto
hezekiah king of judah three hundr talent of silver and thirti
talent of gold

18:15 and hezekiah gave him all the silver that wa found in the hous
of the lord and in the treasur of the king hous

18:16 at that time did hezekiah cut off the gold from the door of the
templ of the lord and from the pillar which hezekiah king of judah
had overlaid and gave it to the king of assyria

18:17 and the king of assyria sent tartan and rabsari and rabshakeh
from lachish to king hezekiah with a great host against jerusalem and
they went up and came to jerusalem and when they were come up they
came and stood by the conduit of the upper pool which is in the
highway of the fuller field

18:18 and when they had call to the king there came out to them
eliakim the son of hilkiah which wa over the household and shebna
the scribe and joah the son of asaph the record

18:19 and rabshakeh said unto them speak ye now to hezekiah thu
saith the great king the king of assyria what confid is thi
wherein thou trustest? 18:20 thou sayest (but they are but vain
words) i have counsel and strength for the war now on whom dost thou
trust that thou rebellest against me? 18:21 now behold thou
trustest upon the staff of thi bruis reed even upon egypt on
which if a man lean it will go into hi hand and pierc it: so is
pharaoh king of egypt unto all that trust on him

18:22 but if ye say unto me we trust in the lord our god: is not that
he whose high place and whose altar hezekiah hath taken away and
hath said to judah and jerusalem ye shall worship befor thi altar
in jerusalem? 18:23 now therefor i pray thee give pledg to my
lord the king of assyria and i will deliv thee two thousand hors
if thou be abl on thi part to set rider upon them

18:24 how then wilt thou turn away the face of one captain of the
least of my master servant and put thi trust on egypt for chariot
and for horsemen? 18:25 am i now come up without the lord against
thi place to destroy it? the lord said to me go up against thi
land and destroy it

18:26 then said eliakim the son of hilkiah and shebna and joah unto
rabshakeh speak i pray thee to thi servant in the syrian language;
for we understand it: and talk not with us in the jew languag in
the ear of the peopl that are on the wall

18:27 but rabshakeh said unto them hath my master sent me to thi
master and to thee to speak these words? hath he not sent me to the
men which sit on the wall that they may eat their own dung and drink
their own piss with you? 18:28 then rabshakeh stood and cri with a
loud voic in the jew languag and spake say hear the word of
the great king the king of assyria: 18:29 thu saith the king let
not hezekiah deceiv you: for he shall not be abl to deliv you out
of hi hand: 18:30 neither let hezekiah make you trust in the lord
say the lord will sure deliv us and thi citi shall not be
deliv into the hand of the king of assyria

18:31 hearken not to hezekiah: for thu saith the king of assyria
make an agreement with me by a present and come out to me and then
eat ye everi man of hi own vine and everi one of hi fig tree and
drink ye everi one the water of hi cistern: 18:32 until i come and
take you away to a land like your own land a land of corn and wine a
land of bread and vineyard a land of oil oliv and of honey that ye
may live and not die: and hearken not unto hezekiah when he
persuadeth you say the lord will deliv us

18:33 hath ani of the god of the nation deliv at all hi land
out of the hand of the king of assyria? 18:34 where are the god of
hamath and of arpad? where are the god of sepharvaim hena and
ivah? have they deliv samaria out of mine hand? 18:35 who are
they among all the god of the countri that have deliv their
countri out of mine hand that the lord should deliv jerusalem out
of mine hand? 18:36 but the peopl held their peac and answer him
not a word: for the king command wa say answer him not

18:37 then came eliakim the son of hilkiah which wa over the
household and shebna the scribe and joah the son of asaph the
record to hezekiah with their cloth rent and told him the word
of rabshakeh

19:1 and it came to pass when king hezekiah heard it that he rent
hi cloth and cover himself with sackcloth and went into the
hous of the lord

19:2 and he sent eliakim which wa over the household and shebna the
scribe and the elder of the priest cover with sackcloth to
isaiah the prophet the son of amoz

19:3 and they said unto him thu saith hezekiah thi day is a day of
troubl and of rebuk and blasphemy; for the children are come to
the birth and there is not strength to bring forth

19:4 it may be the lord thi god will hear all the word of rabshakeh
whom the king of assyria hi master hath sent to reproach the live
god; and will reprov the word which the lord thi god hath heard:
wherefor lift up thi prayer for the remnant that are left

19:5 so the servant of king hezekiah came to isaiah

19:6 and isaiah said unto them thu shall ye say to your master thu
saith the lord be not afraid of the word which thou hast heard with
which the servant of the king of assyria have blasphem me

19:7 behold i will send a blast upon him and he shall hear a rumour
and shall return to hi own land; and i will caus him to fall by the
sword in hi own land

19:8 so rabshakeh return and found the king of assyria war
against libnah: for he had heard that he wa depart from lachish

19:9 and when he heard say of tirhakah king of ethiopia behold he is
come out to fight against thee: he sent messeng again unto
hezekiah say 19:10 thu shall ye speak to hezekiah king of judah
say let not thi god in whom thou trustest deceiv thee say
jerusalem shall not be deliv into the hand of the king of assyria

19:11 behold thou hast heard what the king of assyria have done to
all land by destroy them utterly: and shalt thou be delivered?
19:12 have the god of the nation deliv them which my father
have destroyed; as gozan and haran and rezeph and the children of
eden which were in thelasar? 19:13 where is the king of hamath and
the king of arpad and the king of the citi of sepharvaim of hena
and ivah? 19:14 and hezekiah receiv the letter of the hand of the
messeng and read it: and hezekiah went up into the hous of the
lord and spread it befor the lord

19:15 and hezekiah pray befor the lord and said o lord god of
israel which dwellest between the cherubim thou art the god even
thou alon of all the kingdom of the earth; thou hast made heaven
and earth

19:16 lord bow down thine ear and hear: open lord thine eye and
see: and hear the word of sennacherib which hath sent him to
reproach the live god

19:17 of a truth lord the king of assyria have destroy the
nation and their land 19:18 and have cast their god into the fire:
for they were no god but the work of men hand wood and stone:
therefor they have destroy them

19:19 now therefor o lord our god i beseech thee save thou us out
of hi hand that all the kingdom of the earth may know that thou art
the lord god even thou onli

19:20 then isaiah the son of amoz sent to hezekiah say thu saith
the lord god of israel that which thou hast pray to me against
sennacherib king of assyria i have heard

19:21 thi is the word that the lord hath spoken concern him; the
virgin the daughter of zion hath despis thee and laugh thee to
scorn; the daughter of jerusalem hath shaken her head at thee

19:22 whom hast thou reproach and blasphemed? and against whom hast
thou exalt thi voic and lift up thine eye on high? even against
the holi one of israel

19:23 by thi messeng thou hast reproach the lord and hast said
with the multitud of my chariot i am come up to the height of the
mountain to the side of lebanon and will cut down the tall cedar
tree thereof and the choic fir tree thereof: and i will enter into
the lodg of hi border and into the forest of hi carmel

19:24 i have dig and drunk strang water and with the sole of my
feet have i dri up all the river of besieg place

19:25 hast thou not heard long ago how i have done it and of ancient
time that i have form it? now have i brought it to pass that thou
shouldest be to lay wast fenc citi into ruinou heap

19:26 therefor their inhabit were of small power they were
dismay and confounded; they were as the grass of the field and as
the green herb as the grass on the hous top and as corn blast
befor it be grown up

19:27 but i know thi abod and thi go out and thi come in and
thi rage against me

19:28 becaus thi rage against me and thi tumult is come up into mine
ear therefor i will put my hook in thi nose and my bridl in thi
lip and i will turn thee back by the way by which thou camest

19:29 and thi shall be a sign unto thee ye shall eat thi year such
thing as grow of themselv and in the second year that which
springeth of the same; and in the third year sow ye and reap and
plant vineyard and eat the fruit thereof

19:30 and the remnant that is escap of the hous of judah shall yet
again take root downward and bear fruit upward

19:31 for out of jerusalem shall go forth a remnant and they that
escap out of mount zion: the zeal of the lord of host shall do thi

19:32 therefor thu saith the lord concern the king of assyria he
shall not come into thi citi nor shoot an arrow there nor come
befor it with shield nor cast a bank against it

19:33 by the way that he came by the same shall he return and shall
not come into thi citi saith the lord

19:34 for i will defend thi citi to save it for mine own sake and
for my servant david sake

19:35 and it came to pass that night that the angel of the lord went
out and smote in the camp of the assyrian an hundr fourscor and
five thousand: and when they aros earli in the morn behold they
were all dead corps

19:36 so sennacherib king of assyria depart and went and return
and dwelt at nineveh

19:37 and it came to pass as he wa worship in the hous of
nisroch hi god that adrammelech and sharez hi son smote him with
the sword: and they escap into the land of armenia and esarhaddon
hi son reign in hi stead

20:1 in those day wa hezekiah sick unto death and the prophet
isaiah the son of amoz came to him and said unto him thu saith the
lord set thine hous in order; for thou shalt die and not live

20:2 then he turn hi face to the wall and pray unto the lord
say 20:3 i beseech thee o lord rememb now how i have walk
befor thee in truth and with a perfect heart and have done that
which is good in thi sight and hezekiah wept sore

20:4 and it came to pass afor isaiah wa gone out into the middl
court that the word of the lord came to him say 20:5 turn again
and tell hezekiah the captain of my peopl thu saith the lord the
god of david thi father i have heard thi prayer i have seen thi
tears: behold i will heal thee: on the third day thou shalt go up
unto the hous of the lord

20:6 and i will add unto thi day fifteen years; and i will deliv
thee and thi citi out of the hand of the king of assyria; and i will
defend thi citi for mine own sake and for my servant david sake

20:7 and isaiah said take a lump of fig and they took and laid it
on the boil and he recov

20:8 and hezekiah said unto isaiah what shall be the sign that the
lord will heal me and that i shall go up into the hous of the lord
the third day? 20:9 and isaiah said thi sign shalt thou have of the
lord that the lord will do the thing that he hath spoken: shall the
shadow go forward ten degre or go back ten degrees? 20:10 and
hezekiah answer it is a light thing for the shadow to go down ten
degrees: nay but let the shadow return backward ten degre

20:11 and isaiah the prophet cri unto the lord: and he brought the
shadow ten degre backward by which it had gone down in the dial of
ahaz

20:12 at that time berodachbaladan the son of baladan king of
babylon sent letter and a present unto hezekiah: for he had heard
that hezekiah had been sick

20:13 and hezekiah hearken unto them and shew them all the hous
of hi preciou thing the silver and the gold and the spice and
the preciou ointment and all the hous of hi armour and all that
wa found in hi treasures: there wa noth in hi hous nor in all
hi dominion that hezekiah shew them not

20:14 then came isaiah the prophet unto king hezekiah and said unto
him what said these men? and from whenc came they unto thee? and
hezekiah said they are come from a far countri even from babylon

20:15 and he said what have they seen in thine house? and hezekiah
answer all the thing that are in mine hous have they seen: there
is noth among my treasur that i have not shew them

20:16 and isaiah said unto hezekiah hear the word of the lord

20:17 behold the day come that all that is in thine hous and that
which thi father have laid up in store unto thi day shall be
carri into babylon: noth shall be left saith the lord

20:18 and of thi son that shall issu from thee which thou shalt
beget shall they take away; and they shall be eunuch in the palac
of the king of babylon

20:19 then said hezekiah unto isaiah good is the word of the lord
which thou hast spoken and he said is it not good if peac and
truth be in my days? 20:20 and the rest of the act of hezekiah and
all hi might and how he made a pool and a conduit and brought
water into the citi are they not written in the book of the
chronicl of the king of judah? 20:21 and hezekiah slept with hi
fathers: and manasseh hi son reign in hi stead

21:1 manasseh wa twelv year old when he began to reign and reign
fifti and five year in jerusalem and hi mother name wa
hephzibah

21:2 and he did that which wa evil in the sight of the lord after
the abomin of the heathen whom the lord cast out befor the
children of israel

21:3 for he built up again the high place which hezekiah hi father
had destroyed; and he rear up altar for baal and made a grove as
did ahab king of israel; and worship all the host of heaven and
serv them

21:4 and he built altar in the hous of the lord of which the lord
said in jerusalem will i put my name

21:5 and he built altar for all the host of heaven in the two court
of the hous of the lord

21:6 and he made hi son pass through the fire and observ time
and use enchant and dealt with familiar spirit and wizards: he
wrought much wicked in the sight of the lord to provok him to
anger

21:7 and he set a graven imag of the grove that he had made in the
hous of which the lord said to david and to solomon hi son in
thi hous and in jerusalem which i have chosen out of all tribe of
israel will i put my name for ever: 21:8 neither will i make the feet
of israel move ani more out of the land which i gave their fathers;
onli if they will observ to do accord to all that i have command
them and accord to all the law that my servant mose command
them

21:9 but they hearken not: and manasseh seduc them to do more evil
than did the nation whom the lord destroy befor the children of
israel

21:10 and the lord spake by hi servant the prophet say 21:11
becaus manasseh king of judah hath done these abomin and hath
done wickedli abov all that the amorit did which were befor him
and hath made judah also to sin with hi idols: 21:12 therefor thu
saith the lord god of israel behold i am bring such evil upon
jerusalem and judah that whosoev heareth of it both hi ear shall
tingl

21:13 and i will stretch over jerusalem the line of samaria and the
plummet of the hous of ahab: and i will wipe jerusalem as a man
wipeth a dish wipe it and turn it upsid down

21:14 and i will forsak the remnant of mine inherit and deliv
them into the hand of their enemies; and they shall becom a prey and
a spoil to all their enemies; 21:15 becaus they have done that which
wa evil in my sight and have provok me to anger sinc the day
their father came forth out of egypt even unto thi day

21:16 moreov manasseh shed innoc blood veri much till he had
fill jerusalem from one end to another; besid hi sin wherewith he
made judah to sin in do that which wa evil in the sight of the
lord

21:17 now the rest of the act of manasseh and all that he did and
hi sin that he sin are they not written in the book of the
chronicl of the king of judah? 21:18 and manasseh slept with hi
father and wa buri in the garden of hi own hous in the garden
of uzza: and amon hi son reign in hi stead

21:19 amon wa twenti and two year old when he began to reign and he
reign two year in jerusalem and hi mother name wa
meshullemeth the daughter of haruz of jotbah

21:20 and he did that which wa evil in the sight of the lord as hi
father manasseh did

21:21 and he walk in all the way that hi father walk in and
serv the idol that hi father serv and worship them: 21:22
and he forsook the lord god of hi father and walk not in the way
of the lord

21:23 and the servant of amon conspir against him and slew the
king in hi own hous

21:24 and the peopl of the land slew all them that had conspir
against king amon; and the peopl of the land made josiah hi son king
in hi stead

21:25 now the rest of the act of amon which he did are they not
written in the book of the chronicl of the king of judah? 21:26
and he wa buri in hi sepulchr in the garden of uzza: and josiah
hi son reign in hi stead

22:1 josiah wa eight year old when he began to reign and he reign
thirti and one year in jerusalem and hi mother name wa jedidah
the daughter of adaiah of boscath

22:2 and he did that which wa right in the sight of the lord and
walk in all the way of david hi father and turn not asid to the
right hand or to the left

22:3 and it came to pass in the eighteenth year of king josiah that
the king sent shaphan the son of azaliah the son of meshullam the
scribe to the hous of the lord say 22:4 go up to hilkiah the
high priest that he may sum the silver which is brought into the
hous of the lord which the keeper of the door have gather of the
people: 22:5 and let them deliv it into the hand of the doer of the
work that have the oversight of the hous of the lord: and let them
give it to the doer of the work which is in the hous of the lord to
repair the breach of the hous 22:6 unto carpent and builder
and mason and to buy timber and hewn stone to repair the hous

22:7 howbeit there wa no reckon made with them of the money that
wa deliv into their hand becaus they dealt faith

22:8 and hilkiah the high priest said unto shaphan the scribe i have
found the book of the law in the hous of the lord and hilkiah gave
the book to shaphan and he read it

22:9 and shaphan the scribe came to the king and brought the king
word again and said thi servant have gather the money that wa
found in the hous and have deliv it into the hand of them that
do the work that have the oversight of the hous of the lord

22:10 and shaphan the scribe shew the king say hilkiah the
priest hath deliv me a book and shaphan read it befor the king

22:11 and it came to pass when the king had heard the word of the
book of the law that he rent hi cloth

22:12 and the king command hilkiah the priest and ahikam the son of
shaphan and achbor the son of michaiah and shaphan the scribe and
asahiah a servant of the king say 22:13 go ye enquir of the
lord for me and for the peopl and for all judah concern the
word of thi book that is found: for great is the wrath of the lord
that is kindl against us becaus our father have not hearken
unto the word of thi book to do accord unto all that which is
written concern us

22:14 so hilkiah the priest and ahikam and achbor and shaphan and
asahiah went unto huldah the prophetess the wife of shallum the son
of tikvah the son of harha keeper of the wardrobe; (now she dwelt
in jerusalem in the college;) and they commun with her

22:15 and she said unto them thu saith the lord god of israel tell
the man that sent you to me 22:16 thu saith the lord behold i will
bring evil upon thi place and upon the inhabit thereof even all
the word of the book which the king of judah hath read: 22:17 becaus
they have forsaken me and have burn incens unto other god that
they might provok me to anger with all the work of their hands;
therefor my wrath shall be kindl against thi place and shall not
be quench

22:18 but to the king of judah which sent you to enquir of the lord
thu shall ye say to him thu saith the lord god of israel as
touch the word which thou hast heard; 22:19 becaus thine heart
wa tender and thou hast humbl thyself befor the lord when thou
heardest what i spake against thi place and against the inhabit
thereof that they should becom a desol and a curs and hast
rent thi cloth and wept befor me; i also have heard thee saith
the lord

22:20 behold therefor i will gather thee unto thi father and thou
shalt be gather into thi grave in peace; and thine eye shall not
see all the evil which i will bring upon thi place and they brought
the king word again

23:1 and the king sent and they gather unto him all the elder of
judah and of jerusalem

23:2 and the king went up into the hous of the lord and all the men
of judah and all the inhabit of jerusalem with him and the
priest and the prophet and all the peopl both small and great:
and he read in their ear all the word of the book of the coven
which wa found in the hous of the lord

23:3 and the king stood by a pillar and made a coven befor the
lord to walk after the lord and to keep hi command and hi
testimoni and hi statut with all their heart and all their soul
to perform the word of thi coven that were written in thi book
and all the peopl stood to the coven

23:4 and the king command hilkiah the high priest and the priest
of the second order and the keeper of the door to bring forth out
of the templ of the lord all the vessel that were made for baal and
for the grove and for all the host of heaven: and he burn them
without jerusalem in the field of kidron and carri the ash of
them unto bethel

23:5 and he put down the idolatr priest whom the king of judah
had ordain to burn incens in the high place in the citi of
judah and in the place round about jerusalem; them also that burn
incens unto baal to the sun and to the moon and to the planet
and to all the host of heaven

23:6 and he brought out the grove from the hous of the lord without
jerusalem unto the brook kidron and burn it at the brook kidron
and stamp it small to powder and cast the powder thereof upon the
grave of the children of the peopl

23:7 and he brake down the hous of the sodomit that were by the
hous of the lord where the women wove hang for the grove

23:8 and he brought all the priest out of the citi of judah and
defil the high place where the priest had burn incens from
geba to beersheba and brake down the high place of the gate that
were in the enter in of the gate of joshua the governor of the
citi which were on a man left hand at the gate of the citi

23:9 nevertheless the priest of the high place came not up to the
altar of the lord in jerusalem but they did eat of the unleaven
bread among their brethren

23:10 and he defil topheth which is in the valley of the children
of hinnom that no man might make hi son or hi daughter to pass
through the fire to molech

23:11 and he took away the hors that the king of judah had given to
the sun at the enter in of the hous of the lord by the chamber
of nathanmelech the chamberlain which wa in the suburb and burn
the chariot of the sun with fire

23:12 and the altar that were on the top of the upper chamber of
ahaz which the king of judah had made and the altar which manasseh
had made in the two court of the hous of the lord did the king beat
down and brake them down from thenc and cast the dust of them into
the brook kidron

23:13 and the high place that were befor jerusalem which were on
the right hand of the mount of corrupt which solomon the king of
israel had build for ashtoreth the abomin of the zidonian and
for chemosh the abomin of the moabit and for milcom the
abomin of the children of ammon did the king defil

23:14 and he brake in piec the imag and cut down the grove and
fill their place with the bone of men

23:15 moreov the altar that wa at bethel and the high place which
jeroboam the son of nebat who made israel to sin had made both that
altar and the high place he brake down and burn the high place and
stamp it small to powder and burn the grove

23:16 and as josiah turn himself he spi the sepulchr that were
there in the mount and sent and took the bone out of the
sepulchr and burn them upon the altar and pollut it accord
to the word of the lord which the man of god proclaim who
proclaim these word

23:17 then he said what titl is that that i see? and the men of the
citi told him it is the sepulchr of the man of god which came from
judah and proclaim these thing that thou hast done against the
altar of bethel

23:18 and he said let him alone; let no man move hi bone so they
let hi bone alon with the bone of the prophet that came out of
samaria

23:19 and all the hous also of the high place that were in the
citi of samaria which the king of israel had made to provok the
lord to anger josiah took away and did to them accord to all the
act that he had done in bethel

23:20 and he slew all the priest of the high place that were there
upon the altar and burn men bone upon them and return to
jerusalem

23:21 and the king command all the peopl say keep the passov
unto the lord your god as it is written in the book of thi coven

23:22 sure there wa not holden such a passov from the day of the
judg that judg israel nor in all the day of the king of israel
nor of the king of judah; 23:23 but in the eighteenth year of king
josiah wherein thi passov wa holden to the lord in jerusalem

23:24 moreov the worker with familiar spirit and the wizard and
the imag and the idol and all the abomin that were spi in
the land of judah and in jerusalem did josiah put away that he might
perform the word of the law which were written in the book that
hilkiah the priest found in the hous of the lord

23:25 and like unto him wa there no king befor him that turn to
the lord with all hi heart and with all hi soul and with all hi
might accord to all the law of moses; neither after him aros
there ani like him

23:26 notwithstand the lord turn not from the fierc of hi
great wrath wherewith hi anger wa kindl against judah becaus of
all the provoc that manasseh had provok him withal

23:27 and the lord said i will remov judah also out of my sight as
i have remov israel and will cast off thi citi jerusalem which i
have chosen and the hous of which i said my name shall be there

23:28 now the rest of the act of josiah and all that he did are
they not written in the book of the chronicl of the king of judah?
23:29 in hi day pharaohnechoh king of egypt went up against the king
of assyria to the river euphrates: and king josiah went against him;
and he slew him at megiddo when he had seen him

23:30 and hi servant carri him in a chariot dead from megiddo and
brought him to jerusalem and buri him in hi own sepulchr and the
peopl of the land took jehoahaz the son of josiah and anoint him
and made him king in hi father stead

23:31 jehoahaz wa twenti and three year old when he began to reign;
and he reign three month in jerusalem and hi mother name wa
hamut the daughter of jeremiah of libnah

23:32 and he did that which wa evil in the sight of the lord
accord to all that hi father had done

23:33 and pharaohnechoh put him in band at riblah in the land of
hamath that he might not reign in jerusalem; and put the land to a
tribut of an hundr talent of silver and a talent of gold

23:34 and pharaohnechoh made eliakim the son of josiah king in the
room of josiah hi father and turn hi name to jehoiakim and took
jehoahaz away: and he came to egypt and die there

23:35 and jehoiakim gave the silver and the gold to pharaoh; but he
tax the land to give the money accord to the command of
pharaoh: he exact the silver and the gold of the peopl of the land
of everi one accord to hi taxat to give it unto pharaohnechoh

23:36 jehoiakim wa twenti and five year old when he began to reign;
and he reign eleven year in jerusalem and hi mother name wa
zebudah the daughter of pedaiah of rumah

23:37 and he did that which wa evil in the sight of the lord
accord to all that hi father had done

24:1 in hi day nebuchadnezzar king of babylon came up and jehoiakim
becam hi servant three years: then he turn and rebel against
him

24:2 and the lord sent against him band of the chalde and band of
the syrian and band of the moabit and band of the children of
ammon and sent them against judah to destroy it accord to the
word of the lord which he spake by hi servant the prophet

24:3 sure at the command of the lord came thi upon judah to
remov them out of hi sight for the sin of manasseh accord to
all that he did; 24:4 and also for the innoc blood that he shed:
for he fill jerusalem with innoc blood; which the lord would not
pardon

24:5 now the rest of the act of jehoiakim and all that he did are
they not written in the book of the chronicl of the king of judah?
24:6 so jehoiakim slept with hi fathers: and jehoiachin hi son
reign in hi stead

24:7 and the king of egypt came not again ani more out of hi land:
for the king of babylon had taken from the river of egypt unto the
river euphrat all that pertain to the king of egypt

24:8 jehoiachin wa eighteen year old when he began to reign and he
reign in jerusalem three month and hi mother name wa nehushta
the daughter of elnathan of jerusalem

24:9 and he did that which wa evil in the sight of the lord
accord to all that hi father had done

24:10 at that time the servant of nebuchadnezzar king of babylon came
up against jerusalem and the citi wa besieg

24:11 and nebuchadnezzar king of babylon came against the citi and
hi servant did besieg it

24:12 and jehoiachin the king of judah went out to the king of
babylon he and hi mother and hi servant and hi princ and
hi officers: and the king of babylon took him in the eighth year of
hi reign

24:13 and he carri out thenc all the treasur of the hous of the
lord and the treasur of the king hous and cut in piec all the
vessel of gold which solomon king of israel had made in the templ of
the lord as the lord had said

24:14 and he carri away all jerusalem and all the princ and all
the mighti men of valour even ten thousand captiv and all the
craftsmen and smiths: none remain save the poorest sort of the
peopl of the land

24:15 and he carri away jehoiachin to babylon and the king
mother and the king wive and hi offic and the mighti of the
land those carri he into captiv from jerusalem to babylon

24:16 and all the men of might even seven thousand and craftsmen and
smith a thousand all that were strong and apt for war even them the
king of babylon brought captiv to babylon

24:17 and the king of babylon made mattaniah hi father brother king
in hi stead and chang hi name to zedekiah

24:18 zedekiah wa twenti and one year old when he began to reign
and he reign eleven year in jerusalem and hi mother name wa
hamut the daughter of jeremiah of libnah

24:19 and he did that which wa evil in the sight of the lord
accord to all that jehoiakim had done

24:20 for through the anger of the lord it came to pass in jerusalem
and judah until he had cast them out from hi presenc that zedekiah
rebel against the king of babylon

25:1 and it came to pass in the ninth year of hi reign in the tenth
month in the tenth day of the month that nebuchadnezzar king of
babylon came he and all hi host against jerusalem and pitch
against it; and they built fort against it round about

25:2 and the citi wa besieg unto the eleventh year of king
zedekiah

25:3 and on the ninth day of the fourth month the famin prevail in
the citi and there wa no bread for the peopl of the land

25:4 and the citi wa broken up and all the men of war fled by night
by the way of the gate between two wall which is by the king
garden: (now the chalde were against the citi round about:) and the
king went the way toward the plain

25:5 and the armi of the chalde pursu after the king and overtook
him in the plain of jericho: and all hi armi were scatter from
him

25:6 so they took the king and brought him up to the king of babylon
to riblah; and they gave judgment upon him

25:7 and they slew the son of zedekiah befor hi eye and put out
the eye of zedekiah and bound him with fetter of brass and carri
him to babylon

25:8 and in the fifth month on the seventh day of the month which is
the nineteenth year of king nebuchadnezzar king of babylon came
nebuzaradan captain of the guard a servant of the king of babylon
unto jerusalem: 25:9 and he burnt the hous of the lord and the
king hous and all the hous of jerusalem and everi great man
hous burnt he with fire

25:10 and all the armi of the chalde that were with the captain of
the guard brake down the wall of jerusalem round about

25:11 now the rest of the peopl that were left in the citi and the
fugit that fell away to the king of babylon with the remnant of
the multitud did nebuzaradan the captain of the guard carri away

25:12 but the captain of the guard left of the door of the poor of the
land to be vinedress and husbandmen

25:13 and the pillar of brass that were in the hous of the lord and
the base and the brasen sea that wa in the hous of the lord did
the chalde break in piec and carri the brass of them to
babylon

25:14 and the pot and the shovel and the snuffer and the spoon
and all the vessel of brass wherewith they minist took they
away

25:15 and the firepan and the bowl and such thing as were of
gold in gold and of silver in silver the captain of the guard took
away

25:16 the two pillar one sea and the base which solomon had made
for the hous of the lord; the brass of all these vessel wa without
weight

25:17 the height of the one pillar wa eighteen cubit and the
chapit upon it wa brass: and the height of the chapit three
cubits; and the wreathen work and pomegran upon the chapit
round about all of brass: and like unto these had the second pillar
with wreathen work

25:18 and the captain of the guard took seraiah the chief priest and
zephaniah the second priest and the three keeper of the door: 25:19
and out of the citi he took an offic that wa set over the men of
war and five men of them that were in the king presenc which were
found in the citi and the princip scribe of the host which
muster the peopl of the land and threescor men of the peopl of
the land that were found in the city: 25:20 and nebuzaradan captain of
the guard took these and brought them to the king of babylon to
riblah: 25:21 and the king of babylon smote them and slew them at
riblah in the land of hamath so judah wa carri away out of their
land

25:22 and as for the peopl that remain in the land of judah whom
nebuchadnezzar king of babylon had left even over them he made
gedaliah the son of ahikam the son of shaphan ruler

25:23 and when all the captain of the armi they and their men
heard that the king of babylon had made gedaliah governor there came
to gedaliah to mizpah even ishmael the son of nethaniah and johanan
the son of careah and seraiah the son of tanhumeth the netophathit
and jaazaniah the son of a maachathit they and their men

25:24 and gedaliah sware to them and to their men and said unto
them fear not to be the servant of the chaldees: dwell in the land
and serv the king of babylon; and it shall be well with you

25:25 but it came to pass in the seventh month that ishmael the son
of nethaniah the son of elishama of the seed royal came and ten
men with him and smote gedaliah that he die and the jew and the
chalde that were with him at mizpah

25:26 and all the peopl both small and great and the captain of
the armi aros and came to egypt: for they were afraid of the
chalde

25:27 and it came to pass in the seven and thirtieth year of the
captiv of jehoiachin king of judah in the twelfth month on the
seven and twentieth day of the month that evilmerodach king of
babylon in the year that he began to reign did lift up the head of
jehoiachin king of judah out of prison; 25:28 and he spake kindli to
him and set hi throne abov the throne of the king that were with
him in babylon; 25:29 and chang hi prison garments: and he did eat
bread continu befor him all the day of hi life

25:30 and hi allow wa a continu allow given him of the
king a daili rate for everi day all the day of hi life




the first book of the chronicl


1:1 adam sheth enosh 1:2 kenan mahalaleel jere 1:3 henoch
methuselah lamech 1:4 noah shem ham and japheth

1:5 the son of japheth; gomer and magog and madai and javan and
tubal and meshech and tira

1:6 and the son of gomer; ashchenaz and riphath and togarmah

1:7 and the son of javan; elishah and tarshish kittim and dodanim

1:8 the son of ham; cush and mizraim put and canaan

1:9 and the son of cush; seba and havilah and sabta and raamah
and sabtecha and the son of raamah; sheba and dedan

1:10 and cush begat nimrod: he began to be mighti upon the earth

1:11 and mizraim begat ludim and anamim and lehabim and naphtuhim
1:12 and pathrusim and casluhim (of whom came the philistines) and
caphthorim

1:13 and canaan begat zidon hi firstborn and heth 1:14 the jebusit
also and the amorit and the girgashit 1:15 and the hivit and
the arkit and the sinit 1:16 and the arvadit and the zemarit
and the hamathit

1:17 the son of shem; elam and asshur and arphaxad and lud and
aram and uz and hul and gether and meshech

1:18 and arphaxad begat shelah and shelah begat eber

1:19 and unto eber were born two sons: the name of the one wa peleg;
becaus in hi day the earth wa divided: and hi brother name wa
joktan

1:20 and joktan begat almodad and sheleph and hazarmaveth and
jerah 1:21 hadoram also and uzal and diklah 1:22 and ebal and
abimael and sheba 1:23 and ophir and havilah and jobab all these
were the son of joktan

1:24 shem arphaxad shelah 1:25 eber peleg reu 1:26 serug nahor
terah 1:27 abram; the same is abraham

1:28 the son of abraham; isaac and ishmael

1:29 these are their generations: the firstborn of ishmael nebaioth;
then kedar and adbeel and mibsam 1:30 mishma and dumah massa
hadad and tema 1:31 jetur naphish and kedemah these are the son
of ishmael

1:32 now the son of keturah abraham concubine: she bare zimran
and jokshan and medan and midian and ishbak and shuah and the
son of jokshan; sheba and dedan

1:33 and the son of midian; ephah and epher and henoch and abida
and eldaah all these are the son of keturah

1:34 and abraham begat isaac the son of isaac; esau and israel

1:35 the son of esau; eliphaz reuel and jeush and jaalam and
korah

1:36 the son of eliphaz; teman and omar zephi and gatam kenaz
and timna and amalek

1:37 the son of reuel; nahath zerah shammah and mizzah

1:38 and the son of seir; lotan and shobal and zibeon and anah
and dishon and ezar and dishan

1:39 and the son of lotan; hori and homam: and timna wa lotan
sister

1:40 the son of shobal; alian and manahath and ebal shephi and
onam

and the son of zibeon; aiah and anah

1:41 the son of anah; dishon and the son of dishon; amram and
eshban and ithran and cheran

1:42 the son of ezer; bilhan and zavan and jakan the son of
dishan; uz and aran

1:43 now these are the king that reign in the land of edom befor
ani king reign over the children of israel; bela the son of beor:
and the name of hi citi wa dinhabah

1:44 and when bela wa dead jobab the son of zerah of bozrah reign
in hi stead

1:45 and when jobab wa dead husham of the land of the temanit
reign in hi stead

1:46 and when husham wa dead hadad the son of bedad which smote
midian in the field of moab reign in hi stead: and the name of hi
citi wa avith

1:47 and when hadad wa dead samlah of masrekah reign in hi stead

1:48 and when samlah wa dead shaul of rehoboth by the river reign
in hi stead

1:49 and when shaul wa dead baalhanan the son of achbor reign in
hi stead

1:50 and when baalhanan wa dead hadad reign in hi stead: and the
name of hi citi wa pai; and hi wife name wa mehetabel the
daughter of matr the daughter of mezahab

1:51 hadad die also and the duke of edom were; duke timnah duke
aliah duke jetheth 1:52 duke aholibamah duke elah duke pinon 1:53
duke kenaz duke teman duke mibzar 1:54 duke magdiel duke iram
these are the duke of edom

2:1 these are the son of israel; reuben simeon levi and judah
issachar and zebulun 2:2 dan joseph and benjamin naphtali gad
and asher

2:3 the son of judah; er and onan and shelah: which three were born
unto him of the daughter of shua the canaanitess and er the
firstborn of judah wa evil in the sight of the lord; and he slew
him

2:4 and tamar hi daughter in law bore him pharez and zerah all the
son of judah were five

2:5 the son of pharez; hezron and hamul

2:6 and the son of zerah; zimri and ethan and heman and calcol
and dara: five of them in all

2:7 and the son of carmi; achar the troubler of israel who
transgress in the thing accurs

2:8 and the son of ethan; azariah

2:9 the son also of hezron that were born unto him; jerahmeel and
ram and chelubai

2:10 and ram begat amminadab; and amminadab begat nahshon princ of
the children of judah; 2:11 and nahshon begat salma and salma begat
boaz 2:12 and boaz begat obe and obe begat jess 2:13 and jess
begat hi firstborn eliab and abinadab the second and shimma the
third 2:14 nethaneel the fourth raddai the fifth 2:15 ozem the
sixth david the seventh: 2:16 whose sister were zeruiah and
abigail and the son of zeruiah; abishai and joab and asahel
three

2:17 and abigail bare amasa: and the father of amasa wa jether the
ishmeelit

2:18 and caleb the son of hezron begat children of azubah hi wife
and of jerioth: her son are these; jesher and shobab and ardon

2:19 and when azubah wa dead caleb took unto him ephrath which bare
him hur

2:20 and hur begat uri and uri begat bezaleel

2:21 and afterward hezron went in to the daughter of machir the father
of gilead whom he marri when he wa threescor year old; and she
bare him segub

2:22 and segub begat jair who had three and twenti citi in the land
of gilead

2:23 and he took geshur and aram with the town of jair from them
with kenath and the town thereof even threescor citi all these
belong to the son of machir the father of gilead

2:24 and after that hezron wa dead in calebephratah then abiah
hezron wife bare him ashur the father of tekoa

2:25 and the son of jerahmeel the firstborn of hezron were ram the
firstborn and bunah and oren and ozem and ahijah

2:26 jerahmeel had also anoth wife whose name wa atarah; she wa
the mother of onam

2:27 and the son of ram the firstborn of jerahmeel were maaz and
jamin and eker

2:28 and the son of onam were shammai and jada and the son of
shammai; nadab and abishur

2:29 and the name of the wife of abishur wa abihail and she bare him
ahban and molid

2:30 and the son of nadab; sele and appaim: but sele die without
children

2:31 and the son of appaim; ishi and the son of ishi; sheshan and
the children of sheshan; ahlai

2:32 and the son of jada the brother of shammai; jether and
jonathan: and jether die without children

2:33 and the son of jonathan; peleth and zaza these were the son
of jerahmeel

2:34 now sheshan had no son but daughter and sheshan had a
servant an egyptian whose name wa jarha

2:35 and sheshan gave hi daughter to jarha hi servant to wife; and
she bare him attai

2:36 and attai begat nathan and nathan begat zabad 2:37 and zabad
begat ephlal and ephlal begat obe 2:38 and obe begat jehu and
jehu begat azariah 2:39 and azariah begat helez and helez begat
eleasah 2:40 and eleasah begat sisamai and sisamai begat shallum
2:41 and shallum begat jekamiah and jekamiah begat elishama

2:42 now the son of caleb the brother of jerahmeel were mesha hi
firstborn which wa the father of ziph; and the son of mareshah the
father of hebron

2:43 and the son of hebron; korah and tappuah and rekem and shema

2:44 and shema begat raham the father of jorkoam: and rekem begat
shammai

2:45 and the son of shammai wa maon: and maon wa the father of
bethzur

2:46 and ephah caleb concubin bare haran and moza and gazez:
and haran begat gazez

2:47 and the son of jahdai; regem and jotham and gesham and pelet
and ephah and shaaph

2:48 maachah caleb concubin bare sheber and tirhanah

2:49 she bare also shaaph the father of madmannah sheva the father of
machbenah and the father of gibea: and the daughter of caleb wa
achsa

2:50 these were the son of caleb the son of hur the firstborn of
ephratah; shobal the father of kirjathjearim

2:51 salma the father of bethlehem hareph the father of bethgad

2:52 and shobal the father of kirjathjearim had sons; haroeh and half
of the manahethit

2:53 and the famili of kirjathjearim; the ithrit and the puhit
and the shumathit and the mishraites; of them came the zareathit
and the eshtaulit 2:54 the son of salma; bethlehem and the
netophathit ataroth the hous of joab and half of the
manahethit the zorit

2:55 and the famili of the scribe which dwelt at jabez; the
tirathit the shimeathit and suchathit these are the kenit
that came of hemath the father of the hous of rechab

3:1 now these were the son of david which were born unto him in
hebron; the firstborn amnon of ahinoam the jezreelitess; the second
daniel of abigail the carmelitess: 3:2 the third absalom the son of
maachah the daughter of talmai king of geshur: the fourth adonijah
the son of haggith: 3:3 the fifth shephatiah of abital: the sixth
ithream by eglah hi wife

3:4 these six were born unto him in hebron; and there he reign seven
year and six months: and in jerusalem he reign thirti and three
year

3:5 and these were born unto him in jerusalem; shimea and shobab and
nathan and solomon four of bathshua the daughter of ammiel: 3:6
ibhar also and elishama and eliphelet 3:7 and nogah and nepheg
and japhia 3:8 and elishama and eliada and eliphelet nine

3:9 these were all the son of david besid the son of the
concubin and tamar their sister

3:10 and solomon son wa rehoboam abia hi son asa hi son
jehoshaphat hi son 3:11 joram hi son ahaziah hi son joash hi
son 3:12 amaziah hi son azariah hi son jotham hi son 3:13 ahaz
hi son hezekiah hi son manasseh hi son 3:14 amon hi son josiah
hi son

3:15 and the son of josiah were the firstborn johanan the second
jehoiakim the third zedekiah the fourth shallum

3:16 and the son of jehoiakim: jeconiah hi son zedekiah hi son

3:17 and the son of jeconiah; assir salathiel hi son 3:18
malchiram also and pedaiah and shenazar jecamiah hoshama and
nedabiah

3:19 and the son of pedaiah were zerubbabel and shimei: and the
son of zerubbabel; meshullam and hananiah and shelomith their
sister: 3:20 and hashubah and ohel and berechiah and hasadiah
jushabhes five

3:21 and the son of hananiah; pelatiah and jesaiah: the son of
rephaiah the son of arnan the son of obadiah the son of
shechaniah

3:22 and the son of shechaniah; shemaiah: and the son of shemaiah;
hattush and igeal and bariah and neariah and shaphat six

3:23 and the son of neariah; elioenai and hezekiah and azrikam
three

3:24 and the son of elioenai were hodaiah and eliashib and
pelaiah and akkub and johanan and dalaiah and anani seven

4:1 the son of judah; pharez hezron and carmi and hur and shobal

4:2 and reaiah the son of shobal begat jahath; and jahath begat
ahumai and lahad these are the famili of the zorathit

4:3 and these were of the father of etam; jezreel and ishma and
idbash: and the name of their sister wa hazelelponi: 4:4 and penuel
the father of gedor and ezer the father of hushah these are the son
of hur the firstborn of ephratah the father of bethlehem

4:5 and ashur the father of tekoa had two wive helah and naarah

4:6 and naarah bare him ahuzam and hepher and temeni and
haahashtari

these were the son of naarah

4:7 and the son of helah were zereth and jezoar and ethnan

4:8 and coz begat anub and zobebah and the famili of aharhel the
son of harum

4:9 and jabez wa more honour than hi brethren: and hi mother
call hi name jabez say becaus i bare him with sorrow

4:10 and jabez call on the god of israel say oh that thou
wouldest bless me inde and enlarg my coast and that thine hand
might be with me and that thou wouldest keep me from evil that it
may not griev me! and god grant him that which he request

4:11 and chelub the brother of shuah begat mehir which wa the father
of eshton

4:12 and eshton begat bethrapha and paseah and tehinnah the father
of irnahash these are the men of rechah

4:13 and the son of kenaz; othniel and seraiah: and the son of
othniel; hathath

4:14 and meonothai begat ophrah: and seraiah begat joab the father of
the valley of charashim; for they were craftsmen

4:15 and the son of caleb the son of jephunneh; iru elah and naam:
and the son of elah even kenaz

4:16 and the son of jehaleleel; ziph and ziphah tiria and asareel

4:17 and the son of ezra were jether and mere and epher and
jalon: and she bare miriam and shammai and ishbah the father of
eshtemoa

4:18 and hi wife jehudijah bare jere the father of gedor and heber
the father of socho and jekuthiel the father of zanoah and these are
the son of bithiah the daughter of pharaoh which mere took

4:19 and the son of hi wife hodiah the sister of naham the father
of keilah the garmit and eshtemoa the maachathit

4:20 and the son of shimon were amnon and rinnah benhanan and
tilon

and the son of ishi were zoheth and benzoheth

4:21 the son of shelah the son of judah were er the father of lecah
and laadah the father of mareshah and the famili of the hous of
them that wrought fine linen of the hous of ashbea 4:22 and jokim
and the men of chozeba and joash and saraph who had the dominion in
moab and jashubilehem and these are ancient thing

4:23 these were the potter and those that dwelt among plant and
hedges: there they dwelt with the king for hi work

4:24 the son of simeon were nemuel and jamin jarib zerah and
shaul: 4:25 shallum hi son mibsam hi son mishma hi son

4:26 and the son of mishma; hamuel hi son zacchur hi son shimei
hi son

4:27 and shimei had sixteen son and six daughters: but hi brethren
had not mani children neither did all their famili multipli like to
the children of judah

4:28 and they dwelt at beersheba and moladah and hazarshu 4:29
and at bilhah and at ezem and at tolad 4:30 and at bethuel and at
hormah and at ziklag 4:31 and at bethmarcaboth and hazarsusim and
at bethbirei and at shaaraim these were their citi unto the reign
of david

4:32 and their villag were etam and ain rimmon and tochen and
ashan five cities: 4:33 and all their villag that were round about
the same citi unto baal these were their habit and their
genealog

4:34 and meshobab and jamlech and joshah the son of amaziah 4:35
and joel and jehu the son of josibiah the son of seraiah the son of
asiel 4:36 and elioenai and jaakobah and jeshohaiah and asaiah
and adiel and jesimiel and benaiah 4:37 and ziza the son of shiphi
the son of allon the son of jedaiah the son of shimri the son of
shemaiah; 4:38 these mention by their name were princ in their
families: and the hous of their father increas greatli

4:39 and they went to the entranc of gedor even unto the east side
of the valley to seek pastur for their flock

4:40 and they found fat pastur and good and the land wa wide and
quiet and peaceable; for they of ham had dwelt there of old

4:41 and these written by name came in the day of hezekiah king of
judah and smote their tent and the habit that were found
there and destroy them utterli unto thi day and dwelt in their
rooms: becaus there wa pastur there for their flock

4:42 and some of them even of the son of simeon five hundr men
went to mount seir have for their captain pelatiah and neariah
and rephaiah and uzziel the son of ishi

4:43 and they smote the rest of the amalekit that were escap and
dwelt there unto thi day

5:1 now the son of reuben the firstborn of israel (for he wa the
firstborn; but forasmuch as he defil hi father bed hi
birthright wa given unto the son of joseph the son of israel: and
the genealog is not to be reckon after the birthright

5:2 for judah prevail abov hi brethren and of him came the chief
ruler; but the birthright wa josephs:) 5:3 the son i say of
reuben the firstborn of israel were hanoch and pallu hezron and
carmi

5:4 the son of joel; shemaiah hi son gog hi son shimei hi son
5:5 micah hi son reaia hi son baal hi son 5:6 beerah hi son
whom tilgathpilnes king of assyria carri away captive: he wa
princ of the reubenit

5:7 and hi brethren by their famili when the genealog of their
gener wa reckon were the chief jeiel and zechariah 5:8
and bela the son of azaz the son of shema the son of joel who dwelt
in aroer even unto nebo and baalmeon: 5:9 and eastward he inhabit
unto the enter in of the wilder from the river euphrates:
becaus their cattl were multipli in the land of gilead

5:10 and in the day of saul they made war with the hagarit who
fell by their hand: and they dwelt in their tent throughout all the
east land of gilead

5:11 and the children of gad dwelt over against them in the land of
bashan unto salcah: 5:12 joel the chief and shapham the next and
jaanai and shaphat in bashan

5:13 and their brethren of the hous of their father were michael
and meshullam and sheba and jorai and jachan and zia and heber
seven

5:14 these are the children of abihail the son of huri the son of
jaroah the son of gilead the son of michael the son of jeshishai
the son of jahdo the son of buz; 5:15 ahi the son of abdiel the son
of guni chief of the hous of their father

5:16 and they dwelt in gilead in bashan and in her town and in all
the suburb of sharon upon their border

5:17 all these were reckon by genealog in the day of jotham king
of judah and in the day of jeroboam king of israel

5:18 the son of reuben and the gadit and half the tribe of
manasseh of valiant men men abl to bear buckler and sword and to
shoot with bow and skil in war were four and forti thousand seven
hundr and threescor that went out to the war

5:19 and they made war with the hagarit with jetur and nephish
and nodab

5:20 and they were help against them and the hagarit were
deliv into their hand and all that were with them: for they cri
to god in the battl and he wa intreat of them; becaus they put
their trust in him

5:21 and they took away their cattle; of their camel fifti thousand
and of sheep two hundr and fifti thousand and of ass two
thousand and of men an hundr thousand

5:22 for there fell down mani slain becaus the war wa of god and
they dwelt in their stead until the captiv

5:23 and the children of the half tribe of manasseh dwelt in the land:
they increas from bashan unto baalhermon and senir and unto mount
hermon

5:24 and these were the head of the hous of their father even
epher and ishi and eliel and azriel and jeremiah and hodaviah
and jahdiel mighti men of valour famou men and head of the hous
of their father

5:25 and they transgress against the god of their father and went
a whore after the god of the peopl of the land whom god destroy
befor them

5:26 and the god of israel stir up the spirit of pul king of
assyria and the spirit of tilgathpilnes king of assyria and he
carri them away even the reubenit and the gadit and the half
tribe of manasseh and brought them unto halah and habor and hara
and to the river gozan unto thi day

6:1 the son of levi; gershon kohath and merari

6:2 and the son of kohath; amram izhar and hebron and uzziel

6:3 and the children of amram; aaron and mose and miriam the son
also of aaron; nadab and abihu eleazar and ithamar

6:4 eleazar begat phineha phineha begat abishua 6:5 and abishua
begat bukki and bukki begat uzzi 6:6 and uzzi begat zerahiah and
zerahiah begat meraioth 6:7 meraioth begat amariah and amariah begat
ahitub 6:8 and ahitub begat zadok and zadok begat ahimaaz 6:9 and
ahimaaz begat azariah and azariah begat johanan 6:10 and johanan
begat azariah (he it is that execut the priest offic in the
templ that solomon built in jerusalem:) 6:11 and azariah begat
amariah and amariah begat ahitub 6:12 and ahitub begat zadok and
zadok begat shallum 6:13 and shallum begat hilkiah and hilkiah begat
azariah 6:14 and azariah begat seraiah and seraiah begat jehozadak
6:15 and jehozadak went into captiv when the lord carri away
judah and jerusalem by the hand of nebuchadnezzar

6:16 the son of levi; gershom kohath and merari

6:17 and these be the name of the son of gershom; libni and shimei

6:18 and the son of kohath were amram and izhar and hebron and
uzziel

6:19 the son of merari; mahli and mushi and these are the famili
of the levit accord to their father

6:20 of gershom; libni hi son jahath hi son zimmah hi son 6:21
joah hi son iddo hi son zerah hi son jeaterai hi son

6:22 the son of kohath; amminadab hi son korah hi son assir hi
son 6:23 elkanah hi son and ebiasaph hi son and assir hi son
6:24 tahath hi son uriel hi son uzziah hi son and shaul hi son

6:25 and the son of elkanah; amasai and ahimoth

6:26 as for elkanah: the son of elkanah; zophai hi son and nahath
hi son 6:27 eliab hi son jeroham hi son elkanah hi son

6:28 and the son of samuel; the firstborn vashni and abiah

6:29 the son of merari; mahli libni hi son shimei hi son uzza
hi son 6:30 shimea hi son haggiah hi son asaiah hi son

6:31 and these are they whom david set over the servic of song in the
hous of the lord after that the ark had rest

6:32 and they minist befor the dwell place of the tabernacl
of the congreg with sing until solomon had built the hous of
the lord in jerusalem: and then they wait on their offic accord
to their order

6:33 and these are they that wait with their children of the son
of the kohathites: heman a singer the son of joel the son of
shemuel 6:34 the son of elkanah the son of jeroham the son of
eliel the son of toah 6:35 the son of zuph the son of elkanah the
son of mahath the son of amasai 6:36 the son of elkanah the son of
joel the son of azariah the son of zephaniah 6:37 the son of
tahath the son of assir the son of ebiasaph the son of korah 6:38
the son of izhar the son of kohath the son of levi the son of
israel

6:39 and hi brother asaph who stood on hi right hand even asaph
the son of berachiah the son of shimea 6:40 the son of michael the
son of baaseiah the son of malchiah 6:41 the son of ethni the son
of zerah the son of adaiah 6:42 the son of ethan the son of zimmah
the son of shimei 6:43 the son of jahath the son of gershom the son
of levi

6:44 and their brethren the son of merari stood on the left hand:
ethan the son of kishi the son of abdi the son of malluch 6:45 the
son of hashabiah the son of amaziah the son of hilkiah 6:46 the son
of amzi the son of bani the son of shamer 6:47 the son of mahli
the son of mushi the son of merari the son of levi

6:48 their brethren also the levit were appoint unto all manner of
servic of the tabernacl of the hous of god

6:49 but aaron and hi son offer upon the altar of the burnt
offer and on the altar of incens and were appoint for all the
work of the place most holi and to make an aton for israel
accord to all that mose the servant of god had command

6:50 and these are the son of aaron; eleazar hi son phineha hi
son abishua hi son 6:51 bukki hi son uzzi hi son zerahiah hi
son 6:52 meraioth hi son amariah hi son ahitub hi son 6:53
zadok hi son ahimaaz hi son

6:54 now these are their dwell place throughout their castl in
their coast of the son of aaron of the famili of the kohathites:
for their wa the lot

6:55 and they gave them hebron in the land of judah and the suburb
thereof round about it

6:56 but the field of the citi and the villag thereof they gave
to caleb the son of jephunneh

6:57 and to the son of aaron they gave the citi of judah name
hebron the citi of refug and libnah with her suburb and jattir
and eshtemoa with their suburb 6:58 and hilen with her suburb
debir with her suburb 6:59 and ashan with her suburb and
bethshemesh with her suburbs: 6:60 and out of the tribe of benjamin;
geba with her suburb and alemeth with her suburb and anathoth with
her suburb all their citi throughout their famili were thirteen
citi

6:61 and unto the son of kohath which were left of the famili of
that tribe were citi given out of the half tribe name out of
the half tribe of manasseh by lot ten citi

6:62 and to the son of gershom throughout their famili out of the
tribe of issachar and out of the tribe of asher and out of the tribe
of naphtali and out of the tribe of manasseh in bashan thirteen
citi

6:63 unto the son of merari were given by lot throughout their
famili out of the tribe of reuben and out of the tribe of gad and
out of the tribe of zebulun twelv citi

6:64 and the children of israel gave to the levit these citi with
their suburb

6:65 and they gave by lot out of the tribe of the children of judah
and out of the tribe of the children of simeon and out of the tribe
of the children of benjamin these citi which are call by their
name

6:66 and the residu of the famili of the son of kohath had citi
of their coast out of the tribe of ephraim

6:67 and they gave unto them of the citi of refug shechem in
mount ephraim with her suburbs; they gave also gezer with her suburb
6:68 and jokmeam with her suburb and bethhoron with her suburb
6:69 and aijalon with her suburb and gathrimmon with her suburbs:
6:70 and out of the half tribe of manasseh; aner with her suburb and
bileam with her suburb for the famili of the remnant of the son of
kohath

6:71 unto the son of gershom were given out of the famili of the half
tribe of manasseh golan in bashan with her suburb and ashtaroth
with her suburbs: 6:72 and out of the tribe of issachar; kedesh with
her suburb daberath with her suburb 6:73 and ramoth with her
suburb and anem with her suburbs: 6:74 and out of the tribe of
asher; mashal with her suburb and abdon with her suburb 6:75 and
hukok with her suburb and rehob with her suburbs: 6:76 and out of
the tribe of naphtali; kedesh in galile with her suburb and hammon
with her suburb and kirjathaim with her suburb

6:77 unto the rest of the children of merari were given out of the
tribe of zebulun rimmon with her suburb tabor with her suburbs:
6:78 and on the other side jordan by jericho on the east side of
jordan were given them out of the tribe of reuben bezer in the
wilder with her suburb and jahzah with her suburb 6:79
kedemoth also with her suburb and mephaath with her suburbs: 6:80
and out of the tribe of gad; ramoth in gilead with her suburb and
mahanaim with her suburb 6:81 and heshbon with her suburb and
jazer with her suburb

7:1 now the son of issachar were tola and puah jashub and
shimrom four

7:2 and the son of tola; uzzi and rephaiah and jeriel and jahmai
and jibsam and shemuel head of their father hous to wit of
tola: they were valiant men of might in their generations; whose
number wa in the day of david two and twenti thousand and six
hundr

7:3 and the son of uzzi; izrahiah: and the son of izrahiah; michael
and obadiah and joel ishiah five: all of them chief men

7:4 and with them by their gener after the hous of their
father were band of soldier for war six and thirti thousand men:
for they had mani wive and son

7:5 and their brethren among all the famili of issachar were valiant
men of might reckon in all by their genealog fourscor and seven
thousand

7:6 the son of benjamin; bela and becher and jediael three

7:7 and the son of bela; ezbon and uzzi and uzziel and jerimoth
and iri five; head of the hous of their father mighti men of
valour; and were reckon by their genealog twenti and two thousand
and thirti and four

7:8 and the son of becher; zemira and joash and eliez and
elioenai and omri and jerimoth and abiah and anathoth and
alameth all these are the son of becher

7:9 and the number of them after their genealog by their
gener head of the hous of their father mighti men of
valour wa twenti thousand and two hundr

7:10 the son also of jediael; bilhan: and the son of bilhan; jeush
and benjamin and ehud and chenaanah and zethan and tharshish and
ahishahar

7:11 all these the son of jediael by the head of their father
mighti men of valour were seventeen thousand and two hundr
soldier fit to go out for war and battl

7:12 shuppim also and huppim the children of ir and hushim the
son of aher

7:13 the son of naphtali; jahziel and guni and jezer and shallum
the son of bilhah

7:14 the son of manasseh; ashriel whom she bare: (but hi concubin
the aramitess bare machir the father of gilead: 7:15 and machir took
to wife the sister of huppim and shuppim whose sister name wa
maachah;) and the name of the second wa zelophehad: and zelophehad
had daughter

7:16 and maachah the wife of machir bare a son and she call hi
name peresh; and the name of hi brother wa sheresh; and hi son
were ulam and rakem

7:17 and the son of ulam; bedan these were the son of gilead the
son of machir the son of manasseh

7:18 and hi sister hammoleketh bare ishod and abiez and mahalah

7:19 and the son of shemidah were ahian and shechem and likhi and
aniam

7:20 and the son of ephraim; shuthelah and bere hi son and tahath
hi son and eladah hi son and tahath hi son 7:21 and zabad hi
son and shuthelah hi son and ezer and elead whom the men of gath
that were born in that land slew becaus they came down to take away
their cattl

7:22 and ephraim their father mourn mani day and hi brethren came
to comfort him

7:23 and when he went in to hi wife she conceiv and bare a son
and he call hi name beriah becaus it went evil with hi hous

7:24 (and hi daughter wa sherah who built bethhoron the nether and
the upper and uzzensherah) 7:25 and rephah wa hi son also
resheph and telah hi son and tahan hi son

7:26 laadan hi son ammihud hi son elishama hi son

7:27 non hi son jehoshuah hi son

7:28 and their possess and habit were bethel and the town
thereof and eastward naaran and westward gezer with the town
thereof; shechem also and the town thereof unto gaza and the town
thereof: 7:29 and by the border of the children of manasseh
bethshean and her town taanach and her town megiddo and her town
dor and her town in these dwelt the children of joseph the son of
israel

7:30 the son of asher; imnah and isuah and ishuai and beriah and
serah their sister

7:31 and the son of beriah; heber and malchiel who is the father of
birzavith

7:32 and heber begat japhlet and shomer and hotham and shua their
sister

7:33 and the son of japhlet; pasach and bimhal and ashvath these
are the children of japhlet

7:34 and the son of shamer; ahi and rohgah jehubbah and aram

7:35 and the son of hi brother helem; zophah and imna and shelesh
and amal

7:36 the son of zophah; suah and harneph and shual and beri and
imrah 7:37 bezer and hod and shamma and shilshah and ithran and
beera

7:38 and the son of jether; jephunneh and pispah and ara

7:39 and the son of ulla; arah and haniel and rezia

7:40 all these were the children of asher head of their father
hous choic and mighti men of valour chief of the princ and the
number throughout the genealog of them that were apt to the war and
to battl wa twenti and six thousand men

8:1 now benjamin begat bela hi firstborn ashbel the second and
aharah the third 8:2 nohah the fourth and rapha the fifth

8:3 and the son of bela were addar and gera and abihud 8:4 and
abishua and naaman and ahoah 8:5 and gera and shephuphan and
huram

8:6 and these are the son of ehud: these are the head of the father
of the inhabit of geba and they remov them to manahath: 8:7 and
naaman and ahiah and gera he remov them and begat uzza and
ahihud

8:8 and shaharaim begat children in the countri of moab after he had
sent them away; hushim and baara were hi wive

8:9 and he begat of hodesh hi wife jobab and zibia and mesha and
malcham 8:10 and jeuz and shachia and mirma these were hi son
head of the father

8:11 and of hushim he begat abitub and elpaal

8:12 the son of elpaal; eber and misham and shame who built ono
and lod with the town thereof: 8:13 beriah also and shema who were
head of the father of the inhabit of aijalon who drove away the
inhabit of gath: 8:14 and ahio shashak and jeremoth 8:15 and
zebadiah and arad and ader 8:16 and michael and ispah and joha
the son of beriah; 8:17 and zebadiah and meshullam and hezeki and
heber 8:18 ishmerai also and jezliah and jobab the son of elpaal;
8:19 and jakim and zichri and zabdi 8:20 and elienai and zilthai
and eliel 8:21 and adaiah and beraiah and shimrath the son of
shimhi; 8:22 and ishpan and heber and eliel 8:23 and abdon and
zichri and hanan 8:24 and hananiah and elam and antothijah 8:25
and iphedeiah and penuel the son of shashak; 8:26 and shamsherai
and shehariah and athaliah 8:27 and jaresiah and eliah and zichri
the son of jeroham

8:28 these were head of the father by their gener chief men

these dwelt in jerusalem

8:29 and at gibeon dwelt the father of gibeon; whose wife name wa
maachah: 8:30 and hi firstborn son abdon and zur and kish and
baal and nadab 8:31 and gedor and ahio and zacher

8:32 and mikloth begat shimeah and these also dwelt with their
brethren in jerusalem over against them

8:33 and ner begat kish and kish begat saul and saul begat jonathan
and malchishua and abinadab and eshbaal

8:34 and the son of jonathan wa meribbaal; and meribba begat micah

8:35 and the son of micah were pithon and melech and tarea and
ahaz

8:36 and ahaz begat jehoadah; and jehoadah begat alemeth and
azmaveth and zimri; and zimri begat moza 8:37 and moza begat binea:
rapha wa hi son eleasah hi son azel hi son: 8:38 and azel had
six son whose name are these azrikam bocheru and ishmael and
sheariah and obadiah and hanan all these were the son of azel

8:39 and the son of eshek hi brother were ulam hi firstborn
jehush the second and eliphelet the third

8:40 and the son of ulam were mighti men of valour archer and had
mani son and son son an hundr and fifti all these are of the
son of benjamin

9:1 so all israel were reckon by genealogies; and behold they were
written in the book of the king of israel and judah who were carri
away to babylon for their transgress

9:2 now the first inhabit that dwelt in their possess in their
citi were the israelit the priest levit and the nethinim

9:3 and in jerusalem dwelt of the children of judah and of the
children of benjamin and of the children of ephraim and manasseh;
9:4 uthai the son of ammihud the son of omri the son of imri the
son of bani of the children of pharez the son of judah

9:5 and of the shilonites; asaiah the firstborn and hi son

9:6 and of the son of zerah; jeuel and their brethren six hundr
and nineti

9:7 and of the son of benjamin; sallu the son of meshullam the son
of hodaviah the son of hasenuah 9:8 and ibneiah the son of jeroham
and elah the son of uzzi the son of michri and meshullam the son of
shephathiah the son of reuel the son of ibnijah; 9:9 and their
brethren accord to their gener nine hundr and fifti and
six all these men were chief of the father in the hous of their
father

9:10 and of the priests; jedaiah and jehoiarib and jachin 9:11 and
azariah the son of hilkiah the son of meshullam the son of zadok
the son of meraioth the son of ahitub the ruler of the hous of god;
9:12 and adaiah the son of jeroham the son of pashur the son of
malchijah and maasiai the son of adiel the son of jahzerah the son
of meshullam the son of meshillemith the son of immer; 9:13 and
their brethren head of the hous of their father a thousand and
seven hundr and threescore; veri abl men for the work of the
servic of the hous of god

9:14 and of the levites; shemaiah the son of hasshub the son of
azrikam the son of hashabiah of the son of merari; 9:15 and
bakbakkar heresh and galal and mattaniah the son of micah the son
of zichri the son of asaph; 9:16 and obadiah the son of shemaiah the
son of galal the son of jeduthun and berechiah the son of asa the
son of elkanah that dwelt in the villag of the netophathit

9:17 and the porter were shallum and akkub and talmon and ahiman
and their brethren: shallum wa the chief; 9:18 who hitherto wait in
the king gate eastward: they were porter in the compani of the
children of levi

9:19 and shallum the son of kore the son of ebiasaph the son of
korah and hi brethren of the hous of hi father the korahit
were over the work of the servic keeper of the gate of the
tabernacle: and their father be over the host of the lord were
keeper of the entri

9:20 and phineha the son of eleazar wa the ruler over them in time
past and the lord wa with him

9:21 and zechariah the son of meshelemiah wa porter of the door of
the tabernacl of the congreg

9:22 all these which were chosen to be porter in the gate were two
hundr and twelv these were reckon by their genealog in their
villag whom david and samuel the seer did ordain in their set
offic

9:23 so they and their children had the oversight of the gate of the
hous of the lord name the hous of the tabernacl by ward

9:24 in four quarter were the porter toward the east west north
and south

9:25 and their brethren which were in their villag were to come
after seven day from time to time with them

9:26 for these levit the four chief porter were in their set
offic and were over the chamber and treasuri of the hous of god

9:27 and they lodg round about the hous of god becaus the charg
wa upon them and the open thereof everi morn pertain to
them

9:28 and certain of them had the charg of the minist vessel
that they should bring them in and out by tale

9:29 some of them also were appoint to overse the vessel and all
the instrument of the sanctuari and the fine flour and the wine
and the oil and the frankincens and the spice

9:30 and some of the son of the priest made the ointment of the
spice

9:31 and mattithiah one of the levit who wa the firstborn of
shallum the korahit had the set offic over the thing that were
made in the pan

9:32 and other of their brethren of the son of the kohathit were
over the shewbread to prepar it everi sabbath

9:33 and these are the singer chief of the father of the levit
who remain in the chamber were free: for they were employ in
that work day and night

9:34 these chief father of the levit were chief throughout their
generations; these dwelt at jerusalem

9:35 and in gibeon dwelt the father of gibeon jehiel whose wife
name wa maachah: 9:36 and hi firstborn son abdon then zur and
kish and baal and ner and nadab

9:37 and gedor and ahio and zechariah and mikloth

9:38 and mikloth begat shimeam and they also dwelt with their
brethren at jerusalem over against their brethren

9:39 and ner begat kish; and kish begat saul; and saul begat jonathan
and malchishua and abinadab and eshbaal

9:40 and the son of jonathan wa meribbaal: and meribba begat micah

9:41 and the son of micah were pithon and melech and tahrea and
ahaz

9:42 and ahaz begat jarah; and jarah begat alemeth and azmaveth and
zimri; and zimri begat moza; 9:43 and moza begat binea; and rephaiah
hi son eleasah hi son azel hi son

9:44 and azel had six son whose name are these azrikam bocheru
and ishmael and sheariah and obadiah and hanan: these were the son
of azel

10:1 now the philistin fought against israel; and the men of israel
fled from befor the philistin and fell down slain in mount gilboa

10:2 and the philistin follow hard after saul and after hi sons;
and the philistin slew jonathan and abinadab and malchishua the
son of saul

10:3 and the battl went sore against saul and the archer hit him
and he wa wound of the archer

10:4 then said saul to hi armourbear draw thi sword and thrust me
through therewith; lest these uncircumcis come and abus me but hi
armourbear would not; for he wa sore afraid so saul took a sword
and fell upon it

10:5 and when hi armourbear saw that saul wa dead he fell
likewis on the sword and die

10:6 so saul die and hi three son and all hi hous die
togeth

10:7 and when all the men of israel that were in the valley saw that
they fled and that saul and hi son were dead then they forsook
their citi and fled: and the philistin came and dwelt in them

10:8 and it came to pass on the morrow when the philistin came to
strip the slain that they found saul and hi son fallen in mount
gilboa

10:9 and when they had strip him they took hi head and hi
armour and sent into the land of the philistin round about to
carri tide unto their idol and to the peopl

10:10 and they put hi armour in the hous of their god and fasten
hi head in the templ of dagon

10:11 and when all jabeshgilead heard all that the philistin had
done to saul 10:12 they aros all the valiant men and took away the
bodi of saul and the bodi of hi son and brought them to jabesh
and buri their bone under the oak in jabesh and fast seven day

10:13 so saul die for hi transgress which he commit against
the lord even against the word of the lord which he kept not and
also for ask counsel of one that had a familiar spirit to enquir
of it; 10:14 and enquir not of the lord: therefor he slew him and
turn the kingdom unto david the son of jess

11:1 then all israel gather themselv to david unto hebron say
behold we are thi bone and thi flesh

11:2 and moreov in time past even when saul wa king thou wast he
that leddest out and broughtest in israel: and the lord thi god said
unto thee thou shalt feed my peopl israel and thou shalt be ruler
over my peopl israel

11:3 therefor came all the elder of israel to the king to hebron;
and david made a coven with them in hebron befor the lord; and
they anoint david king over israel accord to the word of the
lord by samuel

11:4 and david and all israel went to jerusalem which is jebus; where
the jebusit were the inhabit of the land

11:5 and the inhabit of jebu said to david thou shalt not come
hither nevertheless david took the castl of zion which is the citi
of david

11:6 and david said whosoev smiteth the jebusit first shall be
chief and captain so joab the son of zeruiah went first up and wa
chief

11:7 and david dwelt in the castle; therefor they call it the citi
of david

11:8 and he built the citi round about even from millo round about:
and joab repair the rest of the citi

11:9 so david wax greater and greater: for the lord of host wa
with him

11:10 these also are the chief of the mighti men whom david had who
strengthen themselv with him in hi kingdom and with all israel
to make him king accord to the word of the lord concern israel

11:11 and thi is the number of the mighti men whom david had;
jashobeam an hachmonit the chief of the captains: he lift up hi
spear against three hundr slain by him at one time

11:12 and after him wa eleazar the son of dodo the ahohit who wa
one of the three mighti

11:13 he wa with david at pasdammim and there the philistin were
gather togeth to battl where wa a parcel of ground full of
barley; and the peopl fled from befor the philistin

11:14 and they set themselv in the midst of that parcel and
deliv it and slew the philistines; and the lord save them by a
great deliver

11:15 now three of the thirti captain went down to the rock to david
into the cave of adullam; and the host of the philistin encamp in
the valley of rephaim

11:16 and david wa then in the hold and the philistin garrison
wa then at bethlehem

11:17 and david long and said oh that one would give me drink of
the water of the well of bethlehem that is at the gate! 11:18 and
the three brake through the host of the philistin and drew water
out of the well of bethlehem that wa by the gate and took it and
brought it to david: but david would not drink of it but pour it
out to the lord

11:19 and said my god forbid it me that i should do thi thing:
shall i drink the blood of these men that have put their live in
jeopardy? for with the jeopardi of their live they brought it
therefor he would not drink it

these thing did these three mightiest

11:20 and abishai the brother of joab he wa chief of the three: for
lift up hi spear against three hundr he slew them and had a
name among the three

11:21 of the three he wa more honour than the two; for he wa
