their captain: howbeit he attain not to the first three

11:22 benaiah the son of jehoiada the son of a valiant man of
kabzeel who had done mani acts; he slew two lionlik men of moab:
also he went down and slew a lion in a pit in a snowi day

11:23 and he slew an egyptian a man of great statur five cubit
high; and in the egyptian hand wa a spear like a weaver beam; and
he went down to him with a staff and pluck the spear out of the
egyptian hand and slew him with hi own spear

11:24 these thing did benaiah the son of jehoiada and had the name
among the three mighti

11:25 behold he wa honour among the thirti but attain not to
the first three: and david set him over hi guard

11:26 also the valiant men of the armi were asahel the brother of
joab elhanan the son of dodo of bethlehem 11:27 shammoth the
harorit helez the pelonit 11:28 ira the son of ikkesh the tekoit
abiez the antothit 11:29 sibbecai the hushathit ilai the
ahohit 11:30 maharai the netophathit hele the son of baanah the
netophathit 11:31 ithai the son of ribai of gibeah that pertain
to the children of benjamin benaiah the pirathonit 11:32 hurai of
the brook of gaash abiel the arbathit 11:33 azmaveth the
baharumit eliahba the shaalbonit 11:34 the son of hashem the
gizonit jonathan the son of shage the hararit 11:35 ahiam the son
of sacar the hararit eliph the son of ur 11:36 hepher the
mecherathit ahijah the pelonit 11:37 hezro the carmelit naarai
the son of ezbai 11:38 joel the brother of nathan mibhar the son of
haggeri 11:39 zelek the ammonit naharai the berothit the
armourbear of joab the son of zeruiah 11:40 ira the ithrit gareb
the ithrit 11:41 uriah the hittit zabad the son of ahlai 11:42
adina the son of shiza the reubenit a captain of the reubenit and
thirti with him 11:43 hanan the son of maachah and joshaphat the
mithnit 11:44 uzzia the ashterathit shama and jehiel the son of
hothan the aroerit 11:45 jediael the son of shimri and joha hi
brother the tizit 11:46 eliel the mahavit and jeribai and
joshaviah the son of elnaam and ithmah the moabit 11:47 eliel
and obe and jasiel the mesobait

12:1 now these are they that came to david to ziklag while he yet
kept himself close becaus of saul the son of kish: and they were
among the mighti men helper of the war

12:2 they were arm with bow and could use both the right hand and
the left in hurl stone and shoot arrow out of a bow even of
saul brethren of benjamin

12:3 the chief wa ahiez then joash the son of shemaah the
gibeathite; and jeziel and pelet the son of azmaveth; and berachah
and jehu the antothit

12:4 and ismaiah the gibeonit a mighti man among the thirti and
over the thirty; and jeremiah and jahaziel and johanan and josabad
the gederathit 12:5 eluzai and jerimoth and bealiah and
shemariah and shephatiah the haruphit 12:6 elkanah and jesiah and
azareel and joezer and jashobeam the korhit 12:7 and joelah and
zebadiah the son of jeroham of gedor

12:8 and of the gadit there separ themselv unto david into the
hold to the wilder men of might and men of war fit for the
battl that could handl shield and buckler whose face were like
the face of lion and were as swift as the roe upon the mountains;
12:9 ezer the first obadiah the second eliab the third 12:10
mishmannah the fourth jeremiah the fifth 12:11 attai the sixth
eliel the seventh 12:12 johanan the eighth elzabad the ninth 12:13
jeremiah the tenth machbanai the eleventh

12:14 these were of the son of gad captain of the host: one of the
least wa over an hundr and the greatest over a thousand

12:15 these are they that went over jordan in the first month when it
had overflown all hi banks; and they put to flight all them of the
valley both toward the east and toward the west

12:16 and there came of the children of benjamin and judah to the hold
unto david

12:17 and david went out to meet them and answer and said unto
them if ye be come peaceabl unto me to help me mine heart shall be
knit unto you: but if ye be come to betray me to mine enemi see
there is no wrong in mine hand the god of our father look thereon
and rebuk it

12:18 then the spirit came upon amasai who wa chief of the captain
and he said thine are we david and on thi side thou son of jesse:
peac peac be unto thee and peac be to thine helpers; for thi god
helpeth thee

then david receiv them and made them captain of the band

12:19 and there fell some of manasseh to david when he came with the
philistin against saul to battle: but they help them not: for the
lord of the philistin upon advis sent him away say he
will fall to hi master saul to the jeopardi of our head

12:20 as he went to ziklag there fell to him of manasseh adnah and
jozabad and jediael and michael and jozabad and elihu and
zilthai captain of the thousand that were of manasseh

12:21 and they help david against the band of the rovers: for they
were all mighti men of valour and were captain in the host

12:22 for at that time day by day there came to david to help him
until it wa a great host like the host of god

12:23 and these are the number of the band that were readi arm to
the war and came to david to hebron to turn the kingdom of saul to
him accord to the word of the lord

12:24 the children of judah that bare shield and spear were six
thousand and eight hundr readi arm to the war

12:25 of the children of simeon mighti men of valour for the war
seven thousand and one hundr

12:26 of the children of levi four thousand and six hundr

12:27 and jehoiada wa the leader of the aaronit and with him were
three thousand and seven hundred; 12:28 and zadok a young man mighti
of valour and of hi father hous twenti and two captain

12:29 and of the children of benjamin the kindr of saul three
thousand: for hitherto the greatest part of them had kept the ward of
the hous of saul

12:30 and of the children of ephraim twenti thousand and eight
hundr mighti men of valour famou throughout the hous of their
father

12:31 and of the half tribe of manasseh eighteen thousand which were
express by name to come and make david king

12:32 and of the children of issachar which were men that had
understand of the time to know what israel ought to do; the head
of them were two hundred; and all their brethren were at their
command

12:33 of zebulun such as went forth to battl expert in war with
all instrument of war fifti thousand which could keep rank: they
were not of doubl heart

12:34 and of naphtali a thousand captain and with them with shield
and spear thirti and seven thousand

12:35 and of the danit expert in war twenti and eight thousand and
six hundr

12:36 and of asher such as went forth to battl expert in war forti
thousand

12:37 and on the other side of jordan of the reubenit and the
gadit and of the half tribe of manasseh with all manner of
instrument of war for the battl an hundr and twenti thousand

12:38 all these men of war that could keep rank came with a perfect
heart to hebron to make david king over all israel: and all the rest
also of israel were of one heart to make david king

12:39 and there they were with david three day eat and drinking:
for their brethren had prepar for them

12:40 moreov they that were nigh them even unto issachar and
zebulun and naphtali brought bread on ass and on camel and on
mule and on oxen and meat meal cake of fig and bunch of
raisin and wine and oil and oxen and sheep abundantly: for there
wa joy in israel

13:1 and david consult with the captain of thousand and hundr
and with everi leader

13:2 and david said unto all the congreg of israel if it seem
good unto you and that it be of the lord our god let us send abroad
unto our brethren everi where that are left in all the land of
israel and with them also to the priest and levit which are in
their citi and suburb that they may gather themselv unto us:
13:3 and let us bring again the ark of our god to us: for we enquir
not at it in the day of saul

13:4 and all the congreg said that they would do so: for the
thing wa right in the eye of all the peopl

13:5 so david gather all israel togeth from shihor of egypt even
unto the enter of hemath to bring the ark of god from
kirjathjearim

13:6 and david went up and all israel to baalah that is to
kirjathjearim which belong to judah to bring up thenc the ark of
god the lord that dwelleth between the cherubim whose name is
call on it

13:7 and they carri the ark of god in a new cart out of the hous of
abinadab: and uzza and ahio drave the cart

13:8 and david and all israel play befor god with all their might
and with sing and with harp and with psalteri and with
timbrel and with cymbal and with trumpet

13:9 and when they came unto the threshingfloor of chidon uzza put
forth hi hand to hold the ark; for the oxen stumbl

13:10 and the anger of the lord wa kindl against uzza and he smote
him becaus he put hi hand to the ark: and there he die befor god

13:11 and david wa displeas becaus the lord had made a breach
upon uzza: wherefor that place is call perezuzza to thi day

13:12 and david wa afraid of god that day say how shall i bring
the ark of god home to me? 13:13 so david brought not the ark home to
himself to the citi of david but carri it asid into the hous of
obededom the gittit

13:14 and the ark of god remain with the famili of obededom in hi
hous three month and the lord bless the hous of obededom and
all that he had

14:1 now hiram king of tyre sent messeng to david and timber of
cedar with mason and carpent to build him an hous

14:2 and david perceiv that the lord had confirm him king over
israel for hi kingdom wa lift up on high becaus of hi peopl
israel

14:3 and david took more wive at jerusalem: and david begat more son
and daughter

14:4 now these are the name of hi children which he had in
jerusalem; shammua and shobab nathan and solomon 14:5 and ibhar
and elishua and elpalet 14:6 and nogah and nepheg and japhia 14:7
and elishama and beeliada and eliphalet

14:8 and when the philistin heard that david wa anoint king over
all israel all the philistin went up to seek david and david heard
of it and went out against them

14:9 and the philistin came and spread themselv in the valley of
rephaim

14:10 and david enquir of god say shall i go up against the
philistines? and wilt thou deliv them into mine hand? and the lord
said unto him go up; for i will deliv them into thine hand

14:11 so they came up to baalperazim; and david smote them there then
david said god hath broken in upon mine enemi by mine hand like the
break forth of waters: therefor they call the name of that place
baalperazim

14:12 and when they had left their god there david gave a
command and they were burn with fire

14:13 and the philistin yet again spread themselv abroad in the
valley

14:14 therefor david enquir again of god; and god said unto him go
not up after them; turn away from them and come upon them over
against the mulberri tree

14:15 and it shall be when thou shalt hear a sound of go in the
top of the mulberri tree that then thou shalt go out to battle: for
god is gone forth befor thee to smite the host of the philistin

14:16 david therefor did as god command him: and they smote the
host of the philistin from gibeon even to gazer

14:17 and the fame of david went out into all lands; and the lord
brought the fear of him upon all nation

15:1 and david made him hous in the citi of david and prepar a
place for the ark of god and pitch for it a tent

15:2 then david said none ought to carri the ark of god but the
levites: for them hath the lord chosen to carri the ark of god and to
minist unto him for ever

15:3 and david gather all israel togeth to jerusalem to bring up
the ark of the lord unto hi place which he had prepar for it

15:4 and david assembl the children of aaron and the levites: 15:5
of the son of kohath; uriel the chief and hi brethren an hundr
and twenty: 15:6 of the son of merari; asaiah the chief and hi
brethren two hundr and twenty: 15:7 of the son of gershom; joel the
chief and hi brethren an hundr and thirty: 15:8 of the son of
elizaphan; shemaiah the chief and hi brethren two hundred: 15:9 of
the son of hebron; eliel the chief and hi brethren fourscore: 15:10
of the son of uzziel; amminadab the chief and hi brethren an
hundr and twelv

15:11 and david call for zadok and abiathar the priest and for the
levit for uriel asaiah and joel shemaiah and eliel and
amminadab 15:12 and said unto them ye are the chief of the father
of the levites: sanctifi yourselv both ye and your brethren that
ye may bring up the ark of the lord god of israel unto the place that
i have prepar for it

15:13 for becaus ye did it not at the first the lord our god made a
breach upon us for that we sought him not after the due order

15:14 so the priest and the levit sanctifi themselv to bring up
the ark of the lord god of israel

15:15 and the children of the levit bare the ark of god upon their
shoulder with the stave thereon as mose command accord to the
word of the lord

15:16 and david spake to the chief of the levit to appoint their
brethren to be the singer with instrument of musick psalteri and
harp and cymbal sound by lift up the voic with joy

15:17 so the levit appoint heman the son of joel; and of hi
brethren asaph the son of berechiah; and of the son of merari their
brethren ethan the son of kushaiah; 15:18 and with them their
brethren of the second degre zechariah ben and jaaziel and
shemiramoth and jehiel and unni eliab and benaiah and maaseiah
and mattithiah and elipheleh and mikneiah and obededom and jeiel
the porter

15:19 so the singer heman asaph and ethan were appoint to sound
with cymbal of brass; 15:20 and zechariah and aziel and
shemiramoth and jehiel and unni and eliab and maaseiah and
benaiah with psalteri on alamoth; 15:21 and mattithiah and
elipheleh and mikneiah and obededom and jeiel and azaziah with
harp on the sheminith to excel

15:22 and chenaniah chief of the levit wa for song: he instruct
about the song becaus he wa skil

15:23 and berechiah and elkanah were doorkeep for the ark

15:24 and shebaniah and jehoshaphat and nethaneel and amasai and
zechariah and benaiah and eliez the priest did blow with the
trumpet befor the ark of god: and obededom and jehiah were
doorkeep for the ark

15:25 so david and the elder of israel and the captain over
thousand went to bring up the ark of the coven of the lord out of
the hous of obededom with joy

15:26 and it came to pass when god help the levit that bare the
ark of the coven of the lord that they offer seven bullock and
seven ram

15:27 and david wa cloth with a robe of fine linen and all the
levit that bare the ark and the singer and chenaniah the master
of the song with the singers: david also had upon him an ephod of
linen

15:28 thu all israel brought up the ark of the coven of the lord
with shout and with sound of the cornet and with trumpet and
with cymbal make a nois with psalteri and harp

15:29 and it came to pass as the ark of the coven of the lord came
to the citi of david that michal the daughter of saul look out at
a window saw king david danc and playing: and she despis him in
her heart

16:1 so they brought the ark of god and set it in the midst of the
tent that david had pitch for it: and they offer burnt sacrific
and peac offer befor god

16:2 and when david had made an end of offer the burnt offer
and the peac offer he bless the peopl in the name of the
lord

16:3 and he dealt to everi one of israel both man and woman to everi
one a loaf of bread and a good piec of flesh and a flagon of wine

16:4 and he appoint certain of the levit to minist befor the
ark of the lord and to record and to thank and prais the lord god
of israel: 16:5 asaph the chief and next to him zechariah jeiel and
shemiramoth and jehiel and mattithiah and eliab and benaiah and
obededom: and jeiel with psalteri and with harps; but asaph made a
sound with cymbals; 16:6 benaiah also and jahaziel the priest with
trumpet continu befor the ark of the coven of god

16:7 then on that day david deliv first thi psalm to thank the
lord into the hand of asaph and hi brethren

16:8 give thank unto the lord call upon hi name make known hi
deed among the peopl

16:9 sing unto him sing psalm unto him talk ye of all hi wondrou
work

16:10 glori ye in hi holi name: let the heart of them rejoic that
seek the lord

16:11 seek the lord and hi strength seek hi face continu

16:12 rememb hi marvel work that he hath done hi wonder
and the judgment of hi mouth; 16:13 o ye seed of israel hi servant
ye children of jacob hi chosen one

16:14 he is the lord our god; hi judgment are in all the earth

16:15 be ye mind alway of hi covenant; the word which he
command to a thousand generations; 16:16 even of the coven which
he made with abraham and of hi oath unto isaac; 16:17 and hath
confirm the same to jacob for a law and to israel for an
everlast coven 16:18 say unto thee will i give the land of
canaan the lot of your inheritance; 16:19 when ye were but few even
a few and stranger in it

16:20 and when they went from nation to nation and from one kingdom
to anoth people; 16:21 he suffer no man to do them wrong: yea he
reprov king for their sake 16:22 say touch not mine anoint
and do my prophet no harm

16:23 sing unto the lord all the earth; shew forth from day to day
hi salvat

16:24 declar hi glori among the heathen; hi marvel work among
all nation

16:25 for great is the lord and greatli to be praised: he also is to
be fear abov all god

16:26 for all the god of the peopl are idols: but the lord made the
heaven

16:27 glori and honour are in hi presence; strength and glad are
in hi place

16:28 give unto the lord ye kindr of the peopl give unto the
lord glori and strength

16:29 give unto the lord the glori due unto hi name: bring an
offer and come befor him: worship the lord in the beauti of
holi

16:30 fear befor him all the earth: the world also shall be stabl
that it be not move

16:31 let the heaven be glad and let the earth rejoice: and let men
say among the nation the lord reigneth

16:32 let the sea roar and the ful thereof: let the field
rejoic and all that is therein

16:33 then shall the tree of the wood sing out at the presenc of the
lord becaus he cometh to judg the earth

16:34 o give thank unto the lord; for he is good; for hi merci
endureth for ever

16:35 and say ye save us o god of our salvat and gather us
togeth and deliv us from the heathen that we may give thank to
thi holi name and glori in thi prais

16:36 bless be the lord god of israel for ever and ever and all the
peopl said amen and prais the lord

16:37 so he left there befor the ark of the coven of the lord
asaph and hi brethren to minist befor the ark continu as
everi day work required: 16:38 and obededom with their brethren
threescor and eight; obededom also the son of jeduthun and hosah to
be porters: 16:39 and zadok the priest and hi brethren the priest
befor the tabernacl of the lord in the high place that wa at
gibeon 16:40 to offer burnt offer unto the lord upon the altar of
the burnt offer continu morn and even and to do
accord to all that is written in the law of the lord which he
command israel; 16:41 and with them heman and jeduthun and the rest
that were chosen who were express by name to give thank to the
lord becaus hi merci endureth for ever; 16:42 and with them heman
and jeduthun with trumpet and cymbal for those that should make a
sound and with music instrument of god and the son of jeduthun
were porter

16:43 and all the peopl depart everi man to hi house: and david
return to bless hi hous

17:1 now it came to pass as david sat in hi hous that david said
to nathan the prophet lo i dwell in an hous of cedar but the ark
of the coven of the lord remaineth under curtain

17:2 then nathan said unto david do all that is in thine heart; for
god is with thee

17:3 and it came to pass the same night that the word of god came to
nathan say 17:4 go and tell david my servant thu saith the
lord thou shalt not build me an hous to dwell in: 17:5 for i have
not dwelt in an hous sinc the day that i brought up israel unto thi
day; but have gone from tent to tent and from one tabernacl to
anoth

17:6 wheresoev i have walk with all israel spake i a word to ani
of the judg of israel whom i command to feed my peopl say
whi have ye not built me an hous of cedars? 17:7 now therefor thu
shalt thou say unto my servant david thu saith the lord of host i
took thee from the sheepcot even from follow the sheep that thou
shouldest be ruler over my peopl israel: 17:8 and i have been with
thee whithersoev thou hast walk and have cut off all thine
enemi from befor thee and have made thee a name like the name of
the great men that are in the earth

17:9 also i will ordain a place for my peopl israel and will plant
them and they shall dwell in their place and shall be move no more;
neither shall the children of wicked wast them ani more as at
the begin 17:10 and sinc the time that i command judg to be
over my peopl israel moreov i will subdu all thine enemi
furthermor i tell thee that the lord will build thee an hous

17:11 and it shall come to pass when thi day be expir that thou
must go to be with thi father that i will rais up thi seed after
thee which shall be of thi sons; and i will establish hi kingdom

17:12 he shall build me an hous and i will stablish hi throne for
ever

17:13 i will be hi father and he shall be my son: and i will not
take my merci away from him as i took it from him that wa befor
thee: 17:14 but i will settl him in mine hous and in my kingdom for
ever: and hi throne shall be establish for evermor

17:15 accord to all these word and accord to all thi vision
so did nathan speak unto david

17:16 and david the king came and sat befor the lord and said who
am i o lord god and what is mine hous that thou hast brought me
hitherto? 17:17 and yet thi wa a small thing in thine eye o god;
for thou hast also spoken of thi servant hous for a great while to
come and hast regard me accord to the estat of a man of high
degre o lord god

17:18 what can david speak more to thee for the honour of thi servant?
for thou knowest thi servant

17:19 o lord for thi servant sake and accord to thine own
heart hast thou done all thi great in make known all these
great thing

17:20 o lord there is none like thee neither is there ani god besid
thee accord to all that we have heard with our ear

17:21 and what one nation in the earth is like thi peopl israel whom
god went to redeem to be hi own peopl to make thee a name of
great and terribl by drive out nation from befor thi
peopl whom thou hast redeem out of egypt? 17:22 for thi peopl
israel didst thou make thine own peopl for ever; and thou lord
becamest their god

17:23 therefor now lord let the thing that thou hast spoken
concern thi servant and concern hi hous be establish for
ever and do as thou hast said

17:24 let it even be establish that thi name may be magnifi for
ever say the lord of host is the god of israel even a god to
israel: and let the hous of david thi servant be establish befor
thee

17:25 for thou o my god hast told thi servant that thou wilt build
him an house: therefor thi servant hath found in hi heart to pray
befor thee

17:26 and now lord thou art god and hast promis thi good
unto thi servant: 17:27 now therefor let it pleas thee to bless the
hous of thi servant that it may be befor thee for ever: for thou
blessest o lord and it shall be bless for ever

18:1 now after thi it came to pass that david smote the philistin
and subdu them and took gath and her town out of the hand of the
philistin

18:2 and he smote moab; and the moabit becam david servant and
brought gift

18:3 and david smote hadarez king of zobah unto hamath as he went
to stablish hi dominion by the river euphrat

18:4 and david took from him a thousand chariot and seven thousand
horsemen and twenti thousand footmen: david also hough all the
chariot hors but reserv of them an hundr chariot

18:5 and when the syrian of damascu came to help hadarez king of
zobah david slew of the syrian two and twenti thousand men

18:6 then david put garrison in syriadamascus; and the syrian becam
david servant and brought gift thu the lord preserv david
whithersoev he went

18:7 and david took the shield of gold that were on the servant of
hadarez and brought them to jerusalem

18:8 likewis from tibhath and from chun citi of hadarez
brought david veri much brass wherewith solomon made the brasen sea
and the pillar and the vessel of brass

18:9 now when tou king of hamath heard how david had smitten all the
host of hadarez king of zobah; 18:10 he sent hadoram hi son to king
david to enquir of hi welfar and to congratul him becaus he
had fought against hadarez and smitten him; (for hadarez had war
with tou;) and with him all manner of vessel of gold and silver and
brass

18:11 them also king david dedic unto the lord with the silver
and the gold that he brought from all these nations; from edom and
from moab and from the children of ammon and from the philistin
and from amalek

18:12 moreov abishai the son of zeruiah slew of the edomit in the
valley of salt eighteen thousand

18:13 and he put garrison in edom; and all the edomit becam
david servant thu the lord preserv david whithersoev he went

18:14 so david reign over all israel and execut judgment and
justic among all hi peopl

18:15 and joab the son of zeruiah wa over the host; and jehoshaphat
the son of ahilud record

18:16 and zadok the son of ahitub and abimelech the son of abiathar
were the priests; and shavsha wa scribe; 18:17 and benaiah the son of
jehoiada wa over the cherethit and the pelethites; and the son of
david were chief about the king

19:1 now it came to pass after thi that nahash the king of the
children of ammon die and hi son reign in hi stead

19:2 and david said i will shew kind unto hanun the son of
nahash becaus hi father shew kind to me and david sent
messeng to comfort him concern hi father so the servant of
david came into the land of the children of ammon to hanun to comfort
him

19:3 but the princ of the children of ammon said to hanun thinkest
thou that david doth honour thi father that he hath sent comfort
unto thee? are not hi servant come unto thee for to search and to
overthrow and to spi out the land? 19:4 wherefor hanun took david
servant and shave them and cut off their garment in the midst
hard by their buttock and sent them away

19:5 then there went certain and told david how the men were serv
and he sent to meet them: for the men were greatli asham and the
king said tarri at jericho until your beard be grown and then
return

19:6 and when the children of ammon saw that they had made themselv
odiou to david hanun and the children of ammon sent a thousand
talent of silver to hire them chariot and horsemen out of
mesopotamia and out of syriamaachah and out of zobah

19:7 so they hire thirti and two thousand chariot and the king of
maachah and hi people; who came and pitch befor medeba and the
children of ammon gather themselv togeth from their citi and
came to battl

19:8 and when david heard of it he sent joab and all the host of the
mighti men

19:9 and the children of ammon came out and put the battl in array
befor the gate of the city: and the king that were come were by
themselv in the field

19:10 now when joab saw that the battl wa set against him befor and
behind he chose out of all the choic of israel and put them in
array against the syrian

19:11 and the rest of the peopl he deliv unto the hand of abishai
hi brother and they set themselv in array against the children of
ammon

19:12 and he said if the syrian be too strong for me then thou
shalt help me: but if the children of ammon be too strong for thee
then i will help thee

19:13 be of good courag and let us behav ourselv valiantli for
our peopl and for the citi of our god: and let the lord do that
which is good in hi sight

19:14 so joab and the peopl that were with him drew nigh befor the
syrian unto the battle; and they fled befor him

19:15 and when the children of ammon saw that the syrian were fled
they likewis fled befor abishai hi brother and enter into the
citi then joab came to jerusalem

19:16 and when the syrian saw that they were put to the wors befor
israel they sent messeng and drew forth the syrian that were
beyond the river: and shophach the captain of the host of hadarez
went befor them

19:17 and it wa told david; and he gather all israel and pass
over jordan and came upon them and set the battl in array against
them so when david had put the battl in array against the syrian
they fought with him

19:18 but the syrian fled befor israel; and david slew of the
syrian seven thousand men which fought in chariot and forti
thousand footmen and kill shophach the captain of the host

19:19 and when the servant of hadarez saw that they were put to the
wors befor israel they made peac with david and becam hi
servants: neither would the syrian help the children of ammon ani
more

20:1 and it came to pass that after the year wa expir at the time
that king go out to battl joab led forth the power of the armi and
wast the countri of the children of ammon and came and besieg
rabbah but david tarri at jerusalem and joab smote rabbah and
destroy it

20:2 and david took the crown of their king from off hi head and
found it to weigh a talent of gold and there were preciou stone in
it; and it wa set upon david head: and he brought also exceed
much spoil out of the citi

20:3 and he brought out the peopl that were in it and cut them with
saw and with harrow of iron and with axe even so dealt david
with all the citi of the children of ammon and david and all the
peopl return to jerusalem

20:4 and it came to pass after thi that there aros war at gezer
with the philistines; at which time sibbechai the hushathit slew
sippai that wa of the children of the giant: and they were subdu

20:5 and there wa war again with the philistines; and elhanan the son
of jair slew lahmi the brother of goliath the gittit whose spear
staff wa like a weaver beam

20:6 and yet again there wa war at gath where wa a man of great
statur whose finger and toe were four and twenti six on each
hand and six on each foot and he also wa the son of the giant

20:7 but when he defi israel jonathan the son of shimea david
brother slew him

20:8 these were born unto the giant in gath; and they fell by the hand
of david and by the hand of hi servant

21:1 and satan stood up against israel and provok david to number
israel

21:2 and david said to joab and to the ruler of the peopl go
number israel from beersheba even to dan; and bring the number of them
to me that i may know it

21:3 and joab answer the lord make hi peopl an hundr time so
mani more as they be: but my lord the king are they not all my
lord servants? whi then doth my lord requir thi thing? whi will
he be a caus of trespass to israel? 21:4 nevertheless the king
word prevail against joab wherefor joab depart and went
throughout all israel and came to jerusalem

21:5 and joab gave the sum of the number of the peopl unto david and
all they of israel were a thousand thousand and an hundr thousand
men that drew sword: and judah wa four hundr threescor and ten
thousand men that drew sword

21:6 but levi and benjamin count he not among them: for the king
word wa abomin to joab

21:7 and god wa displeas with thi thing; therefor he smote
israel

21:8 and david said unto god i have sin greatli becaus i have
done thi thing: but now i beseech thee do away the iniqu of thi
servant; for i have done veri foolishli

21:9 and the lord spake unto gad david seer say 21:10 go and
tell david say thu saith the lord i offer thee three things:
choos thee one of them that i may do it unto thee

21:11 so gad came to david and said unto him thu saith the lord
choos thee 21:12 either three year famine; or three month to be
destroy befor thi foe while that the sword of thine enemi
overtaketh thee; or els three day the sword of the lord even the
pestil in the land and the angel of the lord destroy
throughout all the coast of israel now therefor advis thyself what
word i shall bring again to him that sent me

21:13 and david said unto gad i am in a great strait: let me fall now
into the hand of the lord; for veri great are hi mercies: but let me
not fall into the hand of man

21:14 so the lord sent pestil upon israel: and there fell of
israel seventi thousand men

21:15 and god sent an angel unto jerusalem to destroy it: and as he
wa destroy the lord beheld and he repent him of the evil and
said to the angel that destroy it is enough stay now thine hand
and the angel of the lord stood by the threshingfloor of ornan the
jebusit

21:16 and david lift up hi eye and saw the angel of the lord
stand between the earth and the heaven have a drawn sword in hi
hand stretch out over jerusalem then david and the elder of
israel who were cloth in sackcloth fell upon their face

21:17 and david said unto god is it not i that command the peopl
to be numbered? even i it is that have sin and done evil indeed;
but as for these sheep what have they done? let thine hand i pray
thee o lord my god be on me and on my father house; but not on
thi peopl that they should be plagu

21:18 then the angel of the lord command gad to say to david that
david should go up and set up an altar unto the lord in the
threshingfloor of ornan the jebusit

21:19 and david went up at the say of gad which he spake in the
name of the lord

21:20 and ornan turn back and saw the angel; and hi four son with
him hid themselv now ornan wa thresh wheat

21:21 and as david came to ornan ornan look and saw david and went
out of the threshingfloor and bow himself to david with hi face to
the ground

21:22 then david said to ornan grant me the place of thi
threshingfloor that i may build an altar therein unto the lord: thou
shalt grant it me for the full price: that the plagu may be stay
from the peopl

21:23 and ornan said unto david take it to thee and let my lord the
king do that which is good in hi eyes: lo i give thee the oxen also
for burnt offer and the thresh instrument for wood and the
wheat for the meat offering; i give it all

21:24 and king david said to ornan nay; but i will verili buy it for
the full price: for i will not take that which is thine for the lord
nor offer burnt offer without cost

21:25 so david gave to ornan for the place six hundr shekel of gold
by weight

21:26 and david built there an altar unto the lord and offer burnt
offer and peac offer and call upon the lord; and he
answer him from heaven by fire upon the altar of burnt offer

21:27 and the lord command the angel; and he put up hi sword again
into the sheath thereof

21:28 at that time when david saw that the lord had answer him in
the threshingfloor of ornan the jebusit then he sacrif there

21:29 for the tabernacl of the lord which mose made in the
wilder and the altar of the burnt offer were at that season
in the high place at gibeon

21:30 but david could not go befor it to enquir of god: for he wa
afraid becaus of the sword of the angel of the lord

22:1 then david said thi is the hous of the lord god and thi is
the altar of the burnt offer for israel

22:2 and david command to gather togeth the stranger that were in
the land of israel; and he set mason to hew wrought stone to build
the hous of god

22:3 and david prepar iron in abund for the nail for the door
of the gate and for the joinings; and brass in abund without
weight; 22:4 also cedar tree in abundance: for the zidonian and they
of tyre brought much cedar wood to david

22:5 and david said solomon my son is young and tender and the hous
that is to be build for the lord must be exceed magnif of
fame and of glori throughout all countries: i will therefor now make
prepar for it so david prepar abundantli befor hi death

22:6 then he call for solomon hi son and charg him to build an
hous for the lord god of israel

22:7 and david said to solomon my son as for me it wa in my mind
to build an hous unto the name of the lord my god: 22:8 but the word
of the lord came to me say thou hast shed blood abundantli and
hast made great wars: thou shalt not build an hous unto my name
becaus thou hast shed much blood upon the earth in my sight

22:9 behold a son shall be born to thee who shall be a man of rest;
and i will give him rest from all hi enemi round about: for hi
name shall be solomon and i will give peac and quiet unto israel
in hi day

22:10 he shall build an hous for my name; and he shall be my son and
i will be hi father; and i will establish the throne of hi kingdom
over israel for ever

22:11 now my son the lord be with thee; and prosper thou and build
the hous of the lord thi god as he hath said of thee

22:12 onli the lord give thee wisdom and understand and give thee
charg concern israel that thou mayest keep the law of the lord
thi god

22:13 then shalt thou prosper if thou takest heed to fulfil the
statut and judgment which the lord charg mose with concern
israel: be strong and of good courage; dread not nor be dismay

22:14 now behold in my troubl i have prepar for the hous of the
lord an hundr thousand talent of gold and a thousand thousand
talent of silver; and of brass and iron without weight; for it is in
abundance: timber also and stone have i prepared; and thou mayest add
thereto

22:15 moreov there are workmen with thee in abund hewer and
worker of stone and timber and all manner of cun men for everi
manner of work

22:16 of the gold the silver and the brass and the iron there is
no number aris therefor and be do and the lord be with thee

22:17 david also command all the princ of israel to help solomon
hi son say 22:18 is not the lord your god with you? and hath he
not given you rest on everi side? for he hath given the inhabit of
the land into mine hand; and the land is subdu befor the lord and
befor hi peopl

22:19 now set your heart and your soul to seek the lord your god;
aris therefor and build ye the sanctuari of the lord god to bring
the ark of the coven of the lord and the holi vessel of god into
the hous that is to be built to the name of the lord

23:1 so when david wa old and full of day he made solomon hi son
king over israel

23:2 and he gather togeth all the princ of israel with the
priest and the levit

23:3 now the levit were number from the age of thirti year and
upward: and their number by their poll man by man wa thirti and
eight thousand

23:4 of which twenti and four thousand were to set forward the work
of the hous of the lord; and six thousand were offic and judges:
23:5 moreov four thousand were porters; and four thousand prais
the lord with the instrument which i made said david to prais
therewith

23:6 and david divid them into cours among the son of levi
name gershon kohath and merari

23:7 of the gershonit were laadan and shimei

23:8 the son of laadan; the chief wa jehiel and zetham and joel
three

23:9 the son of shimei; shelomith and haziel and haran three
these were the chief of the father of laadan

23:10 and the son of shimei were jahath zina and jeush and
beriah

these four were the son of shimei

23:11 and jahath wa the chief and zizah the second: but jeush and
beriah had not mani sons; therefor they were in one reckon
accord to their father hous

23:12 the son of kohath; amram izhar hebron and uzziel four

23:13 the son of amram; aaron and moses: and aaron wa separ
that he should sanctifi the most holi thing he and hi son for
ever to burn incens befor the lord to minist unto him and to
bless in hi name for ever

23:14 now concern mose the man of god hi son were name of the
tribe of levi

23:15 the son of mose were gershom and eliez

23:16 of the son of gershom shebuel wa the chief

23:17 and the son of eliez were rehabiah the chief and eliez
had none other sons; but the son of rehabiah were veri mani

23:18 of the son of izhar; shelomith the chief

23:19 of the son of hebron; jeriah the first amariah the second
jahaziel the third and jekameam the fourth

23:20 of the son of uzziel; micah the first and jesiah the second

23:21 the son of merari; mahli and mushi the son of mahli;
eleazar and kish

23:22 and eleazar die and had no son but daughters: and their
brethren the son of kish took them

23:23 the son of mushi; mahli and eder and jeremoth three

23:24 these were the son of levi after the hous of their fathers;
even the chief of the father as they were count by number of name
by their poll that did the work for the servic of the hous of the
lord from the age of twenti year and upward

23:25 for david said the lord god of israel hath given rest unto hi
peopl that they may dwell in jerusalem for ever: 23:26 and also unto
the levites; they shall no more carri the tabernacl nor ani vessel
of it for the servic thereof

23:27 for by the last word of david the levit were number from
twenti year old and above: 23:28 becaus their offic wa to wait on
the son of aaron for the servic of the hous of the lord in the
court and in the chamber and in the purifi of all holi thing
and the work of the servic of the hous of god; 23:29 both for the
shewbread and for the fine flour for meat offer and for the
unleaven cake and for that which is bake in the pan and for that
which is fri and for all manner of measur and size; 23:30 and to
stand everi morn to thank and prais the lord and likewis at
even: 23:31 and to offer all burnt sacrific unto the lord in the
sabbath in the new moon and on the set feast by number
accord to the order command unto them continu befor the
lord: 23:32 and that they should keep the charg of the tabernacl of
the congreg and the charg of the holi place and the charg of
the son of aaron their brethren in the servic of the hous of the
lord

24:1 now these are the divis of the son of aaron the son of
aaron; nadab and abihu eleazar and ithamar

24:2 but nadab and abihu die befor their father and had no
children: therefor eleazar and ithamar execut the priest offic

24:3 and david distribut them both zadok of the son of eleazar
and ahimelech of the son of ithamar accord to their offic in
their servic

24:4 and there were more chief men found of the son of eleazar than
of the son of ithamar and thu were they divid among the son of
eleazar there were sixteen chief men of the hous of their father
and eight among the son of ithamar accord to the hous of their
father

24:5 thu were they divid by lot one sort with another; for the
governor of the sanctuari and governor of the hous of god were of
the son of eleazar and of the son of ithamar

24:6 and shemaiah the son of nethaneel the scribe one of the levit
wrote them befor the king and the princ and zadok the priest and
ahimelech the son of abiathar and befor the chief of the father of
the priest and levites: one princip household be taken for
eleazar and one taken for ithamar

24:7 now the first lot came forth to jehoiarib the second to jedaiah
24:8 the third to harim the fourth to seorim 24:9 the fifth to
malchijah the sixth to mijamin 24:10 the seventh to hakkoz the
eighth to abijah 24:11 the ninth to jeshuah the tenth to shecaniah
24:12 the eleventh to eliashib the twelfth to jakim 24:13 the
thirteenth to huppah the fourteenth to jeshebeab 24:14 the fifteenth
to bilgah the sixteenth to immer 24:15 the seventeenth to hezir the
eighteenth to aphs 24:16 the nineteenth to pethahiah the twentieth
to jehezekel 24:17 the one and twentieth to jachin the two and
twentieth to gamul 24:18 the three and twentieth to delaiah the four
and twentieth to maaziah

24:19 these were the order of them in their servic to come into
the hous of the lord accord to their manner under aaron their
father as the lord god of israel had command him

24:20 and the rest of the son of levi were these: of the son of
amram; shubael: of the son of shubael; jehdeiah

24:21 concern rehabiah: of the son of rehabiah the first wa
isshiah

24:22 of the izharites; shelomoth: of the son of shelomoth; jahath

24:23 and the son of hebron; jeriah the first amariah the second
jahaziel the third jekameam the fourth

24:24 of the son of uzziel; michah: of the son of michah; shamir

24:25 the brother of michah wa isshiah: of the son of isshiah;
zechariah

24:26 the son of merari were mahli and mushi: the son of jaaziah;
beno

24:27 the son of merari by jaaziah; beno and shoham and zaccur and
ibri

24:28 of mahli came eleazar who had no son

24:29 concern kish: the son of kish wa jerahmeel

24:30 the son also of mushi; mahli and eder and jerimoth these
were the son of the levit after the hous of their father

24:31 these likewis cast lot over against their brethren the son of
aaron in the presenc of david the king and zadok and ahimelech and
the chief of the father of the priest and levit even the
princip father over against their younger brethren

25:1 moreov david and the captain of the host separ to the
servic of the son of asaph and of heman and of jeduthun who
should prophesi with harp with psalteri and with cymbals: and the
number of the workmen accord to their servic was: 25:2 of the son
of asaph; zaccur and joseph and nethaniah and asarelah the son of
asaph under the hand of asaph which prophesi accord to the
order of the king

25:3 of jeduthun: the son of jeduthun; gedaliah and zeri and
jeshaiah hashabiah and mattithiah six under the hand of their
father jeduthun who prophesi with a harp to give thank and to
prais the lord

25:4 of heman: the son of heman: bukkiah mattaniah uzziel shebuel
and jerimoth hananiah hanani eliathah giddalti and romamtiez
joshbekashah mallothi hothir and mahazioth: 25:5 all these were the
son of heman the king seer in the word of god to lift up the
horn and god gave to heman fourteen son and three daughter

25:6 all these were under the hand of their father for song in the
hous of the lord with cymbal psalteri and harp for the
servic of the hous of god accord to the king order to asaph
jeduthun and heman

25:7 so the number of them with their brethren that were instruct
in the song of the lord even all that were cun wa two hundr
fourscor and eight

25:8 and they cast lot ward against ward as well the small as the
great the teacher as the scholar

25:9 now the first lot came forth for asaph to joseph: the second to
gedaliah who with hi brethren and son were twelve: 25:10 the third
to zaccur he hi son and hi brethren were twelve: 25:11 the
fourth to izri he hi son and hi brethren were twelve: 25:12 the
fifth to nethaniah he hi son and hi brethren were twelve: 25:13
the sixth to bukkiah he hi son and hi brethren were twelve:
25:14 the seventh to jesharelah he hi son and hi brethren were
twelve: 25:15 the eighth to jeshaiah he hi son and hi brethren
were twelve: 25:16 the ninth to mattaniah he hi son and hi
brethren were twelve: 25:17 the tenth to shimei he hi son and
hi brethren were twelve: 25:18 the eleventh to azareel he hi
son and hi brethren were twelve: 25:19 the twelfth to hashabiah
he hi son and hi brethren were twelve: 25:20 the thirteenth to
shubael he hi son and hi brethren were twelve: 25:21 the
fourteenth to mattithiah he hi son and hi brethren were twelve:
25:22 the fifteenth to jeremoth he hi son and hi brethren were
twelve: 25:23 the sixteenth to hananiah he hi son and hi
brethren were twelve: 25:24 the seventeenth to joshbekashah he hi
son and hi brethren were twelve: 25:25 the eighteenth to hanani
he hi son and hi brethren were twelve: 25:26 the nineteenth to
mallothi he hi son and hi brethren were twelve: 25:27 the
twentieth to eliathah he hi son and hi brethren were twelve:
25:28 the one and twentieth to hothir he hi son and hi brethren
were twelve: 25:29 the two and twentieth to giddalti he hi son
and hi brethren were twelve: 25:30 the three and twentieth to
mahazioth he hi son and hi brethren were twelve: 25:31 the four
and twentieth to romamtiez he hi son and hi brethren were
twelv

26:1 concern the divis of the porters: of the korhit wa
meshelemiah the son of kore of the son of asaph

26:2 and the son of meshelemiah were zechariah the firstborn
jediael the second zebadiah the third jathniel the fourth 26:3 elam
the fifth jehohanan the sixth elioenai the seventh

26:4 moreov the son of obededom were shemaiah the firstborn
jehozabad the second joah the third and sacar the fourth and
nethaneel the fifth

26:5 ammiel the sixth issachar the seventh peulthai the eighth: for
god bless him

26:6 also unto shemaiah hi son were son born that rule throughout
the hous of their father: for they were mighti men of valour

26:7 the son of shemaiah; othni and rephael and obe elzabad
whose brethren were strong men elihu and semachiah

26:8 all these of the son of obededom: they and their son and their
brethren abl men for strength for the servic were threescor and
two of obededom

26:9 and meshelemiah had son and brethren strong men eighteen

26:10 also hosah of the children of merari had sons; simri the
chief (for though he wa not the firstborn yet hi father made him
the chief;) 26:11 hilkiah the second tebaliah the third zechariah
the fourth: all the son and brethren of hosah were thirteen

26:12 among these were the divis of the porter even among the
chief men have ward one against anoth to minist in the hous
of the lord

26:13 and they cast lot as well the small as the great accord to
the hous of their father for everi gate

26:14 and the lot eastward fell to shelemiah then for zechariah hi
son a wise counsellor they cast lots; and hi lot came out
northward

26:15 to obededom southward; and to hi son the hous of asuppim

26:16 to shuppim and hosah the lot came forth westward with the gate
shallecheth by the causeway of the go up ward against ward

26:17 eastward were six levit northward four a day southward four
a day and toward asuppim two and two

26:18 at parbar westward four at the causeway and two at parbar

26:19 these are the divis of the porter among the son of kore
and among the son of merari

26:20 and of the levit ahijah wa over the treasur of the hous
of god and over the treasur of the dedic thing

26:21 as concern the son of laadan; the son of the gershonit
laadan chief father even of laadan the gershonit were jehi

26:22 the son of jehieli; zetham and joel hi brother which were
over the treasur of the hous of the lord

26:23 of the amramit and the izharit the hebronit and the
uzzielites: 26:24 and shebuel the son of gershom the son of mose
wa ruler of the treasur

26:25 and hi brethren by eliezer; rehabiah hi son and jeshaiah hi
son and joram hi son and zichri hi son and shelomith hi son

26:26 which shelomith and hi brethren were over all the treasur of
the dedic thing which david the king and the chief father the
captain over thousand and hundr and the captain of the host
had dedic

26:27 out of the spoil won in battl did they dedic to maintain
the hous of the lord

26:28 and all that samuel the seer and saul the son of kish and
abner the son of ner and joab the son of zeruiah had dedicated; and
whosoev had dedic ani thing it wa under the hand of shelomith
and of hi brethren

26:29 of the izharit chenaniah and hi son were for the outward
busi over israel for offic and judg

26:30 and of the hebronit hashabiah and hi brethren men of
valour a thousand and seven hundr were offic among them of
israel on thi side jordan westward in all the busi of the lord
and in the servic of the king

26:31 among the hebronit wa jerijah the chief even among the
hebronit accord to the gener of hi father in the
fortieth year of the reign of david they were sought for and there
were found among them mighti men of valour at jazer of gilead

26:32 and hi brethren men of valour were two thousand and seven
hundr chief father whom king david made ruler over the
reubenit the gadit and the half tribe of manasseh for everi
matter pertain to god and affair of the king

27:1 now the children of israel after their number to wit the chief
father and captain of thousand and hundr and their offic
that serv the king in ani matter of the cours which came in and
went out month by month throughout all the month of the year of
everi cours were twenti and four thousand

27:2 over the first cours for the first month wa jashobeam the son
of zabdiel: and in hi cours were twenti and four thousand

27:3 of the children of perez wa the chief of all the captain of the
host for the first month

27:4 and over the cours of the second month wa dodai an ahohit and
of hi cours wa mikloth also the ruler: in hi cours likewis were
twenti and four thousand

27:5 the third captain of the host for the third month wa benaiah the
son of jehoiada a chief priest: and in hi cours were twenti and
four thousand

27:6 thi is that benaiah who wa mighti among the thirti and abov
the thirty: and in hi cours wa ammizabad hi son

27:7 the fourth captain for the fourth month wa asahel the brother of
joab and zebadiah hi son after him: and in hi cours were twenti
and four thousand

27:8 the fifth captain for the fifth month wa shamhuth the izrahite:
and in hi cours were twenti and four thousand

27:9 the sixth captain for the sixth month wa ira the son of ikkesh
the tekoite: and in hi cours were twenti and four thousand

27:10 the seventh captain for the seventh month wa helez the
pelonit of the children of ephraim: and in hi cours were twenti
and four thousand

27:11 the eighth captain for the eighth month wa sibbecai the
hushathit of the zarhites: and in hi cours were twenti and four
thousand

27:12 the ninth captain for the ninth month wa abiez the
anetothit of the benjamites: and in hi cours were twenti and four
thousand

27:13 the tenth captain for the tenth month wa maharai the
netophathit of the zarhites: and in hi cours were twenti and four
thousand

27:14 the eleventh captain for the eleventh month wa benaiah the
pirathonit of the children of ephraim: and in hi cours were twenti
and four thousand

27:15 the twelfth captain for the twelfth month wa heldai the
netophathit of othniel: and in hi cours were twenti and four
thousand

27:16 furthermor over the tribe of israel: the ruler of the
reubenit wa eliez the son of zichri: of the simeonit
shephatiah the son of maachah: 27:17 of the levit hashabiah the son
of kemuel: of the aaronit zadok: 27:18 of judah elihu one of the
brethren of david: of issachar omri the son of michael: 27:19 of
zebulun ishmaiah the son of obadiah: of naphtali jerimoth the son of
azriel: 27:20 of the children of ephraim hoshea the son of azaziah:
of the half tribe of manasseh joel the son of pedaiah: 27:21 of the
half tribe of manasseh in gilead iddo the son of zechariah: of
benjamin jaasiel the son of abner: 27:22 of dan azareel the son of
jeroham these were the princ of the tribe of israel

27:23 but david took not the number of them from twenti year old and
under: becaus the lord had said he would increas israel like to the
star of the heaven

27:24 joab the son of zeruiah began to number but he finish not
becaus there fell wrath for it against israel; neither wa the number
put in the account of the chronicl of king david

27:25 and over the king treasur wa azmaveth the son of adiel: and
over the storehous in the field in the citi and in the
villag and in the castl wa jehonathan the son of uzziah: 27:26
and over them that did the work of the field for tillag of the ground
wa ezri the son of chelub: 27:27 and over the vineyard wa shimei
the ramathite: over the increas of the vineyard for the wine cellar
wa zabdi the shiphmite: 27:28 and over the oliv tree and the
sycomor tree that were in the low plain wa baalhanan the gederite:
and over the cellar of oil wa joash: 27:29 and over the herd that
fed in sharon wa shitrai the sharonite: and over the herd that were
in the valley wa shaphat the son of adlai: 27:30 over the camel
also wa obil the ishmaelite: and over the ass wa jehdeiah the
meronothite: 27:31 and over the flock wa jaziz the hagerit all
these were the ruler of the substanc which wa king david

27:32 also jonathan david uncl wa a counsellor a wise man and a
scribe: and jehiel the son of hachmoni wa with the king sons: 27:33
and ahithophel wa the king counsellor: and hushai the archit wa
the king companion: 27:34 and after ahithophel wa jehoiada the son
of benaiah and abiathar: and the gener of the king armi wa joab

28:1 and david assembl all the princ of israel the princ of the
tribe and the captain of the compani that minist to the king
by cours and the captain over the thousand and captain over the
hundr and the steward over all the substanc and possess of
the king and of hi son with the offic and with the mighti men
and with all the valiant men unto jerusalem

28:2 then david the king stood up upon hi feet and said hear me my
brethren and my people: as for me i had in mine heart to build an
hous of rest for the ark of the coven of the lord and for the
footstool of our god and had made readi for the building: 28:3 but
god said unto me thou shalt not build an hous for my name becaus
thou hast been a man of war and hast shed blood

28:4 howbeit the lord god of israel chose me befor all the hous of
my father to be king over israel for ever: for he hath chosen judah to
be the ruler; and of the hous of judah the hous of my father; and
among the son of my father he like me to make me king over all
israel: 28:5 and of all my son (for the lord hath given me mani
sons) he hath chosen solomon my son to sit upon the throne of the
kingdom of the lord over israel

28:6 and he said unto me solomon thi son he shall build my hous and
my courts: for i have chosen him to be my son and i will be hi
father

28:7 moreov i will establish hi kingdom for ever if he be constant
to do my command and my judgment as at thi day

28:8 now therefor in the sight of all israel the congreg of the
lord and in the audienc of our god keep and seek for all the
command of the lord your god: that ye may possess thi good land
and leav it for an inherit for your children after you for ever

28:9 and thou solomon my son know thou the god of thi father and
serv him with a perfect heart and with a will mind: for the lord
searcheth all heart and understandeth all the imagin of the
thoughts: if thou seek him he will be found of thee; but if thou
forsak him he will cast thee off for ever

28:10 take heed now; for the lord hath chosen thee to build an hous
for the sanctuary: be strong and do it

28:11 then david gave to solomon hi son the pattern of the porch and
of the hous thereof and of the treasuri thereof and of the upper
chamber thereof and of the inner parlour thereof and of the place
of the merci seat 28:12 and the pattern of all that he had by the
spirit of the court of the hous of the lord and of all the
chamber round about of the treasuri of the hous of god and of
the treasuri of the dedic things: 28:13 also for the cours of
the priest and the levit and for all the work of the servic of
the hous of the lord and for all the vessel of servic in the hous
of the lord

28:14 he gave of gold by weight for thing of gold for all
instrument of all manner of service; silver also for all instrument
of silver by weight for all instrument of everi kind of service:
28:15 even the weight for the candlestick of gold and for their
lamp of gold by weight for everi candlestick and for the lamp
thereof: and for the candlestick of silver by weight both for the
candlestick and also for the lamp thereof accord to the use of
everi candlestick

28:16 and by weight he gave gold for the tabl of shewbread for
everi table; and likewis silver for the tabl of silver: 28:17 also
pure gold for the fleshhook and the bowl and the cups: and for the
golden bason he gave gold by weight for everi bason; and likewis
silver by weight for everi bason of silver: 28:18 and for the altar of
incens refin gold by weight; and gold for the pattern of the
chariot of the cherubim that spread out their wing and cover the
ark of the coven of the lord

28:19 all thi said david the lord made me understand in write by
hi hand upon me even all the work of thi pattern

28:20 and david said to solomon hi son be strong and of good
courag and do it: fear not nor be dismayed: for the lord god even
my god will be with thee; he will not fail thee nor forsak thee
until thou hast finish all the work for the servic of the hous of
the lord

28:21 and behold the cours of the priest and the levit even
they shall be with thee for all the servic of the hous of god: and
there shall be with thee for all manner of workmanship everi will
skil man for ani manner of service: also the princ and all the
peopl will be wholli at thi command

29:1 furthermor david the king said unto all the congreg
solomon my son whom alon god hath chosen is yet young and tender
and the work is great: for the palac is not for man but for the lord
god

29:2 now i have prepar with all my might for the hous of my god the
gold for thing to be made of gold and the silver for thing of
silver and the brass for thing of brass the iron for thing of
iron and wood for thing of wood; onyx stone and stone to be set
glister stone and of diver colour and all manner of preciou
stone and marbl stone in abund

29:3 moreov becaus i have set my affect to the hous of my god
i have of mine own proper good of gold and silver which i have given
to the hous of my god over and abov all that i have prepar for
the holi hous

29:4 even three thousand talent of gold of the gold of ophir and
seven thousand talent of refin silver to overlay the wall of the
hous withal: 29:5 the gold for thing of gold and the silver for
thing of silver and for all manner of work to be made by the hand
of artific and who then is will to consecr hi servic thi
day unto the lord? 29:6 then the chief of the father and princ of
the tribe of israel and the captain of thousand and of hundr
with the ruler of the king work offer willingli 29:7 and gave
for the servic of the hous of god of gold five thousand talent and
ten thousand dram and of silver ten thousand talent and of brass
eighteen thousand talent and one hundr thousand talent of iron

29:8 and they with whom preciou stone were found gave them to the
treasur of the hous of the lord by the hand of jehiel the
gershonit

29:9 then the peopl rejoic for that they offer willingli
becaus with perfect heart they offer willingli to the lord: and
david the king also rejoic with great joy

29:10 wherefor david bless the lord befor all the congregation:
and david said bless be thou lord god of israel our father for
ever and ever

29:11 thine o lord is the great and the power and the glori
and the victori and the majesty: for all that is in the heaven and in
the earth is thine; thine is the kingdom o lord and thou art exalt
as head abov all

29:12 both rich and honour come of thee and thou reignest over all;
and in thine hand is power and might; and in thine hand it is to make
great and to give strength unto all

29:13 now therefor our god we thank thee and prais thi gloriou
name

29:14 but who am i and what is my peopl that we should be abl to
offer so willingli after thi sort? for all thing come of thee and
of thine own have we given thee

29:15 for we are stranger befor thee and sojourn as were all
our fathers: our day on the earth are as a shadow and there is none
abid

29:16 o lord our god all thi store that we have prepar to build
thee an hous for thine holi name cometh of thine hand and is all
thine own

29:17 i know also my god that thou triest the heart and hast
pleasur in upright as for me in the upright of mine heart i
have willingli offer all these things: and now have i seen with joy
thi peopl which are present here to offer willingli unto thee

29:18 o lord god of abraham isaac and of israel our father keep
thi for ever in the imagin of the thought of the heart of thi
peopl and prepar their heart unto thee: 29:19 and give unto solomon
my son a perfect heart to keep thi command thi testimoni and
thi statut and to do all these thing and to build the palac for
the which i have made provis

29:20 and david said to all the congreg now bless the lord your
god

and all the congreg bless the lord god of their father and
bow down their head and worship the lord and the king

29:21 and they sacrif sacrific unto the lord and offer burnt
offer unto the lord on the morrow after that day even a thousand
bullock a thousand ram and a thousand lamb with their drink
offer and sacrific in abund for all israel: 29:22 and did
eat and drink befor the lord on that day with great glad and
they made solomon the son of david king the second time and anoint
him unto the lord to be the chief governor and zadok to be priest

29:23 then solomon sat on the throne of the lord as king instead of
david hi father and prospered; and all israel obey him

29:24 and all the princ and the mighti men and all the son
likewis of king david submit themselv unto solomon the king

29:25 and the lord magnifi solomon exceedingli in the sight of all
israel and bestow upon him such royal majesti as had not been on
ani king befor him in israel

29:26 thu david the son of jess reign over all israel

29:27 and the time that he reign over israel wa forti years; seven
year reign he in hebron and thirti and three year reign he in
jerusalem

29:28 and he die in a good old age full of day rich and honour:
and solomon hi son reign in hi stead

29:29 now the act of david the king first and last behold they are
written in the book of samuel the seer and in the book of nathan the
prophet and in the book of gad the seer 29:30 with all hi reign and
hi might and the time that went over him and over israel and over
all the kingdom of the countri




the second book of the chronicl


1:1 and solomon the son of david wa strengthen in hi kingdom and
the lord hi god wa with him and magnifi him exceedingli

1:2 then solomon spake unto all israel to the captain of thousand
and of hundr and to the judg and to everi governor in all
israel the chief of the father

1:3 so solomon and all the congreg with him went to the high
place that wa at gibeon; for there wa the tabernacl of the
congreg of god which mose the servant of the lord had made in
the wilder

1:4 but the ark of god had david brought up from kirjathjearim to the
place which david had prepar for it: for he had pitch a tent for
it at jerusalem

1:5 moreov the brasen altar that bezaleel the son of uri the son
of hur had made he put befor the tabernacl of the lord: and
solomon and the congreg sought unto it

1:6 and solomon went up thither to the brasen altar befor the lord
which wa at the tabernacl of the congreg and offer a
thousand burnt offer upon it

1:7 in that night did god appear unto solomon and said unto him ask
what i shall give thee

1:8 and solomon said unto god thou hast shew great merci unto david
my father and hast made me to reign in hi stead

1:9 now o lord god let thi promis unto david my father be
established: for thou hast made me king over a peopl like the dust of
the earth in multitud

1:10 give me now wisdom and knowledg that i may go out and come in
befor thi people: for who can judg thi thi peopl that is so
great? 1:11 and god said to solomon becaus thi wa in thine heart
and thou hast not ask rich wealth or honour nor the life of
thine enemi neither yet hast ask long life; but hast ask wisdom
and knowledg for thyself that thou mayest judg my peopl over whom
i have made thee king: 1:12 wisdom and knowledg is grant unto thee;
and i will give thee rich and wealth and honour such as none of
the king have had that have been befor thee neither shall there ani
after thee have the like

1:13 then solomon came from hi journey to the high place that wa at
gibeon to jerusalem from befor the tabernacl of the congreg
and reign over israel

1:14 and solomon gather chariot and horsemen: and he had a thousand
and four hundr chariot and twelv thousand horsemen which he
place in the chariot citi and with the king at jerusalem

1:15 and the king made silver and gold at jerusalem as plenteou as
stone and cedar tree made he as the sycomor tree that are in the
vale for abund

1:16 and solomon had hors brought out of egypt and linen yarn: the
king merchant receiv the linen yarn at a price

1:17 and they fetch up and brought forth out of egypt a chariot for
six hundr shekel of silver and an hors for an hundr and fifty:
and so brought they out hors for all the king of the hittit and
for the king of syria by their mean

2:1 and solomon determin to build an hous for the name of the lord
and an hous for hi kingdom

2:2 and solomon told out threescor and ten thousand men to bear
burden and fourscor thousand to hew in the mountain and three
thousand and six hundr to overse them

2:3 and solomon sent to huram the king of tyre say as thou didst
deal with david my father and didst send him cedar to build him an
hous to dwell therein even so deal with me

2:4 behold i build an hous to the name of the lord my god to
dedic it to him and to burn befor him sweet incens and for the
continu shewbread and for the burnt offer morn and even
on the sabbath and on the new moon and on the solemn feast of the
lord our god thi is an ordin for ever to israel

2:5 and the hous which i build is great: for great is our god abov
all god

2:6 but who is abl to build him an hous see the heaven and
heaven of heaven cannot contain him? who am i then that i should
build him an hous save onli to burn sacrific befor him? 2:7 send
me now therefor a man cun to work in gold and in silver and in
brass and in iron and in purpl and crimson and blue and that can
skill to grave with the cun men that are with me in judah and in
jerusalem whom david my father did provid

2:8 send me also cedar tree fir tree and algum tree out of
lebanon: for i know that thi servant can skill to cut timber in
lebanon; and behold my servant shall be with thi servant 2:9 even
to prepar me timber in abundance: for the hous which i am about to
build shall be wonder great

2:10 and behold i will give to thi servant the hewer that cut
timber twenti thousand measur of beaten wheat and twenti thousand
measur of barley and twenti thousand bath of wine and twenti
thousand bath of oil

2:11 then huram the king of tyre answer in write which he sent to
solomon becaus the lord hath love hi peopl he hath made thee
king over them

2:12 huram said moreov bless be the lord god of israel that made
heaven and earth who hath given to david the king a wise son endu
with prudenc and understand that might build an hous for the
lord and an hous for hi kingdom

2:13 and now i have sent a cun man endu with understand of
huram my father 2:14 the son of a woman of the daughter of dan
and hi father wa a man of tyre skil to work in gold and in
silver in brass in iron in stone and in timber in purpl in
blue and in fine linen and in crimson; also to grave ani manner of
grave and to find out everi devic which shall be put to him with
thi cun men and with the cun men of my lord david thi father

2:15 now therefor the wheat and the barley the oil and the wine
which my lord hath spoken of let him send unto hi servants: 2:16 and
we will cut wood out of lebanon as much as thou shalt need: and we
will bring it to thee in float by sea to joppa; and thou shalt carri
it up to jerusalem

2:17 and solomon number all the stranger that were in the land of
israel after the number wherewith david hi father had number
them; and they were found an hundr and fifti thousand and three
thousand and six hundr

2:18 and he set threescor and ten thousand of them to be bearer of
burden and fourscor thousand to be hewer in the mountain and
three thousand and six hundr overs to set the peopl a work

3:1 then solomon began to build the hous of the lord at jerusalem in
mount moriah where the lord appear unto david hi father in the
place that david had prepar in the threshingfloor of ornan the
jebusit

3:2 and he began to build in the second day of the second month in
the fourth year of hi reign

3:3 now these are the thing wherein solomon wa instruct for the
build of the hous of god the length by cubit after the first
measur wa threescor cubit and the breadth twenti cubit

3:4 and the porch that wa in the front of the hous the length of it
wa accord to the breadth of the hous twenti cubit and the
height wa an hundr and twenty: and he overlaid it within with pure
gold

3:5 and the greater hous he ciel with fir tree which he overlaid
with fine gold and set thereon palm tree and chain

3:6 and he garnish the hous with preciou stone for beauty: and
the gold wa gold of parvaim

3:7 he overlaid also the hous the beam the post and the wall
thereof and the door thereof with gold; and grave cherubim on the
wall

3:8 and he made the most holi hous the length whereof wa accord
to the breadth of the hous twenti cubit and the breadth thereof
twenti cubits: and he overlaid it with fine gold amount to six
hundr talent

3:9 and the weight of the nail wa fifti shekel of gold and he
overlaid the upper chamber with gold

3:10 and in the most holi hous he made two cherubim of imag work
and overlaid them with gold

3:11 and the wing of the cherubim were twenti cubit long: one wing
of the one cherub wa five cubit reach to the wall of the house:
and the other wing wa likewis five cubit reach to the wing of
the other cherub

3:12 and one wing of the other cherub wa five cubit reach to the
wall of the house: and the other wing wa five cubit also join to
the wing of the other cherub

3:13 the wing of these cherubim spread themselv forth twenti
cubits: and they stood on their feet and their face were inward

3:14 and he made the vail of blue and purpl and crimson and fine
linen and wrought cherubim thereon

3:15 also he made befor the hous two pillar of thirti and five
cubit high and the chapit that wa on the top of each of them wa
five cubit

3:16 and he made chain as in the oracl and put them on the head
of the pillars; and made an hundr pomegran and put them on the
chain

3:17 and he rear up the pillar befor the templ one on the right
hand and the other on the left; and call the name of that on the
right hand jachin and the name of that on the left boaz

4:1 moreov he made an altar of brass twenti cubit the length
thereof and twenti cubit the breadth thereof and ten cubit the
height thereof

4:2 also he made a molten sea of ten cubit from brim to brim round
in compass and five cubit the height thereof; and a line of thirti
cubit did compass it round about

4:3 and under it wa the similitud of oxen which did compass it
round about: ten in a cubit compass the sea round about two row
of oxen were cast when it wa cast

4:4 it stood upon twelv oxen three look toward the north and
three look toward the west and three look toward the south and
three look toward the east: and the sea wa set abov upon them
and all their hinder part were inward

4:5 and the thick of it wa an handbreadth and the brim of it
like the work of the brim of a cup with flower of lilies; and it
receiv and held three thousand bath

4:6 he made also ten laver and put five on the right hand and five
on the left to wash in them: such thing as they offer for the
burnt offer they wash in them; but the sea wa for the priest to
wash in

4:7 and he made ten candlestick of gold accord to their form and
set them in the templ five on the right hand and five on the left

4:8 he made also ten tabl and place them in the templ five on
the right side and five on the left and he made an hundr bason of
gold

4:9 furthermor he made the court of the priest and the great court
and door for the court and overlaid the door of them with brass

4:10 and he set the sea on the right side of the east end over
against the south

4:11 and huram made the pot and the shovel and the bason and
huram finish the work that he wa to make for king solomon for the
hous of god; 4:12 to wit the two pillar and the pommel and the
chapit which were on the top of the two pillar and the two
wreath to cover the two pommel of the chapit which were on the
top of the pillars; 4:13 and four hundr pomegran on the two
wreaths; two row of pomegran on each wreath to cover the two
pommel of the chapit which were upon the pillar

4:14 he made also base and laver made he upon the bases; 4:15 one
sea and twelv oxen under it

4:16 the pot also and the shovel and the fleshhook and all their
instrument did huram hi father make to king solomon for the hous
of the lord of bright brass

4:17 in the plain of jordan did the king cast them in the clay ground
between succoth and zeredathah

4:18 thu solomon made all these vessel in great abundance: for the
weight of the brass could not be found out

4:19 and solomon made all the vessel that were for the hous of god
the golden altar also and the tabl whereon the shewbread wa set;
4:20 moreov the candlestick with their lamp that they should burn
after the manner befor the oracl of pure gold; 4:21 and the
flower and the lamp and the tong made he of gold and that
perfect gold; 4:22 and the snuffer and the bason and the spoon
and the censer of pure gold: and the entri of the hous the inner
door thereof for the most holi place and the door of the hous of
the templ were of gold

5:1 thu all the work that solomon made for the hous of the lord wa
finished: and solomon brought in all the thing that david hi father
had dedicated; and the silver and the gold and all the instrument
put he among the treasur of the hous of god

5:2 then solomon assembl the elder of israel and all the head of
the tribe the chief of the father of the children of israel unto
jerusalem to bring up the ark of the coven of the lord out of the
citi of david which is zion

5:3 wherefor all the men of israel assembl themselv unto the king
in the feast which wa in the seventh month

5:4 and all the elder of israel came; and the levit took up the
ark

5:5 and they brought up the ark and the tabernacl of the
congreg and all the holi vessel that were in the tabernacl
these did the priest and the levit bring up

5:6 also king solomon and all the congreg of israel that were
assembl unto him befor the ark sacrif sheep and oxen which
could not be told nor number for multitud

5:7 and the priest brought in the ark of the coven of the lord
unto hi place to the oracl of the hous into the most holi place
even under the wing of the cherubims: 5:8 for the cherubim spread
forth their wing over the place of the ark and the cherubim cover
the ark and the stave thereof abov

5:9 and they drew out the stave of the ark that the end of the
stave were seen from the ark befor the oracle; but they were not
seen without and there it is unto thi day

5:10 there wa noth in the ark save the two tabl which mose put
therein at horeb when the lord made a coven with the children of
israel when they came out of egypt

5:11 and it came to pass when the priest were come out of the holi
place: (for all the priest that were present were sanctifi and did
not then wait by course: 5:12 also the levit which were the singer
all of them of asaph of heman of jeduthun with their son and their
brethren be array in white linen have cymbal and psalteri
and harp stood at the east end of the altar and with them an
hundr and twenti priest sound with trumpets:) 5:13 it came even
to pass as the trumpet and singer were as one to make one sound
to be heard in prais and thank the lord; and when they lift up
their voic with the trumpet and cymbal and instrument of musick
and prais the lord say for he is good; for hi merci endureth
for ever: that then the hous wa fill with a cloud even the hous
of the lord; 5:14 so that the priest could not stand to minist by
reason of the cloud: for the glori of the lord had fill the hous of
god

6:1 then said solomon the lord hath said that he would dwell in the
thick dark

6:2 but i have built an hous of habit for thee and a place for
thi dwell for ever

6:3 and the king turn hi face and bless the whole congreg
of israel: and all the congreg of israel stood

6:4 and he said bless be the lord god of israel who hath with hi
hand fulfil that which he spake with hi mouth to my father david
say 6:5 sinc the day that i brought forth my peopl out of the
